function hE(t) {
    const s = [];
    return Array.from(t.childNodes).forEach(n => {
        if (n.nodeType === n.TEXT_NODE && n.textContent && s.push(n.textContent), GO(n)) {

                i = n.dataset.radixToastAnnounceExclude === "";
            if (!a)
                if (i) {
                    const o = n.dataset.radixToastAnnounceAlt;
                    o && s.push(o)
                } else
                    s.push(...hE(n))
        }
    }), s
}
function Jm(t, s, r, {discrete: n}) {

}
var GN = (t, s, r=0) => {
    const n = Math.abs(t.x),
        a = Math.abs(t.y),
        i = n > a;
    return s === "left" || s === "right" ? i && n > r : !i && a > r
};
function WO(t=() => {}) {

function GO(t) {
    return t.nodeType === t.ELEMENT_NODE
}
function KO(t) {
    const s = [],
        r = document.createTreeWalker(t, NodeFilter.SHOW_ELEMENT, {
            acceptNode: n => {
                const a = n.tagName === "INPUT" && n.type === "hidden";
                return n.disabled || n.hidden || a ? NodeFilter.FILTER_SKIP : n.tabIndex >= 0 ? NodeFilter.FILTER_ACCEPT : NodeFilter.FILTER_SKIP
            }
        });
    for (; r.nextNode();)
        s.push(r.currentNode);
    return s
}
function Wx(t) {

function jE(t) {
    var s,
        r,
        n = "";
    if (typeof t == "string" || typeof t == "number")
        n += t;
    else if (typeof t == "object")
        if (Array.isArray(t)) {
            var a = t.length;
            for (s = 0; s < a; s++)
                t[s] && (r = jE(t[s])) && (n && (n += " "), n += r)
        } else
            for (r in t)
                t[r] && (n && (n += " "), n += r);
    return n
}
function bE() {

}

                i.classGroupId = r;
                return
            }
            if (typeof a == "function") {
                if (q5(a)) {
                    Sv(a(n), s, r, n);
                    return
                }
                s.validators.push({
                    validator: a,
                    classGroupId: r
                });
                return
            }
            Object.entries(a).forEach(([i, o]) => {
                Sv(o, iw(s, i), r, n)
            })
        })
    },
    iw = (t, s) => {
        let r = t;
        return s.split(Dj).forEach(n => {
            r.nextPart.has(n) || r.nextPart.set(n, {
                nextPart: new Map,
                validators: []
            }),
            r = r.nextPart.get(n)
        }), r
    },
    q5 = t => t.isThemeGetter,
    B5 = (t, s) => s ? t.map(([r, n]) => {
        const a = n.map(i => typeof i == "string" ? s + i : typeof i == "object" ? Object.fromEntries(Object.entries(i).map(([o, l]) => [s + o, l])) : i);
        return [r, a]
    }) : t,
    H5 = t => {
        if (t < 1)
            return {
                get: () => {},
                set: () => {}
            };
        let s = 0,
            r = new Map,
            n = new Map;
        const a = (i, o) => {
            r.set(i, o),
            s++,
            s > t && (s = 0, n = r, r = new Map)
        };
        return {
            get(i) {
                let o = r.get(i);
                if (o !== void 0)
                    return o;
                if ((o = n.get(i)) !== void 0)
                    return a(i, o), o
            },
            set(i, o) {
                r.has(i) ? r.set(i, o) : a(i, o)
            }
        }
    },
    OE = "!",
    W5 = t => {
        const {separator: s, experimentalParseClassName: r} = t,
            n = s.length === 1,
            a = s[0],
            i = s.length,
            o = l => {
                const c = [];
                let d = 0,
                    u = 0,
                    m;
                for (let b = 0; b < l.length; b++) {
                    let j = l[b];
                    if (d === 0) {
                        if (j === a && (n || l.slice(b, b + i) === s)) {
                            c.push(l.slice(u, b)),
                            u = b + i;
                            continue
                        }
                        if (j === "/") {
                            m = b;
                            continue
                        }
                    }
                    j === "[" ? d++ : j === "]" && d--
                }
                const f = c.length === 0 ? l : l.substring(u),
                    y = f.startsWith(OE),
                    g = y ? f.substring(1) : f,
                    x = m && m > u ? m - u : void 0;
                return {
                    modifiers: c,
                    hasImportantModifier: y,
                    baseClassName: g,
                    maybePostfixModifierPosition: x
                }
            };
        return r ? l => r({
            className: l,
            parseClassName: o
        }) : o
    },
    G5 = t => {
        if (t.length <= 1)
            return t;
        const s = [];
        let r = [];
        return t.forEach(n => {
            n[0] === "[" ? (s.push(...r.sort(), n), r = []) : r.push(n)
        }), s.push(...r.sort()), s
    },
    K5 = t => ({
        cache: H5(t.cacheSize),
        parseClassName: W5(t),
        ...$5(t)
    }),
    Y5 = /\s+/,
    Q5 = (t, s) => {
        const {parseClassName: r, getClassGroupId: n, getConflictingClassGroupIds: a} = s,
            i = [],
            o = t.trim().split(Y5);
        let l = "";
        for (let c = o.length - 1; c >= 0; c -= 1) {
            const d = o[c],
                {modifiers: u, hasImportantModifier: m, baseClassName: f, maybePostfixModifierPosition: y} = r(d);
            let g = !!y,
                x = n(g ? f.substring(0, y) : f);
            if (!x) {
                if (!g) {
                    l = d + (l.length > 0 ? " " + l : l);
                    continue
                }
                if (x = n(f), !x) {
                    l = d + (l.length > 0 ? " " + l : l);
                    continue
                }
                g = !1
            }
            const b = G5(u).join(":"),
                j = m ? b + OE : b,
                p = j + x;
            if (i.includes(p))
                continue;
            i.push(p);
            const v = a(x, g);
            for (let N = 0; N < v.length; ++N) {
                const w = v[N];
                i.push(j + w)
            }
            l = d + (l.length > 0 ? " " + l : l)
        }
        return l
    };
function Z5() {
    let t = 0,
        s,
        r,
        n = "";
    for (; t < arguments.length;)
        (s = arguments[t++]) && (r = LE(s)) && (n && (n += " "), n += r);
    return n
}
const LE = t => {
    if (typeof t == "string")
        return t;
    let s,
        r = "";
    for (let n = 0; n < t.length; n++)
        t[n] && (s = LE(t[n])) && (r && (r += " "), r += s);
    return r
};
function X5(t, ...s) {
    let r,
        n,
        a,
        i = o;
    function o(c) {
        const d = s.reduce((u, m) => m(u), t());
        return r = K5(d), n = r.cache.get, a = r.cache.set, i = l, l(c)
    }
    function l(c) {
        const d = n(c);
        if (d)
            return d;
        const u = Q5(c, r);
        return a(c, u), u
    }
    return function() {
        return i(Z5.apply(null, arguments))
    }
}
const Wt = t => {
        const s = r => r[t] || [];

function ue(...t) {
    return gL(bE(t))

const bp = .21;
function $E(t) {
    return t * (1 + bp)
}
function ft(t, s=!0) {
    if (t == null || t === "")
        return "0,00 €";
    let r;
    return typeof t == "string" ? r = parseFloat(t.replace(",", ".")) : r = t, isNaN(r) || r < 0 ? "0,00 €" : (s && (r = $E(r)), new Intl.NumberFormat("es-ES", {
        style: "currency",
        currency: "EUR",
        minimumFractionDigits: 2
    }).format(r))
}
function vL(t) {
    if (t == null || t === "")
        return {
            basePrice: "0,00 €",
            iva: "0,00 €",
            totalPrice: "0,00 €",
            basePriceNum: 0,
            ivaNum: 0,
            totalPriceNum: 0
        };
    let s;
    if (typeof t == "string" ? s = parseFloat(t.replace(",", ".")) : s = t, isNaN(s) || s < 0)
        return {
            basePrice: "0,00 €",
            iva: "0,00 €",
            totalPrice: "0,00 €",
            basePriceNum: 0,
            ivaNum: 0,
            totalPriceNum: 0
        };
    const r = s * bp,
        n = s + r;
    return {
        basePrice: new Intl.NumberFormat("es-ES", {
            style: "currency",
            currency: "EUR",
            minimumFractionDigits: 2
        }).format(s),
        iva: new Intl.NumberFormat("es-ES", {
            style: "currency",
            currency: "EUR",
            minimumFractionDigits: 2
        }).format(r),
        totalPrice: new Intl.NumberFormat("es-ES", {
            style: "currency",
            currency: "EUR",
            minimumFractionDigits: 2
        }).format(n),
        basePriceNum: s,
        ivaNum: r,
        totalPriceNum: n
    }
}
function yL(t) {
    if (t == null || t === "")
        return "N/A";
    const s = typeof t == "string" ? parseFloat(t) : t;
    return isNaN(s) || s <= 0 ? "N/A" : `${(s / 100).toFixed(2)} kg`
}
function jL(t) {
    const s = typeof t == "string" ? new Date(t) : t;
    return new Intl.DateTimeFormat("es-ES", {
        day: "2-digit",
        month: "2-digit",
        year: "numeric"
    }).format(s)
}
function $n(t) {
    const s = typeof t == "string" ? new Date(t) : t;
    return new Intl.DateTimeFormat("es-ES", {
        day: "2-digit",
        month: "2-digit",
        year: "numeric",
        hour: "2-digit",
        minute: "2-digit"
    }).format(s)
}
function Kd(t) {
    if (!t || t === null || t === void 0 || t === "")
        return "N/A";
    const s = String(t).trim();
    if (!s)
        return "N/A";
    const r = s.toLowerCase();
    return {
            diesel: "Diésel",
            gasolina: "Gasolina",
            hibrido: "Híbrido",
            electrico: "Eléctrico",
            gas: "Gas",
            "sin plomo 95": "Gasolina Sin Plomo 95",
            "sin plomo 98": "Gasolina Sin Plomo 98",
            "sin plomo 91": "Gasolina Sin Plomo 91",
            "gas natural": "Gas Natural",
            "gasolina/eléctrico (combinado)": "Híbrido",
            el: "Eléctrico"
        }[r] || s
}

function CL() {
    const {toasts: t} = tt();
    return e.jsxs(bL, {
        children: [t.map(function({id: s, title: r, description: n, action: a, ...i}) {
            return e.jsxs(UE, {
                ...i,
                children: [e.jsxs("div", {
                    className: "grid gap-1",
                    children: [r && e.jsx(BE, {
                        children: r
                    }), n && e.jsx(HE, {
                        children: n
                    })]
                }), a, e.jsx(qE, {})]
            }, s)
        }), e.jsx(VE, {})]
    })
}
var SL = I2[" useId ".trim().toString()] || (() => {}),
    EL = 0;
function ln(t) {
    const [s, r] = h.useState(SL());
    return js(() => {
        t || r(n => n ?? String(EL++))
    }, [t]), t || (s ? `radix-${s}` : "")
}
const kL = ["top", "right", "bottom", "left"],
    uo = Math.min,
    tn = Math.max,
    xf = Math.round,
    eh = Math.floor,
    Na = t => ({
        x: t,
        y: t
    }),
    PL = {
        left: "right",
        right: "left",
        bottom: "top",
        top: "bottom"
    },
    _L = {
        start: "end",
        end: "start"
    };
function Ev(t, s, r) {
    return tn(t, uo(s, r))
}
function gi(t, s) {
    return typeof t == "function" ? t(s) : t
}
function vi(t) {
    return t.split("-")[0]
}
function Zc(t) {
    return t.split("-")[1]
}
function Oj(t) {
    return t === "x" ? "y" : "x"
}
function Lj(t) {
    return t === "y" ? "height" : "width"
}
function mo(t) {
    return ["top", "bottom"].includes(vi(t)) ? "y" : "x"
}
function Fj(t) {
    return Oj(mo(t))
}
function TL(t, s, r) {
    r === void 0 && (r = !1);
    const n = Zc(t),
        a = Fj(t),
        i = Lj(a);
    let o = a === "x" ? n === (r ? "end" : "start") ? "right" : "left" : n === "start" ? "bottom" : "top";
    return s.reference[i] > s.floating[i] && (o = gf(o)), [o, gf(o)]
}
function AL(t) {
    const s = gf(t);
    return [kv(t), s, kv(s)]
}
function kv(t) {
    return t.replace(/start|end/g, s => _L[s])
}
function ML(t, s, r) {
    const n = ["left", "right"],
        a = ["right", "left"],
        i = ["top", "bottom"],
        o = ["bottom", "top"];
    switch (t) {
    case "top":
    case "bottom":
        return r ? s ? a : n : s ? n : a;
    case "left":
    case "right":
        return s ? i : o;
    default:
        return []
    }
}
function RL(t, s, r, n) {
    const a = Zc(t);
    let i = ML(vi(t), r === "start", n);
    return a && (i = i.map(o => o + "-" + a), s && (i = i.concat(i.map(kv)))), i
}
function gf(t) {
    return t.replace(/left|right|bottom|top/g, s => PL[s])
}
function IL(t) {
    return {
        top: 0,
        right: 0,
        bottom: 0,
        left: 0,
        ...t
    }
}
function WE(t) {
    return typeof t != "number" ? IL(t) : {
        top: t,
        right: t,
        bottom: t,
        left: t
    }
}
function vf(t) {
    const {x: s, y: r, width: n, height: a} = t;
    return {
        width: n,
        height: a,
        top: r,
        left: s,
        right: s + n,
        bottom: r + a,
        x: s,
        y: r
    }
}
function ow(t, s, r) {
    let {reference: n, floating: a} = t;
    const i = mo(s),
        o = Fj(s),
        l = Lj(o),
        c = vi(s),
        d = i === "y",
        u = n.x + n.width / 2 - a.width / 2,
        m = n.y + n.height / 2 - a.height / 2,
        f = n[l] / 2 - a[l] / 2;
    let y;
    switch (c) {
    case "top":
        y = {
            x: u,
            y: n.y - a.height
        };
        break;
    case "bottom":
        y = {
            x: u,
            y: n.y + n.height
        };
        break;
    case "right":
        y = {
            x: n.x + n.width,
            y: m
        };
        break;
    case "left":
        y = {
            x: n.x - a.width,
            y: m
        };
        break;
    default:
        y = {
            x: n.x,
            y: n.y
        }
    }
    switch (Zc(s)) {
    case "start":
        y[o] -= f * (r && d ? -1 : 1);
        break;
    case "end":
        y[o] += f * (r && d ? -1 : 1);
        break
    }
    return y
}
const DL = async (t, s, r) => {
    const {placement: n="bottom", strategy: a="absolute", middleware: i=[], platform: o} = r,
        l = i.filter(Boolean),
        c = await (o.isRTL == null ? void 0 : o.isRTL(s));
    let d = await o.getElementRects({
            reference: t,
            floating: s,
            strategy: a
        }),
        {x: u, y: m} = ow(d, n, c),
        f = n,
        y = {},
        g = 0;
    for (let x = 0; x < l.length; x++) {
        const {name: b, fn: j} = l[x],
            {x: p, y: v, data: N, reset: w} = await j({
                x: u,
                y: m,
                initialPlacement: n,
                placement: f,
                strategy: a,
                middlewareData: y,
                rects: d,
                platform: o,
                elements: {
                    reference: t,
                    floating: s
                }
            });
        u = p ?? u,
        m = v ?? m,
        y = {
            ...y,
            [b]: {
                ...y[b],
                ...N
            }
        },
        w && g <= 50 && (g++, typeof w == "object" && (w.placement && (f = w.placement), w.rects && (d = w.rects === !0 ? await o.getElementRects({
            reference: t,
            floating: s,
            strategy: a
        }) : w.rects), {x: u, y: m} = ow(d, f, c)), x = -1)
    }
    return {
        x: u,
        y: m,
        placement: f,
        strategy: a,
        middlewareData: y
    }
};
async function yu(t, s) {
    var r;
    s === void 0 && (s = {});
    const {x: n, y: a, platform: i, rects: o, elements: l, strategy: c} = t,
        {boundary: d="clippingAncestors", rootBoundary: u="viewport", elementContext: m="floating", altBoundary: f=!1, padding: y=0} = gi(s, t),
        g = WE(y),
        b = l[f ? m === "floating" ? "reference" : "floating" : m],
        j = vf(await i.getClippingRect({
            element: (r = await (i.isElement == null ? void 0 : i.isElement(b))) == null || r ? b : b.contextElement || await (i.getDocumentElement == null ? void 0 : i.getDocumentElement(l.floating)),
            boundary: d,
            rootBoundary: u,
            strategy: c
        })),
        p = m === "floating" ? {
            x: n,
            y: a,
            width: o.floating.width,
            height: o.floating.height
        } : o.reference,
        v = await (i.getOffsetParent == null ? void 0 : i.getOffsetParent(l.floating)),
        N = await (i.isElement == null ? void 0 : i.isElement(v)) ? await (i.getScale == null ? void 0 : i.getScale(v)) || {
            x: 1,
            y: 1
        } : {
            x: 1,
            y: 1
        },
        w = vf(i.convertOffsetParentRelativeRectToViewportRelativeRect ? await i.convertOffsetParentRelativeRectToViewportRelativeRect({
            elements: l,
            rect: p,
            offsetParent: v,
            strategy: c
        }) : p);
    return {
        top: (j.top - w.top + g.top) / N.y,
        bottom: (w.bottom - j.bottom + g.bottom) / N.y,
        left: (j.left - w.left + g.left) / N.x,
        right: (w.right - j.right + g.right) / N.x
    }
}
const OL = t => ({
        name: "arrow",
        options: t,
        async fn(s) {
            const {x: r, y: n, placement: a, rects: i, platform: o, elements: l, middlewareData: c} = s,
                {element: d, padding: u=0} = gi(t, s) || {};
            if (d == null)
                return {};
            const m = WE(u),
                f = {
                    x: r,
                    y: n
                },
                y = Fj(a),
                g = Lj(y),
                x = await o.getDimensions(d),
                b = y === "y",
                j = b ? "top" : "left",
                p = b ? "bottom" : "right",
                v = b ? "clientHeight" : "clientWidth",
                N = i.reference[g] + i.reference[y] - f[y] - i.floating[g],
                w = f[y] - i.reference[y],
                C = await (o.getOffsetParent == null ? void 0 : o.getOffsetParent(d));
            let S = C ? C[v] : 0;
            (!S || !await (o.isElement == null ? void 0 : o.isElement(C))) && (S = l.floating[v] || i.floating[g]);
            const E = N / 2 - w / 2,
                O = S / 2 - x[g] / 2 - 1,
                G = uo(m[j], O),
                L = uo(m[p], O),
                I = G,
                z = S - x[g] - L,
                B = S / 2 - x[g] / 2 + E,
                F = Ev(I, B, z),
                T = !c.arrow && Zc(a) != null && B !== F && i.reference[g] / 2 - (B < I ? G : L) - x[g] / 2 < 0,
                k = T ? B < I ? B - I : B - z : 0;
            return {
                [y]: f[y] + k,
                data: {
                    [y]: F,
                    centerOffset: B - F - k,
                    ...T && {
                        alignmentOffset: k
                    }
                },
                reset: T
            }
        }
    }),
    LL = function(t) {
        return t === void 0 && (t = {}), {
            name: "flip",
            options: t,
            async fn(s) {
                var r,
                    n;
                const {placement: a, middlewareData: i, rects: o, initialPlacement: l, platform: c, elements: d} = s,
                    {mainAxis: u=!0, crossAxis: m=!0, fallbackPlacements: f, fallbackStrategy: y="bestFit", fallbackAxisSideDirection: g="none", flipAlignment: x=!0, ...b} = gi(t, s);
                if ((r = i.arrow) != null && r.alignmentOffset)
                    return {};
                const j = vi(a),
                    p = mo(l),
                    v = vi(l) === l,
                    N = await (c.isRTL == null ? void 0 : c.isRTL(d.floating)),
                    w = f || (v || !x ? [gf(l)] : AL(l)),
                    C = g !== "none";
                !f && C && w.push(...RL(l, x, g, N));
                const S = [l, ...w],
                    E = await yu(s, b),
                    O = [];
                let G = ((n = i.flip) == null ? void 0 : n.overflows) || [];
                if (u && O.push(E[j]), m) {
                    const B = TL(a, o, N);
                    O.push(E[B[0]], E[B[1]])
                }
                if (G = [...G, {
                    placement: a,
                    overflows: O
                }], !O.every(B => B <= 0)) {
                    var L,
                        I;
                    const B = (((L = i.flip) == null ? void 0 : L.index) || 0) + 1,
                        F = S[B];
                    if (F)
                        return {
                            data: {
                                index: B,
                                overflows: G
                            },
                            reset: {
                                placement: F
                            }
                        };
                    let T = (I = G.filter(k => k.overflows[0] <= 0).sort((k, D) => k.overflows[1] - D.overflows[1])[0]) == null ? void 0 : I.placement;
                    if (!T)
                        switch (y) {
                        case "bestFit":
                            {
                                var z;
                                const k = (z = G.filter(D => {
                                    if (C) {
                                        const $ = mo(D.placement);
                                        return $ === p || $ === "y"
                                    }
                                    return !0
                                }).map(D => [D.placement, D.overflows.filter($ => $ > 0).reduce(($, re) => $ + re, 0)]).sort((D, $) => D[1] - $[1])[0]) == null ? void 0 : z[0];
                                k && (T = k);
                                break
                            }case "initialPlacement":
                            T = l;
                            break
                        }
                    if (a !== T)
                        return {
                            reset: {
                                placement: T
                            }
                        }
                }
                return {}
            }
        }
    };
function lw(t, s) {
    return {
        top: t.top - s.height,
        right: t.right - s.width,
        bottom: t.bottom - s.height,
        left: t.left - s.width
    }
}
function cw(t) {
    return kL.some(s => t[s] >= 0)
}
const FL = function(t) {
    return t === void 0 && (t = {}), {
        name: "hide",
        options: t,
        async fn(s) {
            const {rects: r} = s,
                {strategy: n="referenceHidden", ...a} = gi(t, s);
            switch (n) {
            case "referenceHidden":
                {
                    const i = await yu(s, {
                            ...a,
                            elementContext: "reference"
                        }),
                        o = lw(i, r.reference);
                    return {
                        data: {
                            referenceHiddenOffsets: o,
                            referenceHidden: cw(o)
                        }
                    }
                }case "escaped":
                {
                    const i = await yu(s, {
                            ...a,
                            altBoundary: !0
                        }),
                        o = lw(i, r.floating);
                    return {
                        data: {
                            escapedOffsets: o,
                            escaped: cw(o)
                        }
                    }
                }default:
                return {}
            }
        }
    }
};
async function zL(t, s) {
    const {placement: r, platform: n, elements: a} = t,
        i = await (n.isRTL == null ? void 0 : n.isRTL(a.floating)),
        o = vi(r),
        l = Zc(r),
        c = mo(r) === "y",
        d = ["left", "top"].includes(o) ? -1 : 1,
        u = i && c ? -1 : 1,
        m = gi(s, t);
    let {mainAxis: f, crossAxis: y, alignmentAxis: g} = typeof m == "number" ? {
        mainAxis: m,
        crossAxis: 0,
        alignmentAxis: null
    } : {
        mainAxis: m.mainAxis || 0,
        crossAxis: m.crossAxis || 0,
        alignmentAxis: m.alignmentAxis
    };
    return l && typeof g == "number" && (y = l === "end" ? g * -1 : g), c ? {
        x: y * u,
        y: f * d
    } : {
        x: f * d,
        y: y * u
    }
}
const $L = function(t) {
        return t === void 0 && (t = 0), {
            name: "offset",

                        ...c,
                        placement: o
                    }
                }
            }
        }
    },
    VL = function(t) {
        return t === void 0 && (t = {}), {
            name: "shift",
            options: t,

                const {x: r, y: n, placement: a} = s,

                }

                    const b = m === "y" ? "top" : "left",
                        j = m === "y" ? "bottom" : "right",

                }

                        }
                    }

            }
        }
    },
    UL = function(t) {
        return t === void 0 && (t = {}), {
            options: t,
            fn(s) {
                const {x: r, y: n, placement: a, rects: i, middlewareData: o} = s,
                    {offset: l=0, mainAxis: c=!0, crossAxis: d=!0} = gi(t, s),

                    b = typeof x == "number" ? {
                        mainAxis: x,
                        crossAxis: 0
                    } : {
                        mainAxis: 0,
                        crossAxis: 0,
                        ...x
                    };
                if (c) {
                    const v = f === "y" ? "height" : "width",
                        N = i.reference[f] - i.floating[v] + b.mainAxis,
                        w = i.reference[f] + i.reference[v] - b.mainAxis;
                    y < N ? y = N : y > w && (y = w)
                }
                if (d) {
                    var j,
                        p;
                    const v = f === "y" ? "width" : "height",
                        N = ["top", "left"].includes(vi(a)),
                        w = i.reference[m] - i.floating[v] + (N && ((j = o.offset) == null ? void 0 : j[m]) || 0) + (N ? 0 : b.crossAxis),
                        C = i.reference[m] + i.reference[v] + (N ? 0 : ((p = o.offset) == null ? void 0 : p[m]) || 0) - (N ? b.crossAxis : 0);
                    g < w ? g = w : g > C && (g = C)
                }
                return {
                    [f]: y,
                    [m]: g
                }
            }
        }
    },
    qL = function(t) {
        return t === void 0 && (t = {}), {
            name: "size",
            options: t,
            async fn(s) {
                var r,
                    n;
                const {placement: a, rects: i, platform: o, elements: l} = s,
                    {apply: c=() => {}, ...d} = gi(t, s),
                    u = await yu(s, d),
                    m = vi(a),
                    f = Zc(a),
                    y = mo(a) === "y",
                    {width: g, height: x} = i.floating;
                let b,
                    j;
                m === "top" || m === "bottom" ? (b = m, j = f === (await (o.isRTL == null ? void 0 : o.isRTL(l.floating)) ? "start" : "end") ? "left" : "right") : (j = m, b = f === "end" ? "top" : "bottom");
                const p = x - u.top - u.bottom,
                    v = g - u.left - u.right,
                    N = uo(x - u[b], p),
                    w = uo(g - u[j], v),
                    C = !s.middlewareData.shift;
                let S = N,
                    E = w;
                if ((r = s.middlewareData.shift) != null && r.enabled.x && (E = v), (n = s.middlewareData.shift) != null && n.enabled.y && (S = p), C && !f) {

                        L = tn(u.right, 0),
                        I = tn(u.top, 0),
                        z = tn(u.bottom, 0);
                    y ? E = g - 2 * (G !== 0 || L !== 0 ? G + L : tn(u.left, u.right)) : S = x - 2 * (I !== 0 || z !== 0 ? I + z : tn(u.top, u.bottom))
                }
                await c({
                    ...s,
                    availableWidth: E,
                    availableHeight: S
                });
                const O = await o.getDimensions(l.floating);
                return g !== O.width || x !== O.height ? {
                    reset: {
                        rects: !0
                    }
                } : {}
            }
        }
    };
function Np() {
    return typeof window < "u"
}
function Xc(t) {
    return GE(t) ? (t.nodeName || "").toLowerCase() : "#document"
}
function cn(t) {
    var s;
    return (t == null || (s = t.ownerDocument) == null ? void 0 : s.defaultView) || window
}
function Ma(t) {
    var s;
    return (s = (GE(t) ? t.ownerDocument : t.document) || window.document) == null ? void 0 : s.documentElement
}
function GE(t) {
    return Np() ? t instanceof Node || t instanceof cn(t).Node : !1
}
function Zn(t) {
    return Np() ? t instanceof Element || t instanceof cn(t).Element : !1
}
function ka(t) {
    return Np() ? t instanceof HTMLElement || t instanceof cn(t).HTMLElement : !1
}
function dw(t) {
    return !Np() || typeof ShadowRoot > "u" ? !1 : t instanceof ShadowRoot || t instanceof cn(t).ShadowRoot
}
function om(t) {
    const {overflow: s, overflowX: r, overflowY: n, display: a} = Xn(t);
    return /auto|scroll|overlay|hidden|clip/.test(s + n + r) && !["inline", "contents"].includes(a)
}
function BL(t) {
    return ["table", "td", "th"].includes(Xc(t))
}
function wp(t) {
    return [":popover-open", ":modal"].some(s => {
        try {
            return t.matches(s)
        } catch {
            return !1
        }
    })
}
function zj(t) {
    const s = $j(),
        r = Zn(t) ? Xn(t) : t;
    return ["transform", "translate", "scale", "rotate", "perspective"].some(n => r[n] ? r[n] !== "none" : !1) || (r.containerType ? r.containerType !== "normal" : !1) || !s && (r.backdropFilter ? r.backdropFilter !== "none" : !1) || !s && (r.filter ? r.filter !== "none" : !1) || ["transform", "translate", "scale", "rotate", "perspective", "filter"].some(n => (r.willChange || "").includes(n)) || ["paint", "layout", "strict", "content"].some(n => (r.contain || "").includes(n))
}
function HL(t) {
    let s = ho(t);
    for (; ka(s) && !Pc(s);) {
        if (zj(s))
            return s;
        if (wp(s))
            return null;
        s = ho(s)
    }
    return null
}
function $j() {
    return typeof CSS > "u" || !CSS.supports ? !1 : CSS.supports("-webkit-backdrop-filter", "none")
}
function Pc(t) {
    return ["html", "body", "#document"].includes(Xc(t))
}
function Xn(t) {
    return cn(t).getComputedStyle(t)
}
function Cp(t) {
    return Zn(t) ? {
        scrollLeft: t.scrollLeft,
        scrollTop: t.scrollTop
    } : {
        scrollLeft: t.scrollX,
        scrollTop: t.scrollY
    }
}
function ho(t) {
    if (Xc(t) === "html")
        return t;
    const s = t.assignedSlot || t.parentNode || dw(t) && t.host || Ma(t);
    return dw(s) ? s.host : s
}
function KE(t) {
    const s = ho(t);
    return Pc(s) ? t.ownerDocument ? t.ownerDocument.body : t.body : ka(s) && om(s) ? s : KE(s)
}
function ju(t, s, r) {
    var n;
    s === void 0 && (s = []),
    r === void 0 && (r = !0);
    const a = KE(t),
        i = a === ((n = t.ownerDocument) == null ? void 0 : n.body),
        o = cn(a);
    if (i) {
        const l = Pv(o);
        return s.concat(o, o.visualViewport || [], om(a) ? a : [], l && r ? ju(l) : [])
    }
    return s.concat(a, ju(a, [], r))
}
function Pv(t) {
    return t.parent && Object.getPrototypeOf(t.parent) ? t.frameElement : null
}
function YE(t) {
    const s = Xn(t);
    let r = parseFloat(s.width) || 0,
        n = parseFloat(s.height) || 0;
    const a = ka(t),
        i = a ? t.offsetWidth : r,
        o = a ? t.offsetHeight : n,
        l = xf(r) !== i || xf(n) !== o;
    return l && (r = i, n = o), {
        width: r,
        height: n,
        $: l
    }
}
function Vj(t) {
    return Zn(t) ? t : t.contextElement
}
function tc(t) {
    const s = Vj(t);
    if (!ka(s))
        return Na(1);
    const r = s.getBoundingClientRect(),
        {width: n, height: a, $: i} = YE(s);
    let o = (i ? xf(r.width) : r.width) / n,
        l = (i ? xf(r.height) : r.height) / a;
    return (!o || !Number.isFinite(o)) && (o = 1), (!l || !Number.isFinite(l)) && (l = 1), {
        x: o,
        y: l
    }
}
const WL = Na(0);
function QE(t) {
    const s = cn(t);
    return !$j() || !s.visualViewport ? WL : {
        x: s.visualViewport.offsetLeft,
        y: s.visualViewport.offsetTop
    }
}
function GL(t, s, r) {
    return s === void 0 && (s = !1), !r || s && r !== cn(t) ? !1 : s
}
function rl(t, s, r, n) {
    s === void 0 && (s = !1),
    r === void 0 && (r = !1);
    const a = t.getBoundingClientRect(),
        i = Vj(t);
    let o = Na(1);
    s && (n ? Zn(n) && (o = tc(n)) : o = tc(t));
    const l = GL(i, r, n) ? QE(i) : Na(0);
    let c = (a.left + l.x) / o.x,
        d = (a.top + l.y) / o.y,
        u = a.width / o.x,
        m = a.height / o.y;
    if (i) {
        const f = cn(i),
            y = n && Zn(n) ? cn(n) : n;
        let g = f,
            x = Pv(g);
        for (; x && n && y !== g;) {
            const b = tc(x),
                j = x.getBoundingClientRect(),
                p = Xn(x),
                v = j.left + (x.clientLeft + parseFloat(p.paddingLeft)) * b.x,
                N = j.top + (x.clientTop + parseFloat(p.paddingTop)) * b.y;
            c *= b.x,
            d *= b.y,
            u *= b.x,
            m *= b.y,
            c += v,
            d += N,
            g = cn(x),
            x = Pv(g)
        }
    }
    return vf({
        width: u,
        height: m,
        x: c,
        y: d
    })
}
function Uj(t, s) {
    const r = Cp(t).scrollLeft;
    return s ? s.left + r : rl(Ma(t)).left + r
}
function ZE(t, s, r) {
    r === void 0 && (r = !1);
    const n = t.getBoundingClientRect(),
        a = n.left + s.scrollLeft - (r ? 0 : Uj(t, n)),
        i = n.top + s.scrollTop;
    return {
        x: a,
        y: i
    }
}
function KL(t) {
    let {elements: s, rect: r, offsetParent: n, strategy: a} = t;
    const i = a === "fixed",
        o = Ma(n),
        l = s ? wp(s.floating) : !1;
    if (n === o || l && i)
        return r;
    let c = {
            scrollLeft: 0,
            scrollTop: 0
        },
        d = Na(1);
    const u = Na(0),
        m = ka(n);
    if ((m || !m && !i) && ((Xc(n) !== "body" || om(o)) && (c = Cp(n)), ka(n))) {
        const y = rl(n);
        d = tc(n),
        u.x = y.x + n.clientLeft,
        u.y = y.y + n.clientTop
    }
    const f = o && !m && !i ? ZE(o, c, !0) : Na(0);
    return {
        width: r.width * d.x,
        height: r.height * d.y,
        x: r.x * d.x - c.scrollLeft * d.x + u.x + f.x,
        y: r.y * d.y - c.scrollTop * d.y + u.y + f.y
    }
}
function YL(t) {

        }

    }
    return t !== t && s !== s
}

function U6(t, s) {
    const r = Math.abs(s.top - t.y),
        n = Math.abs(s.bottom - t.y),
        a = Math.abs(s.right - t.x),
        i = Math.abs(s.left - t.x);
    switch (Math.min(r, n, a, i)) {
    case i:
        return "left";
    case a:
        return "right";
    case r:
        return "top";
    case n:
        return "bottom";
    default:
        throw new Error("unreachable")
    }
}
function q6(t, s, r=5) {
    const n = [];
    switch (s) {
    case "top":
        n.push({
            x: t.x - r,
            y: t.y + r
        }, {
            x: t.x + r,
            y: t.y + r
        });
        break;
    case "bottom":
        n.push({
            x: t.x - r,
            y: t.y - r
        }, {
            x: t.x + r,
            y: t.y - r
        });
        break;
    case "left":
        n.push({
            x: t.x + r,
            y: t.y - r
        }, {
            x: t.x + r,
            y: t.y + r
        });
        break;
    case "right":
        n.push({
            x: t.x - r,
            y: t.y - r
        }, {
            x: t.x - r,
            y: t.y + r
        });
        break
    }
    return n
}

}

function n3() {

function jw(t) {
    return {
        onFetch: (s, r) => {
            var u,
                m,
                f,
                y,
                g;
            const n = s.options,
                a = (f = (m = (u = s.fetchOptions) == null ? void 0 : u.meta) == null ? void 0 : m.fetchMore) == null ? void 0 : f.direction,

                o = ((g = s.state.data) == null ? void 0 : g.pageParams) || [];

                    pages: [],
                    pageParams: []
                },
                c = 0;
            const d = async () => {
                let x = !1;
                const b = v => {
                        Object.defineProperty(v, "signal", {
                            enumerable: !0,
                            get: () => (s.signal.aborted ? x = !0 : s.signal.addEventListener("abort", () => {
                                x = !0
                            }), s.signal)
                        })
                    },

                    p = async (v, N, w) => {
                        if (x)
                            return Promise.reject();
                        if (N == null && v.pages.length)
                            return Promise.resolve(v);
                        const C = {
                            queryKey: s.queryKey,
                            pageParam: N,

                            meta: s.options.meta
                        };

                            O = w ? e3 : J6;

                        }

                        N = v ? d3 : bw,
                        w = {
                            pages: i,
                            pageParams: o
                        },

                        const N = c === 0 ? o[0] ?? n.initialPageParam : bw(n, l);
                        if (c > 0 && N == null)
                            break;

                }
                return l
            };

                    b;

                    queryKey: s.queryKey,

                    signal: s.signal
                }, r)
            } : s.fetchFn = d
        }
    }
}

async function Ie(t, s, r) {

            credentials: "include",
            ...s
        };

    return await Rk(i), i
}
const Ik = ({on401: t}) => async ({queryKey: s}) => {

function Zj() {
    const t = typeof (navigator == null ? void 0 : navigator.userAgent) == "string" ? navigator.userAgent : "",
        s = [];
    let r = "Unknown",
        n = "Unknown",
        a = !0;
    if (t.indexOf("Chrome") > -1) {
        r = "Chrome";
        const i = t.match(/Chrome\/(\d+\.\d+)/);
        n = i ? i[1] : "Unknown",
        parseInt(n.split(".")[0]) < 70 && s.push("Chrome version is outdated. Some features may not work correctly.")
    } else if (t.indexOf("Firefox") > -1) {
        r = "Firefox";
        const i = t.match(/Firefox\/(\d+\.\d+)/);
        n = i ? i[1] : "Unknown"
    } else if (t.indexOf("Safari") > -1 && t.indexOf("Chrome") === -1) {
        r = "Safari";
        const i = t.match(/Version\/(\d+\.\d+)/);
        n = i ? i[1] : "Unknown"
    } else if (t.indexOf("Edg") > -1) {
        r = "Edge";
        const i = t.match(/Edg\/(\d+\.\d+)/);
        n = i ? i[1] : "Unknown"
    }
    return {
        name: r,
        version: n,
        isSupported: a,
        warnings: s
    }
}
function _3(t, s) {
    try {
        if (!t || typeof s.left != "number" || isNaN(s.left)) {
            console.warn("Invalid parameters for safeScrollBy");
            return
        }
        t.scrollBy && typeof t.scrollBy == "function" ? t.scrollBy(s) : t.scrollLeft += s.left
    } catch (r) {
        console.warn("Error scrolling element:", r),
        t && typeof s.left == "number" && !isNaN(s.left) && (t.scrollLeft += s.left)
    }
}
function Dk(t, s, r, n) {
    try {
        t.addEventListener(s, r, n)
    } catch (a) {

        "on" + s in t && (t["on" + s] = r)
    }
}
function Ok(t, s, r, n) {

    } catch (a) {

    }
}
function Lk(t, s, r) {

    } catch (n) {
        console.warn("Error with history.pushState:", n),
        window.location.href = r
    }
}

    } catch (s) {

                        const C = parseFloat(((p = b.precio) == null ? void 0 : p.replace(",", ".")) || "0"),
                            S = $E(C),
                            E = b.peso && parseInt(b.peso.toString()) || 500,

                            G = 1,

                            z = {
                                id: Date.now(),

                            };
                        r(B => [...B, z])

                    l({

                    j && o(!0)
                } catch (w) {
                    console.error("Error adding to cart:", w),
                    l({
                        title: "Error",

                        variant: "destructive"
                    })
                } finally {
                    a(!1)
                }
            },

                    u(g);
                    return
                }

                    variant: "destructive"
                })
            },

                r(x => x.filter(b => b.partId !== g)),
                l({
                    title: "Eliminado del carrito",
                    description: "Pieza eliminada del carrito"
                })
            },
            m = () => {
                r([]),
                l({
                    title: "Carrito vaciado",
                    description: "Se han eliminado todos los productos del carrito"
                })
            },
            f = s.reduce((g, x) => g + x.quantity, 0),
            y = s.reduce((g, x) => g + x.price * x.quantity, 0);

function Uk(t) {

        });

        s.push(r.currentNode);
    return s
}

function qk(t, s) {

var JF = h.forwardRef((t, s) => {

            f = h.useRef(null),
            y = ot(s, f),
            g = jl(i),

                prop: o,
                defaultProp: l,

            }),

            N = C4(r),
            w = h.useRef(!1),
            [C, S] = h.useState(0);
        return h.useEffect(() => {
            const E = f.current;
            if (E)
                return E.addEventListener(ag, v), () => E.removeEventListener(ag, v)
        }, [v]), e.jsx(ZF, {
            scope: r,
            orientation: n,
            dir: g,
            loop: a,
            currentTabStopId: x,

            onItemShiftTab: h.useCallback(() => p(!0), []),

            children: e.jsx(De.div, {

                },

                    w.current = !0
                }),

                    const O = !w.current;
                    if (E.target === E.currentTarget && O && !j) {

                        if (E.currentTarget.dispatchEvent(G), !G.defaultPrevented) {
                            const L = N().filter(T => T.focusable),
                                I = L.find(T => T.active),
                                z = L.find(T => T.id === x),
                                F = [I, z, ...L].filter(Boolean).map(T => T.ref.current);

                        }
                    }

                }),

            })
        })
    }),
    E4 = "RovingFocusGroupItem",
    k4 = h.forwardRef((t, s) => {
        const {__scopeRovingFocusGroup: r, focusable: n=!0, active: a=!1, tabStopId: i, ...o} = t,
            l = ln(),

        }, [n, f, y]), e.jsx(Wv.ItemSlot, {
            scope: r,

                tabIndex: u ? 0 : -1,

                    n ? d.onItemFocus(c) : g.preventDefault()
                }),
                onFocus: Ne(t.onFocus, () => d.onItemFocus(c)),
                onKeyDown: Ne(t.onKeyDown, g => {
                    if (g.key === "Tab" && g.shiftKey) {
                        d.onItemShiftTab();
                        return
                    }
                    if (g.target !== g.currentTarget)
                        return;
                    const x = sz(g, d.orientation, d.dir);
                    if (x !== void 0) {
                        if (g.metaKey || g.ctrlKey || g.altKey || g.shiftKey)
                            return;
                        g.preventDefault();
                        let j = m().filter(p => p.focusable).map(p => p.ref.current);
                        if (x === "last")
                            j.reverse();
                        else if (x === "prev" || x === "next") {
                            x === "prev" && j.reverse();
                            const p = j.indexOf(g.currentTarget);
                            j = d.loop ? rz(j, p + 1) : j.slice(p + 1)
                        }
                        setTimeout(() => P4(j))
                    }
                })
            })
        })
    });
k4.displayName = E4;
var ez = {
    ArrowLeft: "prev",
    ArrowUp: "prev",
    ArrowRight: "next",
    ArrowDown: "next",
    PageUp: "first",
    Home: "first",
    PageDown: "last",
    End: "last"
};
function tz(t, s) {
    return s !== "rtl" ? t : t === "ArrowLeft" ? "ArrowRight" : t === "ArrowRight" ? "ArrowLeft" : t
}
function sz(t, s, r) {
    const n = tz(t.key, r);
    if (!(s === "vertical" && ["ArrowLeft", "ArrowRight"].includes(n)) && !(s === "horizontal" && ["ArrowUp", "ArrowDown"].includes(n)))
        return ez[n]
}
function P4(t, s=!1) {
    const r = document.activeElement;
    for (const n of t)
        if (n === r || (n.focus({
            preventScroll: s
        }), document.activeElement !== r))
            return
}
function rz(t, s) {
    return t.map((r, n) => t[(s + n) % t.length])
}
var i0 = S4,
    o0 = k4,
    Gv = ["Enter", " "],
    nz = ["ArrowDown", "PageUp", "Home"],
    _4 = ["ArrowUp", "PageDown", "End"],
    az = [...nz, ..._4],
    iz = {
        ltr: [...Gv, "ArrowRight"],
        rtl: [...Gv, "ArrowLeft"]
    },
    oz = {
        ltr: ["ArrowLeft"],
        rtl: ["ArrowRight"]
    },
    xm = "Menu",
    [Nu, lz, cz] = nm(xm),
    [bl, T4] = ws(xm, [cz, bo, ed]),
    zp = bo(),
    A4 = ed(),
    [dz, Nl] = bl(xm),
    [uz, gm] = bl(xm),

            l = zp(s),

            u = h.useRef(!1),
            m = Zt(i),
            f = jl(a);
        return h.useEffect(() => {
            const y = () => {
                    u.current = !0,
                    document.addEventListener("pointerdown", g, {
                        capture: !0,
                        once: !0
                    }),
                    document.addEventListener("pointermove", g, {
                        capture: !0,
                        once: !0
                    })
                },
                g = () => u.current = !1;
            return document.addEventListener("keydown", y, {
                capture: !0
            }), () => {
                document.removeEventListener("keydown", y, {
                    capture: !0
                }),
                document.removeEventListener("pointerdown", g, {
                    capture: !0

                document.removeEventListener("pointermove", g, {

                })

        }, []), e.jsx(Hj, {

                    dir: f,

                })
            })
        })
    };

var mz = "MenuAnchor",
    l0 = h.forwardRef((t, s) => {

function Z4(t) {
    return t ? "open" : "closed"
}
function Ef(t) {
    return t === "indeterminate"
}
function f0(t) {
    return Ef(t) ? "indeterminate" : t ? "checked" : "unchecked"
}
function kz(t) {
    const s = document.activeElement;
    for (const r of t)
        if (r === s || (r.focus(), document.activeElement !== s))
            return
}
function Pz(t, s) {
    return t.map((r, n) => t[(s + n) % t.length])
}
function _z(t, s, r) {
    const a = s.length > 1 && Array.from(s).every(d => d === s[0]) ? s[0] : s,
        i = r ? t.indexOf(r) : -1;
    let o = Pz(t, Math.max(i, 0));
    a.length === 1 && (o = o.filter(d => d !== r));
    const c = o.find(d => d.toLowerCase().startsWith(a.toLowerCase()));
    return c !== r ? c : void 0
}
function Tz(t, s) {
    const {x: r, y: n} = t;
    let a = !1;
    for (let i = 0, o = s.length - 1; i < s.length; o = i++) {
        const l = s[i].x,
            c = s[i].y,
            d = s[o].x,
            u = s[o].y;
        c > n != u > n && r < (d - l) * (n - c) / (u - c) + l && (a = !a)
    }
    return a
}
function Az(t, s) {
    if (!s)
        return !1;
    const r = {
        x: t.clientX,
        y: t.clientY
    };
    return Tz(r, s)
}
function wu(t) {
    return s => s.pointerType === "mouse" ? t(s) : void 0
}

function Ow(t, s) {
    return t ? s ? (t.src !== s && (t.src = s), t.complete && t.naturalWidth > 0 ? "loaded" : "loading") : "error" : "idle"
}
function y8(t, {referrerPolicy: s, crossOrigin: r}) {
    const n = b8(),
        a = h.useRef(null),
        i = n ? (a.current || (a.current = new window.Image), a.current) : null,
        [o, l] = h.useState(() => Ow(i, t));
    return js(() => {
        l(Ow(i, t))
    }, [i, t]), js(() => {
        const c = m => () => {
            l(m)
        };
        if (!i)
            return;
        const d = c("loaded"),
            u = c("error");
        return i.addEventListener("load", d), i.addEventListener("error", u), s && (i.referrerPolicy = s), typeof r == "string" && (i.crossOrigin = r), () => {
            i.removeEventListener("load", d),
            i.removeEventListener("error", u)
        }
    }, [i, r, s]), o
}

    return Object.prototype.toString.call(t) === "[object Object]"
}

}
function y0(t, s) {
    const r = Object.keys(t),
        n = Object.keys(s);
    if (r.length !== n.length)
        return !1;
    const a = JSON.stringify(Object.keys(t.breakpoints || {})),
        i = JSON.stringify(Object.keys(s.breakpoints || {}));
    return a !== i ? !1 : r.every(o => {
        const l = t[o],
            c = s[o];
        return typeof l == "function" ? `${l}` == `${c}` : !Yw(l) || !Yw(c) ? l === c : y0(l, c)
    })
}
function Qw(t) {
    return t.concat().sort((s, r) => s.name > r.name ? 1 : -1).map(s => s.options)
}

        return !1;

        n = Qw(s);

    })
}
function j0(t) {
    return typeof t == "number"
}
function Xv(t) {
    return typeof t == "string"
}
function Vp(t) {
    return typeof t == "boolean"
}
function Zw(t) {
    return Object.prototype.toString.call(t) === "[object Object]"
}
function as(t) {
    return Math.abs(t)
}
function b0(t) {
    return Math.sign(t)
}
function Yd(t, s) {
    return as(t - s)
}

    if (t === 0 || s === 0 || as(t) <= as(s))
        return 0;
    const r = Yd(as(t), as(s));
    return as(r / t)
}

    return Math.round(t * 100) / 100
}

    return Pu(t).map(Number)
}

    return t[vm(t)]
}

    return Math.max(0, t.length - 1)

    return s === vm(t)
}

}

}

}

}

    }
