    }
}
function _u() {
    let t = [];
    function s(a, i, o, l={
        passive: !0
    }) {
        let c;
        if ("addEventListener" in a)
            a.addEventListener(i, o, l),
            c = () => a.removeEventListener(i, o, l);
        else {
            const d = a;
            d.addListener(o),
            c = () => d.removeListener(o)
        }
        return t.push(c), n
    }
    function r() {
        t = t.filter(a => a())
    }
    const n = {
        add: s,
        clear: r
    };
    return n
}
function l$(t, s, r, n) {
    const a = _u(),
        i = 1e3 / 60;
    let o = null,
        l = 0,
        c = 0;
    function d() {
        a.add(t, "visibilitychange", () => {
            t.hidden && g()
        })
    }
    function u() {
        y(),
        a.clear()
    }
    function m(b) {
        if (!c)
            return;
        o || (o = b, r(), r());
        const j = b - o;
        for (o = b, l += j; l >= i;)
            r(),
            l -= i;
        const p = l / i;
        n(p),
        c && (c = s.requestAnimationFrame(m))
    }
    function f() {
        c || (c = s.requestAnimationFrame(m))
    }
    function y() {
        s.cancelAnimationFrame(c),
        o = null,
        l = 0,
        c = 0
    }
    function g() {
        o = null,
        l = 0
    }
    return {
        init: d,
        destroy: u,
        start: f,
        stop: y,
        update: r,
        render: n
    }
}
function c$(t, s) {
    const r = s === "rtl",
        n = t === "y",
        a = n ? "y" : "x",
        i = n ? "x" : "y",
        o = !n && r ? -1 : 1,
        l = u(),
        c = m();
    function d(g) {
        const {height: x, width: b} = g;
        return n ? x : b
    }
    function u() {
        return n ? "top" : r ? "right" : "left"
    }
    function m() {
        return n ? "bottom" : r ? "left" : "right"
    }
    function f(g) {
        return g * o
    }
    return {
        scroll: a,
        cross: i,
        startEdge: l,
        endEdge: c,
        measureSize: d,
        direction: f
    }
}
function ol(t=0, s=0) {
    const r = as(t - s);
    function n(d) {
        return d < t
    }
    function a(d) {
        return d > s
    }
    function i(d) {
        return n(d) || a(d)
    }
    function o(d) {
        return i(d) ? n(d) ? t : s : d
    }
    function l(d) {
        return r ? d - r * Math.ceil((d - s) / r) : d
    }
    return {
        length: r,
        max: s,
        min: t,
        constrain: o,
        reachedAny: i,
        reachedMax: a,
        reachedMin: n,
        removeOffset: l
    }
}
function XP(t, s, r) {
    const {constrain: n} = ol(0, t),
        a = t + 1;
    let i = o(s);
    function o(f) {
        return r ? as((a + f) % a) : n(f)
    }
    function l() {
        return i
    }
    function c(f) {
        return i = o(f), m
    }
    function d(f) {
        return u().set(l() + f)
    }
    function u() {
        return XP(t, l(), r)
    }
    const m = {
        get: l,
        set: c,
        add: d,
        clone: u
    };
    return m
}
function d$(t, s, r, n, a, i, o, l, c, d, u, m, f, y, g, x, b, j, p) {
    const {cross: v, direction: N} = t,
        w = ["INPUT", "SELECT", "TEXTAREA"],
        C = {
            passive: !1
        },
        S = _u(),
        E = _u(),
        O = ol(50, 225).constrain(y.measure(20)),
        G = {
            mouse: 300,
            touch: 400
        },
        L = {
            mouse: 500,
            touch: 600
        },
        I = g ? 43 : 25;
    let z = !1,
        B = 0,
        F = 0,
        T = !1,
        k = !1,
        D = !1,
        $ = !1;
    function re(le) {
        if (!p)
            return;
        function he(lt) {
            (Vp(p) || p(le, lt)) && Se(lt)
        }
        const ve = s;
        S.add(ve, "dragstart", lt => lt.preventDefault(), C).add(ve, "touchmove", () => {}, C).add(ve, "touchend", () => {}).add(ve, "touchstart", he).add(ve, "mousedown", he).add(ve, "touchcancel", ee).add(ve, "contextmenu", ee).add(ve, "click", H, !0)
    }
    function R() {
        S.clear(),
        E.clear()
    }
    function M() {
        const le = $ ? r : s;
        E.add(le, "touchmove", _, C).add(le, "touchend", ee).add(le, "mousemove", _, C).add(le, "mouseup", ee)
    }
    function K(le) {
        const he = le.nodeName || "";
        return w.includes(he)
    }
    function oe() {
        return (g ? L : G)[$ ? "mouse" : "touch"]
    }
    function be(le, he) {
        const ve = m.add(b0(le) * -1),
            lt = u.byDistance(le, !g).distance;
        return g || as(le) < O ? lt : b && he ? lt * .5 : u.byIndex(ve.get(), 0).distance
    }
    function Se(le) {
        const he = Jv(le, n);
        $ = he,
        D = g && he && !le.buttons && z,
        z = Yd(a.get(), o.get()) >= 2,
        !(he && le.button !== 0) && (K(le.target) || (T = !0, i.pointerDown(le), d.useFriction(0).useDuration(0), a.set(o), M(), B = i.readPoint(le), F = i.readPoint(le, v), f.emit("pointerDown")))
    }
    function _(le) {
        if (!Jv(le, n) && le.touches.length >= 2)
            return ee(le);
        const ve = i.readPoint(le),
            lt = i.readPoint(le, v),
            ut = Yd(ve, B),
            bt = Yd(lt, F);
        if (!k && !$ && (!le.cancelable || (k = ut > bt, !k)))
            return ee(le);
        const W = i.pointerMove(le);
        ut > x && (D = !0),
        d.useFriction(.3).useDuration(.75),
        l.start(),
        a.add(N(W)),
        le.preventDefault()
    }
    function ee(le) {
        const ve = u.byDistance(0, !1).index !== m.get(),
            lt = i.pointerUp(le) * oe(),
            ut = be(N(lt), ve),
            bt = a$(lt, ut),
            W = I - 10 * bt,
            Me = j + bt / 50;
        k = !1,
        T = !1,
        E.clear(),
        d.useDuration(W).useFriction(Me),
        c.distance(ut, !g),
        $ = !1,
        f.emit("pointerUp")
    }
    function H(le) {
        D && (le.stopPropagation(), le.preventDefault(), D = !1)
    }
    function se() {
        return T
    }
    return {
        init: re,
        destroy: R,
        pointerDown: se
    }
}
function u$(t, s) {
    let n,
        a;
    function i(m) {
        return m.timeStamp
    }
    function o(m, f) {
        const g = `client${(f || t.scroll) === "x" ? "X" : "Y"}`;
        return (Jv(m, s) ? m : m.touches[0])[g]
    }
    function l(m) {
        return n = m, a = m, o(m)
    }
    function c(m) {
        const f = o(m) - o(a),
            y = i(m) - i(n) > 170;
        return a = m, y && (n = m), f
    }
    function d(m) {
        if (!n || !a)
            return 0;
        const f = o(a) - o(n),
            y = i(m) - i(n),
            g = i(m) - i(a) > 170,
            x = f / y;
        return y && !g && as(x) > .1 ? x : 0
    }
    return {
        pointerDown: l,
        pointerMove: c,
        pointerUp: d,
        readPoint: o
    }
}
function m$() {
    function t(r) {
        const {offsetTop: n, offsetLeft: a, offsetWidth: i, offsetHeight: o} = r;
        return {
            top: n,
            right: a + i,
            bottom: n + o,
            left: a,
            width: i,
            height: o
        }
    }
    return {
        measure: t
    }
}
function h$(t) {
    function s(n) {
        return t * (n / 100)
    }
    return {
        measure: s
    }
}
function f$(t, s, r, n, a, i, o) {
    const l = [t].concat(n);
    let c,
        d,
        u = [],
        m = !1;
    function f(b) {
        return a.measureSize(o.measure(b))
    }
    function y(b) {
        if (!i)
            return;
        d = f(t),
        u = n.map(f);
        function j(p) {
            for (const v of p) {
                if (m)
                    return;
                const N = v.target === t,
                    w = n.indexOf(v.target),
                    C = N ? d : u[w],
                    S = f(N ? t : n[w]);
                if (as(S - C) >= .5) {
                    b.reInit(),
                    s.emit("resize");
                    break
                }
            }
        }
        c = new ResizeObserver(p => {
            (Vp(i) || i(b, p)) && j(p)
        }),
        r.requestAnimationFrame(() => {
            l.forEach(p => c.observe(p))
        })
    }
    function g() {
        m = !0,
        c && c.disconnect()
    }
    return {
        init: y,
        destroy: g
    }
}
function p$(t, s, r, n, a, i) {
    let o = 0,
        l = 0,
        c = a,
        d = i,
        u = t.get(),
        m = 0;
    function f() {
        const C = n.get() - t.get(),
            S = !c;
        let E = 0;
        return S ? (o = 0, r.set(n), t.set(n), E = C) : (r.set(t), o += C / c, o *= d, u += o, t.add(o), E = u - m), l = b0(E), m = u, w
    }
    function y() {
        const C = n.get() - s.get();
        return as(C) < .001
    }
    function g() {
        return c
    }
    function x() {
        return l
    }
    function b() {
        return o
    }
    function j() {
        return v(a)
    }
    function p() {
        return N(i)
    }
    function v(C) {
        return c = C, w
    }
    function N(C) {
        return d = C, w
    }
    const w = {
        direction: x,
        duration: g,
        velocity: b,
        seek: f,
        settled: y,
        useBaseFriction: p,
        useBaseDuration: j,
        useFriction: N,
        useDuration: v
    };
    return w
}
function x$(t, s, r, n, a) {
    const i = a.measure(10),
        o = a.measure(50),
        l = ol(.1, .99);
    let c = !1;
    function d() {
        return !(c || !t.reachedAny(r.get()) || !t.reachedAny(s.get()))
    }
    function u(y) {
        if (!d())
            return;
        const g = t.reachedMin(s.get()) ? "min" : "max",
            x = as(t[g] - s.get()),
            b = r.get() - s.get(),
            j = l.constrain(x / o);
        r.subtract(b * j),
        !y && as(b) < i && (r.set(t.constrain(r.get())), n.useDuration(25).useBaseFriction())
    }
    function m(y) {
        c = !y
    }
    return {
        shouldConstrain: d,
        constrain: u,
        toggleActive: m
    }
}
function g$(t, s, r, n, a) {
    const i = ol(-s + t, 0),
        o = m(),
        l = u(),
        c = f();
    function d(g, x) {
        return Yd(g, x) <= 1
    }
    function u() {
        const g = o[0],
            x = Gn(o),
            b = o.lastIndexOf(g),
            j = o.indexOf(x) + 1;
        return ol(b, j)
    }
    function m() {
        return r.map((g, x) => {
            const {min: b, max: j} = i,
                p = i.constrain(g),
                v = !x,
                N = N0(r, x);
            return v ? j : N || d(b, p) ? b : d(j, p) ? j : p
        }).map(g => parseFloat(g.toFixed(3)))
    }
    function f() {
        if (s <= t + a)
            return [i.max];
        if (n === "keepSnaps")
            return o;
        const {min: g, max: x} = l;
        return o.slice(g, x)
    }
    return {
        snapsContained: c,
        scrollContainLimit: l
    }
}
function v$(t, s, r) {
    const n = s[0],
        a = r ? n - t : Gn(s);
    return {
        limit: ol(a, n)
    }
}
function y$(t, s, r, n) {
    const i = s.min + .1,
        o = s.max + .1,
        {reachedMin: l, reachedMax: c} = ol(i, o);
    function d(f) {
        return f === 1 ? c(r.get()) : f === -1 ? l(r.get()) : !1
    }
    function u(f) {
        if (!d(f))
            return;
        const y = t * (f * -1);
        n.forEach(g => g.add(y))
    }
    return {
        loop: u
    }
}
function j$(t) {
    const {max: s, length: r} = t;
    function n(i) {
        const o = i - s;
        return r ? o / -r : 0
    }
    return {
        get: n
    }
}
function b$(t, s, r, n, a) {
    const {startEdge: i, endEdge: o} = t,
        {groupSlides: l} = a,
        c = m().map(s.measure),
        d = f(),
        u = y();
    function m() {
        return l(n).map(x => Gn(x)[o] - x[0][i]).map(as)
    }
    function f() {
        return n.map(x => r[i] - x[i]).map(x => -as(x))
    }
    function y() {
        return l(d).map(x => x[0]).map((x, b) => x + c[b])
    }
    return {
        snaps: d,
        snapsAligned: u
    }
}
function N$(t, s, r, n, a, i) {
    const {groupSlides: o} = a,
        {min: l, max: c} = n,
        d = u();
    function u() {
        const f = o(i),
            y = !t || s === "keepSnaps";
        return r.length === 1 ? [i] : y ? f : f.slice(l, c).map((g, x, b) => {
            const j = !x,
                p = N0(b, x);
            if (j) {
                const v = Gn(b[0]) + 1;
                return Xw(v)
            }
            if (p) {
                const v = vm(i) - Gn(b)[0] + 1;
                return Xw(v, Gn(b)[0])
            }
            return g
        })
    }
    return {
        slideRegistry: d
    }
}
function w$(t, s, r, n, a) {
    const {reachedAny: i, removeOffset: o, constrain: l} = n;
    function c(g) {
        return g.concat().sort((x, b) => as(x) - as(b))[0]
    }
    function d(g) {
        const x = t ? o(g) : l(g),
            b = s.map((p, v) => ({
                diff: u(p - x, 0),
                index: v
            })).sort((p, v) => as(p.diff) - as(v.diff)),
            {index: j} = b[0];
        return {
            index: j,
            distance: x
        }
    }
    function u(g, x) {
        const b = [g, g + r, g - r];
        if (!t)
            return g;
        if (!x)
            return c(b);
        const j = b.filter(p => b0(p) === x);
        return j.length ? c(j) : Gn(b) - r
    }
    function m(g, x) {
        const b = s[g] - a.get(),
            j = u(b, x);
        return {
            index: g,
            distance: j
        }
    }
    function f(g, x) {
        const b = a.get() + g,
            {index: j, distance: p} = d(b),
            v = !t && i(b);
        if (!x || v)
            return {
                index: j,
                distance: g
            };
        const N = s[j] - p,
            w = g + u(N, 0);
        return {
            index: j,
            distance: w
        }
    }
    return {
        byDistance: f,
        byIndex: m,
        shortcut: u
    }
}
function C$(t, s, r, n, a, i, o) {
    function l(m) {
        const f = m.distance,
            y = m.index !== s.get();
        i.add(f),
        f && (n.duration() ? t.start() : (t.update(), t.render(1), t.update())),
        y && (r.set(s.get()), s.set(m.index), o.emit("select"))
    }
    function c(m, f) {
        const y = a.byDistance(m, f);
        l(y)
    }
    function d(m, f) {
        const y = s.clone().set(m),
            g = a.byIndex(y.get(), f);
        l(g)
    }
    return {
        distance: c,
        index: d
    }
}
function S$(t, s, r, n, a, i, o, l) {
    const c = {
        passive: !0,
        capture: !0
    };
    let d = 0;
    function u(y) {
        if (!l)
            return;
        function g(x) {
            if (new Date().getTime() - d > 10)
                return;
            o.emit("slideFocusStart"),
            t.scrollLeft = 0;
            const p = r.findIndex(v => v.includes(x));
            j0(p) && (a.useDuration(0), n.index(p, 0), o.emit("slideFocus"))
        }
        i.add(document, "keydown", m, !1),
        s.forEach((x, b) => {
            i.add(x, "focus", j => {
                (Vp(l) || l(y, j)) && g(b)
            }, c)
        })
    }
    function m(y) {
        y.code === "Tab" && (d = new Date().getTime())
    }
    return {
        init: u
    }
}
function Rd(t) {
    let s = t;
    function r() {
        return s
    }
    function n(c) {
        s = o(c)
    }
    function a(c) {
        s += o(c)
    }
    function i(c) {
        s -= o(c)
    }
    function o(c) {
        return j0(c) ? c : c.get()
    }
    return {
        get: r,
        set: n,
        add: a,
        subtract: i
    }
}
function JP(t, s) {
    const r = t.scroll === "x" ? o : l,
        n = s.style;
    let a = null,
        i = !1;
    function o(f) {
        return `translate3d(${f}px,0px,0px)`
    }
    function l(f) {
        return `translate3d(0px,${f}px,0px)`
    }
    function c(f) {
        if (i)
            return;
        const y = i$(t.direction(f));
        y !== a && (n.transform = r(y), a = y)
    }
    function d(f) {
        i = !f
    }
    function u() {
        i || (n.transform = "", s.getAttribute("style") || s.removeAttribute("style"))
    }
    return {
        clear: u,
        to: c,
        toggleActive: d
    }
}
function E$(t, s, r, n, a, i, o, l, c) {
    const u = ku(a),
        m = ku(a).reverse(),
        f = j().concat(p());
    function y(S, E) {
        return S.reduce((O, G) => O - a[G], E)
    }
    function g(S, E) {
        return S.reduce((O, G) => y(O, E) > 0 ? O.concat([G]) : O, [])
    }
    function x(S) {
        return i.map((E, O) => ({
            start: E - n[O] + .5 + S,
            end: E + s - .5 + S
        }))
    }
    function b(S, E, O) {
        const G = x(E);
        return S.map(L => {
            const I = O ? 0 : -r,
                z = O ? r : 0,
                B = O ? "end" : "start",
                F = G[L][B];
            return {
                index: L,
                loopPoint: F,
                slideLocation: Rd(-1),
                translate: JP(t, c[L]),
                target: () => l.get() > F ? I : z
            }
        })
    }
    function j() {
        const S = o[0],
            E = g(m, S);
        return b(E, r, !1)
    }
    function p() {
        const S = s - o[0] - 1,
            E = g(u, S);
        return b(E, -r, !0)
    }
    function v() {
        return f.every(({index: S}) => {
            const E = u.filter(O => O !== S);
            return y(E, s) <= .1
        })
    }
    function N() {
        f.forEach(S => {
            const {target: E, translate: O, slideLocation: G} = S,
                L = E();
            L !== G.get() && (O.to(L), G.set(L))
        })
    }
    function w() {
        f.forEach(S => S.translate.clear())
    }
    return {
        canLoop: v,
        clear: w,
        loop: N,
        loopPoints: f
    }
}
function k$(t, s, r) {
    let n,
        a = !1;
    function i(c) {
        if (!r)
            return;
        function d(u) {
            for (const m of u)
                if (m.type === "childList") {
                    c.reInit(),
                    s.emit("slidesChanged");
                    break
                }
        }
        n = new MutationObserver(u => {
            a || (Vp(r) || r(c, u)) && d(u)
        }),
        n.observe(t, {
            childList: !0
        })
    }
    function o() {
        n && n.disconnect(),
        a = !0
    }
    return {
        init: i,
        destroy: o
    }
}
function P$(t, s, r, n) {
    const a = {};
    let i = null,
        o = null,
        l,
        c = !1;
    function d() {
        l = new IntersectionObserver(g => {
            c || (g.forEach(x => {
                const b = s.indexOf(x.target);
                a[b] = x
            }), i = null, o = null, r.emit("slidesInView"))
        }, {
            root: t.parentElement,
            threshold: n
        }),
        s.forEach(g => l.observe(g))
    }
    function u() {
        l && l.disconnect(),
        c = !0
    }
    function m(g) {
        return Pu(a).reduce((x, b) => {
            const j = parseInt(b),
                {isIntersecting: p} = a[j];
            return (g && p || !g && !p) && x.push(j), x
        }, [])
    }
    function f(g=!0) {
        if (g && i)
            return i;
        if (!g && o)
            return o;
        const x = m(g);
        return g && (i = x), g || (o = x), x
    }
    return {
        init: d,
        destroy: u,
        get: f
    }
}
function _$(t, s, r, n, a, i) {
    const {measureSize: o, startEdge: l, endEdge: c} = t,
        d = r[0] && a,
        u = g(),
        m = x(),
        f = r.map(o),
        y = b();
    function g() {
        if (!d)
            return 0;
        const p = r[0];
        return as(s[l] - p[l])
    }
    function x() {
        if (!d)
            return 0;
        const p = i.getComputedStyle(Gn(n));
        return parseFloat(p.getPropertyValue(`margin-${c}`))
    }
    function b() {
        return r.map((p, v, N) => {
            const w = !v,
                C = N0(N, v);
            return w ? f[v] + u : C ? f[v] + m : N[v + 1][l] - p[l]
        }).map(as)
    }
    return {
        slideSizes: f,
        slideSizesWithGaps: y,
        startGap: u,
        endGap: m
    }
}
function T$(t, s, r, n, a, i, o, l, c) {
    const {startEdge: d, endEdge: u, direction: m} = t,
        f = j0(r);
    function y(j, p) {
        return ku(j).filter(v => v % p === 0).map(v => j.slice(v, v + p))
    }
    function g(j) {
        return j.length ? ku(j).reduce((p, v, N) => {
            const w = Gn(p) || 0,
                C = w === 0,
                S = v === vm(j),
                E = a[d] - i[w][d],
                O = a[d] - i[v][u],
                G = !n && C ? m(o) : 0,
                L = !n && S ? m(l) : 0,
                I = as(O - L - (E + G));
            return N && I > s + c && p.push(v), S && p.push(j.length), p
        }, []).map((p, v, N) => {
            const w = Math.max(N[v - 1] || 0);
            return j.slice(w, p)
        }) : []
    }
    function x(j) {
        return f ? y(j, r) : g(j)
    }
    return {
        groupSlides: x
    }
}
function A$(t, s, r, n, a, i, o) {
    const {align: l, axis: c, direction: d, startIndex: u, loop: m, duration: f, dragFree: y, dragThreshold: g, inViewThreshold: x, slidesToScroll: b, skipSnaps: j, containScroll: p, watchResize: v, watchSlides: N, watchDrag: w, watchFocus: C} = i,
        S = 2,
        E = m$(),
        O = E.measure(s),
        G = r.map(E.measure),
        L = c$(c, d),
        I = L.measureSize(O),
        z = h$(I),
        B = o$(l, I),
        F = !m && !!p,
        T = m || !!p,
        {slideSizes: k, slideSizesWithGaps: D, startGap: $, endGap: re} = _$(L, O, G, r, T, a),
        R = T$(L, I, b, m, O, G, $, re, S),
        {snaps: M, snapsAligned: K} = b$(L, B, O, G, R),
        oe = -Gn(M) + Gn(D),
        {snapsContained: be, scrollContainLimit: Se} = g$(I, oe, K, p, S),
        _ = F ? be : K,
        {limit: ee} = v$(oe, _, m),
        H = XP(vm(_), u, m),
        se = H.clone(),
        de = ku(r),
        le = ({dragHandler: Pt, scrollBody: $t, scrollBounds: Qr, options: {loop: xe}}) => {
            xe || Qr.constrain(Pt.pointerDown()),
            $t.seek()
        },
        he = ({scrollBody: Pt, translate: $t, location: Qr, offsetLocation: xe, previousLocation: mt, scrollLooper: It, slideLooper: An, dragHandler: So, animation: wl, eventHandler: Eo, scrollBounds: Cl, options: {loop: Mm}}, Si) => {
            const Rm = Pt.settled(),
                ux = !Cl.shouldConstrain(),
                us = Mm ? Rm : Rm && ux,
                Ia = us && !So.pointerDown();
            Ia && wl.stop();
            const mx = Qr.get() * Si + mt.get() * (1 - Si);
            xe.set(mx),
            Mm && (It.loop(Pt.direction()), An.loop()),
            $t.to(xe.get()),
            Ia && Eo.emit("settle"),
            us || Eo.emit("scroll")
        },
        ve = l$(n, a, () => le(Be), Pt => he(Be, Pt)),
        lt = .68,
        ut = _[H.get()],
        bt = Rd(ut),
        W = Rd(ut),
        Me = Rd(ut),
        At = Rd(ut),
        Ft = p$(bt, Me, W, At, f, lt),
        P = w$(m, _, oe, ee, At),
        Z = C$(ve, H, se, Ft, P, At, o),
        ie = j$(ee),
        we = _u(),
        je = P$(s, r, o, x),
        {slideRegistry: J} = N$(F, p, _, Se, R, de),
        ye = S$(t, r, J, Z, Ft, we, o, C),
        Be = {
            ownerDocument: n,
            ownerWindow: a,
            eventHandler: o,
            containerRect: O,
            slideRects: G,
            animation: ve,
            axis: L,
            dragHandler: d$(L, t, n, a, At, u$(L, a), bt, ve, Z, Ft, P, H, o, z, y, g, j, lt, w),
            eventStore: we,
            percentOfView: z,
            index: H,
            indexPrevious: se,
            limit: ee,
            location: bt,
            offsetLocation: Me,
            previousLocation: W,
            options: i,
            resizeHandler: f$(s, o, a, r, L, v, E),
            scrollBody: Ft,
            scrollBounds: x$(ee, Me, At, Ft, z),
            scrollLooper: y$(oe, ee, Me, [bt, Me, W, At]),
            scrollProgress: ie,
            scrollSnapList: _.map(ie.get),
            scrollSnaps: _,
            scrollTarget: P,
            scrollTo: Z,
            slideLooper: E$(L, I, oe, k, D, M, _, Me, r),
            slideFocus: ye,
            slidesHandler: k$(s, o, N),
            slidesInView: je,
            slideIndexes: de,
            slideRegistry: J,
            slidesToScroll: R,
            target: At,
            translate: JP(L, s)
        };
    return Be
}
function M$() {
    let t = {},
        s;
    function r(d) {
        s = d
    }
    function n(d) {
        return t[d] || []
    }
    function a(d) {
        return n(d).forEach(u => u(s, d)), c
    }
    function i(d, u) {
        return t[d] = n(d).concat([u]), c
    }
    function o(d, u) {
        return t[d] = n(d).filter(m => m !== u), c
    }
    function l() {
        t = {}
    }
    const c = {
        init: r,
        emit: a,
        off: o,
        on: i,
        clear: l
    };
    return c
}
const R$ = {
    align: "center",
    axis: "x",
    container: null,
    slides: null,
    containScroll: "trimSnaps",
    direction: "ltr",
    slidesToScroll: 1,
    inViewThreshold: 0,
    breakpoints: {},
    dragFree: !1,
    dragThreshold: 10,
    loop: !1,
    skipSnaps: !1,
    duration: 25,
    startIndex: 0,
    active: !0,
    watchDrag: !0,
    watchResize: !0,
    watchSlides: !0,
    watchFocus: !0
};
function I$(t) {
    function s(i, o) {
        return ZP(i, o || {})
    }
    function r(i) {
        const o = i.breakpoints || {},
            l = Pu(o).filter(c => t.matchMedia(c).matches).map(c => o[c]).reduce((c, d) => s(c, d), {});
        return s(i, l)
    }
    function n(i) {
        return i.map(o => Pu(o.breakpoints || {})).reduce((o, l) => o.concat(l), []).map(t.matchMedia)
    }
    return {
        mergeOptions: s,
        optionsAtMedia: r,
        optionsMediaQueries: n
    }
}
function D$(t) {
    let s = [];
    function r(i, o) {
        return s = o.filter(({options: l}) => t.optionsAtMedia(l).active !== !1), s.forEach(l => l.init(i, t)), o.reduce((l, c) => Object.assign(l, {
            [c.name]: c
        }), {})
    }
    function n() {
        s = s.filter(i => i.destroy())
    }
    return {
        init: r,
        destroy: n
    }
}
function _f(t, s, r) {
    const n = t.ownerDocument,
        a = n.defaultView,
        i = I$(a),
        o = D$(i),
        l = _u(),
        c = M$(),
        {mergeOptions: d, optionsAtMedia: u, optionsMediaQueries: m} = i,
        {on: f, off: y, emit: g} = c,
        x = L;
    let b = !1,
        j,
        p = d(R$, _f.globalOptions),
        v = d(p),
        N = [],
        w,
        C,
        S;
    function E() {
        const {container: de, slides: le} = v;
        C = (Xv(de) ? t.querySelector(de) : de) || t.children[0];
        const ve = Xv(le) ? C.querySelectorAll(le) : le;
        S = [].slice.call(ve || C.children)
    }
    function O(de) {
        const le = A$(t, C, S, n, a, de, c);
        if (de.loop && !le.slideLooper.canLoop()) {
            const he = Object.assign({}, de, {
                loop: !1
            });
            return O(he)
        }
        return le
    }
    function G(de, le) {
        b || (p = d(p, de), v = u(p), N = le || N, E(), j = O(v), m([p, ...N.map(({options: he}) => he)]).forEach(he => l.add(he, "change", L)), v.active && (j.translate.to(j.location.get()), j.animation.init(), j.slidesInView.init(), j.slideFocus.init(se), j.eventHandler.init(se), j.resizeHandler.init(se), j.slidesHandler.init(se), j.options.loop && j.slideLooper.loop(), C.offsetParent && S.length && j.dragHandler.init(se), w = o.init(se, N)))
    }
    function L(de, le) {
        const he = R();
        I(),
        G(d({
            startIndex: he
        }, de), le),
        c.emit("reInit")
    }
    function I() {
        j.dragHandler.destroy(),
        j.eventStore.clear(),
        j.translate.clear(),
        j.slideLooper.clear(),
        j.resizeHandler.destroy(),
        j.slidesHandler.destroy(),
        j.slidesInView.destroy(),
        j.animation.destroy(),
        o.destroy(),
        l.clear()
    }
    function z() {
        b || (b = !0, l.clear(), I(), c.emit("destroy"), c.clear())
    }
    function B(de, le, he) {
        !v.active || b || (j.scrollBody.useBaseFriction().useDuration(le === !0 ? 0 : v.duration), j.scrollTo.index(de, he || 0))
    }
    function F(de) {
        const le = j.index.add(1).get();
        B(le, de, -1)
    }
    function T(de) {
        const le = j.index.add(-1).get();
        B(le, de, 1)
    }
    function k() {
        return j.index.add(1).get() !== R()
    }
    function D() {
        return j.index.add(-1).get() !== R()
    }
    function $() {
        return j.scrollSnapList
    }
    function re() {
        return j.scrollProgress.get(j.offsetLocation.get())
    }
    function R() {
        return j.index.get()
    }
    function M() {
        return j.indexPrevious.get()
    }
    function K() {
        return j.slidesInView.get()
    }
    function oe() {
        return j.slidesInView.get(!1)
    }
    function be() {
        return w
    }
    function Se() {
        return j
    }
    function _() {
        return t
    }
    function ee() {
        return C
    }
    function H() {
        return S
    }
    const se = {
        canScrollNext: k,
        canScrollPrev: D,
        containerNode: ee,
        internalEngine: Se,
        destroy: z,
        off: y,
        on: f,
        emit: g,
        plugins: be,
        previousScrollSnap: M,
        reInit: x,
        rootNode: _,
        scrollNext: F,
        scrollPrev: T,
        scrollProgress: re,
        scrollSnapList: $,
        scrollTo: B,
        selectedScrollSnap: R,
        slideNodes: H,
        slidesInView: K,
        slidesNotInView: oe
    };
    return G(s, r), setTimeout(() => c.emit("init"), 0), se
}
_f.globalOptions = void 0;
function w0(t={}, s=[]) {
    const r = h.useRef(t),
        n = h.useRef(s),
        [a, i] = h.useState(),
        [o, l] = h.useState(),
        c = h.useCallback(() => {
            a && a.reInit(r.current, n.current)
        }, [a]);
    return h.useEffect(() => {
        y0(r.current, t) || (r.current = t, c())
    }, [t, c]), h.useEffect(() => {
        n$(n.current, s) || (n.current = s, c())
    }, [s, c]), h.useEffect(() => {
        if (r$() && o) {
            _f.globalOptions = w0.globalOptions;
            const d = _f(o, r.current, n.current);
            return i(d), () => d.destroy()
        } else
            i(void 0)
    }, [o, i]), [l, a]
}
w0.globalOptions = void 0;
const e_ = h.createContext(null);
function Up() {
    const t = h.useContext(e_);
    if (!t)
        throw new Error("useCarousel must be used within a <Carousel />");
    return t
}
const Ac = h.forwardRef(({orientation: t="horizontal", opts: s, setApi: r, plugins: n, className: a, children: i, ...o}, l) => {
    const [c, d] = w0({
            ...s,
            axis: t === "horizontal" ? "x" : "y"
        }, n),
        [u, m] = h.useState(!1),
        [f, y] = h.useState(!1),
        g = h.useCallback(p => {
            p && (m(p.canScrollPrev()), y(p.canScrollNext()))
        }, []),
        x = h.useCallback(() => {
            d == null || d.scrollPrev()
        }, [d]),
        b = h.useCallback(() => {
            d == null || d.scrollNext()
        }, [d]),
        j = h.useCallback(p => {
            p.key === "ArrowLeft" ? (p.preventDefault(), x()) : p.key === "ArrowRight" && (p.preventDefault(), b())
        }, [x, b]);
    return h.useEffect(() => {
        !d || !r || r(d)
    }, [d, r]), h.useEffect(() => {
        if (d)
            return g(d), d.on("reInit", g), d.on("select", g), () => {
                d == null || d.off("select", g)
            }
    }, [d, g]), e.jsx(e_.Provider, {
        value: {
            carouselRef: c,
            api: d,
            opts: s,
            orientation: t || ((s == null ? void 0 : s.axis) === "y" ? "vertical" : "horizontal"),
            scrollPrev: x,
            scrollNext: b,
            canScrollPrev: u,
            canScrollNext: f
        },
        children: e.jsx("div", {
            ref: l,
            onKeyDownCapture: j,
            className: ue("relative", a),
            role: "region",
            "aria-roledescription": "carousel",
            ...o,
            children: i
        })
    })
});

const qp = {
        getVehicles: async t => {
            const s = new URLSearchParams;
            t != null && t.limit && s.append("limit", t.limit.toString()),
            t != null && t.offset && s.append("offset", t.offset.toString()),
            t != null && t.marca && s.append("marca", t.marca),
            t != null && t.modelo && s.append("modelo", t.modelo),
            t != null && t.anyo && s.append("anyo", t.anyo.toString()),
            t != null && t.search && s.append("search", t.search),
            t != null && t.withPartCounts && s.append("withPartCounts", "true"),
            t != null && t.activePartCounts && s.append("activePartCounts", "true"),
            t != null && t.idLocal && s.append("idLocal", t.idLocal.toString());
            const r = `/api/vehicles?${s.toString()}`;
            return await (await Ie("GET", r)).json()
        },
        getVehicleById: async (t, s) => {
            const r = (s == null ? void 0 : s.soloActivas) !== !1,
                n = `/api/vehicles/${t}?soloActivas=${r}`;
            return await (await Ie("GET", n)).json()
        },
        searchVehicles: async t => await (await Ie("GET", `/api/vehicles/search?q=${encodeURIComponent(t)}`)).json(),
        getAll: async t => qp.getVehicles(t),
        updateVehicle: async (t, s) => await (await Ie("PUT", `/api/vehicles/${t}`, s)).json(),
        deleteVehicle: async t => await (await Ie("DELETE", `/api/vehicles/${t}`)).json(),
        deleteAllVehicles: async () => await (await Ie("DELETE", "/api/vehicles/all/delete")).json()
    },
    C0 = {
        getParts: async t => {
            const s = new URLSearchParams;
            t != null && t.limit && s.append("limit", t.limit.toString()),
            t != null && t.offset && s.append("offset", t.offset.toString()),
            t != null && t.vehicleId && s.append("vehicleId", t.vehicleId.toString()),
            t != null && t.familia && s.append("familia", t.familia),
            (t == null ? void 0 : t.activo) !== void 0 && s.append("activo", t.activo.toString());
            const r = `/api/parts?${s.toString()}`;
            return await (await Ie("GET", r)).json()
        },
        getPartById: async (t, s) => {
            let r = `/api/parts/${t}`;
            const n = new URLSearchParams;
            return s != null && s.isAdmin && n.append("isAdmin", "true"), s != null && s.filterBrand && n.append("filterBrand", s.filterBrand), n.toString() && (r += `?${n.toString()}`), await (await Ie("GET", r)).json()
        },
        searchParts: async t => await (await Ie("GET", `/api/parts/search?q=${encodeURIComponent(t)}`)).json(),
        getAll: async t => C0.getParts(t),
        searchPartsAdvanced: async (t, s) => {
            const r = new URLSearchParams;
            r.append("q", t),
            s != null && s.limit && r.append("limit", s.limit.toString()),
            s != null && s.offset && r.append("offset", s.offset.toString()),
            (s == null ? void 0 : s.activo) !== void 0 && r.append("activo", s.activo.toString());
            const n = `/api/native-search?${r.toString()}`;
            return await (await Ie("GET", n)).json()
        },
        updatePart: async (t, s) => await (await Ie("PUT", `/api/parts/${t}`, s)).json(),
        deletePart: async t => await (await Ie("DELETE", `/api/parts/${t}`)).json(),
        deleteAllParts: async () => await (await Ie("DELETE", "/api/parts/all/delete")).json(),
        getBrandsAndModels: async (t={}) => {
            var s;
            try {
                const r = new URLSearchParams;
                t.marca && t.marca !== "all-brands" && r.append("marca", t.marca),
                t.modelo && t.modelo !== "all-models" && r.append("modelo", t.modelo);
                const n = `/api/parts/brands-models?${r}`;
                console.log(`API: Fetching brands and models from: ${n}`);
                const a = await fetch(n, {
                    method: "GET",
                    headers: {
                        "Content-Type": "application/json"
                    }
                });
                if (!a.ok) {
                    const o = await a.text();
                    throw console.error(`API Error ${a.status}:`, o), new Error(`Failed to fetch brands and models: ${a.status} ${o}`)
                }
                const i = await a.json();
                return console.log("API: Brands and models received:", {
                    brands: ((s = i == null ? void 0 : i.brands) == null ? void 0 : s.length) || 0,
                    models: Object.keys((i == null ? void 0 : i.models) || {}).length
                }), i
            } catch (r) {
                throw console.error("API: Error in getBrandsAndModels:", r), r
            }
        }
    },
    Dc = {
        async getConfig() {
            const t = await fetch("/api/config");
            if (!t.ok)
                throw new Error(`Error ${t.status}: ${t.statusText}`);
            return t.json()
        },
        async updateConfig(t) {
            console.log("🔧 Llamando a updateConfig con:", t);
            try {
                const s = await fetch("/api/config", {
                        method: "POST",
                        headers: {
                            "Content-Type": "application/json"
                        },
                        body: JSON.stringify(t)
                    }),
                    r = await s.json();
                if (console.log("📡 Respuesta cruda del servidor:", {
                    status: s.status,
                    data: r
                }), !s.ok)
                    throw console.error("❌ Error HTTP:", s.status, r), new Error(r.error || r.details || `Error HTTP ${s.status}`);
                if (!r.success)
                    throw console.error("❌ Respuesta no exitosa:", r), new Error(r.error || "La operación no fue exitosa");
                return console.log("✅ Configuración actualizada exitosamente:", r), r
            } catch (s) {
                throw console.error("❌ Error en updateConfig:", s), s.name === "TypeError" && s.message.includes("fetch") ? new Error("Error de conexión con el servidor") : s
            }
        },
        async getChatbotConfig() {
            const t = await fetch("/api/config/chatbot");
            if (!t.ok)
                throw new Error(`Error ${t.status}: ${t.statusText}`);
            return t.json()
        },
        async updateChatbotCode(t) {
            console.log("🔧 Llamando a updateChatbotCode con código de longitud:", t.length);
            try {
                const s = await fetch("/api/config/chatbot", {
                        method: "POST",
                        headers: {
                            "Content-Type": "application/json"
                        },
                        body: JSON.stringify({
                            chatbotCode: t
                        })
                    }),
                    r = await s.json();
                if (console.log("📡 Respuesta del servidor chatbot:", {
                    status: s.status,
                    data: r
                }), !s.ok)
                    throw console.error("❌ Error HTTP en chatbot:", s.status, r), new Error(r.error || r.details || `Error HTTP ${s.status}`);
                return console.log("✅ Configuración del chatbot actualizada exitosamente:", r), r
            } catch (s) {
                throw console.error("❌ Error en updateChatbotCode:", s), s.name === "TypeError" && s.message.includes("fetch") ? new Error("Error de conexión con el servidor") : s
            }
        }
    },
    ss = {
        getHistory: async t => {
            const s = t ? `/api/import/history?limit=${t}` : "/api/import/history";
            return await (await Ie("GET", s)).json()
        },
        deleteHistoryItem: async t => await (await Ie("DELETE", `/api/import/history/${t}`)).json(),
        getSchedules: async () => await (await Ie("GET", "/api/import/schedules")).json(),
        updateSchedule: async (t, s) => await (await Ie("PUT", `/api/import/schedule/${t}`, s)).json(),
        createSchedule: async t => await (await Ie("POST", "/api/import/schedule", t)).json(),
        deleteSchedule: async t => await (await Ie("DELETE", `/api/import/schedule/${t}`)).json(),

                    } : {},

                    } : {}

                const t = await fetch("/api/metasync-optimized/sync-status");

                    throw console.error("❌ Error en respuesta del servidor:", t.status, t.statusText), new Error(`HTTP ${t.status}: ${t.statusText}`);

                throw console.error("❌ Error en getSyncStatus:", t), t

        async getImportStatus(t) {
            const s = await fetch(`/api/import/${t}`, {
                credentials: "include"
            });
            if (!s.ok)
                throw new Error("Error al obtener estado de importación");
            return s.json()
        },

                },
                credentials: "include",

                method: "POST",
                credentials: "include"
            })).ok)
                throw new Error(`Error al ${s} la importación`)
        },

                method: "PUT",
                headers: {
                    "Content-Type": "application/json"
                },
                credentials: "include",
                body: JSON.stringify(s)
            });
            if (!r.ok)
                throw new Error("Error al actualizar programación");
            return r.json()
        },
        async pauseImportOperation(t) {
            const s = await fetch(`/api/metasync-optimized/import/${t}/pause`, {
                method: "POST",
                headers: {
                    "Content-Type": "application/json"
                },
                credentials: "include"
            });

            const s = await fetch(`/api/metasync-optimized/import/${t}/resume`, {
                method: "POST",
                headers: {
                    "Content-Type": "application/json"
                },
                credentials: "include"
            });
            if (!s.ok)
                throw new Error("Error al reanudar importación");
            return s.json()
        },
        async cancelImportOperation(t) {
            const s = await fetch(`/api/metasync-optimized/import/${t}/cancel`, {
                method: "POST",
                headers: {
                    "Content-Type": "application/json"
                },
                credentials: "include"
            });
            if (!s.ok)
                throw new Error("Error al cancelar importación");
            return s.json()
        },
        async deleteImportFromHistory(t) {
            const s = await fetch(`/api/import/${t}`, {
                method: "DELETE",
                headers: {
                    "Content-Type": "application/json"
                },
                credentials: "include"
            });
            if (!s.ok) {
                const n = await s.json().catch(() => ({
                    message: "Error desconocido"
                }));
                throw new Error(n.message || "Error al eliminar importación del historial")
            }
            const r = await s.text();
            if (!r || r.trim() === "")
                return {
                    success: !0,
                    message: "Importación eliminada correctamente"
                };
            try {
                return JSON.parse(r)
            } catch (n) {
                return console.error("Error parsing JSON response:", n, "Response text:", r), {
                    success: !0,
                    message: "Importación eliminada correctamente"
                }
            }
        },
        async deleteAllImportHistory() {
            const t = await fetch("/api/import/clear-all", {
                method: "DELETE",
                headers: {
                    "Content-Type": "application/json"
                },
                credentials: "include"
            });
            if (!t.ok) {
                const r = await t.json().catch(() => ({
                    message: "Error desconocido"
                }));
                throw new Error(r.message || "Error al eliminar todo el historial de importaciones")
            }
            const s = await t.text();
            if (!s || s.trim() === "")
                return {
                    success: !0,
                    message: "Historial eliminado correctamente"
                };
            try {
                return JSON.parse(s)
            } catch (r) {
                return console.error("Error parsing JSON response:", r, "Response text:", s), {
                    success: !0,
                    message: "Historial eliminado correctamente"
                }
            }
        },
        async clearImportStatistics() {
            const t = await fetch("/api/import/history/stats", {
                method: "DELETE",
                headers: {
                    "Content-Type": "application/json"
                },
                credentials: "include"
            });
            if (!t.ok) {
                const r = await t.json().catch(() => ({
                    message: "Error desconocido"
                }));
                throw new Error(r.message || "Error al limpiar estadísticas de importación")
            }
            const s = await t.text();
            if (!s || s.trim() === "")
                return {
                    success: !0,
                    message: "Estadísticas limpiadas correctamente"
                };
            try {
                return JSON.parse(s)
            } catch (r) {
                return console.error("Error parsing JSON response:", r, "Response text:", s), {
                    success: !0,
                    message: "Estadísticas limpiadas correctamente"
                }
            }
        }
    },

                    idempresa: 1476
                }),

                    method: "RecuperarCambiosCanalEmpresa",
                    fecha: "01/01/2000 00:00:00",
                    lastid: "0",
                    offset: "1000",
                    idempresa: 1476
                });
            return {
                vehicleCount: t.success && ((n = t.data) == null ? void 0 : n.total) || 0,
                partCount: s.success && ((a = s.data) == null ? void 0 : a.total) || 0,

                timestamp: new Date().toISOString()
            }

                        D = parseInt(B.paddingBottom, 10),
                        $ = F + T + z + D + k,
                        re = Math.min(b.offsetHeight * 5, $),
                        R = window.getComputedStyle(x),

                        K = parseInt(R.paddingBottom, 10),
                        oe = S.top + S.height / 2 - In,
                        be = I - oe,
                        Se = b.offsetHeight / 2,
                        _ = b.offsetTop + Se,
                        ee = F + T + _,
                        H = $ - ee;

                        const de = L.length > 0 && b === L[L.length - 1].ref.current;
                        l.style.bottom = "0px";
                        const le = d.clientHeight - x.offsetTop - x.offsetHeight,
                            he = Math.max(be, Se + (de ? K : 0) + le + k),
                            ve = ee + he;
                        l.style.height = ve + "px"
                    } else {
                        const de = L.length > 0 && b === L[0].ref.current;
                        l.style.top = "0px";
                        const he = Math.max(oe, F + x.offsetTop + (de ? M : 0) + Se) + H;
                        l.style.height = he + "px",
                        x.scrollTop = ee - oe + x.offsetTop
                    }
                    l.style.margin = `${In}px 0`,
                    l.style.minHeight = re + "px",
                    l.style.maxHeight = I + "px",
                    n == null || n(),
                    requestAnimationFrame(() => y.current = !0)
                }
            }, [f, i.trigger, i.valueNode, l, d, x, b, j, i.dir, n]);

            d && w(window.getComputedStyle(d).zIndex)

        }, [v, p]);

function P_(t, s, r) {

    return c !== r ? c : void 0
}

const uV = () => {
        const [, t] = dt(),
            [s, r] = h.useState("all-brands"),
            [n, a] = h.useState("all-models"),
            [i, o] = h.useState("all-families"),
            [l, c] = h.useState(""),
            {data: d, error: u, isLoading: m} = _e({
                queryKey: ["parts-brands-models"],
                queryFn: async () => {
                    var x,
                        b;
                    console.log("=== HERO: Cargando marcas y modelos ===");
                    try {
                        const j = await C0.getBrandsAndModels();
                        return console.log("=== HERO: Resultado recibido ===", {
                            brands: ((x = j == null ? void 0 : j.brands) == null ? void 0 : x.length) || 0,
                            firstBrands: ((b = j == null ? void 0 : j.brands) == null ? void 0 : b.slice(0, 5)) || [],
                            modelsCount: Object.keys((j == null ? void 0 : j.models) || {}).length
                        }), j
                    } catch (j) {
                        throw console.error("=== HERO: Error al cargar marcas ===", j), j
                    }
                },
                staleTime: 10 * 60 * 1e3,
                retry: 3
            }),
            f = h.useMemo(() => d != null && d.brands ? d.brands.sort() : [], [d]);
        _e({
            queryKey: ["parts-brands-models", s, n],
            queryFn: () => fetch(`/api/parts/brands-models?marca=${s || "all-brands"}&modelo=${n || "all-models"}`).then(x => x.json()),
            staleTime: 5 * 60 * 1e3
        });
        const {data: y} = _e({
                queryKey: ["/api/parts/families", s, n],
                queryFn: async () => {
                    try {
                        const x = new URLSearchParams;
                        s && s !== "all-brands" && x.append("marca", s),
                        n && n !== "all-models" && x.append("modelo", n),
                        console.log("Consultando familias con filtros:", {
                            marca: s,
                            modelo: n
                        });
                        const b = `/api/optimized/parts/families?${x.toString()}`,
                            j = await fetch(b);
                        if (!j.ok)
                            throw new Error(`Error ${j.status}: ${j.statusText}`);
                        const p = await j.json();
                        if (Array.isArray(p) && p.length > 0 && typeof p[0] == "object" && p[0].name)
                            return p.map(C => C.name).sort();
                        if (Array.isArray(p) && p.length > 0 && typeof p[0] == "string")
                            return p.sort();
                        console.log("Fallback a API original de piezas para familias");
                        const v = new URLSearchParams;
                        v.append("limit", "2000"),
                        v.append("activo", "true"),
                        s && s !== "all-brands" && v.append("marca", s),
                        n && n !== "all-models" && v.append("modelo", n);
                        const w = await (await fetch(`/api/parts?${v.toString()}`)).json();
                        return Array.from(new Set(w.data.map(C => C.descripcionFamilia).filter(Boolean))).sort()
                    } catch (x) {
                        return console.error("Error al cargar familias:", x), []
                    }
                },
                staleTime: 3e4
            }),
            g = x => {
                x.preventDefault();
                const b = new URLSearchParams;
                l.trim() && b.append("search", l.trim()),

function F_(t) {
    return t ? t.toLowerCase().trim().replace(/[áàäâã]/g, "a").replace(/[éèëê]/g, "e").replace(/[íìïî]/g, "i").replace(/[óòöôõ]/g, "o").replace(/[úùüû]/g, "u").replace(/[ñ]/g, "n").replace(/[ç]/g, "c").replace(/[^a-z0-9\s-]/g, "").replace(/\s+/g, "-").replace(/-+/g, "-").replace(/^-|-$/g, "") : ""
}
function iy(t) {
    return `/piezas/${F_(`${t.descripcionArticulo} ${t.vehicleMarca} ${t.vehicleModelo}`)}-${t.id}`
}
function Tu(t) {
    const s = t.anyo ? `-${t.anyo}` : "";
    return `/vehiculos/${F_(`${t.marca} ${t.modelo}${s}`)}-${t.id}`
}
function z_(t) {
    const s = t.match(/-(\d+)$/);
    return s ? parseInt(s[1]) : null
}
const E0 = ({vehicle: t, className: s, partCount: r}) => {
        const [, n] = dt();
        if (!t)
            return null;
        const a = t.activeParts || t.active_parts_count || r || 0,
            i = t && t.imagenes && Array.isArray(t.imagenes) && t.imagenes.length > 0,
            o = () => {
                if (!t)
                    return "Vehículo";
                if (t.descripcion && t.descripcion.trim() !== "" && isNaN(Number(t.descripcion.trim())))
                    return t.descripcion;
                const c = [];
                return t.marca && t.marca !== "N/A" && t.marca.trim() !== "" && c.push(t.marca), t.modelo && t.modelo !== "N/A" && t.modelo.trim() !== "" && c.push(t.modelo), t.version && t.version !== "N/A" && t.version.trim() !== "" && c.push(t.version), t.anyo && t.anyo > 0 && c.push(t.anyo.toString()), c.length > 0 ? c.join(" ") : `Vehículo ${t.id || "Sin ID"}`
            },
            l = () => {
                const c = Tu({
                    id: t.id,
                    marca: t.marca,
                    modelo: t.modelo,
                    anyo: t.anyo
                });
                n(c),
                fp(!0)
            };
        return e.jsxs(V, {

function SV({category: t}) {
    const [s, r] = h.useState("grid"),
        {data: n, isLoading: a, error: i} = _e({
            queryKey: ["category-parts", t],
            queryFn: async () => {
                console.log(`🔍 Buscando piezas para categoría: "${t}"`);
                const l = new URLSearchParams;
                l.set("familia", t),
                l.set("activo", "true"),
                l.set("limit", "8"),
                l.set("offset", "0"),
                l.set("getTotalCount", "true"),
                l.set("orden", "newest");
                const c = `/api/search-parts?${l.toString()}`;
                console.log(`🔎 Usando endpoint: ${c}`);
                const d = await fetch(c);
                if (!d.ok)
                    throw new Error(`Error ${d.status}: ${d.statusText}`);
                const u = await d.json(),
                    m = (u == null ? void 0 : u.data) || [];
                return console.log(`✅ Piezas encontradas para "${t}": ${m.length}`), m.length > 0 ? console.log(`📦 Primera pieza de "${t}":`, {
                    descripcion: m[0].descripcionArticulo,
                    familia: m[0].descripcionFamilia
                }) : console.log(`🚨 No se encontraron piezas para "${t}"`), m
            },
            staleTime: 18e4,
            retry: 1
        }),
        o = n || [];
    return e.jsx(e.Fragment, {
        children: a ? e.jsx("div", {
            className: "grid grid-cols-1 md:grid-cols-2 lg:grid-cols-4 gap-6",
            children: [...Array(8)].map((l, c) => e.jsxs("div", {
                className: "bg-white rounded-lg shadow-md p-4 animate-pulse",
                children: [e.jsx("div", {
                    className: "h-40 bg-gray-200 rounded mb-4"
                }), e.jsxs("div", {
                    className: "space-y-3",
                    children: [e.jsx("div", {
                        className: "h-4 bg-gray-200 rounded w-3/4"
                    }), e.jsx("div", {
                        className: "h-3 bg-gray-200 rounded"
                    }), e.jsx("div", {
                        className: "h-4 bg-gray-200 rounded w-1/2"
                    })]
                })]
            }, c))
        }) : i ? e.jsx("div", {
            className: "text-center py-8",
            children: e.jsxs("div", {
                className: "bg-red-50 border border-red-200 rounded-lg p-6",
                children: [e.jsx("h3", {
                    className: "text-lg font-medium text-red-900 mb-2",
                    children: "Error al cargar piezas"
                }), e.jsxs("p", {
                    className: "text-red-700",
                    children: ["No se pudieron cargar las piezas de ", t]
                })]
            })
        }) : o.length > 0 ? s === "grid" ? e.jsx("div", {
            className: "grid grid-cols-1 md:grid-cols-2 lg:grid-cols-4 gap-6",
            children: o.map(l => e.jsx(cl, {
                part: l
            }, l.id || l.refLocal))
        }) : e.jsx("div", {
            className: "space-y-4",
            children: o.map(l => e.jsx(cl, {
                part: l
            }, l.id || l.refLocal))
        }) : e.jsx("div", {
            className: "text-center py-8",
            children: e.jsxs("div", {
                className: "bg-gray-50 border border-gray-200 rounded-lg p-6",
                children: [e.jsxs("h3", {
                    className: "text-lg font-medium text-gray-900 mb-2",
                    children: ["No hay piezas disponibles en ", t]
                }), e.jsx("p", {
                    className: "text-gray-600 mb-4",
                    children: "Esta categoría no tiene piezas disponibles en este momento."
                })]
            })
        })
    })
}
function EV() {
    const {data: t} = _e({
            queryKey: ["optimized-vehicles"],
            queryFn: () => fetch("/api/optimized/vehicles?limit=10&withPartCounts=true&orden=fecha_desc").then(u => u.json()),
            staleTime: 3e4
        }),
        {data: s} = _e({
            queryKey: ["parts-categories"],
            queryFn: () => fetch("/api/parts/families").then(u => u.json()),
            staleTime: 3e4
        }),
        {data: r, isLoading: n} = _e({
            queryKey: ["/api/cms/homepage-blocks"],
            queryFn: async () => {
                const u = await fetch("/api/cms/homepage-blocks");
                if (!u.ok)
                    throw new Error("Error al cargar bloques");
                return u.json()
            },
            staleTime: 3e5,
            retry: 1
        }),
        a = (t == null ? void 0 : t.data) || [],
        i = s || [],
        {data: o, isLoading: l, error: c} = _e({
            queryKey: ["parts-for-home"],
            queryFn: async () => {
                var u,
                    m;
                try {
                    console.log("🔍 Iniciando carga de piezas para home...");
                    const f = new URLSearchParams;
                    f.set("activo", "true"),
                    f.set("limit", "50"),
                    f.set("offset", "0"),
                    f.set("getTotalCount", "true"),
                    f.set("orden", "newest");
                    const y = `/api/search-parts?${f.toString()}`;
                    console.log(`🔎 Usando endpoint optimizado: ${y}`);
                    const g = await fetch(y);
                    if (console.log("📡 Respuesta del endpoint:", {
                        status: g.status,
                        statusText: g.statusText,
                        ok: g.ok
                    }), !g.ok)
                        throw new Error(`Error ${g.status}: ${g.statusText}`);
                    const x = await g.json();
                    console.log("✅ Datos recibidos:", {
                        dataStructure: Object.keys(x),
                        partsLength: ((u = x == null ? void 0 : x.data) == null ? void 0 : u.length) || 0,
                        pagination: x == null ? void 0 : x.pagination,
                        firstPart: ((m = x == null ? void 0 : x.data) == null ? void 0 : m[0]) || "no parts"
                    });
                    const b = (x == null ? void 0 : x.data) || [];
                    return console.log(`📊 Piezas procesadas para home: ${b.length} piezas encontradas`), b.length > 0 && console.log("✨ Primera pieza:", b[0]), b
                } catch (f) {
                    throw console.error("💥 Error loading parts for home:", f), f
                }
            },
            staleTime: 18e4,
            refetchOnMount: !0,
            retry: 1
        }),
        d = o || [];
    return console.log("🔍 Estado de piezas en Home:", {
        allPartsLength: d.length,
        categoriesLength: i.length,
        isLoadingParts: l
    }), e.jsxs(e.Fragment, {

                    className: "mb-4 text-center",

                        className: "text-3xl font-montserrat font-semibold text-gray-800 mb-2",

                    }), e.jsx("p", {
                        className: "text-sm text-gray-600",

                    })]
                }), e.jsxs(Ac, {
                    className: "w-full max-w-7xl mx-auto px-4 sm:px-0",
                    children: [e.jsx(Mc, {
                        children: a && a.length > 0 ? function Mr(t, s, r="name") {
    let n = document.querySelector(`meta[${r}="${t}"]`);
    n || (n = document.createElement("meta"), n.setAttribute(r, t), document.head.appendChild(n)),
    n.setAttribute("content", s)
}
function e1(t, s) {
    let r = document.getElementById(t);
    r || (r = document.createElement("script"), r.id = t, r.type = "application/ld+json", document.head.appendChild(r)),
    r.textContent = JSON.stringify(s)
}

const PV = () => {
        var bt;
        dt(),
        Sj();
        const [t, s] = h.useState(""),
            [r, n] = h.useState(""),
            [a, i] = h.useState(""),
            [o, l] = h.useState(""),
            [c, d] = h.useState(""),
            [u, m] = h.useState("newest"),
            [f, y] = h.useState(""),
            [g, x] = h.useState("grid"),
            [b, j] = h.useState(1),
            [p, v] = h.useState(12);
        h.useState(!1);
        const [N, w] = h.useState(!1),
            [C, S] = h.useState(!1),
            E = W => {
                j(W),
                fp(!0)
            };
        h.useEffect(() => {
            const W = () => {
                const Me = window.innerWidth < 1024,
                    At = window.innerWidth < 768 ? "móvil" : window.innerWidth < 1024 ? "tablet" : "desktop";
                console.log("📱 Mobile detection (Vehicles):", {
                    width: window.innerWidth,
                    isMobile: Me,
                    deviceType: At
                }),

            };

                        P;

                    W.append("limit", p.toString()),
                    W.append("offset", ((b - 1) * p).toString()),
                    W.append("withPartCounts", "true"),
                    W.append("getTotalCount", "true"),
                    W.append("orden", u),

                    O && W.append("search", O);

                    if (!Me.ok)
                        throw new Error(`Error: ${Me.statusText}`);
                    const At = await Me.json();
                    return {
                        data: At.data || [],
                        pagination: {
                            total: ((Ft = At.pagination) == null ? void 0 : Ft.total) || 0,
                            hasMore: (b - 1) * p + p < (((P = At.pagination) == null ? void 0 : P.total) || 0)
                        }
                    }

                staleTime: 12e4
            }),

                            soloActivas: !0

var IV = t => {
    const {control: s, checked: r, bubbles: n=!0, defaultChecked: a, ...i} = t,
        o = h.useRef(null),
        l = Ip(r),
        c = Sp(s);
    h.useEffect(() => {
        const u = o.current,
            m = window.HTMLInputElement.prototype,
            y = Object.getOwnPropertyDescriptor(m, "checked").set;
        if (l !== r && y) {
            const g = new Event("click", {
                bubbles: n
            });
            u.indeterminate = ao(r),
            y.call(u, ao(r) ? !1 : r),
            u.dispatchEvent(g)
        }
    }, [l, r, n]);
    const d = h.useRef(ao(r) ? !1 : r);
    return e.jsx("input", {
        type: "checkbox",
        "aria-hidden": !0,
        defaultChecked: a ?? d.current,
        ...i,
        tabIndex: -1,
        ref: o,
        style: {
            ...t.style,
            ...c,
            position: "absolute",
            pointerEvents: "none",
            opacity: 0,
            margin: 0
        }
    })
};
function ao(t) {
    return t === "indeterminate"
}
function B_(t) {
    return ao(t) ? "indeterminate" : t ? "checked" : "unchecked"
}
var H_ = V_,
    DV = q_;
const yi = h.forwardRef(({className: t, ...s}, r) => e.jsx(H_, {
    ref: r,

    ...s,
    children: e.jsx(DV, {
        className: ue("flex items-center justify-center text-current"),
        children: e.jsx(yp, {
            className: "h-4 w-4"
        })
    })
}));

function t1(t) {
    if (t.vehicles && t.vehicles.length > 0) {
        const s = t.vehicles[0];
        return {
            id: s.id,
            marca: s.marca,
            modelo: s.modelo,
            version: s.version || "",
            anyo: s.anyo,
            combustible: s.combustible,
            hasValidId: !!s.id
        }
    }
    return t.vehicleId || t.vehicleMarca || t.vehicleModelo ? {
        id: t.vehicleId,
        marca: t.vehicleMarca || "",
        modelo: t.vehicleModelo || "",
        version: t.vehicleVersion || "",
        anyo: t.vehicleAnyo,
        hasValidId: !!t.vehicleId
    } : t.idVehiculo && (t.vehicleMarca || t.vehicleModelo) ? {
        id: void 0,
        marca: t.vehicleMarca || "",
        modelo: t.vehicleModelo || "",
        version: t.vehicleVersion || "",
        anyo: t.vehicleAnyo,
        hasValidId: !1
    } : {
        id: void 0,
        marca: t.marcaVehiculo || "",
        modelo: t.modeloVehiculo || "",
        version: t.versionVehiculo || "",
        anyo: t.anyoVehiculo,
        hasValidId: !1
    }
}
function OV(t, s={}) {
    const {includeYear: r=!1, uppercase: n=!1, includeId: a=!1} = s,
        i = [t.marca, t.modelo, t.version].filter(Boolean);
    r && t.anyo && i.push(`(${t.anyo})`),
    a && t.id && i.push(`ID: ${t.id}`);
    let o = i.join(" ");
    return n ? o.toUpperCase() : o
}
function s1(t, s={}) {
    const {hideLinks: r=!1, contextVehicleId: n, includeYear: a=!1, uppercase: i=!1, showId: o=!1} = s,
        l = OV(t, {
            includeYear: a,
            uppercase: i
        }),
        c = !r && t.hasValidId && t.id !== n;
    return {
        vehicleText: l,
        shouldShowLink: c,
        vehicleId: t.id,
        linkTo: t.id ? `/vehiculos/${t.id}` : void 0,
        displayText: o && t.id ? `${l} (ID: ${t.id})` : l
    }
}

var _0 = "Collapsible",
    [LV, W_] = ws(_0),
    [FV, T0] = LV(_0),
    G_ = h.forwardRef((t, s) => {
        const {__scopeCollapsible: r, open: n, defaultOpen: a, disabled: i, onOpenChange: o, ...l} = t,
            [c=!1, d] = Kr({
                prop: n,
                defaultProp: a,
                onChange: o
            });
        return e.jsx(FV, {
            scope: r,
            disabled: i,
            contentId: ln(),
            open: c,
            onOpenToggle: h.useCallback(() => d(u => !u), [d]),
            children: e.jsx(De.div, {
                "data-state": M0(c),
                "data-disabled": i ? "" : void 0,
                ...l,
                ref: s
            })
        })
    });
G_.displayName = _0;
var K_ = "CollapsibleTrigger",
    Y_ = h.forwardRef((t, s) => {
        const {__scopeCollapsible: r, ...n} = t,
            a = T0(K_, r);
        return e.jsx(De.button, {
            type: "button",
            "aria-controls": a.contentId,
            "aria-expanded": a.open || !1,
            "data-state": M0(a.open),
            "data-disabled": a.disabled ? "" : void 0,
            disabled: a.disabled,
            ...n,
            ref: s,
            onClick: Ne(t.onClick, a.onOpenToggle)
        })
    });
Y_.displayName = K_;
var A0 = "CollapsibleContent",
    Q_ = h.forwardRef((t, s) => {
        const {forceMount: r, ...n} = t,
            a = T0(A0, t.__scopeCollapsible);
        return e.jsx(ks, {
            present: r || a.open,
            children: ({present: i}) => e.jsx(zV, {
                ...n,
                ref: s,
                present: i
            })
        })
    });
Q_.displayName = A0;
var zV = h.forwardRef((t, s) => {
    const {__scopeCollapsible: r, present: n, children: a, ...i} = t,
        o = T0(A0, r),
        [l, c] = h.useState(n),
        d = h.useRef(null),
        u = ot(s, d),
        m = h.useRef(0),
        f = m.current,
        y = h.useRef(0),
        g = y.current,
        x = o.open || l,
        b = h.useRef(x),
        j = h.useRef(void 0);
    return h.useEffect(() => {
        const p = requestAnimationFrame(() => b.current = !1);
        return () => cancelAnimationFrame(p)
    }, []), js(() => {
        const p = d.current;
        if (p) {
            j.current = j.current || {
                transitionDuration: p.style.transitionDuration,
                animationName: p.style.animationName
            },
            p.style.transitionDuration = "0s",
            p.style.animationName = "none";
            const v = p.getBoundingClientRect();
            m.current = v.height,
            y.current = v.width,
            b.current || (p.style.transitionDuration = j.current.transitionDuration, p.style.animationName = j.current.animationName),
            c(n)
        }
    }, [o.open, n]), e.jsx(De.div, {
        "data-state": M0(o.open),
        "data-disabled": o.disabled ? "" : void 0,
        id: o.contentId,
        hidden: !x,
        ...i,
        ref: u,
        style: {
            "--radix-collapsible-content-height": f ? `${f}px` : void 0,
            "--radix-collapsible-content-width": g ? `${g}px` : void 0,
            ...t.style
        },
        children: x && a
    })
});
function M0(t) {
    return t ? "open" : "closed"
}
var $V = G_,
    VV = Y_,

                    N = j - 1,

var Cm = t => t.type === "checkbox",
    Do = t => t instanceof Date,
    yr = t => t == null;

    uT = t => ys(t) && t.target ? Cm(t.target) ? t.target.checked : t.target.value : t,

function Gs(t) {

        n = typeof FileList < "u" ? t instanceof FileList : !1;

            s = t;

    else
        return t;
    return s
}
var Yp = t => Array.isArray(t) ? t.filter(Boolean) : [],
    ms = t => t === void 0,

            }

        }

};

}

const Le = kt.arrayToEnum(["string", "nan", "number", "integer", "float", "boolean", "date", "bigint", "symbol", "function", "undefined", "null", "array", "object", "unknown", "promise", "void", "never", "map", "set"]),
    Ga = t => {
        switch (typeof t) {
        case "undefined":
            return Le.undefined;
        case "string":
            return Le.string;
        case "number":
            return isNaN(t) ? Le.nan : Le.number;
        case "boolean":
            return Le.boolean;
        case "function":
            return Le.function;
        case "bigint":
            return Le.bigint;
        case "symbol":
            return Le.symbol;
        case "object":
            return Array.isArray(t) ? Le.array : t === null ? Le.null : t.then && typeof t.then == "function" && t.catch && typeof t.catch == "function" ? Le.promise : typeof Map < "u" && t instanceof Map ? Le.map : typeof Set < "u" && t instanceof Set ? Le.set : typeof Date < "u" && t instanceof Date ? Le.date : Le.object;
        default:
            return Le.unknown
        }
    },
    Ce = kt.arrayToEnum(["invalid_type", "invalid_literal", "custom", "invalid_union", "invalid_union_discriminator", "invalid_enum_value", "unrecognized_keys", "invalid_arguments", "invalid_return_type", "invalid_date", "invalid_string", "too_small", "too_big", "invalid_intersection_types", "not_multiple_of", "not_finite"]),
    C9 = t => JSON.stringify(t, null, 2).replace(/"([^"]+)":/g, "$1:");
class mn extends Error {
    get errors()
    {
        return this.issues
    }
    constructor(s)
    {
        super(),
        this.issues = [],
        this.addIssue = n => {
            this.issues = [...this.issues, n]
        },
        this.addIssues = (n=[]) => {
            this.issues = [...this.issues, ...n]
        };
        const r = new.target.prototype;
        Object.setPrototypeOf ? Object.setPrototypeOf(this, r) : this.__proto__ = r,
        this.name = "ZodError",
        this.issues = s
    }
    format(s)
    {
        const r = s || function(i) {
                return i.message
            },
            n = {
                _errors: []
            },
            a = i => {
                for (const o of i.issues)
                    if (o.code === "invalid_union")
                        o.unionErrors.map(a);
                    else if (o.code === "invalid_return_type")
                        a(o.returnTypeError);
                    else if (o.code === "invalid_arguments")
                        a(o.argumentsError);
                    else if (o.path.length === 0)
                        n._errors.push(r(o));
                    else {
                        let l = n,
                            c = 0;
                        for (; c < o.path.length;) {
                            const d = o.path[c];
                            c === o.path.length - 1 ? (l[d] = l[d] || {
                                _errors: []
                            }, l[d]._errors.push(r(o))) : l[d] = l[d] || {
                                _errors: []
                            },
                            l = l[d],
                            c++
                        }
                    }
            };
        return a(this), n
    }
    static assert(s)
    {
        if (!(s instanceof mn))
            throw new Error(`Not a ZodError: ${s}`)
    }
    toString()
    {
        return this.message
    }
    get message()
    {
        return JSON.stringify(this.issues, kt.jsonStringifyReplacer, 2)
    }
    get isEmpty()
    {
        return this.issues.length === 0
    }
    flatten(s=r => r.message)
    {
        const r = {},
            n = [];
        for (const a of this.issues)
            a.path.length > 0 ? (r[a.path[0]] = r[a.path[0]] || [], r[a.path[0]].push(s(a))) : n.push(s(a));
        return {
            formErrors: n,
            fieldErrors: r
        }
    }
    get formErrors()
    {
        return this.flatten()
    }
}
mn.create = t => new mn(t);
const Oc = (t, s) => {
    let r;
    switch (t.code) {
    case Ce.invalid_type:
        t.received === Le.undefined ? r = "Required" : r = `Expected ${t.expected}, received ${t.received}`;
        break;
    case Ce.invalid_literal:
        r = `Invalid literal value, expected ${JSON.stringify(t.expected, kt.jsonStringifyReplacer)}`;
        break;
    case Ce.unrecognized_keys:
        r = `Unrecognized key(s) in object: ${kt.joinValues(t.keys, ", ")}`;
        break;
    case Ce.invalid_union:
        r = "Invalid input";
        break;
    case Ce.invalid_union_discriminator:
        r = `Invalid discriminator value. Expected ${kt.joinValues(t.options)}`;
        break;
    case Ce.invalid_enum_value:
        r = `Invalid enum value. Expected ${kt.joinValues(t.options)}, received '${t.received}'`;
        break;
    case Ce.invalid_arguments:
        r = "Invalid function arguments";
        break;
    case Ce.invalid_return_type:
        r = "Invalid function return type";
        break;
    case Ce.invalid_date:
        r = "Invalid date";
        break;
    case Ce.invalid_string:
        typeof t.validation == "object" ? "includes" in t.validation ? (r = `Invalid input: must include "${t.validation.includes}"`, typeof t.validation.position == "number" && (r = `${r} at one or more positions greater than or equal to ${t.validation.position}`)) : "startsWith" in t.validation ? r = `Invalid input: must start with "${t.validation.startsWith}"` : "endsWith" in t.validation ? r = `Invalid input: must end with "${t.validation.endsWith}"` : kt.assertNever(t.validation) : t.validation !== "regex" ? r = `Invalid ${t.validation}` : r = "Invalid";
        break;
    case Ce.too_small:
        t.type === "array" ? r = `Array must contain ${t.exact ? "exactly" : t.inclusive ? "at least" : "more than"} ${t.minimum} element(s)` : t.type === "string" ? r = `String must contain ${t.exact ? "exactly" : t.inclusive ? "at least" : "over"} ${t.minimum} character(s)` : t.type === "number" ? r = `Number must be ${t.exact ? "exactly equal to " : t.inclusive ? "greater than or equal to " : "greater than "}${t.minimum}` : t.type === "date" ? r = `Date must be ${t.exact ? "exactly equal to " : t.inclusive ? "greater than or equal to " : "greater than "}${new Date(Number(t.minimum))}` : r = "Invalid input";
        break;
    case Ce.too_big:
        t.type === "array" ? r = `Array must contain ${t.exact ? "exactly" : t.inclusive ? "at most" : "less than"} ${t.maximum} element(s)` : t.type === "string" ? r = `String must contain ${t.exact ? "exactly" : t.inclusive ? "at most" : "under"} ${t.maximum} character(s)` : t.type === "number" ? r = `Number must be ${t.exact ? "exactly" : t.inclusive ? "less than or equal to" : "less than"} ${t.maximum}` : t.type === "bigint" ? r = `BigInt must be ${t.exact ? "exactly" : t.inclusive ? "less than or equal to" : "less than"} ${t.maximum}` : t.type === "date" ? r = `Date must be ${t.exact ? "exactly" : t.inclusive ? "smaller than or equal to" : "smaller than"} ${new Date(Number(t.maximum))}` : r = "Invalid input";
        break;
    case Ce.custom:
        r = "Invalid input";
        break;
    case Ce.invalid_intersection_types:
        r = "Intersection results could not be merged";
        break;
    case Ce.not_multiple_of:
        r = `Number must be a multiple of ${t.multipleOf}`;
        break;
    case Ce.not_finite:
        r = "Number must be finite";
        break;
    default:
        r = s.defaultError,
        kt.assertNever(t)
    }
    return {
        message: r
    }
};

    ST = t
}
function Of() {
    return ST
}
const Lf = t => {

            }).message;
        return {

        }
    },
