            queryKey: ["/api/diagnostic"],
            queryFn: Qd.runDiagnostic
        }),
        d = () => {
            c()
        },
        u = async () => {
            try {
                n(!0);
                const f = await Qd.checkCounts();
                s(f)
            } catch (f) {
                console.error("Error al verificar conteos:", f)
            } finally {
                n(!1)
            }
        };
    if (i)
        return e.jsxs(V, {
            className: "w-full",
            children: [e.jsx(ne, {
                children: e.jsxs(ae, {
                    className: "flex items-center gap-2",
                    children: [e.jsx(Gx, {
                        className: "h-5 w-5"
                    }), "Diagnóstico de API"]
                })
            }), e.jsx(U, {
                children: e.jsxs("div", {
                    className: "flex flex-col items-center justify-center p-8",
                    children: [e.jsx(nw, {
                        className: "h-8 w-8 animate-spin text-blue-500"
                    }), e.jsx("p", {
                        className: "mt-4 text-sm text-muted-foreground",
                        children: "Ejecutando diagnóstico..."
                    })]
                })
            })]
        });
    if (o)
        return e.jsxs(V, {
            className: "w-full",
            children: [e.jsx(ne, {
                children: e.jsxs(ae, {
                    className: "flex items-center gap-2",
                    children: [e.jsx(Gx, {
                        className: "h-5 w-5"
                    }), "Diagnóstico de API"]
                })
            }), e.jsx(U, {
                children: e.jsxs("div", {
                    className: "flex flex-col items-center justify-center p-8",
                    children: [e.jsx(qs, {
                        className: "h-8 w-8 text-red-500"
                    }), e.jsxs("p", {
                        className: "mt-4 text-sm text-muted-foreground",
                        children: ["Error al ejecutar diagnóstico: ", l instanceof Error ? l.message : "Error desconocido"]
                    })]
                })
            }), e.jsx(Pa, {
                children: e.jsxs(A, {
                    variant: "outline",
                    onClick: d,
                    className: "w-full",
                    children: [e.jsx(rw, {
                        className: "mr-2 h-4 w-4"
                    }), "Reintentar"]
                })
            })]
        });
    const m = a != null && a.timestamp ? Bt(new Date(a.timestamp), "dd MMMM yyyy HH:mm:ss", {
        locale: Ss
    }) : "";
    return e.jsxs(V, {
        className: "w-full",
        children: [e.jsxs(ne, {
            children: [e.jsxs(ae, {
                className: "flex items-center gap-2",
                children: [e.jsx(Gx, {
                    className: "h-5 w-5"
                }), "Diagnóstico de API"]
            }), e.jsxs(qt, {
                children: ["Fecha: ", m]
            })]
        }), e.jsxs(U, {
            children: [e.jsx("div", {
                className: "mb-3 text-xs text-amber-600 bg-amber-50 p-2 rounded border border-amber-200",
                children: e.jsxs("p", {
                    children: [e.jsx("strong", {
                        children: "Nota:"
                    }), " Los vehículos se obtienen a través del endpoint RecuperarCambiosCanalEmpresa, ya que el endpoint específico RecuperarCambiosVehiculosCanalEmpresa no responde correctamente."]
                })
            }), a && e.jsxs(e.Fragment, {
                children: [e.jsxs("div", {
                    className: "mb-6 flex flex-col space-y-2",
                    children: [e.jsxs("div", {
                        className: "flex justify-between items-center",
                        children: [e.jsx("span", {
                            className: "text-sm font-medium",
                            children: "Estado general:"
                        }), a.success ? e.jsxs(ge, {
                            variant: "outline",
                            className: "bg-green-50 text-green-700 border-green-200",
                            children: [e.jsx(Nv, {
                                className: "mr-1 h-3 w-3"
                            }), "Conexión correcta"]
                        }) : e.jsxs(ge, {
                            variant: "outline",
                            className: "bg-red-50 text-red-700 border-red-200",
                            children: [e.jsx(qs, {
                                className: "mr-1 h-3 w-3"
                            }), "Con errores"]
                        })]
                    }), e.jsxs("div", {
                        className: "flex justify-between",
                        children: [e.jsx("span", {
                            className: "text-sm font-medium",
                            children: "Total endpoints:"
                        }), e.jsx("span", {
                            className: "text-sm",
                            children: a.diagnostics.length
                        })]
                    }), e.jsxs("div", {
                        className: "flex justify-between",
                        children: [e.jsx("span", {
                            className: "text-sm font-medium",
                            children: "Endpoints correctos:"
                        }), e.jsx("span", {
                            className: "text-sm text-green-600",
                            children: a.diagnostics.filter(f => f.success).length
                        })]
                    }), e.jsxs("div", {
                        className: "flex justify-between",
                        children: [e.jsx("span", {
                            className: "text-sm font-medium",
                            children: "Endpoints con error:"
                        }), e.jsx("span", {
                            className: "text-sm text-red-600",
                            children: a.diagnostics.filter(f => !f.success).length
                        })]
                    }), e.jsxs("div", {
                        className: "flex justify-between",
                        children: [e.jsx("span", {
                            className: "text-sm font-medium",
                            children: "Estado del sistema:"
                        }), e.jsx("span", {
                            className: "text-sm",
                            children: a.success ? "Funcionando" : "Con problemas"
                        })]
                    }), e.jsxs("div", {
                        className: "flex justify-between",
                        children: [e.jsx("span", {
                            className: "text-sm font-medium",
                            children: "Última actualización:"
                        }), e.jsx("span", {
                            className: "text-sm",
                            children: Bt(new Date(a.timestamp), "HH:mm:ss", {
                                locale: Ss
                            })
                        })]
                    })]
                }), e.jsx(O0, {
                    type: "single",
                    collapsible: !0,
                    className: "w-full",
                    children: a.diagnostics.map((f, y) => e.jsxs(Au, {
                        value: `item-${y}`,
                        children: [e.jsx(Mu, {
                            children: e.jsxs("div", {
                                className: "flex items-center gap-2 w-full justify-between",
                                children: [e.jsxs("div", {
                                    className: "flex items-center gap-2",
                                    children: [f.success ? e.jsx(Nv, {
                                        className: "h-4 w-4 text-green-500"
                                    }) : e.jsx(Sa, {
                                        className: "h-4 w-4 text-red-500"
                                    }), e.jsx("span", {
                                        children: f.endpoint
                                    })]
                                }), e.jsxs("div", {
                                    className: "flex items-center gap-2",
                                    children: [f.success && f.responseData && f.responseData.summary && e.jsx(ge, {
                                        variant: "outline",
                                        className: "bg-green-50 text-green-700 border-green-200 whitespace-nowrap",
                                        children: f.responseData.summary
                                    }), !f.success && f.status && e.jsxs(ge, {
                                        variant: "destructive",
                                        className: "ml-2",
                                        children: ["Error ", f.status]
                                    })]
                                })]
                            })
                        }), e.jsx(Ru, {
                            children: e.jsxs("div", {
                                className: "space-y-3 p-2 text-sm",
                                children: [e.jsxs("div", {
                                    className: "grid grid-cols-2 gap-1",
                                    children: [e.jsx("span", {
                                        className: "font-medium",
                                        children: "URL:"
                                    }), e.jsx("span", {
                                        className: "font-mono text-xs break-all",
                                        children: f.url
                                    })]
                                }), e.jsxs("div", {
                                    className: "grid grid-cols-2 gap-1",
                                    children: [e.jsx("span", {
                                        className: "font-medium",
                                        children: "Método:"
                                    }), e.jsx("span", {
                                        children: f.method
                                    })]
                                }), e.jsxs("div", {
                                    className: "grid grid-cols-2 gap-1",
                                    children: [e.jsx("span", {
                                        className: "font-medium",
                                        children: "Estado:"
                                    }), e.jsx("span", {
                                        children: f.status || "N/A"
                                    })]
                                }), f.success && f.responseData && f.responseData.summary && e.jsxs("div", {
                                    className: "grid grid-cols-2 gap-1",
                                    children: [e.jsx("span", {
                                        className: "font-medium",
                                        children: "Datos:"
                                    }), e.jsx("span", {
                                        className: "text-xs font-semibold text-green-700",
                                        children: f.responseData.summary
                                    })]
                                }), f.success && f.responseData && f.responseData.itemCount && e.jsxs("div", {
                                    className: "mt-2 p-2 bg-green-50 rounded-md border border-green-200",
                                    children: [e.jsx("p", {
                                        className: "text-sm text-green-700 font-medium mb-1",
                                        children: "Detalle de datos:"
                                    }), e.jsxs("ul", {
                                        className: "list-disc list-inside text-xs text-green-700",
                                        children: [f.responseData.itemCount.piezas > 0 && e.jsxs("li", {
                                            children: ["Piezas: ", f.responseData.itemCount.piezas]
                                        }), f.responseData.itemCount.vehiculos > 0 && e.jsxs("li", {
                                            children: ["Vehículos: ", f.responseData.itemCount.vehiculos]
                                        }), f.responseData.pagination && e.jsxs("li", {
                                            children: ["Último ID: ", f.responseData.pagination.lastId]
                                        })]
                                    })]
                                }), e.jsxs("div", {
                                    className: "grid grid-cols-2 gap-1",
                                    children: [e.jsx("span", {
                                        className: "font-medium",
                                        children: "Mensaje:"
                                    }), e.jsx("span", {
                                        className: "text-xs",
                                        children: f.message
                                    })]
                                }), !f.success && e.jsxs("div", {
                                    className: "mt-3 p-3 bg-red-50 rounded-md border border-red-200",
                                    children: [e.jsx("p", {
                                        className: "text-sm text-red-700 font-medium",
                                        children: "Sugerencia de solución:"
                                    }), e.jsxs("ul", {
                                        className: "list-disc list-inside text-xs text-red-700 mt-1",
                                        children: [f.status === 404 && e.jsxs(e.Fragment, {
                                            children: [e.jsx("li", {
                                                children: "Verificar que la URL del endpoint es correcta"
                                            }), e.jsx("li", {
                                                children: "Comprobar que el API key tiene acceso a este endpoint"
                                            }), e.jsx("li", {
                                                children: "La respuesta 404 indica que el recurso no fue encontrado"
                                            })]
                                        }), f.status === 401 && e.jsxs(e.Fragment, {
                                            children: [e.jsx("li", {
                                                children: "El API key proporcionado no es válido o ha expirado"
                                            }), e.jsx("li", {
                                                children: "Verificar las credenciales en la configuración"
                                            })]
                                        }), f.status === 403 && e.jsxs(e.Fragment, {
                                            children: [e.jsx("li", {
                                                children: "El API key no tiene permisos suficientes"
                                            }), e.jsx("li", {
                                                children: "Contactar con el proveedor de la API"
                                            })]
                                        }), !f.status && e.jsxs(e.Fragment, {
                                            children: [e.jsx("li", {
                                                children: "Verificar la conexión a internet"
                                            }), e.jsx("li", {
                                                children: "El servidor de la API podría estar caído"
                                            }), e.jsx("li", {
                                                children: "Contactar con el proveedor de la API"
                                            })]
                                        })]
                                    })]
                                })]
                            })
                        })]
                    }, y))
                })]
            })]
        }), e.jsx(U, {
            className: "pt-5",
            children: t && e.jsxs("div", {
                className: "bg-blue-50 border border-blue-200 rounded-md p-4 mb-5",
                children: [e.jsxs("h3", {
                    className: "text-sm font-medium flex items-center gap-2 mb-3",
                    children: [e.jsx(Wn, {
                        className: "h-4 w-4 text-blue-500"
                    }), "Validación de conteos y recuperación de datos", e.jsx(ge, {
                        variant: "outline",
                        className: "bg-blue-100 text-blue-700 border-blue-200 ml-2",
                        children: new Date(t.timestamp).toLocaleTimeString()
                    })]
                }), e.jsxs(Bs, {
                    children: [e.jsx(Hs, {
                        children: e.jsxs(vt, {
                            children: [e.jsx(pe, {
                                children: "Métrica"
                            }), e.jsx(pe, {
                                className: "text-right",
                                children: "Conteo API"
                            }), e.jsx(pe, {
                                className: "text-right",
                                children: "Recuperados"
                            })]
                        })
                    }), e.jsxs(Ws, {
                        children: [e.jsxs(vt, {
                            children: [e.jsx(fe, {
                                className: "font-medium",
                                children: "Vehículos"
                            }), e.jsx(fe, {
                                className: "text-right",
                                children: t.vehicleCount
                            }), e.jsx(fe, {
                                className: "text-right",
                                children: t.vehiclesRetrieved > 0 ? e.jsx("span", {
                                    className: "text-green-600",
                                    children: t.vehiclesRetrieved
                                }) : e.jsx("span", {
                                    className: "text-red-600",
                                    children: "0"
                                })
                            })]
                        }), e.jsxs(vt, {
                            children: [e.jsx(fe, {
                                className: "font-medium",
                                children: "Piezas"
                            }), e.jsx(fe, {
                                className: "text-right",
                                children: t.partCount
                            }), e.jsx(fe, {
                                className: "text-right",
                                children: t.partsRetrieved > 0 ? e.jsx("span", {
                                    className: "text-green-600",
                                    children: t.partsRetrieved
                                }) : e.jsx("span", {
                                    className: "text-red-600",
                                    children: "0"
                                })
                            })]
                        })]
                    })]
                }), t.vehiclesInPartsResponse > 0 && e.jsxs("div", {
                    className: "mt-3 text-xs text-blue-700 bg-blue-100 p-2 rounded",
                    children: [e.jsx("span", {
                        className: "font-medium",
                        children: "Nota:"
                    }), " Se encontraron ", t.vehiclesInPartsResponse, " vehículos asociados en la respuesta de piezas."]
                }), t.vehicleCount > 0 && t.vehiclesRetrieved === 0 && e.jsxs("div", {
                    className: "mt-3 text-xs text-amber-700 bg-amber-100 p-2 rounded",
                    children: [e.jsx("span", {
                        className: "font-medium",
                        children: "Sugerencia:"
                    }), " Los conteos muestran vehículos disponibles pero no se pudieron recuperar directamente. Intente recuperar vehículos a través de la API de piezas, donde aparecen como elementos asociados."]
                })]
            })
        }), e.jsxs(Pa, {
            className: "flex gap-2",
            children: [e.jsxs(A, {
                variant: "outline",
                onClick: d,
                className: "w-full",
                children: [e.jsx(rw, {
                    className: "mr-2 h-4 w-4"
                }), "Actualizar diagnóstico"]
            }), e.jsxs(A, {
                variant: "secondary",
                onClick: u,
                className: "w-full",
                disabled: r,
                children: [r ? e.jsx(nw, {
                    className: "mr-2 h-4 w-4 animate-spin"
                }) : e.jsx(wE, {
                    className: "mr-2 h-4 w-4"
                }), "Verificar conteos"]
            })]
        })]
    })
}
function iW(t, s) {
    return h.useReducer((r, n) => s[r][n] ?? r, t)
}
var ob = "ScrollArea",
    [VA, bQ] = ws(ob),
    [oW, Tn] = VA(ob),
    UA = h.forwardRef((t, s) => {
        const {__scopeScrollArea: r, type: n="hover", dir: a, scrollHideDelay: i=600, ...o} = t,
            [l, c] = h.useState(null),
            [d, u] = h.useState(null),
            [m, f] = h.useState(null),
            [y, g] = h.useState(null),
            [x, b] = h.useState(null),
            [j, p] = h.useState(0),
            [v, N] = h.useState(0),
            [w, C] = h.useState(!1),
            [S, E] = h.useState(!1),
            O = ot(s, L => c(L)),
            G = jl(a);
        return e.jsx(oW, {
            scope: r,
            type: n,
            dir: G,
            scrollHideDelay: i,
            scrollArea: l,
            viewport: d,
            onViewportChange: u,
            content: m,
            onContentChange: f,
            scrollbarX: y,
            onScrollbarXChange: g,
            scrollbarXEnabled: w,
            onScrollbarXEnabledChange: C,
            scrollbarY: x,
            onScrollbarYChange: b,
            scrollbarYEnabled: S,
            onScrollbarYEnabledChange: E,
            onCornerWidthChange: p,
            onCornerHeightChange: N,
            children: e.jsx(De.div, {
                dir: G,
                ...o,
                ref: O,
                style: {
                    position: "relative",
                    "--radix-scroll-area-corner-width": j + "px",
                    "--radix-scroll-area-corner-height": v + "px",
                    ...t.style
                }
            })
        })
    });
UA.displayName = ob;
var qA = "ScrollAreaViewport",
    BA = h.forwardRef((t, s) => {
        const {__scopeScrollArea: r, children: n, nonce: a, ...i} = t,
            o = Tn(qA, r),
            l = h.useRef(null),
            c = ot(s, l, o.onViewportChange);
        return e.jsxs(e.Fragment, {
            children: [e.jsx("style", {
                dangerouslySetInnerHTML: {
                    __html: "[data-radix-scroll-area-viewport]{scrollbar-width:none;-ms-overflow-style:none;-webkit-overflow-scrolling:touch;}[data-radix-scroll-area-viewport]::-webkit-scrollbar{display:none}"
                },
                nonce: a
            }), e.jsx(De.div, {
                "data-radix-scroll-area-viewport": "",
                ...i,
                ref: c,
                style: {
                    overflowX: o.scrollbarXEnabled ? "scroll" : "hidden",
                    overflowY: o.scrollbarYEnabled ? "scroll" : "hidden",
                    ...t.style
                },
                children: e.jsx("div", {
                    ref: o.onContentChange,
                    style: {
                        minWidth: "100%",
                        display: "table"
                    },
                    children: n
                })
            })]
        })
    });
BA.displayName = qA;
var Ra = "ScrollAreaScrollbar",
    lb = h.forwardRef((t, s) => {
        const {forceMount: r, ...n} = t,
            a = Tn(Ra, t.__scopeScrollArea),
            {onScrollbarXEnabledChange: i, onScrollbarYEnabledChange: o} = a,
            l = t.orientation === "horizontal";
        return h.useEffect(() => (l ? i(!0) : o(!0), () => {
            l ? i(!1) : o(!1)
        }), [l, i, o]), a.type === "hover" ? e.jsx(lW, {
            ...n,
            ref: s,
            forceMount: r
        }) : a.type === "scroll" ? e.jsx(cW, {
            ...n,
            ref: s,
            forceMount: r
        }) : a.type === "auto" ? e.jsx(HA, {
            ...n,
            ref: s,
            forceMount: r
        }) : a.type === "always" ? e.jsx(cb, {
            ...n,
            ref: s
        }) : null
    });
lb.displayName = Ra;
var lW = h.forwardRef((t, s) => {
        const {forceMount: r, ...n} = t,
            a = Tn(Ra, t.__scopeScrollArea),
            [i, o] = h.useState(!1);
        return h.useEffect(() => {
            const l = a.scrollArea;
            let c = 0;
            if (l) {
                const d = () => {
                        window.clearTimeout(c),
                        o(!0)
                    },
                    u = () => {
                        c = window.setTimeout(() => o(!1), a.scrollHideDelay)
                    };
                return l.addEventListener("pointerenter", d), l.addEventListener("pointerleave", u), () => {
                    window.clearTimeout(c),
                    l.removeEventListener("pointerenter", d),
                    l.removeEventListener("pointerleave", u)
                }
            }
        }, [a.scrollArea, a.scrollHideDelay]), e.jsx(ks, {
            present: r || i,
            children: e.jsx(HA, {
                "data-state": i ? "visible" : "hidden",
                ...n,
                ref: s
            })
        })
    }),
    cW = h.forwardRef((t, s) => {
        const {forceMount: r, ...n} = t,
            a = Tn(Ra, t.__scopeScrollArea),
            i = t.orientation === "horizontal",
            o = sx(() => c("SCROLL_END"), 100),
            [l, c] = iW("hidden", {
                hidden: {
                    SCROLL: "scrolling"
                },
                scrolling: {
                    SCROLL_END: "idle",
                    POINTER_ENTER: "interacting"
                },
                interacting: {
                    SCROLL: "interacting",
                    POINTER_LEAVE: "idle"
                },
                idle: {
                    HIDE: "hidden",
                    SCROLL: "scrolling",
                    POINTER_ENTER: "interacting"
                }
            });
        return h.useEffect(() => {
            if (l === "idle") {
                const d = window.setTimeout(() => c("HIDE"), a.scrollHideDelay);
                return () => window.clearTimeout(d)
            }
        }, [l, a.scrollHideDelay, c]), h.useEffect(() => {
            const d = a.viewport,
                u = i ? "scrollLeft" : "scrollTop";
            if (d) {
                let m = d[u];
                const f = () => {
                    const y = d[u];
                    m !== y && (c("SCROLL"), o()),
                    m = y
                };
                return d.addEventListener("scroll", f), () => d.removeEventListener("scroll", f)
            }
        }, [a.viewport, i, c, o]), e.jsx(ks, {
            present: r || l !== "hidden",
            children: e.jsx(cb, {
                "data-state": l === "hidden" ? "hidden" : "visible",
                ...n,
                ref: s,
                onPointerEnter: Ne(t.onPointerEnter, () => c("POINTER_ENTER")),
                onPointerLeave: Ne(t.onPointerLeave, () => c("POINTER_LEAVE"))
            })
        })
    }),
    HA = h.forwardRef((t, s) => {
        const r = Tn(Ra, t.__scopeScrollArea),
            {forceMount: n, ...a} = t,
            [i, o] = h.useState(!1),
            l = t.orientation === "horizontal",
            c = sx(() => {
                if (r.viewport) {
                    const d = r.viewport.offsetWidth < r.viewport.scrollWidth,
                        u = r.viewport.offsetHeight < r.viewport.scrollHeight;
                    o(l ? d : u)
                }
            }, 10);
        return qc(r.viewport, c), qc(r.content, c), e.jsx(ks, {
            present: n || i,
            children: e.jsx(cb, {
                "data-state": i ? "visible" : "hidden",
                ...a,
                ref: s
            })
        })
    }),
    cb = h.forwardRef((t, s) => {
        const {orientation: r="vertical", ...n} = t,
            a = Tn(Ra, t.__scopeScrollArea),
            i = h.useRef(null),
            o = h.useRef(0),
            [l, c] = h.useState({
                content: 0,
                viewport: 0,
                scrollbar: {
                    size: 0,
                    paddingStart: 0,
                    paddingEnd: 0
                }
            }),
            d = QA(l.viewport, l.content),
            u = {
                ...n,
                sizes: l,
                onSizesChange: c,
                hasThumb: d > 0 && d < 1,
                onThumbChange: f => i.current = f,
                onThumbPointerUp: () => o.current = 0,
                onThumbPointerDown: f => o.current = f
            };
        function m(f, y) {
            return pW(f, o.current, l, y)
        }
        return r === "horizontal" ? e.jsx(dW, {
            ...u,
            ref: s,
            onThumbPositionChange: () => {
                if (a.viewport && i.current) {
                    const f = a.viewport.scrollLeft,
                        y = O1(f, l, a.dir);
                    i.current.style.transform = `translate3d(${y}px, 0, 0)`
                }
            },
            onWheelScroll: f => {
                a.viewport && (a.viewport.scrollLeft = f)
            },
            onDragScroll: f => {
                a.viewport && (a.viewport.scrollLeft = m(f, a.dir))
            }
        }) : r === "vertical" ? e.jsx(uW, {
            ...u,
            ref: s,
            onThumbPositionChange: () => {
                if (a.viewport && i.current) {
                    const f = a.viewport.scrollTop,
                        y = O1(f, l);
                    i.current.style.transform = `translate3d(0, ${y}px, 0)`
                }
            },
            onWheelScroll: f => {
                a.viewport && (a.viewport.scrollTop = f)
            },
            onDragScroll: f => {
                a.viewport && (a.viewport.scrollTop = m(f))
            }
        }) : null
    }),
    dW = h.forwardRef((t, s) => {
        const {sizes: r, onSizesChange: n, ...a} = t,
            i = Tn(Ra, t.__scopeScrollArea),
            [o, l] = h.useState(),
            c = h.useRef(null),
            d = ot(s, c, i.onScrollbarXChange);
        return h.useEffect(() => {
            c.current && l(getComputedStyle(c.current))
        }, [c]), e.jsx(GA, {
            "data-orientation": "horizontal",
            ...a,
            ref: d,
            sizes: r,
            style: {
                bottom: 0,
                left: i.dir === "rtl" ? "var(--radix-scroll-area-corner-width)" : 0,
                right: i.dir === "ltr" ? "var(--radix-scroll-area-corner-width)" : 0,
                "--radix-scroll-area-thumb-width": tx(r) + "px",
                ...t.style
            },
            onThumbPointerDown: u => t.onThumbPointerDown(u.x),
            onDragScroll: u => t.onDragScroll(u.x),
            onWheelScroll: (u, m) => {
                if (i.viewport) {
                    const f = i.viewport.scrollLeft + u.deltaX;
                    t.onWheelScroll(f),
                    XA(f, m) && u.preventDefault()
                }

function Gf(t) {
    return t ? parseInt(t, 10) : 0
}
function QA(t, s) {
    const r = t / s;
    return isNaN(r) ? 0 : r
}
function tx(t) {
    const s = QA(t.viewport, t.content),
        r = t.scrollbar.paddingStart + t.scrollbar.paddingEnd,
        n = (t.scrollbar.size - r) * s;
    return Math.max(n, 18)
}
function pW(t, s, r, n="ltr") {
    const a = tx(r),
        i = a / 2,
        o = s || i,
        l = a - o,
        c = r.scrollbar.paddingStart + o,
        d = r.scrollbar.size - r.scrollbar.paddingEnd - l,
        u = r.content - r.viewport,
        m = n === "ltr" ? [0, u] : [u * -1, 0];
    return ZA([c, d], m)(t)
}
function O1(t, s, r="ltr") {
    const n = tx(s),
        a = s.scrollbar.paddingStart + s.scrollbar.paddingEnd,
        i = s.scrollbar.size - a,
        o = s.content - s.viewport,
        l = i - n,
        c = r === "ltr" ? [0, o] : [o * -1, 0],
        d = ey(t, c);
    return ZA([0, o], [0, l])(d)
}
function ZA(t, s) {
    return r => {
        if (t[0] === t[1] || s[0] === s[1])
            return s[0];
        const n = (s[1] - s[0]) / (t[1] - t[0]);
        return s[0] + n * (r - t[0])
    }
}
function XA(t, s) {
    return t > 0 && t < s
}
var xW = (t, s=() => {}) => {
    let r = {
            left: t.scrollLeft,
            top: t.scrollTop
        },
        n = 0;
    return function a() {
        const i = {
                left: t.scrollLeft,
                top: t.scrollTop
            },
            o = r.left !== i.left,
            l = r.top !== i.top;
        (o || l) && s(),
        r = i,
        n = window.requestAnimationFrame(a)
    }(), () => window.cancelAnimationFrame(n)
};
function sx(t, s) {
    const r = Zt(t),
        n = h.useRef(0);
    return h.useEffect(() => () => window.clearTimeout(n.current), []), h.useCallback(() => {
        window.clearTimeout(n.current),
        n.current = window.setTimeout(r, s)
    }, [r, s])
}
function qc(t, s) {
    const r = Zt(s);
    js(() => {
        let n = 0;
        if (t) {
            const a = new ResizeObserver(() => {
                cancelAnimationFrame(n),
                n = window.requestAnimationFrame(r)
            });
            return a.observe(t), () => {
                window.cancelAnimationFrame(n),
                a.unobserve(t)
            }
        }
    }, [t, r])
}

    SW = () => {
        var g,
            x;
        const [t, s] = h.useState("");
        h.useState(null);
        const {toast: r} = tt(),
            n = hr(),
            {data: a, isLoading: i} = _e({
                queryKey: ["/api/backup/list"],
                queryFn: async () => {
                    const b = await fetch("/api/backup/list", {
                        credentials: "include"
                    });
                    if (!b.ok)
                        throw new Error("Error obteniendo backups");
                    return b.json()
                }
            }),
            o = rt({
                mutationFn: async b => {
                    const j = await fetch("/api/backup/create", {
                        method: "POST",
                        headers: {
                            "Content-Type": "application/json"
                        },
                        credentials: "include",
                        body: JSON.stringify({
                            name: b || void 0
                        })
                    });
                    if (!j.ok)
                        throw new Error("Error creando backup de base de datos");
                    return j.json()
                },
                onSuccess: b => {
                    n.invalidateQueries({
                        queryKey: ["/api/backup/list"]
                    }),
                    r({
                        title: "Éxito",
                        description: b.message
                    }),
                    s("")
                },
                onError: b => {
                    r({
                        title: "Error",
                        description: b.message,
                        variant: "destructive"
                    })
                }
            }),
            l = rt({
                mutationFn: async b => {
                    const j = await fetch(`/api/backup/restore/database/${b}`, {
                        method: "POST",
                        credentials: "include"
                    });
                    if (!j.ok)
                        throw new Error("Error restaurando backup de base de datos");
                    return j.json()
                },
                onSuccess: b => {
                    r({
                        title: "Éxito",
                        description: b.message
                    })
                },
                onError: b => {
                    r({
                        title: "Error",
                        description: b.message,
                        variant: "destructive"
                    })
                }
            }),
            c = rt({
                mutationFn: async b => {
                    const j = await fetch(`/api/backup/${b}`, {
                        method: "DELETE",
                        credentials: "include"
                    });
                    if (!j.ok)
                        throw new Error("Error eliminando backup");
                    return j.json()
                },
                onSuccess: b => {
                    n.invalidateQueries({
                        queryKey: ["/api/backup/list"]
                    }),

                        title: "Éxito",
                        description: b.message
                    })
                },
                onError: b => {
                    r({
                        title: "Error",
                        description: b.message,
                        variant: "destructive"
                    })
                }
            }),

                const j = `¿Estás seguro de que quieres restaurar la base de datos desde el backup "${b.name}"? Esta acción sobrescribirá los datos actuales.`;

            },
            u = b => {

    yg = () => {
        var $t,
            Qr;
        const [, t] = dt(),
            {toast: s} = tt(),
            {user: r} = Ps(),
            [n, a] = h.useState(""),
            [i, o] = h.useState(1),
            [l, c] = h.useState(kW),
            [d, u] = h.useState(null),
            [m, f] = h.useState(!1),
            [y, g] = h.useState(!1),
            [x, b] = h.useState("fechaActualizacion"),
            [j, p] = h.useState("desc"),
            [v, N] = h.useState(""),
            [w, C] = h.useState(""),
            [S, E] = h.useState(""),
            [O, G] = h.useState(!1),
            [L, I] = h.useState(!1),
            [z, B] = h.useState(null),
            [F, T] = h.useState(!1),
            [k, D] = h.useState(null),
            [$, re] = h.useState(0);
        mf("/admin/vehicles/edit/:id"),
        mf("/admin/vehicles/new"),
        r && !r.isAdmin && t("/");
        const {data: R, isLoading: M, refetch: K} = _e({
                queryKey: ["/api/optimized/vehicles", i, n, v, w, S, x, j, l],
                queryFn: async () => {
                    try {
                        const xe = new URLSearchParams;
                        xe.append("limit", l.toString()),
                        xe.append("offset", ((i - 1) * l).toString()),
                        xe.append("getTotalCount", "true"),
                        n && xe.append("search", n),
                        v && xe.append("marca", v),
                        w && xe.append("combustible", w),
                        S && xe.append("anyo", S),
                        x && xe.append("orden", `${x}_${j}`);
                        const mt = await fetch(`/api/optimized/vehicles?${xe.toString()}`);
                        if (!mt.ok)
                            throw new Error("Error al cargar vehículos");
                        return await mt.json()
                    } catch (xe) {
                        throw console.error("Error en la consulta de vehículos:", xe), xe
                    }
                },
                enabled: !O && !L,
                staleTime: 12e4,
                refetchOnWindowFocus: !1
            }),
            oe = (R == null ? void 0 : R.data) || [],
            be = (($t = R == null ? void 0 : R.pagination) == null ? void 0 : $t.total) || 0,
            Se = Math.ceil(be / l);
        console.log("🚗 AdminVehicles Data:", {
            vehiclesCount: oe.length,
            totalItems: be,
            itemsPerPage: l,
            totalPages: Se,
            currentPage: i,
            pagination: R == null ? void 0 : R.pagination,
            fullResponse: R
        }),
        R != null && R.pagination && (console.log("📊 Pagination details:", {

        }), R.pagination.total < 1e3 && console.warn("⚠️ Conteo sospechosamente bajo en AdminVehicles:", R.pagination.total));
        const _ = rt({
                mutationFn: async xe => {
                    const mt = await fetch("/api/vehicles", {
                        method: "POST",
                        headers: {
                            "Content-Type": "application/json"
                        },
                        credentials: "include",
                        body: JSON.stringify(xe)
                    });
                    if (!mt.ok)
                        throw new Error("Error al crear vehículo");
                    return mt.json()
                },
                onSuccess: () => {
                    s({
                        title: "Vehículo creado",
                        description: "El vehículo ha sido creado correctamente"
                    }),
                    sn.invalidateQueries({
                        queryKey: ["/api/optimized/vehicles"]
                    }),
                    I(!1),
                    B(null),
                    t("/admin/vehicles")
                },
                onError: xe => {
                    s({
                        title: "Error al crear vehículo",
                        description: "No se pudo crear el vehículo. Intente nuevamente.",
                        variant: "destructive"
                    })
                }
            }),
            ee = rt({
                mutationFn: async ({id: xe, data: mt}) => {
                    const It = await fetch(`/api/vehicles/${xe}`, {
                        method: "PUT",
                        headers: {
                            "Content-Type": "application/json"
                        },
                        body: JSON.stringify(mt)
                    });
                    if (!It.ok)
                        throw new Error("Error al actualizar vehículo");
                    return It.json()
                },
                onSuccess: () => {
                    s({
                        title: "Vehículo actualizado",
                        description: "El vehículo ha sido actualizado correctamente"
                    }),
                    sn.invalidateQueries({
                        queryKey: ["/api/optimized/vehicles"]
                    }),
                    G(!1),
                    B(null),
                    t("/admin/vehicles")
                },
                onError: xe => {
                    s({
                        title: "Error al actualizar vehículo",
                        description: "No se pudo actualizar el vehículo. Intente nuevamente.",
                        variant: "destructive"
                    })
                }
            }),
            H = rt({
                mutationFn: async xe => {
                    const mt = await fetch(`/api/vehicles/${xe}`, {
                        method: "DELETE",
                        credentials: "include"
                    });
                    if (!mt.ok)
                        throw new Error("Error al eliminar vehículo");
                    return mt.json()
                },
                onSuccess: () => {
                    s({
                        title: "Vehículo eliminado",
                        description: "El vehículo ha sido eliminado correctamente"
                    }),
                    sn.invalidateQueries({
                        queryKey: ["/api/optimized/vehicles"]
                    }),
                    K()
                },
                onError: xe => {
                    s({
                        title: "Error al eliminar vehículo",
                        description: "No se pudo eliminar el vehículo. Intente nuevamente.",
                        variant: "destructive"
                    })
                }
            }),
            se = rt({
                mutationFn: async () => {
                    const xe = await fetch("/api/vehicles/delete-all", {
                        method: "DELETE",
                        credentials: "include"
                    });
                    if (!xe.ok)
                        throw new Error("Error al eliminar todos los vehículos");
                    return xe.json()
                },
                onSuccess: () => {
                    s({
                        title: "Todos los vehículos eliminados",
                        description: "Se han eliminado todos los vehículos correctamente"
                    }),
                    sn.invalidateQueries({
                        queryKey: ["/api/optimized/vehicles"]
                    }),
                    K()
                },

                    s({
                        title: "Error al eliminar todos los vehículos",
                        description: "No se pudieron eliminar todos los vehículos. Intente nuevamente.",
                        variant: "destructive"
                    })
                }
            }),
            de = rt({
                mutationFn: async xe => {

                        method: "PATCH",
                        credentials: "include"
                    });
                    if (!mt.ok)
                        throw new Error("Error al cambiar estado del vehículo");
                    return mt.json()
                },
                onSuccess: xe => {
                    s({
                        title: "Estado cambiado",
                        description: xe.message || "El estado del vehículo ha sido cambiado correctamente"
                    }),
                    sn.invalidateQueries({
                        queryKey: ["/api/optimized/vehicles"]
                    }),
                    K()
                },
                onError: xe => {
                    s({
                        title: "Error al cambiar estado",
                        description: "No se pudo cambiar el estado del vehículo. Intente nuevamente.",
                        variant: "destructive"
                    })
                }
            }),
            le = xe => {
                L ? _.mutate(xe) : z && z.id && ee.mutate({
                    id: z.id,
                    data: xe
                })
            },
            he = () => {
                G(!1),
                I(!1),
                B(null),
                t("/admin/vehicles")
            },
            ve = () => {
                I(!0),
                B(null),
                t("/admin/vehicles/new")
            },
            lt = xe => {
                G(!0),

                t(`/admin/vehicles/edit/${xe.id}`)
            },
            ut = xe => {
                u(xe),
                f(!0)
            },
            bt = () => {
                d && H.mutate(d),
                f(!1),
                u(null)
            },
            W = () => {
                g(!0)
            },
            Me = () => {
                se.mutate(),
                g(!1)
            },
            At = xe => {
                de.mutate(xe)
            },
            Ft = xe => {
                D(xe),
                re(0),
                T(!0)
            },
            P = () => {
                k != null && k.imagenes && k.imagenes.length > 0 && re(xe => xe === k.imagenes.length - 1 ? 0 : xe + 1)
            },
            Z = () => {
                k != null && k.imagenes && k.imagenes.length > 0 && re(xe => xe === 0 ? k.imagenes.length - 1 : xe - 1)
            },
            ie = xe => {
                xe.preventDefault(),
                o(1),
                K()
            },
            we = xe => {
                x === xe ? p(j === "asc" ? "desc" : "asc") : (b(xe), p("asc")),
                o(1)
            },
            je = xe => {
                c(xe),
                o(1)
            },
            J = Array.from(new Set(oe.map(xe => xe.marca))).sort(),
            ye = Array.from(new Set(oe.map(xe => xe.combustible).filter(Boolean))).sort(),
            Be = (i - 1) * l + 1,
            Pt = Math.min(i * l, be);
        return e.jsxs("div", {
            className: "flex min-h-screen bg-gray-100",

            }), e.jsxs("div", {

                        children: [e.jsxs("h1", {
                            className: "text-3xl font-montserrat font-bold",

                            })]

                        onClick: () => O || L ? he() : t("/admin"),

                        }), O || L ? "Volver a vehículos" : "Volver al panel"]
                    })]
                }), (O || L) && e.jsxs(V, {
                    children: [e.jsx(ne, {
                        children: e.jsx(ae, {
                            children: L ? "Datos del nuevo vehículo" : "Editar datos del vehículo"
                        })
                    }), e.jsx(U, {
                        children: e.jsx(PW, {
                            vehicle: z || {},

                        })

    jg = () => {

            je;

            [i, o] = h.useState(1),
            [l, c] = h.useState(null),
            [d, u] = h.useState(!1),
            [m, f] = h.useState(!1),
            [y, g] = h.useState("fechaActualizacion"),
            [x, b] = h.useState("desc"),
            [j, p] = h.useState(""),
            [v, N] = h.useState("all"),
            [w, C] = h.useState("all"),
            [S, E] = h.useState({
                min: "",
                max: ""
            }),
            [O, G] = h.useState(!1),
            [L, I] = h.useState(!1),
            [z, B] = h.useState(null),

        const {data: $, isLoading: re, refetch: R} = _e({
                queryKey: ["/api/search-parts", i, n, j, v, w, S, y, x],
                queryFn: async () => {
                    try {
                        let J = `/api/search-parts?limit=${wd}&offset=${(i - 1) * wd}&isAdmin=true&getTotalCount=true`;
                        n && (J += `&q=${encodeURIComponent(n)}`),
                        j && (J += `&familia=${encodeURIComponent(j)}`),
                        v !== "all" && (J += `&activo=${v === "active"}`),
                        w !== "all" && (w === "processed" ? J += "&vehicleType=processed" : w === "associated" && (J += "&vehicleType=associated")),
                        S.min && (J += `&precioMin=${S.min}`),
                        S.max && (J += `&precioMax=${S.max}`),
                        y && (J += `&orden=${y}_${x}`),
                        console.log("Admin parts query URL:", J);
                        const ye = await fetch(J, {
                            credentials: "include"
                        });
                        if (!ye.ok)
                            throw new Error("Error al cargar piezas");
                        const Be = await ye.json();
                        return console.log("Admin parts response:", Be), Be
                    } catch (J) {
                        throw console.error("Error en la consulta de piezas:", J), J
                    }
                },
                enabled: !O && !L
            }),
            {data: M} = _e({
                queryKey: ["/api/optimized/parts/families"],
                queryFn: async () => (await fetch("/api/optimized/parts/families")).json()
            }),
            K = ($ == null ? void 0 : $.data) || [],
            oe = ((we = $ == null ? void 0 : $.pagination) == null ? void 0 : we.total) || 0,
            be = ((je = $ == null ? void 0 : $.pagination) == null ? void 0 : je.filtered) || oe,
            Se = Math.ceil(be / wd),
            _ = M || [],
            ee = rt({
                mutationFn: async J => {
                    const ye = await fetch("/api/parts", {
                        method: "POST",
                        headers: {
                            "Content-Type": "application/json"
                        },
                        credentials: "include",
                        body: JSON.stringify(J)
                    });
                    if (!ye.ok)
                        throw new Error("Error al crear pieza");
                    return ye.json()
                },
                onSuccess: () => {
                    s({
                        title: "Pieza creada",
                        description: "La pieza ha sido creada correctamente"
                    }),
                    sn.invalidateQueries({
                        queryKey: ["/api/search-parts"]
                    }),
                    I(!1),
                    B(null),
                    t("/admin/parts")
                },
                onError: J => {
                    s({
                        title: "Error al crear pieza",
                        description: "No se pudo crear la pieza. Intente nuevamente.",
                        variant: "destructive"
                    })
                }
            }),
            H = rt({
                mutationFn: async ({id: J, data: ye}) => {
                    const Be = await fetch(`/api/parts/${J}`, {
                        method: "PUT",
                        headers: {
                            "Content-Type": "application/json"
                        },
                        credentials: "include",
                        body: JSON.stringify(ye)
                    });
                    if (!Be.ok)
                        throw new Error("Error al actualizar pieza");
                    return Be.json()
                },
                onSuccess: () => {
                    s({
                        title: "Pieza actualizada",
                        description: "La pieza ha sido actualizada correctamente"
                    }),
                    sn.invalidateQueries({
                        queryKey: ["/api/search-parts"]
                    }),
                    G(!1),
                    B(null),
                    t("/admin/parts")
                },
                onError: J => {
                    s({
                        title: "Error al actualizar pieza",
                        description: "No se pudo actualizar la pieza. Intente nuevamente.",
                        variant: "destructive"
                    })
                }
            }),
            se = rt({
                mutationFn: async J => {
                    const ye = await fetch(`/api/parts/${J}`, {
                        method: "DELETE",
                        credentials: "include"
                    });
                    if (!ye.ok)
                        throw new Error("Error al eliminar pieza");
                    return ye.json()
                },
                onSuccess: () => {
                    s({
                        title: "Pieza eliminada",
                        description: "La pieza ha sido eliminada correctamente"
                    }),
                    sn.invalidateQueries({
                        queryKey: ["/api/search-parts"]
                    }),
                    R()
                },
                onError: J => {
                    s({
                        title: "Error al eliminar pieza",
                        description: "No se pudo eliminar la pieza. Intente nuevamente.",
                        variant: "destructive"
                    })
                }
            }),
            de = rt({
                mutationFn: async () => {
                    const J = await fetch("/api/parts/delete-all", {
                        method: "DELETE",
                        credentials: "include"
                    });
                    if (!J.ok)
                        throw new Error("Error al eliminar todas las piezas");
                    return J.json()
                },
                onSuccess: () => {
                    s({
                        title: "Todas las piezas eliminadas",
                        description: "Se han eliminado todas las piezas correctamente"
                    }),
                    sn.invalidateQueries({
                        queryKey: ["/api/search-parts"]
                    }),
                    R()
                },
                onError: J => {
                    s({
                        title: "Error al eliminar todas las piezas",
                        description: "No se pudieron eliminar todas las piezas. Intente nuevamente.",
                        variant: "destructive"
                    })
                }
            }),
            le = rt({
                mutationFn: async J => {
                    const ye = await fetch(`/api/parts/${J}/toggle`, {
                        method: "PATCH",
                        credentials: "include"
                    });
                    if (!ye.ok)
                        throw new Error("Error al cambiar estado de la pieza");
                    return ye.json()
                },
                onSuccess: J => {
                    s({
                        title: "Estado cambiado",
                        description: J.message || "El estado de la pieza ha sido cambiado correctamente"
                    }),
                    sn.invalidateQueries({
                        queryKey: ["/api/search-parts"]
                    }),
                    R()
                },
                onError: J => {
                    s({
                        title: "Error al cambiar estado",
                        description: "No se pudo cambiar el estado de la pieza. Intente nuevamente.",
                        variant: "destructive"
                    })
                }
            }),
            he = J => {
                L ? ee.mutate(J) : z && z.id && H.mutate({
                    id: z.id,
                    data: J
                })
            },
            ve = () => {
                G(!1),
                I(!1),
                B(null),
                t("/admin/parts")
            },
            lt = () => {
                I(!0),
                B(null),
                t("/admin/parts/new")
            },
            ut = J => {
                G(!0),
                B(J),
                t(`/admin/parts/edit/${J.id}`)
            },
            bt = async J => {
                D(J),
                T(!0)
            },
            W = J => {
                c(J),
                u(!0)
            },
            Me = () => {
                l && se.mutate(l),
                u(!1),
                c(null)
            },
            At = () => {
                f(!0)
            },
            Ft = () => {
                de.mutate(),
                f(!1)
            },
            P = J => {
                le.mutate(J)
            },
            Z = J => {
                J.preventDefault(),
                o(1),
                R()
            },
            ie = J => {
                y === J ? b(x === "asc" ? "desc" : "asc") : (g(J), b("asc")),
                o(1)
            };
        return e.jsxs("div", {
            className: "flex min-h-screen bg-gray-100",
            children: [e.jsx(Fs, {
                activeTab: "admin_parts"
            }), e.jsxs("div", {
                className: "flex-1 p-8",
                children: [e.jsxs("div", {

                    children: [e.jsxs("div", {
                        children: [e.jsx("h1", {
                            className: "text-3xl font-montserrat font-bold",
                            children: L ? "Nueva Pieza" : O ? "Editar Pieza" : "Gestión de Piezas"
                        }), e.jsx("p", {
                            className: "text-muted-foreground",
                            children: L ? "Complete los datos de la nueva pieza" : O ? "Modifique los datos de la pieza y guarde los cambios" : "Gestione todas las piezas del sistema"
                        })]
                    }), e.jsxs(A, {
                        variant: "outline",
                        onClick: () => O || L ? ve() : t("/admin"),
                        children: [e.jsx(xi, {
                            className: "mr-2 h-4 w-4"
                        }), O || L ? "Volver a piezas" : "Volver al panel"]
                    })]
                }), (O || L) && e.jsxs(V, {
                    children: [e.jsx(ne, {
                        children: e.jsx(ae, {
                            children: L ? "Datos de la nueva pieza" : "Editar datos de la pieza"
                        })
                    }), e.jsx(U, {
                        children: e.jsx(_W, {
                            part: z || {},
                            onSave: he,
                            onCancel: ve,
                            isNew: L
                        })
                    })]
                }), !O && !L && e.jsxs(e.Fragment, {
                    children: [e.jsx(V, {
                        className: "mb-8",
                        children: e.jsxs(U, {
                            className: "p-6",
                            children: [e.jsxs("div", {
                                className: "flex flex-col gap-4 mb-6",
                                children: [e.jsxs("div", {
                                    className: "flex flex-col md:flex-row gap-4 justify-between",

                                        onSubmit: Z,
                                        className: "flex w-full md:w-1/2 gap-2",
                                        children: [e.jsx(te, {
                                            placeholder: "Buscar por referencia, artículo, familia...",

                                            onChange: J => a(J.target.value),

                            })]
                        }), e.jsxs(Br, {

                                children: "Confirmar eliminación masiva"
                            }), e.jsx(Cr, {
                                children: "¿Está seguro que desea eliminar TODAS las piezas? Esta acción eliminará permanentemente todas las piezas del sistema y no se puede deshacer."
                            })]
                        }), e.jsxs(Br, {
                            children: [e.jsx(A, {
                                variant: "outline",
                                onClick: () => f(!1),
                                children: "Cancelar"
                            }), e.jsx(A, {
                                variant: "destructive",
                                onClick: Ft,
                                children: "Eliminar todas las piezas"
                            })]
                        })]
                    })
                })]
            })]
        })
    },
    AW = () => {
        var R;
        const [, t] = dt(),
            {toast: s} = tt(),
            {logout: r} = Ps(),
            [n, a] = h.useState(!1),
            [i, o] = h.useState(!1),
            [l, c] = h.useState(!1),
            [d, u] = h.useState(null),
            [m, f] = h.useState(""),
            [y, g] = h.useState(""),
            [x, b] = h.useState(""),
            [j, p] = h.useState("manager"),
            [v, N] = h.useState(""),
            [w, C] = h.useState(""),
            [S, E] = h.useState(""),
            [O, G] = h.useState("manager"),
            L = _e({
                queryKey: ["/api/users"],
                queryFn: async () => {
                    try {
                        const M = await fetch("/api/users");
                        if (!M.ok) {
                            const be = await M.json();
                            throw new Error(be.error || "Error al cargar usuarios")
                        }
                        const K = await M.json();
                        return console.log("Usuarios cargados:", K), K.filter(be => be.role === "manager" || be.role === "admin" || be.isAdmin) || []
                    } catch (M) {
                        throw console.error("Error en la consulta de usuarios:", M), M
                    }
                }
            }),
            I = rt({
                mutationFn: async M => {
                    const K = await fetch("/api/users", {
                        method: "POST",
                        headers: {
                            "Content-Type": "application/json"
                        },
                        body: JSON.stringify(M)
                    });
                    if (!K.ok) {
                        const oe = await K.json();
                        throw new Error(oe.error || "Error al crear usuario")
                    }
                    return K.json()
                },
                onSuccess: () => {
                    s({
                        title: "Usuario creado",
                        description: "El usuario ha sido creado correctamente"
                    }),
                    a(!1),
                    L.refetch(),
                    f(""),
                    g(""),
                    b(""),
                    p("manager")
                },
                onError: M => {
                    s({
                        title: "Error",
                        description: M.message || "Error al crear usuario",
                        variant: "destructive"
                    })
                }
            }),
            z = rt({
                mutationFn: async ({id: M, userData: K}) => {
                    const oe = await fetch(`/api/users/${M}`, {
                        method: "PUT",
                        headers: {
                            "Content-Type": "application/json"
                        },
                        body: JSON.stringify(K)
                    });
                    if (!oe.ok) {
                        const be = await oe.json();
                        throw new Error(be.error || "Error al actualizar usuario")
                    }
                    return oe.json()
                },
                onSuccess: () => {
                    s({
                        title: "Usuario actualizado",
                        description: `El usuario ${d == null ? void 0 : d.username} ha sido actualizado correctamente`
                    }),
                    o(!1),
                    L.refetch()
                },
                onError: M => {
                    s({
                        title: "Error",
                        description: M.message || "Error al actualizar usuario",
                        variant: "destructive"
                    })
                }
            }),
            B = rt({
                mutationFn: async M => {
                    const K = await fetch(`/api/users/${M}`, {
                        method: "DELETE"
                    });
                    if (!K.ok) {
                        const oe = await K.json();
                        throw new Error(oe.error || "Error al eliminar usuario")
                    }
                    return K.json()
                },
                onSuccess: () => {
                    s({
                        title: "Usuario eliminado",
                        description: `El usuario ${d == null ? void 0 : d.username} ha sido eliminado correctamente`
                    }),
                    c(!1),
                    L.refetch()
                },
                onError: M => {
                    s({
                        title: "Error",
                        description: M.message || "Error al eliminar usuario",
                        variant: "destructive"
                    })
                }
            }),
            F = async () => {
                try {
                    await r(),
                    t("/admin")
                } catch (M) {
                    console.error("Error during logout:", M)
                }
            },
            T = () => {
                if (!m || !x) {
                    s({
                        title: "Error",
                        description: "Usuario y contraseña son obligatorios",
                        variant: "destructive"
                    });
                    return
                }
                if (x.length < 6) {
                    s({
                        title: "Error",
                        description: "La contraseña debe tener al menos 6 caracteres",
                        variant: "destructive"
                    });
                    return
                }
                I.mutate({
                    username: m,
                    password: x,
                    email: y || void 0,
                    role: j
                })
            },
            k = () => {
                if (!v) {
                    s({
                        title: "Error",
                        description: "El nombre de usuario es obligatorio",
                        variant: "destructive"
                    });
                    return
                }
                if (S && S.length < 6) {
                    s({
                        title: "Error",
                        description: "La contraseña debe tener al menos 6 caracteres",
                        variant: "destructive"
                    });
                    return
                }
                const M = {
                    username: v,
                    email: w || void 0,
                    role: O
                };
                S && (M.password = S),
                z.mutate({
                    id: d.id,
                    userData: M
                })
            },
            D = () => {
                B.mutate(d.id)
            },
            $ = M => {
                u(M),
                N(M.username || ""),
                C(M.email || ""),
                E(""),
                G(M.role || "manager"),
                o(!0)
            },
            re = M => {
                u(M),
                c(!0)
            };
        return e.jsxs("div", {
            className: "flex min-h-screen bg-gray-100",
            children: [e.jsx(Fs, {}), e.jsxs("div", {
                className: "flex-1 p-8",
                children: [e.jsxs("div", {
                    className: "flex justify-between items-center mb-8",
                    children: [e.jsxs("div", {
                        children: [e.jsx("h1", {
                            className: "text-3xl font-montserrat font-bold",
                            children: "Gestión de Usuarios Administrativos"
                        }), e.jsx("p", {
                            className: "text-muted-foreground",
                            children: "Administre los usuarios administrativos del sistema (administradores y gestores)"
                        })]
                    }), e.jsxs("div", {
                        className: "flex gap-2",
                        children: [e.jsxs(A, {
                            variant: "default",
                            onClick: () => a(!0),

                                className: "mr-2 h-4 w-4"
                            }), "Nuevo Usuario Administrativo"]
                        }), e.jsxs(A, {
                            variant: "outline",
                            onClick: F,

                                className: "mr-2 h-4 w-4"
                            }), "Cerrar sesión"]
                        })]
                    })]
                }), e.jsx(V, {
                    children: e.jsx(U, {
                        className: "p-6",
                        children: L.isLoading ? e.jsxs("div", {
                            className: "text-center py-8",
                            children: [e.jsx("div", {
                                className: "animate-spin h-8 w-8 border-4 border-primary border-t-transparent rounded-full mx-auto mb-4"
                            }), e.jsx("p", {
                                children: "Cargando usuarios..."
                            })]
                        }) : e.jsxs(Bs, {
                            children: [e.jsx(Hs, {
                                children: e.jsxs(vt, {

                                        children: "ID"
                                    }), e.jsx(pe, {

                                    }), e.jsx(pe, {

                                    }), e.jsx(pe, {
                                        className: "text-right",

                                    })]

                            })]
