                    }), e.jsxs(Br, {
                        children: [e.jsx(A, {
                            variant: "outline",
                            onClick: () => c(!1),
                            children: "Cancelar"
                        }), e.jsx(A, {
                            variant: "destructive",
                            onClick: D,
                            children: "Eliminar"
                        })]
                    })]
                })
            })]
        })
    },
    MW = () => {
        const [t, s] = h.useState(""),
            [r, n] = h.useState("all"),
            [a, i] = h.useState(""),
            [o, l] = h.useState(null),
            [c, d] = h.useState(null),
            [u, m] = h.useState(!1),
            [f, y] = h.useState(!1),
            [g, x] = h.useState(!1),
            [b, j] = h.useState(null),
            [p, v] = h.useState({}),
            {toast: N} = tt(),
            w = hr(),
            {data: C, isLoading: S} = _e({
                queryKey: ["/api/admin/clients"],
                queryFn: async () => {
                    const M = await fetch("/api/admin/clients");
                    if (!M.ok)
                        throw new Error("Error al cargar clientes");
                    return (await M.json()).filter(oe => oe.role === "customer" && !oe.isAdmin)
                }
            }),
            {data: E, isLoading: O} = _e({
                queryKey: ["/api/admin/guest-orders"],
                queryFn: async () => {
                    const M = await fetch("/api/admin/guest-orders");
                    if (!M.ok)
                        throw new Error("Error al cargar pedidos de invitados");
                    return M.json()
                }
            }),
            G = (C == null ? void 0 : C.filter(M => {
                const K = M.firstName.toLowerCase().includes(t.toLowerCase()) || M.lastName.toLowerCase().includes(t.toLowerCase()) || M.email.toLowerCase().includes(t.toLowerCase()) || M.username.toLowerCase().includes(t.toLowerCase()),
                    oe = r === "all" || M.province === r;
                return K && oe
            })) || [],
            L = (E == null ? void 0 : E.filter(M => M.guestName.toLowerCase().includes(a.toLowerCase()) || M.guestEmail.toLowerCase().includes(a.toLowerCase()) || M.orderNumber.toLowerCase().includes(a.toLowerCase()))) || [],
            I = [...new Set(C == null ? void 0 : C.map(M => M.province).filter(Boolean))],
            z = M => {
                switch (M) {
                case "admin":
                    return "destructive";
                case "manager":
                    return "secondary";
                case "customer":
                    return "default";
                default:
                    return "outline"
                }
            },
            B = M => {
                switch (M) {
                case "admin":
                    return "Administrador";
                case "manager":
                    return "Gestor";
                case "customer":
                    return "Cliente";
                default:
                    return M
                }
            },
            F = rt({
                mutationFn: async ({id: M, data: K}) => {
                    const oe = {
                            firstName: K.firstName,
                            lastName: K.lastName,
                            email: K.email,
                            phone: K.phone,
                            address: K.address,
                            city: K.city,
                            postalCode: K.postalCode,
                            province: K.province,
                            shippingAddress: K.shippingAddress,
                            shippingCity: K.shippingCity,
                            shippingPostalCode: K.shippingPostalCode,
                            shippingProvince: K.shippingProvince,
                            billingAddress: K.billingAddress,
                            billingCity: K.billingCity,
                            billingPostalCode: K.billingPostalCode,
                            billingProvince: K.billingProvince
                        },
                        be = await fetch(`/api/admin/users/${M}`, {
                            method: "PUT",
                            headers: {
                                "Content-Type": "application/json"
                            },
                            body: JSON.stringify(oe)
                        });
                    if (!be.ok)
                        throw new Error("Error al actualizar cliente");
                    return be.json()
                },
                onSuccess: () => {
                    w.invalidateQueries({
                        queryKey: ["/api/admin/clients"]
                    }),
                    N({
                        title: "Cliente actualizado",
                        description: "Los datos del cliente se han actualizado correctamente"
                    }),
                    y(!1),
                    d(null),
                    v({})
                },
                onError: M => {
                    N({
                        title: "Error",
                        description: "No se pudo actualizar el cliente",
                        variant: "destructive"
                    }),
                    console.error("Error updating client:", M)
                }
            }),
            T = rt({
                mutationFn: async M => {
                    const K = await fetch(`/api/admin/users/${M}`, {
                        method: "DELETE"
                    });
                    if (!K.ok)
                        throw new Error("Error al eliminar cliente");
                    return K.json()
                },
                onSuccess: () => {
                    w.invalidateQueries({
                        queryKey: ["/api/admin/clients"]
                    }),
                    N({
                        title: "Cliente eliminado",
                        description: "El cliente ha sido eliminado correctamente"
                    }),
                    x(!1),
                    j(null)
                },
                onError: M => {
                    N({
                        title: "Error",
                        description: "No se pudo eliminar el cliente",
                        variant: "destructive"
                    }),
                    console.error("Error deleting client:", M)
                }
            }),
            k = M => {
                l(M),
                m(!0)
            },
            D = M => {
                d(M),
                v({
                    firstName: M.firstName,
                    lastName: M.lastName,
                    email: M.email,
                    phone: M.phone,
                    address: M.address,
                    city: M.city,
                    postalCode: M.postalCode,
                    province: M.province,
                    shippingAddress: M.shippingAddress || M.address,
                    shippingCity: M.shippingCity || M.city,
                    shippingPostalCode: M.shippingPostalCode || M.postalCode,
                    shippingProvince: M.shippingProvince || M.province,
                    billingAddress: M.billingAddress || M.address,
                    billingCity: M.billingCity || M.city,
                    billingPostalCode: M.billingPostalCode || M.postalCode,
                    billingProvince: M.billingProvince || M.province
                }),
                y(!0)
            },
            $ = M => {
                j(M),
                x(!0)
            },
            re = () => {
                c && F.mutate({
                    id: c.id,
                    data: p
                })
            },
            R = () => {
                b && T.mutate(b.id)
            };
        return S ? e.jsxs("div", {
            className: "flex min-h-screen bg-gray-100",
            children: [e.jsx(Fs, {}), e.jsx("div", {
                className: "flex-1 p-8",
                children: e.jsx("div", {
                    className: "flex items-center justify-center h-64",
                    children: e.jsx("div", {
                        className: "animate-spin h-12 w-12 border-4 border-primary border-t-transparent rounded-full"
                    })
                })
            })]
        }) : e.jsxs("div", {
            className: "flex min-h-screen bg-gray-100",
            children: [e.jsx(Fs, {}), e.jsxs("div", {
                className: "flex-1 p-8",
                children: [e.jsx("div", {
                    className: "flex justify-between items-center mb-8",
                    children: e.jsxs("div", {
                        children: [e.jsx("h1", {
                            className: "text-3xl font-montserrat font-bold",
                            children: "Gestión de Clientes"
                        }), e.jsx("p", {
                            className: "text-muted-foreground",
                            children: "Administra los clientes registrados y pedidos de invitados"
                        })]
                    })
                }), e.jsxs(ls, {
                    defaultValue: "customers",
                    className: "space-y-6",
                    children: [e.jsxs(es, {
                        className: "grid w-full grid-cols-2",

                                        className: "w-8 h-8 bg-emerald-500 rounded-lg flex items-center justify-center",
                                        children: e.jsx(Lt, {
                                            className: "w-4 h-4 text-white"
                                        })
                                    }), e.jsx("h3", {
                                        className: "text-lg font-semibold text-gray-800",
                                        children: "Estadísticas de Pedidos"
                                    })]
                                }), e.jsxs("div", {
                                    className: "space-y-3",
                                    children: [e.jsxs("div", {
                                        className: "flex items-center justify-between py-2 border-b border-gray-100",
                                        children: [e.jsx("span", {
                                            className: "font-medium text-gray-600",
                                            children: "Total de pedidos"
                                        }), e.jsx("span", {
                                            className: "text-xl font-bold text-gray-900",
                                            children: o.totalOrders || o.orderCount || 0
                                        })]
                                    }), e.jsxs("div", {
                                        className: "flex items-center justify-between py-2 border-b border-gray-100",
                                        children: [e.jsx("span", {
                                            className: "font-medium text-gray-600",
                                            children: "Total gastado"
                                        }), e.jsx("span", {
                                            className: "text-xl font-bold text-gray-900",
                                            children: o.totalSpent ? `${Number(o.totalSpent).toFixed(2)}€` : "0.00€"
                                        })]
                                    }), o.lastOrderDate && e.jsxs("div", {
                                        className: "flex items-center justify-between py-2",
                                        children: [e.jsx("span", {
                                            className: "font-medium text-gray-600",
                                            children: "Último pedido"
                                        }), e.jsx("span", {
                                            className: "text-gray-900",
                                            children: new Date(o.lastOrderDate).toLocaleDateString("es-ES")
                                        })]
                                    })]
                                })]
                            })]
                        })]
                    }), e.jsxs(Br, {
                        className: "pt-6 border-t border-gray-200",
                        children: [e.jsx(A, {
                            variant: "outline",
                            onClick: () => m(!1),
                            children: "Cerrar"
                        }), e.jsx(A, {
                            onClick: () => {
                                m(!1),
                                o && D(o)
                            },
                            children: "Editar Cliente"
                        })]
                    })]
                })
            }), e.jsx(Es, {
                open: f,
                onOpenChange: y,
                children: e.jsxs(xs, {
                    className: "max-w-4xl max-h-[90vh] overflow-y-auto",
                    children: [e.jsxs(gs, {
                        children: [e.jsx(vs, {
                            children: "Editar Cliente"
                        }), e.jsx(Cr, {
                            children: "Modifica la información del cliente"
                        })]
                    }), c && e.jsxs("div", {
                        className: "space-y-6",
                        children: [e.jsxs("div", {
                            className: "grid grid-cols-1 md:grid-cols-2 gap-4",
                            children: [e.jsxs("div", {
                                children: [e.jsx(q, {
                                    htmlFor: "editFirstName",
                                    children: "Nombre"
                                }), e.jsx(te, {
                                    id: "editFirstName",
                                    value: p.firstName || "",
                                    onChange: M => v(K => ({
                                        ...K,
                                        firstName: M.target.value
                                    })),
                                    placeholder: "Nombre"
                                })]
                            }), e.jsxs("div", {
                                children: [e.jsx(q, {
                                    htmlFor: "editLastName",
                                    children: "Apellidos"
                                }), e.jsx(te, {
                                    id: "editLastName",
                                    value: p.lastName || "",
                                    onChange: M => v(K => ({
                                        ...K,
                                        lastName: M.target.value
                                    })),
                                    placeholder: "Apellidos"
                                })]
                            }), e.jsxs("div", {
                                children: [e.jsx(q, {
                                    htmlFor: "editEmail",
                                    children: "Email"
                                }), e.jsx(te, {
                                    id: "editEmail",
                                    type: "email",
                                    value: p.email || "",
                                    onChange: M => v(K => ({
                                        ...K,
                                        email: M.target.value
                                    })),
                                    placeholder: "Email"
                                })]
                            }), e.jsxs("div", {
                                children: [e.jsx(q, {
                                    htmlFor: "editPhone",
                                    children: "Teléfono"
                                }), e.jsx(te, {
                                    id: "editPhone",
                                    value: p.phone || "",
                                    onChange: M => v(K => ({
                                        ...K,
                                        phone: M.target.value
                                    })),
                                    placeholder: "Teléfono"
                                })]
                            })]
                        }), e.jsxs("div", {
                            children: [e.jsx("h3", {
                                className: "text-lg font-semibold mb-3",
                                children: "Dirección de Envío"
                            }), e.jsxs("div", {
                                className: "grid grid-cols-1 md:grid-cols-2 gap-4",
                                children: [e.jsxs("div", {
                                    children: [e.jsx(q, {
                                        htmlFor: "editShippingAddress",

                                        onChange: M => v(K => ({
                                            ...K,
                                            shippingAddress: M.target.value
                                        })),
                                        placeholder: "Dirección de envío"
                                    })]
                                }), e.jsxs("div", {

                                        htmlFor: "editShippingCity",
                                        children: "Ciudad de Envío"
                                    }), e.jsx(te, {
                                        id: "editShippingCity",

                                            shippingCity: M.target.value
                                        })),
                                        placeholder: "Ciudad de envío"
                                    })]

                                        htmlFor: "editShippingProvince",
                                        children: "Provincia de Envío"

                                        id: "editShippingProvince",
                                        value: p.shippingProvince || "",

                                            shippingProvince: M.target.value
                                        })),
                                        placeholder: "Provincia de envío"
                                    })]
                                }), e.jsxs("div", {
                                    children: [e.jsx(q, {
                                        htmlFor: "editShippingPostalCode",
                                        children: "Código Postal de Envío"
                                    }), e.jsx(te, {

                                            ...K,
                                            shippingPostalCode: M.target.value
                                        })),
                                        placeholder: "Código postal de envío"
                                    })]
                                })]
                            })]
                        }), e.jsxs("div", {

                                className: "text-lg font-semibold mb-3",
                                children: "Dirección de Facturación"
                            }), e.jsxs("div", {
                                className: "grid grid-cols-1 md:grid-cols-2 gap-4",

                                        htmlFor: "editBillingAddress",
                                        children: "Dirección de Facturación"
                                    }), e.jsx(te, {
                                        id: "editBillingAddress",
                                        value: p.billingAddress || "",
                                        onChange: M => v(K => ({
                                            ...K,
                                            billingAddress: M.target.value
                                        })),
                                        placeholder: "Dirección de facturación"
                                    })]
                                }), e.jsxs("div", {

                                        htmlFor: "editBillingCity",

                                        })),
                                        placeholder: "Ciudad de facturación"
                                    })]
                                }), e.jsxs("div", {

                                    })]
                                })]
                            })]
                        })]
                    }), e.jsxs(Br, {
                        children: [e.jsx(A, {
                            variant: "outline",
                            onClick: () => y(!1),
                            children: "Cancelar"
                        }), e.jsx(A, {
                            onClick: re,
                            disabled: F.isPending,
                            children: F.isPending ? "Guardando..." : "Guardar Cambios"
                        })]
                    })]
                })
            }), e.jsx(Li, {
                open: g,
                onOpenChange: x,
                children: e.jsxs(Ya, {
                    children: [e.jsxs(Qa, {
                        children: [e.jsx(Xa, {
                            children: "¿Eliminar cliente?"
                        }), e.jsxs(Ja, {
                            children: ["Esta acción no se puede deshacer. Se eliminará permanentemente el cliente", b && ` "${b.firstName} ${b.lastName}"`, "y todos sus datos asociados."]
                        })]
                    }), e.jsxs(Za, {
                        children: [e.jsx(ti, {
                            children: "Cancelar"
                        }), e.jsx(ei, {
                            onClick: R,
                            className: "bg-red-600 hover:bg-red-700",
                            disabled: T.isPending,
                            children: T.isPending ? "Eliminando..." : "Eliminar"
                        })]
                    })]
                })
            })]
        })
    };
function ii({className: t, ...s}) {
    return e.jsx("div", {
        className: ue("animate-pulse rounded-md bg-muted", t),
        ...s
    })
}
const ya = ({children: t}) => e.jsxs("div", {
    className: "flex min-h-screen bg-gray-100",
    children: [e.jsx(Fs, {}), e.jsxs("div", {
        className: "flex-1 p-8",
        children: [e.jsx("div", {
            className: "mb-6"
        }), e.jsx("div", {
            className: "flex-1",
            children: t
        })]
    })]
});
function RW({order: t, isOpen: s, onClose: r}) {
    const {toast: n} = tt(),
        a = hr(),
        i = h.useRef(null),
        o = h.useRef(null),
        [l, c] = h.useState({
            transportAgency: (t == null ? void 0 : t.transportAgency) || "",
            expeditionNumber: (t == null ? void 0 : t.expeditionNumber) || "",
            adminObservations: (t == null ? void 0 : t.adminObservations) || "",
            documents: (t == null ? void 0 : t.documents) || [],
            invoicePdf: (t == null ? void 0 : t.invoicePdf) || ""
        }),
        [d, u] = h.useState(!1),
        m = rt({
            mutationFn: p => (console.log("🚀 Frontend: Enviando actualización de pedido:", {
                orderId: t.id,
                url: `/api/admin/orders/${t.id}/update-admin-info`,
                data: p
            }), Ie("PATCH", `/api/admin/orders/${t.id}/update-admin-info`, p)),
            onSuccess: p => {
                console.log("✅ Frontend: Actualización exitosa:", p),
                n({
                    title: "Pedido actualizado",
                    description: "La información adicional se ha guardado correctamente."
                }),
                a.invalidateQueries({
                    queryKey: ["/api/admin/orders"]
                }),
                r()
            },
            onError: p => {
                var v,
                    N,
                    w,
                    C;
                console.error("❌ Frontend: Error al actualizar pedido:", p),
                console.error("❌ Frontend: Error details:", {
                    message: p.message,
                    response: (v = p.response) == null ? void 0 : v.data,
                    status: (N = p.response) == null ? void 0 : N.status
                }),
                n({
                    title: "Error",
                    description: ((C = (w = p.response) == null ? void 0 : w.data) == null ? void 0 : C.error) || p.message || "No se pudo actualizar el pedido.",
                    variant: "destructive"
                })
            }
        }),
        f = async (p, v) => {
            console.log("📤 Iniciando upload de archivo:", {
                fileName: p.name,
                fileSize: p.size,
                orderId: t.id,
                type: v
            });
            const N = new FormData;
            N.append("file", p),
            N.append("orderId", t.id.toString()),
            N.append("type", v);
            try {
                const w = await fetch("/api/upload/order-document", {
                    method: "POST",
                    body: N,
                    credentials: "same-origin"
                });
                if (console.log("📡 Response status:", w.status), !w.ok) {
                    const S = await w.json().catch(() => ({}));
                    throw console.error("❌ Upload error:", {
                        status: w.status,
                        error: S
                    }), new Error(S.error || `Error HTTP ${w.status}: No se pudo subir el archivo`)
                }
                const C = await w.json();
                return console.log("✅ Upload exitoso:", C), C.filePath
            } catch (w) {
                throw console.error("❌ Error en uploadFile:", w), new Error(w.message || "Error al subir archivo")
            }
        },
        y = async p => {
            const v = p.target.files;
            if (v) {
                u(!0);
                try {
                    const N = Array.from(v).map(C => f(C, "document")),
                        w = await Promise.all(N);
                    c(C => ({
                        ...C,
                        documents: [...C.documents, ...w]
                    })),
                    n({
                        title: "Documentos subidos",
                        description: `Se han subido ${v.length} documento(s) correctamente.`
                    })
                } catch (N) {
                    console.error("❌ Error en handleDocumentUpload:", N),
                    n({
                        title: "Error",
                        description: N.message || "Error al subir los documentos.",
                        variant: "destructive"
                    })
                } finally {
                    u(!1),
                    i.current && (i.current.value = "")
                }
            }
        },
        g = async p => {
            var N;
            const v = (N = p.target.files) == null ? void 0 : N[0];
            if (v) {
                if (v.type !== "application/pdf") {
                    n({
                        title: "Error",
                        description: "Solo se permiten archivos PDF para la factura.",
                        variant: "destructive"
                    });
                    return
                }
                u(!0);
                try {
                    const w = await f(v, "invoice");
                    c(C => ({
                        ...C,
                        invoicePdf: w
                    })),
                    n({
                        title: "Factura subida",
                        description: "La factura se ha subido correctamente."
                    })
                } catch (w) {
                    console.error("❌ Error en handleInvoiceUpload:", w),
                    n({
                        title: "Error",
                        description: w.message || "Error al subir la factura.",
                        variant: "destructive"
                    })
                } finally {
                    u(!1),
                    o.current && (o.current.value = "")
                }
            }
        },
        x = p => {
            c(v => ({
                ...v,
                documents: v.documents.filter((N, w) => w !== p)
            }))
        },
        b = () => {
            c(p => ({
                ...p,
                invoicePdf: ""
            }))
        },
        j = p => {
            p.preventDefault(),
            m.mutate(l)
        };
    return t ? e.jsx(Es, {
        open: s,
        onOpenChange: r,
        children: e.jsxs(xs, {
            className: "max-w-2xl max-h-[90vh] overflow-y-auto",
            children: [e.jsx(gs, {
                children: e.jsxs(vs, {
                    children: ["Información Adicional - Pedido ", t.orderNumber]
                })
            }), e.jsxs("form", {
                onSubmit: j,
                className: "space-y-6",
                children: [e.jsxs("div", {
                    className: "bg-gray-50 p-4 rounded-lg",
                    children: [e.jsx("h3", {
                        className: "font-semibold mb-2",
                        children: "Información del Pedido"
                    }), e.jsxs("div", {
                        className: "grid grid-cols-2 gap-4 text-sm",
                        children: [e.jsxs("div", {
                            children: [e.jsx("span", {
                                className: "font-medium",
                                children: "Cliente:"
                            }), " ", t.customerName]
                        }), e.jsxs("div", {
                            children: [e.jsx("span", {
                                className: "font-medium",
                                children: "Email:"
                            }), " ", t.customerEmail]
                        }), e.jsxs("div", {
                            children: [e.jsx("span", {
                                className: "font-medium",
                                children: "Total:"
                            }), " ", t.total, "€"]
                        }), e.jsxs("div", {
                            children: [e.jsx("span", {
                                className: "font-medium",
                                children: "Estado:"
                            }), " ", t.orderStatus]
                        })]
                    })]
                }), e.jsxs("div", {
                    className: "space-y-4",
                    children: [e.jsxs("div", {
                        children: [e.jsx(q, {
                            htmlFor: "transportAgency",
                            children: "Agencia de Transporte"
                        }), e.jsx(te, {
                            id: "transportAgency",
                            value: l.transportAgency,
                            onChange: p => c(v => ({
                                ...v,
                                transportAgency: p.target.value
                            })),
                            placeholder: "Nombre de la agencia de transporte"
                        })]
                    }), e.jsxs("div", {
                        children: [e.jsx(q, {
                            htmlFor: "expeditionNumber",
                            children: "Número de Expedición"
                        }), e.jsx(te, {
                            id: "expeditionNumber",
                            value: l.expeditionNumber,
                            onChange: p => c(v => ({
                                ...v,
                                expeditionNumber: p.target.value
                            })),
                            placeholder: "Número de seguimiento o expedición"
                        })]
                    }), e.jsxs("div", {
                        children: [e.jsx(q, {
                            htmlFor: "adminObservations",
                            children: "Observaciones"
                        }), e.jsx(Ut, {
                            id: "adminObservations",
                            value: l.adminObservations,
                            onChange: p => c(v => ({
                                ...v,
                                adminObservations: p.target.value
                            })),
                            placeholder: "Observaciones adicionales para el cliente...",
                            rows: 4
                        })]
                    }), e.jsxs("div", {
                        children: [e.jsx(q, {
                            children: "Documentos"
                        }), e.jsxs("div", {
                            className: "mt-2",
                            children: [e.jsxs(A, {
                                type: "button",
                                variant: "outline",
                                onClick: () => {
                                    var p;
                                    return (p = i.current) == null ? void 0 : p.click()
                                },
                                disabled: d,
                                className: "mb-3",
                                children: [e.jsx(li, {
                                    className: "w-4 h-4 mr-2"
                                }), d ? "Subiendo..." : "Subir Documentos"]
                            }), e.jsx("input", {
                                ref: i,
                                type: "file",
                                multiple: !0,
                                accept: ".pdf,.jpg,.jpeg,.png",
                                onChange: y,
                                className: "hidden"
                            }), l.documents.length > 0 && e.jsx("div", {
                                className: "space-y-2",
                                children: l.documents.map((p, v) => e.jsxs("div", {
                                    className: "flex items-center justify-between bg-gray-50 p-2 rounded",
                                    children: [e.jsxs("div", {
                                        className: "flex items-center",
                                        children: [e.jsx(vu, {
                                            className: "w-4 h-4 mr-2"
                                        }), e.jsx("span", {
                                            className: "text-sm",
                                            children: p.split("/").pop()
                                        })]
                                    }), e.jsx(A, {
                                        type: "button",
                                        variant: "ghost",
                                        size: "sm",
                                        onClick: () => x(v),
                                        children: e.jsx(Xs, {
                                            className: "w-4 h-4"
                                        })
                                    })]
                                }, v))
                            })]
                        })]
                    }), e.jsxs("div", {
                        children: [e.jsx(q, {
                            children: "Factura PDF"
                        }), e.jsxs("div", {
                            className: "mt-2",
                            children: [e.jsxs(A, {
                                type: "button",
                                variant: "outline",
                                onClick: () => {
                                    var p;
                                    return (p = o.current) == null ? void 0 : p.click()
                                },
                                disabled: d,
                                className: "mb-3",
                                children: [e.jsx(li, {
                                    className: "w-4 h-4 mr-2"
                                }), d ? "Subiendo..." : "Subir Factura PDF"]
                            }), e.jsx("input", {
                                ref: o,
                                type: "file",
                                accept: ".pdf",
                                onChange: g,
                                className: "hidden"
                            }), l.invoicePdf && e.jsxs("div", {
                                className: "flex items-center justify-between bg-gray-50 p-2 rounded",
                                children: [e.jsxs("div", {
                                    className: "flex items-center",
                                    children: [e.jsx(vu, {
                                        className: "w-4 h-4 mr-2"
                                    }), e.jsx("span", {
                                        className: "text-sm",
                                        children: l.invoicePdf.split("/").pop()
                                    })]
                                }), e.jsx(A, {
                                    type: "button",
                                    variant: "ghost",
                                    size: "sm",
                                    onClick: b,
                                    children: e.jsx(Xs, {
                                        className: "w-4 h-4"
                                    })
                                })]
                            })]
                        })]
                    })]
                }), e.jsxs("div", {
                    className: "flex justify-end space-x-2",
                    children: [e.jsx(A, {
                        type: "button",
                        variant: "outline",
                        onClick: r,
                        children: "Cancelar"
                    }), e.jsx(A, {
                        type: "submit",
                        disabled: m.isPending || d,
                        children: m.isPending ? "Guardando..." : "Guardar Cambios"
                    })]
                })]
            })]
        })
    }) : null
}
const L1 = {
        pagado: {
            label: "Pagado",
            color: "bg-green-100 text-green-800 border-green-200",
            icon: e.jsx(zt, {
                className: "h-4 w-4"
            })
        },
        pendiente: {
            label: "Pendiente",
            color: "bg-yellow-100 text-yellow-800 border-yellow-200",
            icon: e.jsx(dr, {
                className: "h-4 w-4"
            })
        }
    },
    F1 = {
        pendiente_verificar: {
            label: "Pendiente Verificar",
            color: "bg-orange-100 text-orange-800 border-orange-200",
            icon: e.jsx(vp, {
                className: "h-4 w-4"
            }),
            description: "El pedido está pendiente de verificación"
        },
        verificado: {
            label: "Verificado",
            color: "bg-blue-100 text-blue-800 border-blue-200",
            icon: e.jsx(zt, {
                className: "h-4 w-4"
            }),
            description: "El pedido ha sido verificado"
        },
        embalado: {
            label: "Embalado",
            color: "bg-purple-100 text-purple-800 border-purple-200",
            icon: e.jsx(Lt, {
                className: "h-4 w-4"
            }),
            description: "El pedido está embalado"
        },
        enviado: {
            label: "Enviado",
            color: "bg-indigo-100 text-indigo-800 border-indigo-200",
            icon: e.jsx(ur, {
                className: "h-4 w-4"
            }),
            description: "El pedido ha sido enviado"
        },
        incidencia: {
            label: "Incidencia",
            color: "bg-red-100 text-red-800 border-red-200",
            icon: e.jsx(qs, {
                className: "h-4 w-4"
            }),
            description: "Hay una incidencia con el pedido"
        }
    },
    IW = {
        pending: {
            label: "Pendiente",
            color: "bg-yellow-100 text-yellow-800 border-yellow-200",
            icon: e.jsx(vp, {
                className: "h-4 w-4"
            }),
            description: "El pedido está pendiente de verificación"
        },
        processing: {
            label: "En Proceso",
            color: "bg-blue-100 text-blue-800 border-blue-200",
            icon: e.jsx(Lt, {
                className: "h-4 w-4"
            }),
            description: "El pedido está siendo procesado"
        },
        shipped: {
            label: "Enviado",
            color: "bg-purple-100 text-purple-800 border-purple-200",
            icon: e.jsx(ur, {
                className: "h-4 w-4"
            }),
            description: "El pedido ha sido enviado"
        },
        delivered: {
            label: "Entregado",
            color: "bg-green-100 text-green-800 border-green-200",
            icon: e.jsx(Lt, {
                className: "h-4 w-4"
            }),
            description: "El pedido ha sido entregado"
        },
        cancelled: {
            label: "Cancelado",
            color: "bg-red-100 text-red-800 border-red-200",
            icon: e.jsx(qs, {
                className: "h-4 w-4"
            }),
            description: "El pedido ha sido cancelado"
        }
    };
function DW({order: t, isOpen: s, onClose: r}) {
    const [n, a] = h.useState(null),
        [i, o] = h.useState(!1),
        l = async () => {
            if (t != null && t.id) {
                o(!0);
                try {
                    const u = await fetch(`/api/admin/orders/${t.id}`);
                    if (!u.ok)
                        throw new Error("Error al cargar detalles del pedido");
                    const m = await u.json();
                    a(m)
                } catch (u) {
                    console.error("Error al cargar detalles del pedido:", u)
                } finally {
                    o(!1)
                }
            }
        };
    if (h.useEffect(() => {
        s && l()
    }, [s, t == null ? void 0 : t.id]), !t)
        return null;
    const c = L1[n == null ? void 0 : n.paymentStatus] || L1.pendiente,
        d = F1[n == null ? void 0 : n.orderStatus] || IW[n == null ? void 0 : n.status] || F1.pendiente_verificar;
    return e.jsx(Es, {
        open: s,
        onOpenChange: r,
        children: e.jsxs(xs, {
            className: "max-w-4xl max-h-[90vh] overflow-y-auto",
            children: [e.jsx(gs, {
                children: e.jsxs(vs, {
                    children: ["Detalles del Pedido #", t.orderNumber]
                })
            }), i ? e.jsx("div", {
                className: "flex items-center justify-center py-8",
                children: e.jsx("div", {
                    className: "animate-spin h-8 w-8 border-4 border-primary border-t-transparent rounded-full"
                })
            }) : n ? e.jsxs("div", {
                className: "space-y-6",
                children: [e.jsxs("div", {
                    className: "grid grid-cols-1 md:grid-cols-3 gap-4",
                    children: [e.jsx(V, {
                        children: e.jsxs(U, {
                            className: "pt-6",
                            children: [e.jsxs("div", {
                                className: "flex items-center mb-4",
                                children: [e.jsx(vp, {
                                    className: "h-5 w-5 mr-2 text-gray-500"
                                }), e.jsx("h3", {
                                    className: "font-semibold",
                                    children: "Fecha del Pedido"
                                })]
                            }), e.jsx("p", {
                                children: Bt(new Date(n.createdAt), "PPP", {
                                    locale: Ss
                                })
                            }), e.jsx("p", {
                                className: "text-sm text-gray-500",
                                children: Bt(new Date(n.createdAt), "p", {
                                    locale: Ss
                                })
                            })]
                        })
                    }), e.jsx(V, {
                        children: e.jsxs(U, {
                            className: "pt-6",
                            children: [e.jsxs("div", {
                                className: "flex items-center mb-4",
                                children: [e.jsx(Lt, {
                                    className: "h-5 w-5 mr-2 text-gray-500"
                                }), e.jsx("h3", {
                                    className: "font-semibold",
                                    children: "Total del Pedido"
                                })]
                            }), e.jsx("p", {
                                className: "text-2xl font-bold",
                                children: ft(n.total, !1)
                            }), e.jsx("p", {
                                className: "text-sm text-gray-500",
                                children: "IVA incluido"
                            })]
                        })
                    }), e.jsx(V, {
                        children: e.jsxs(U, {
                            className: "pt-6",
                            children: [e.jsxs("div", {
                                className: "flex items-center mb-4",
                                children: [e.jsx(ps, {
                                    className: "h-5 w-5 mr-2 text-gray-500"
                                }), e.jsx("h3", {
                                    className: "font-semibold",
                                    children: "Estados del Pedido"
                                })]
                            }), e.jsxs("div", {
                                className: "mb-3",
                                children: [e.jsx("p", {
                                    className: "text-sm text-gray-600 mb-1",
                                    children: "Estado del Pago:"
                                }), e.jsxs("div", {
                                    className: `inline-flex items-center px-3 py-1 rounded-full text-sm ${c.color}`,
                                    children: [c.icon, e.jsx("span", {
                                        className: "ml-2 font-medium",
                                        children: c.label
                                    })]
                                })]
                            }), e.jsxs("div", {
                                children: [e.jsx("p", {
                                    className: "text-sm text-gray-600 mb-1",
                                    children: "Estado del Pedido:"
                                }), e.jsxs("div", {
                                    className: `inline-flex items-center px-3 py-1 rounded-full text-sm ${d.color}`,
                                    children: [d.icon, e.jsx("span", {
                                        className: "ml-2 font-medium",
                                        children: d.label
                                    })]
                                }), d.description && e.jsx("p", {
                                    className: "text-sm text-gray-500 mt-2",
                                    children: d.description
                                })]
                            })]
                        })
                    })]
                }), e.jsxs("div", {
                    className: "grid grid-cols-1 md:grid-cols-2 gap-6",
                    children: [e.jsxs(V, {
                        children: [e.jsx(ne, {
                            children: e.jsxs(ae, {
                                className: "flex items-center gap-2",

                                    className: "h-5 w-5"
                                }), "Información del Cliente"]
                            })
                        }), e.jsx(U, {

                                className: "space-y-2",
                                children: [e.jsxs("p", {

                                    }), " ", n.customerName]
                                }), e.jsxs("p", {
                                    children: [e.jsx("strong", {
                                        children: "Email:"
                                    }), " ", n.customerEmail]
                                }), e.jsxs("p", {
                                    children: [e.jsx("strong", {
                                        children: "Teléfono:"
                                    }), " ", n.customerPhone]
                                })]
                            })
                        })]
                    }), e.jsxs(V, {
                        children: [e.jsx(ne, {
                            children: e.jsxs(ae, {
                                className: "flex items-center gap-2",
                                children: [e.jsx(co, {
                                    className: "h-5 w-5"
                                }), "Dirección de Envío"]
                            })
                        }), e.jsx(U, {

                                }), e.jsxs("p", {

                                }), e.jsx("p", {

                                }), n.shippingCost && e.jsxs("p", {
                                    children: [e.jsx("strong", {
                                        children: "Costo de envío:"
                                    }), " ", ft(n.shippingCost, !1)]
                                })]
                            })
                        })]
                    })]
                }), (n.transportAgency || n.expeditionNumber || n.adminObservations) && e.jsxs(V, {
                    children: [e.jsx(ne, {
                        children: e.jsxs(ae, {
                            className: "flex items-center gap-2",
                            children: [e.jsx(ur, {
                                className: "h-5 w-5"
                            }), "Información de Transporte"]
                        })
                    }), e.jsxs(U, {
                        className: "space-y-3",
                        children: [n.transportAgency && e.jsxs("div", {
                            children: [e.jsx("span", {
                                className: "font-medium text-gray-700",
                                children: "Agencia de transporte:"
                            }), e.jsx("p", {
                                className: "text-gray-900",
                                children: n.transportAgency
                            })]
                        }), n.expeditionNumber && e.jsxs("div", {
                            children: [e.jsx("span", {
                                className: "font-medium text-gray-700",

                            }), e.jsx("p", {

                                children: n.expeditionNumber
                            })]
                        }), n.adminObservations && e.jsxs("div", {
                            children: [e.jsx("span", {
                                className: "font-medium text-gray-700",
                                children: "Observaciones:"
                            }), e.jsx("p", {
                                className: "text-gray-900",
                                children: n.adminObservations
                            })]
                        })]
                    })]
                }), e.jsxs(V, {
                    children: [e.jsx(ne, {
                        children: e.jsx(ae, {
                            children: "Artículos del Pedido"
                        })
                    }), e.jsx(U, {
                        children: n.items && n.items.length > 0 ? e.jsxs("div", {
                            className: "space-y-4",
                            children: [n.items.map((u, m) => e.jsxs("div", {
                                className: "flex items-start justify-between p-4 border rounded-lg",
                                children: [e.jsxs("div", {
                                    className: "flex-1",
                                    children: [e.jsxs("div", {
                                        className: "flex items-center gap-2 mb-2",
                                        children: [e.jsx(Lt, {
                                            className: "h-4 w-4 text-gray-500"
                                        }), e.jsx("h4", {
                                            className: "font-semibold",
                                            children: u.partName || u.descripcionArticulo
                                        })]
                                    }), e.jsxs("div", {
                                        className: "space-y-1 text-sm text-gray-600",
                                        children: [u.partFamily && e.jsxs("p", {
                                            children: [e.jsx("span", {
                                                className: "font-medium",
                                                children: "Familia:"
                                            }), " ", u.partFamily]
                                        }), u.partReference && e.jsxs("p", {
                                            children: [e.jsx("span", {
                                                className: "font-medium",
                                                children: "Referencia:"
                                            }), " ", u.partReference]
                                        }), (u.vehicleBrand || u.vehicleModel || u.vehicleMarca || u.vehicleModelo) && e.jsxs("p", {
                                            children: [e.jsx("span", {
                                                className: "font-medium",
                                                children: "Vehículo:"
                                            }), (u.vehicleBrand || u.vehicleMarca) && ` ${u.vehicleBrand || u.vehicleMarca}`, (u.vehicleModel || u.vehicleModelo) && ` ${u.vehicleModel || u.vehicleModelo}`, (u.vehicleYear || u.vehicleAnyo) && ` (${u.vehicleYear || u.vehicleAnyo})`]
                                        }), u.vehicleVersion && e.jsxs("p", {
                                            children: [e.jsx("span", {
                                                className: "font-medium",
                                                children: "Versión:"
                                            }), " ", u.vehicleVersion]
                                        })]
                                    })]
                                }), e.jsxs("div", {
                                    className: "text-right",
                                    children: [e.jsxs("p", {
                                        className: "font-semibold",
                                        children: [ft(u.price, !1), " × ", u.quantity]
                                    }), e.jsxs("p", {
                                        className: "text-sm text-gray-500",
                                        children: ["Total: ", ft((parseFloat(u.price) || 0) * u.quantity, !1)]
                                    })]
                                })]
                            }, m)), e.jsx("div", {
                                className: "mt-6 pt-4 border-t border-gray-200",
                                children: e.jsxs("div", {
                                    className: "space-y-2",
                                    children: [e.jsxs("div", {
                                        className: "flex justify-between text-sm",
                                        children: [e.jsx("span", {
                                            children: "Subtotal productos:"
                                        }), e.jsx("span", {
                                            children: ft(n.subtotal || 0, !1)
                                        })]
                                    }), e.jsxs("div", {
                                        className: "flex justify-between text-sm",
                                        children: [e.jsx("span", {
                                            children: "Gastos de envío:"
                                        }), e.jsx("span", {
                                            children: ft(n.shippingCost || 0, !1)
                                        })]
                                    }), e.jsxs("div", {
                                        className: "flex justify-between font-bold text-lg pt-2 border-t",
                                        children: [e.jsx("span", {
                                            children: "Total del pedido:"
                                        }), e.jsx("span", {
                                            children: ft(n.total || 0, !1)
                                        })]
                                    })]
                                })
                            })]
                        }) : e.jsxs("div", {
                            className: "text-center py-8 text-gray-500",
                            children: [e.jsx(Lt, {
                                className: "h-12 w-12 mx-auto mb-4 opacity-50"
                            }), e.jsx("p", {

                            })]
                        })
                    })]
                }), n.notes && e.jsxs(V, {
                    children: [e.jsx(ne, {

                            children: "Notas del Pedido"
                        })
                    }), e.jsx(U, {
                        children: e.jsx("p", {
                            className: "text-gray-600",
                            children: n.notes
                        })
                    })]
                })]
            }) : e.jsx("div", {
                className: "text-center py-8",
                children: e.jsx("p", {
                    className: "text-muted-foreground",
                    children: "No se pudieron cargar los detalles del pedido"
                })
            })]
        })
    })
}
const z1 = () => {
    dt();
    const t = hr(),
        {toast: s} = tt(),
        [r, n] = h.useState(""),
        [a, i] = h.useState("all"),
        [o, l] = h.useState("all"),
        [c, d] = h.useState("all"),
        [u, m] = h.useState(null),
        [f, y] = h.useState(!1),
        [g, x] = h.useState(null),
        [b, j] = h.useState(!1),
        [p, v] = h.useState(new Set),
        [N, w] = h.useState({}),
        [C, S] = h.useState(new Set),
        {data: E, isLoading: O, error: G} = _e({
            queryKey: ["/api/admin/orders"]
        }),
        L = h.useMemo(() => !E || !Array.isArray(E) ? [] : E.filter(R => {
            var Se,
                _,
                ee;
            const M = r === "" || ((Se = R.customerEmail) == null ? void 0 : Se.toLowerCase().includes(r.toLowerCase())) || ((_ = R.customerName) == null ? void 0 : _.toLowerCase().includes(r.toLowerCase())) || R.id.toString().includes(r) || ((ee = R.orderNumber) == null ? void 0 : ee.toLowerCase().includes(r.toLowerCase())),
                K = a === "all" || R.paymentStatus === a,
                oe = o === "all" || R.orderStatus === o,
                be = (() => {
                    if (c === "all")
                        return !0;
                    const H = new Date(R.createdAt),
                        se = new Date;
                    switch (c) {
                    case "today":
                        return H.toDateString() === se.toDateString();
                    case "week":
                        const de = new Date(se.getTime() - 7 * 24 * 60 * 60 * 1e3);
                        return H >= de;
                    case "month":
                        const le = new Date(se.getTime() - 30 * 24 * 60 * 60 * 1e3);
                        return H >= le;
                    default:
                        return !0
                    }
                })();
            return M && K && oe && be
        }), [E, r, a, o, c]),
        I = rt({
            mutationFn: async ({orderId: R, paymentStatus: M}) => Ie(`/api/admin/orders/${R}/payment-status`, {
                method: "PATCH",
                body: JSON.stringify({
                    paymentStatus: M
                }),
                headers: {
                    "Content-Type": "application/json"
                }
            }),
            onSuccess: () => {
                t.invalidateQueries({
                    queryKey: ["/api/admin/orders"]
                }),
                s({
                    title: "Estado actualizado",
                    description: "El estado del pago ha sido actualizado correctamente."
                })
            },
            onError: R => {
                s({
                    title: "Error",
                    description: R.message || "Error al actualizar el estado del pago.",
                    variant: "destructive"
                })
            }
        }),
        z = rt({
            mutationFn: async ({orderId: R, status: M}) => Ie(`/api/admin/orders/${R}/order-status`, {
                method: "PATCH",
                body: JSON.stringify({
                    orderStatus: M
                }),
                headers: {
                    "Content-Type": "application/json"
                }
            }),
            onSuccess: () => {
                t.invalidateQueries({
                    queryKey: ["/api/admin/orders"]
                }),
                s({
                    title: "Estado actualizado",
                    description: "El estado del pedido ha sido actualizado correctamente."
                })
            },
            onError: R => {
                s({
                    title: "Error",
                    description: R.message || "Error al actualizar el estado del pedido.",
                    variant: "destructive"
                })
            }
        }),
        B = rt({
            mutationFn: async R => Ie(`/api/admin/orders/${R}`, {
                method: "DELETE"
            }),
            onSuccess: () => {
                t.invalidateQueries({
                    queryKey: ["/api/admin/orders"]
                }),
                s({
                    title: "Pedido eliminado",
                    description: "El pedido ha sido eliminado correctamente."
                })
            },
            onError: R => {
                s({
                    title: "Error",
                    description: R.message || "Error al eliminar el pedido.",
                    variant: "destructive"
                })
            }
        }),
        F = (R, M) => {
            I.mutate({
                orderId: R,
                paymentStatus: M
            })
        },
        T = (R, M) => {
            z.mutate({
                orderId: R,
                status: M
            })
        },
        k = R => {
            x(R),
            j(!0)
        },
        D = async R => {
            const M = new Set(p);
            M.has(R) ? M.delete(R) : (M.add(R), N[R] || await $(R)),
            v(M)
        },
        $ = async R => {
            const M = new Set(C);
            M.add(R),
            S(M);
            try {
                const K = await fetch(`/api/admin/orders/${R}`);
                if (!K.ok)
                    throw new Error("Error al cargar detalles del pedido");
                const oe = await K.json();
                w(be => ({
                    ...be,
                    [R]: oe
                }))
            } catch (K) {
                console.error("Error al cargar detalles del pedido:", K),
                s({
                    title: "Error",
                    description: "No se pudieron cargar los detalles del pedido.",
                    variant: "destructive"
                })
            } finally {
                const K = new Set(C);
                K.delete(R),
                S(K)
            }
        },
        re = R => {
            window.confirm("¿Estás seguro de que quieres eliminar este pedido? Esta acción se puede revertir desde la papelera.") && B.mutate(R)
        };
    return O ? e.jsx(ya, {
        children: e.jsxs("div", {
            className: "space-y-6",
            children: [e.jsx("h1", {
                className: "text-3xl font-bold",
                children: "Gestión de Pedidos"
            }), e.jsxs(V, {
                children: [e.jsx(ne, {
                    children: e.jsx(ae, {
                        children: "Pedidos Recientes"
                    })
                }), e.jsx(U, {
                    children: e.jsx(ii, {
                        className: "h-64 w-full"
                    })
                })]
            })]
        })
    }) : G ? e.jsx(ya, {
        children: e.jsxs("div", {
            className: "space-y-6",
            children: [e.jsx("h1", {
                className: "text-3xl font-bold",
                children: "Gestión de Pedidos"
            }), e.jsx(V, {
                children: e.jsxs(U, {
                    className: "flex flex-col items-center py-10",
                    children: [e.jsx(qs, {
                        className: "h-12 w-12 text-red-500 mb-4"
                    }), e.jsx("h2", {
                        className: "text-xl font-semibold mb-2",
                        children: "Error al cargar pedidos"
                    }), e.jsx("p", {
                        className: "text-gray-600 mb-6",
                        children: "No se pudieron cargar los pedidos. Por favor, intenta de nuevo más tarde."
                    }), e.jsx(A, {
                        onClick: () => t.invalidateQueries(),
                        children: "Reintentar"
                    })]
                })
            })]
        })
    }) : !E || !Array.isArray(E) || E.length === 0 ? e.jsx(ya, {
        children: e.jsxs("div", {
            className: "space-y-6",
            children: [e.jsx("h1", {
                className: "text-3xl font-bold",
                children: "Gestión de Pedidos"
            }), e.jsx(V, {
                children: e.jsxs(U, {
                    className: "flex flex-col items-center py-10",
                    children: [e.jsx(kh, {
                        className: "h-12 w-12 text-gray-400 mb-4"
                    }), e.jsx("h2", {
                        className: "text-xl font-semibold mb-2",
                        children: "No hay pedidos"
                    }), e.jsx("p", {
                        className: "text-gray-600 mb-6",
                        children: "No se han recibido pedidos aún."
                    })]
                })
            })]
        })
    }) : e.jsxs(ya, {
        children: [e.jsxs("div", {
            className: "space-y-6",
            children: [e.jsxs("div", {
                className: "flex justify-between items-center",
                children: [e.jsx("h1", {
                    className: "text-3xl font-bold",
                    children: "Gestión de Pedidos"
                }), e.jsxs("div", {
                    className: "flex items-center gap-2 text-sm text-gray-500",
                    children: [e.jsx(kh, {
                        className: "h-4 w-4"
                    }), L.length, " de ", Array.isArray(E) ? E.length : 0, " pedidos"]
                })]
            }), e.jsxs(V, {
                children: [e.jsx(ne, {
                    children: e.jsxs(ae, {
                        className: "flex items-center gap-2",
                        children: [e.jsx(p5, {
                            className: "h-5 w-5"
                        }), "Filtros y Búsqueda"]
                    })
                }), e.jsxs(U, {
                    children: [e.jsxs("div", {
                        className: "grid grid-cols-1 md:grid-cols-2 lg:grid-cols-5 gap-4",
                        children: [e.jsx("div", {
                            className: "lg:col-span-2",
                            children: e.jsxs("div", {
                                className: "relative",
                                children: [e.jsx(wr, {
                                    className: "absolute left-3 top-1/2 transform -translate-y-1/2 h-4 w-4 text-gray-400"
                                }), e.jsx(te, {
                                    placeholder: "Buscar por email, nombre, ID o referencia...",
                                    value: r,
                                    onChange: R => n(R.target.value),
                                    className: "pl-9"
                                })]
                            })
                        }), e.jsx("div", {
                            children: e.jsxs(He, {
                                value: a,
                                onValueChange: i,
                                children: [e.jsx(Ue, {
                                    children: e.jsxs("div", {
                                        className: "flex items-center gap-2",
                                        children: [e.jsx(ps, {
                                            className: "h-4 w-4"
                                        }), e.jsx(We, {
                                            placeholder: "Estado Pago"
                                        })]
                                    })
                                }), e.jsxs(qe, {

                                    })]

                            })
                        }), e.jsx("div", {

                                value: o,
                                onValueChange: l,
                                children: [e.jsx(Ue, {
                                    children: e.jsxs("div", {
                                        className: "flex items-center gap-2",

                                    })]

                    }), (r || a !== "all" || o !== "all" || c !== "all") && e.jsx("div", {

                        children: e.jsx(A, {

                            },
                            children: "Limpiar filtros"
                        })
                    })]
                })]
            }), e.jsxs(V, {
                children: [e.jsx(ne, {
                    children: e.jsxs(ae, {
                        className: "flex items-center justify-between",
                        children: [e.jsx("span", {
                            children: "Pedidos"
                        }), e.jsx("div", {
                            className: "flex items-center gap-4 text-sm text-gray-500",
                            children: e.jsxs("div", {

                                children: ["Total: ", ft(L.reduce((R, M) => R + parseFloat(M.total || 0), 0), !1)]
                            })
                        })]
                    })
                }), e.jsx(U, {
                    className: "p-0",
                    children: e.jsxs("div", {
                        className: "overflow-x-auto w-full",
                        children: [e.jsxs(Bs, {

                                    })]

                                    var M;
                                    return e.jsxs(ke.Fragment, {

                                                        className: "h-4 w-4"
                                                    })
                                                })

                                            }), e.jsx(fe, {

                                                            locale: Ss
                                                        })
                                                    }), e.jsx("p", {

                                                        children: Bt(new Date(R.createdAt), "HH:mm", {
                                                            locale: Ss
                                                        })
                                                    })]
                                                })
                                            }), e.jsx(fe, {
                                                className: "font-semibold",
                                                children: ft(R.total, !1)
                                            }), e.jsx(fe, {
                                                className: "hidden lg:table-cell",
                                                children: e.jsxs(He, {
                                                    value: R.paymentStatus || "pendiente",
                                                    onValueChange: K => F(R.id, K),
                                                    disabled: I.isPending,
                                                    children: [e.jsx(Ue, {
                                                        className: "w-28",
                                                        children: e.jsx(We, {})
                                                    }), e.jsxs(qe, {

                                                        })]
                                                    })]
                                                })
                                            }), e.jsx(fe, {
                                                className: "hidden xl:table-cell",
                                                children: e.jsxs(He, {
                                                    value: R.orderStatus || "pendiente_verificar",
                                                    onValueChange: K => T(R.id, K),
                                                    disabled: z.isPending,
                                                    children: [e.jsx(Ue, {
                                                        className: "w-36",
                                                        children: e.jsx(We, {})
                                                    }), e.jsxs(qe, {
                                                        children: [e.jsx(Q, {

                                                            children: "Incidencia"

                                                children: e.jsxs("div", {

                                                    children: [e.jsxs(A, {

                                                        className: "hidden sm:flex",

                                                        }), e.jsx("span", {

                                                        })]

                                                            className: "h-4 w-4"
                                                        })
                                                    })]
                                                })
                                            })]
                                        }), p.has(R.id) && e.jsx(vt, {
                                            children: e.jsx(fe, {
                                                colSpan: 8,
                                                className: "p-0 bg-gray-50",
                                                children: e.jsx("div", {
                                                    className: "p-3 border-t border-gray-200 overflow-x-auto",
                                                    children: C.has(R.id) ? e.jsxs("div", {
                                                        className: "flex items-center justify-center py-4",
                                                        children: [e.jsx("div", {
                                                            className: "animate-spin h-6 w-6 border-2 border-primary border-t-transparent rounded-full"
                                                        }), e.jsx("span", {
                                                            className: "ml-2 text-gray-600",
                                                            children: "Cargando detalles..."
                                                        })]
                                                    }) : N[R.id] ? e.jsxs("div", {
                                                        className: "space-y-2 max-w-full",
                                                        children: [e.jsxs("div", {
                                                            className: "grid grid-cols-1 md:grid-cols-2 gap-2",

                                                                    className: "flex items-center gap-1 mb-1",
                                                                    children: [e.jsx(Or, {
                                                                        className: "h-3 w-3 text-blue-600"
                                                                    }), e.jsx("span", {
                                                                        className: "font-medium text-blue-800 text-xs",
                                                                        children: "Cliente"
                                                                    })]
                                                                }), e.jsxs("div", {

                                                                    children: [e.jsxs("p", {

                                                                        }), " ", N[R.id].customerName]
                                                                    }), e.jsxs("p", {
                                                                        children: [e.jsx("strong", {
                                                                            children: "Email:"
                                                                        }), " ", e.jsx("span", {
                                                                            className: "break-all",

                                                                        })]
                                                                    }), e.jsxs("p", {
