                                                                        }), " ", N[R.id].customerPhone]
                                                                    }), e.jsxs("p", {
                                                                        children: [e.jsx("strong", {
                                                                            children: "Dirección:"
                                                                        }), " ", N[R.id].shippingAddress, ", ", N[R.id].shippingCity, " ", N[R.id].shippingPostalCode]
                                                                    })]
                                                                })]
                                                            }), e.jsxs("div", {
                                                                className: "bg-white p-2 rounded border text-xs",
                                                                children: [e.jsxs("div", {
                                                                    className: "flex items-center gap-1 mb-1",
                                                                    children: [e.jsx(Lt, {
                                                                        className: "h-3 w-3 text-green-600"
                                                                    }), e.jsxs("span", {
                                                                        className: "font-medium text-green-800 text-xs",
                                                                        children: ["Productos (", ((M = N[R.id].items) == null ? void 0 : M.length) || 0, ")"]
                                                                    })]
                                                                }), N[R.id].items && Array.isArray(N[R.id].items) && N[R.id].items.length > 0 ? e.jsxs("div", {
                                                                    className: "space-y-1",
                                                                    children: [N[R.id].items.map((K, oe) => e.jsxs("div", {
                                                                        className: "flex justify-between items-start text-xs bg-gray-50 p-1.5 rounded",
                                                                        children: [e.jsxs("div", {
                                                                            className: "flex-1 pr-1 min-w-0",
                                                                            children: [e.jsx("p", {
                                                                                className: "font-medium truncate text-xs",
                                                                                children: K.partName || K.descripcionArticulo
                                                                            }), K.partReference && e.jsxs("p", {
                                                                                className: "text-gray-600 text-xs",
                                                                                children: ["Ref: ", K.partReference]
                                                                            })]
                                                                        }), e.jsxs("div", {
                                                                            className: "text-right whitespace-nowrap text-xs",
                                                                            children: [e.jsxs("p", {
                                                                                className: "font-semibold",
                                                                                children: [ft(K.price, !1), " × ", K.quantity]
                                                                            }), e.jsx("p", {
                                                                                className: "text-gray-600",
                                                                                children: ft((parseFloat(K.price) || 0) * K.quantity, !1)
                                                                            })]
                                                                        })]
                                                                    }, oe)), e.jsxs("div", {
                                                                        className: "border-t pt-1 mt-1 text-xs",
                                                                        children: [e.jsxs("div", {
                                                                            className: "flex justify-between",
                                                                            children: [e.jsx("span", {
                                                                                children: "Subtotal:"
                                                                            }), e.jsx("span", {
                                                                                children: ft(N[R.id].subtotal || 0, !1)
                                                                            })]
                                                                        }), e.jsxs("div", {
                                                                            className: "flex justify-between",
                                                                            children: [e.jsx("span", {
                                                                                children: "Envío:"
                                                                            }), e.jsx("span", {
                                                                                children: ft(N[R.id].shippingCost || 0, !1)
                                                                            })]
                                                                        }), e.jsxs("div", {
                                                                            className: "flex justify-between font-bold pt-0.5 border-t",
                                                                            children: [e.jsx("span", {
                                                                                children: "Total:"
                                                                            }), e.jsx("span", {
                                                                                children: ft(N[R.id].total || 0, !1)
                                                                            })]
                                                                        })]
                                                                    })]
                                                                }) : e.jsx("p", {
                                                                    className: "text-xs text-gray-500",
                                                                    children: "No hay productos"
                                                                })]
                                                            })]
                                                        }), e.jsx("div", {
                                                            className: "bg-yellow-50 border border-yellow-200 p-2 rounded",
                                                            children: e.jsxs("div", {
                                                                className: "flex items-start gap-1",
                                                                children: [e.jsx(qs, {
                                                                    className: "h-3 w-3 text-yellow-600 mt-0.5 flex-shrink-0"
                                                                }), e.jsxs("div", {
                                                                    className: "min-w-0",
                                                                    children: [e.jsx("span", {
                                                                        className: "font-medium text-yellow-800 text-xs",
                                                                        children: "Observaciones:"
                                                                    }), e.jsx("p", {
                                                                        className: "text-xs text-yellow-700 mt-0.5 break-words",
                                                                        children: N[R.id].adminObservations || "Sin observaciones"
                                                                    })]
                                                                })]
                                                            })
                                                        }), e.jsxs("div", {
                                                            className: "flex gap-2 sm:hidden",
                                                            children: [e.jsxs(A, {
                                                                variant: "outline",
                                                                size: "sm",
                                                                onClick: () => k(R),
                                                                className: "flex-1",
                                                                children: [e.jsx(bs, {
                                                                    className: "h-4 w-4 mr-1"
                                                                }), "Ver"]
                                                            }), e.jsxs(A, {
                                                                variant: "outline",
                                                                size: "sm",
                                                                onClick: () => {
                                                                    m(R),
                                                                    y(!0)
                                                                },
                                                                className: "flex-1",
                                                                children: [e.jsx(qr, {
                                                                    className: "h-4 w-4 mr-1"
                                                                }), "Editar"]
                                                            })]
                                                        })]
                                                    }) : e.jsxs("div", {
                                                        className: "text-center py-6",
                                                        children: [e.jsx("p", {
                                                            className: "text-sm text-gray-500",
                                                            children: "No se pudieron cargar los detalles del pedido"
                                                        }), e.jsx(A, {
                                                            variant: "outline",
                                                            size: "sm",
                                                            onClick: () => $(R.id),
                                                            className: "mt-2",
                                                            children: "Reintentar"
                                                        })]
                                                    })
                                                })
                                            })
                                        })]
                                    }, R.id)
                                })
                            })]
                        }), L.length === 0 && e.jsxs("div", {
                            className: "text-center py-8",
                            children: [e.jsx(kh, {
                                className: "h-12 w-12 text-gray-400 mx-auto mb-4"
                            }), e.jsx("h3", {
                                className: "text-lg font-semibold mb-2",
                                children: "No se encontraron pedidos"
                            }), e.jsx("p", {
                                className: "text-gray-600",
                                children: r || a !== "all" || o !== "all" || c !== "all" ? "Intenta ajustar los filtros de búsqueda" : "No hay pedidos para mostrar"
                            })]
                        })]
                    })
                })]
            })]
        }), b && g && e.jsx(DW, {
            isOpen: b,
            onClose: () => {
                j(!1),
                x(null)
            },
            order: g
        }), f && u && e.jsx(RW, {
            isOpen: f,
            onClose: () => {
                y(!1),
                m(null)
            },
            order: u
        })]
    })
};
function OW() {
    const {toast: t} = tt(),
        [s, r] = ke.useState([]),
        [n, a] = ke.useState({
            merchantCode: "",
            terminal: "001",
            secretKey: "",
            environment: "test"
        }),
        [i, o] = ke.useState({
            name: "",
            description: "",
            basePrice: "",
            freeShippingThreshold: "",
            weightBasedPricing: !1,
            pricePerKg: "",
            estimatedDays: "1",
            isActive: !0
        });
    ke.useEffect(() => {
        l(),
        c()
    }, []);
    const l = async () => {
            try {
                const m = await Ie("GET", "/api/shipping/methods");
                if (m.ok) {
                    const f = await m.json();
                    r(f)
                }
            } catch (m) {
                console.error("Error loading shipping methods:", m)
            }
        },
        c = async () => {
            try {
                const m = await Ie("GET", "/api/admin/site-config/redsys_config");
                if (m.ok) {
                    const f = await m.json();
                    f.value && a(JSON.parse(f.value))
                }
            } catch (m) {
                console.error("Error loading Redsys config:", m)
            }
        },
        d = async () => {
            try {
                (await Ie("POST", "/api/admin/site-config", {
                    key: "redsys_config",
                    value: JSON.stringify(n),
                    description: "Configuración de Redsys para pagos con tarjeta"
                })).ok && t({
                    title: "Configuración guardada",
                    description: "La configuración de Redsys se ha guardado correctamente"
                })
            } catch {
                t({
                    title: "Error",
                    description: "No se pudo guardar la configuración",
                    variant: "destructive"
                })
            }
        },
        u = async () => {
            try {
                (await Ie("POST", "/api/admin/shipping/methods", {
                    ...i,
                    basePrice: parseFloat(i.basePrice) || 0,
                    freeShippingThreshold: i.freeShippingThreshold ? parseFloat(i.freeShippingThreshold) : null,
                    pricePerKg: parseFloat(i.pricePerKg) || 0,
                    estimatedDays: parseInt(i.estimatedDays) || 1
                })).ok && (t({
                    title: "Método creado",
                    description: "El método de envío se ha creado correctamente"
                }), l(), o({
                    name: "",
                    description: "",
                    basePrice: "",
                    freeShippingThreshold: "",
                    weightBasedPricing: !1,
                    pricePerKg: "",
                    estimatedDays: "1",
                    isActive: !0
                }))
            } catch {
                t({
                    title: "Error",
                    description: "No se pudo crear el método de envío",
                    variant: "destructive"
                })
            }
        };
    return e.jsxs("div", {
        className: "container mx-auto px-4 py-8",
        children: [e.jsx("h1", {
            className: "text-3xl font-bold mb-8",
            children: "Configuración de Pagos y Envíos"
        }), e.jsxs(ls, {
            defaultValue: "shipping",
            className: "space-y-6",
            children: [e.jsxs(es, {
                children: [e.jsx(Ve, {
                    value: "shipping",
                    children: "Métodos de Envío"
                }), e.jsx(Ve, {
                    value: "payments",
                    children: "Configuración de Pagos"
                })]
            }), e.jsxs(ze, {
                value: "shipping",
                className: "space-y-6",
                children: [e.jsxs(V, {
                    children: [e.jsx(ne, {
                        children: e.jsx(ae, {
                            children: "Crear Nuevo Método de Envío"
                        })
                    }), e.jsxs(U, {
                        className: "space-y-4",
                        children: [e.jsxs("div", {
                            className: "grid grid-cols-1 md:grid-cols-2 gap-4",
                            children: [e.jsxs("div", {
                                children: [e.jsx(q, {
                                    htmlFor: "name",
                                    children: "Nombre"
                                }), e.jsx(te, {
                                    id: "name",
                                    value: i.name,
                                    onChange: m => o(f => ({
                                        ...f,
                                        name: m.target.value
                                    })),
                                    placeholder: "Envío estándar"
                                })]
                            }), e.jsxs("div", {
                                children: [e.jsx(q, {
                                    htmlFor: "basePrice",
                                    children: "Precio base (€)"
                                }), e.jsx(te, {
                                    id: "basePrice",
                                    type: "number",
                                    step: "0.01",
                                    value: i.basePrice,
                                    onChange: m => o(f => ({
                                        ...f,
                                        basePrice: m.target.value
                                    })),
                                    placeholder: "5.95"
                                })]
                            }), e.jsxs("div", {
                                children: [e.jsx(q, {
                                    htmlFor: "freeThreshold",
                                    children: "Envío gratuito desde (€)"
                                }), e.jsx(te, {
                                    id: "freeThreshold",
                                    type: "number",
                                    step: "0.01",
                                    value: i.freeShippingThreshold,
                                    onChange: m => o(f => ({
                                        ...f,
                                        freeShippingThreshold: m.target.value
                                    })),
                                    placeholder: "50.00"
                                })]
                            }), e.jsxs("div", {
                                children: [e.jsx(q, {
                                    htmlFor: "estimatedDays",
                                    children: "Días estimados"
                                }), e.jsx(te, {
                                    id: "estimatedDays",
                                    type: "number",
                                    value: i.estimatedDays,
                                    onChange: m => o(f => ({
                                        ...f,
                                        estimatedDays: m.target.value
                                    }))
                                })]
                            })]
                        }), e.jsxs("div", {
                            children: [e.jsx(q, {
                                htmlFor: "description",
                                children: "Descripción"
                            }), e.jsx(te, {
                                id: "description",
                                value: i.description,
                                onChange: m => o(f => ({
                                    ...f,
                                    description: m.target.value
                                })),
                                placeholder: "Envío en 24-48 horas laborables"
                            })]
                        }), e.jsxs("div", {
                            className: "flex items-center space-x-2",
                            children: [e.jsx(St, {
                                id: "isActive",
                                checked: i.isActive,
                                onCheckedChange: m => o(f => ({
                                    ...f,
                                    isActive: m
                                }))
                            }), e.jsx(q, {
                                htmlFor: "isActive",
                                children: "Activo"
                            })]
                        }), e.jsx(A, {
                            onClick: u,
                            children: "Crear Método"
                        })]
                    })]
                }), e.jsxs(V, {
                    children: [e.jsx(ne, {
                        children: e.jsx(ae, {
                            children: "Métodos de Envío Existentes"
                        })
                    }), e.jsx(U, {
                        children: e.jsx("div", {
                            className: "space-y-4",
                            children: s.map(m => e.jsx("div", {
                                className: "border p-4 rounded-lg",
                                children: e.jsxs("div", {
                                    className: "flex justify-between items-start",
                                    children: [e.jsxs("div", {
                                        children: [e.jsx("h3", {
                                            className: "font-semibold",
                                            children: m.name
                                        }), e.jsx("p", {
                                            className: "text-sm text-gray-600",
                                            children: m.description
                                        }), e.jsxs("p", {
                                            className: "text-sm",
                                            children: ["Precio: ", m.basePrice, "€", m.freeShippingThreshold && e.jsxs("span", {
                                                children: [" (Gratuito desde ", m.freeShippingThreshold, "€)"]
                                            })]
                                        })]
                                    }), e.jsx("div", {
                                        className: "flex items-center space-x-2",
                                        children: e.jsx("span", {
                                            className: `px-2 py-1 rounded text-xs ${m.isActive ? "bg-green-100 text-green-800" : "bg-red-100 text-red-800"}`,
                                            children: m.isActive ? "Activo" : "Inactivo"
                                        })
                                    })]
                                })
                            }, m.id))
                        })
                    })]
                })]
            }), e.jsx(ze, {
                value: "payments",
                className: "space-y-6",
                children: e.jsxs(V, {
                    children: [e.jsx(ne, {
                        children: e.jsx(ae, {
                            children: "Configuración de Redsys"
                        })
                    }), e.jsxs(U, {
                        className: "space-y-4",
                        children: [e.jsxs("div", {
                            className: "grid grid-cols-1 md:grid-cols-2 gap-4",
                            children: [e.jsxs("div", {
                                children: [e.jsx(q, {
                                    htmlFor: "merchantCode",
                                    children: "Código de comercio"
                                }), e.jsx(te, {
                                    id: "merchantCode",
                                    value: n.merchantCode,
                                    onChange: m => a(f => ({
                                        ...f,
                                        merchantCode: m.target.value
                                    })),
                                    placeholder: "123456789"
                                })]
                            }), e.jsxs("div", {
                                children: [e.jsx(q, {
                                    htmlFor: "terminal",
                                    children: "Terminal"
                                }), e.jsx(te, {
                                    id: "terminal",
                                    value: n.terminal,
                                    onChange: m => a(f => ({
                                        ...f,
                                        terminal: m.target.value
                                    })),
                                    placeholder: "001"
                                })]
                            }), e.jsxs("div", {
                                className: "md:col-span-2",
                                children: [e.jsx(q, {
                                    htmlFor: "secretKey",
                                    children: "Clave secreta"
                                }), e.jsx(te, {
                                    id: "secretKey",
                                    type: "password",
                                    value: n.secretKey,
                                    onChange: m => a(f => ({
                                        ...f,
                                        secretKey: m.target.value
                                    })),
                                    placeholder: "Clave secreta de Redsys"
                                })]
                            }), e.jsxs("div", {
                                children: [e.jsx(q, {
                                    htmlFor: "environment",
                                    children: "Entorno"
                                }), e.jsxs("select", {
                                    id: "environment",
                                    className: "w-full p-2 border rounded",
                                    value: n.environment,
                                    onChange: m => a(f => ({
                                        ...f,
                                        environment: m.target.value
                                    })),
                                    children: [e.jsx("option", {
                                        value: "test",
                                        children: "Pruebas"
                                    }), e.jsx("option", {
                                        value: "production",
                                        children: "Producción"
                                    })]
                                })]
                            })]
                        }), e.jsx(A, {
                            onClick: d,
                            children: "Guardar Configuración"
                        })]
                    })]
                })
            })]
        })]
    })
}
const LW = {
    bank_transfer: o5,
    redsys: ps,
    stripe: ps,
    paypal: ps
};
function FW() {
    var v,
        N,
        w;
    const {toast: t} = tt(),
        [s, r] = h.useState([]),
        [n, a] = h.useState(!0),
        [i, o] = h.useState(""),
        [l, c] = h.useState({}),
        [d, u] = h.useState(!1),
        [m, f] = h.useState({});
    h.useEffect(() => {
        y()
    }, []);
    const y = async () => {
            try {
                console.log("AdminPaymentMethods: Cargando módulos...");
                const C = await Ie("GET", "/api/admin/payment-modules");
                console.log("AdminPaymentMethods: Response object:", C);
                const S = await C.json();
                if (console.log("AdminPaymentMethods: Data después de JSON:", S), console.log("AdminPaymentMethods: Tipo de data:", typeof S), console.log("AdminPaymentMethods: Es array?", Array.isArray(S)), Array.isArray(S)) {
                    console.log("AdminPaymentMethods: Módulos válidos:", S.length),
                    console.log("AdminPaymentMethods: Primer módulo:", S[0]),
                    r(S);
                    const E = {};
                    S.forEach(O => {
                        E[O.provider] = O.isActive
                    }),
                    f(E),
                    console.log("AdminPaymentMethods: Estados de módulos:", E),
                    S.length > 0 && (o(S[0].provider), c(S[0].config || {}))
                } else
                    console.error("La respuesta no es un array:", S),
                    console.error("AdminPaymentMethods: Tipo de respuesta:", typeof S),
                    r([])
            } catch (C) {
                console.error("AdminPaymentMethods: Error cargando módulos:", C),
                r([]),
                t({
                    title: "Error",
                    description: "No se pudieron cargar los módulos de pago",
                    variant: "destructive"
                })
            } finally {
                a(!1)
            }
        },
        g = C => {
            o(C);
            const S = s.find(E => E.provider === C);
            c((S == null ? void 0 : S.config) || {})
        },
        x = (C, S) => {
            c(E => ({
                ...E,
                [C]: S
            }))
        },
        b = async () => {
            if (i) {
                u(!0);
                try {
                    await Ie("PUT", `/api/admin/payment-modules/${i}`, {
                        config: l
                    }),
                    t({
                        title: "Configuración guardada",
                        description: "La configuración del módulo se ha guardado correctamente"
                    }),
                    await y()
                } catch {
                    t({
                        title: "Error",
                        description: "No se pudo guardar la configuración",
                        variant: "destructive"
                    })
                } finally {
                    u(!1)
                }
            }
        },
        j = async (C, S) => {
            try {
                await Ie("PUT", `/api/admin/payment-modules/${C}`, {
                    isActive: S
                }),
                f(E => ({
                    ...E,
                    [C]: S
                })),
                t({
                    title: S ? "Módulo activado" : "Módulo desactivado",
                    description: `El módulo ${C} ha sido ${S ? "activado" : "desactivado"}`
                }),
                await y()
            } catch {
                t({
                    title: "Error",
                    description: "No se pudo cambiar el estado del módulo",
                    variant: "destructive"
                })
            }
        },
        p = C => {
            var E;
            const S = l[C.name] || "";
            switch (C.type) {
            case "text":
            case "password":
                return e.jsxs("div", {
                    className: "space-y-2",
                    children: [e.jsxs(q, {
                        htmlFor: C.name,
                        className: "text-sm font-medium",
                        children: [C.label, C.required && e.jsx("span", {
                            className: "text-red-500 ml-1",
                            children: "*"
                        })]
                    }), e.jsx(te, {
                        id: C.name,
                        type: C.type,
                        value: S,
                        onChange: O => x(C.name, O.target.value),
                        placeholder: C.description,
                        className: "w-full"
                    }), C.description && e.jsx("p", {
                        className: "text-xs text-muted-foreground",
                        children: C.description
                    })]
                }, C.name);
            case "select":
                return e.jsxs("div", {
                    className: "space-y-2",
                    children: [e.jsxs(q, {
                        htmlFor: C.name,
                        className: "text-sm font-medium",
                        children: [C.label, C.required && e.jsx("span", {
                            className: "text-red-500 ml-1",
                            children: "*"
                        })]
                    }), e.jsx("select", {
                        id: C.name,
                        value: S,
                        onChange: O => x(C.name, O.target.value),
                        className: "w-full p-2 border rounded-md",
                        children: (E = C.options) == null ? void 0 : E.map(O => e.jsx("option", {
                            value: O.value,
                            children: O.label
                        }, O.value))
                    }), C.description && e.jsx("p", {
                        className: "text-xs text-muted-foreground",
                        children: C.description
                    })]
                }, C.name);
            case "checkbox":
                return e.jsxs("div", {
                    className: "flex items-center space-x-2",
                    children: [e.jsx(St, {
                        id: C.name,
                        checked: S,
                        onCheckedChange: O => x(C.name, O)
                    }), e.jsx(q, {
                        htmlFor: C.name,
                        className: "text-sm",
                        children: C.label
                    }), C.description && e.jsxs("p", {
                        className: "text-xs text-muted-foreground ml-2",
                        children: ["(", C.description, ")"]
                    })]
                }, C.name);
            default:
                return null
            }
        };
    return n ? e.jsxs("div", {
        className: "flex min-h-screen bg-background",
        children: [e.jsx(Fs, {}), e.jsx("div", {
            className: "flex-1 p-6",
            children: e.jsxs("div", {
                className: "animate-pulse space-y-4",
                children: [e.jsx("div", {
                    className: "h-8 bg-gray-200 rounded w-1/4"
                }), e.jsx("div", {
                    className: "grid grid-cols-1 md:grid-cols-3 gap-4",
                    children: [1, 2, 3].map(C => e.jsx("div", {
                        className: "h-48 bg-gray-200 rounded"
                    }, C))
                })]
            })
        })]
    }) : (console.log("AdminPaymentMethods: Renderizando con modules:", s, "loading:", n), console.log("AdminPaymentMethods: modules.length:", s.length), e.jsxs("div", {
        className: "flex min-h-screen bg-background",
        children: [e.jsx(Fs, {}), e.jsxs("div", {
            className: "flex-1 p-6 space-y-6",
            children: [e.jsx("div", {
                className: "flex justify-between items-center",
                children: e.jsxs("div", {
                    children: [e.jsx("h1", {
                        className: "text-3xl font-bold tracking-tight",
                        children: "Módulos de Pago"
                    }), e.jsx("p", {
                        className: "text-muted-foreground",
                        children: "Gestiona los módulos de pago disponibles en tu tienda"
                    })]
                })
            }), e.jsxs("div", {
                className: "grid grid-cols-1 lg:grid-cols-4 gap-6",
                children: [e.jsx("div", {
                    className: "lg:col-span-1",
                    children: e.jsx("div", {
                        className: "space-y-3",
                        children: s && s.length > 0 ? s.map(C => {
                            const S = LW[C.provider] || ps;
                            return e.jsxs(V, {
                                className: `cursor-pointer transition-all ${i === C.provider ? "ring-2 ring-primary" : "hover:bg-muted/50"}`,
                                onClick: () => g(C.provider),
                                children: [e.jsx(ne, {
                                    className: "pb-3",
                                    children: e.jsxs("div", {
                                        className: "flex items-center justify-between",
                                        children: [e.jsxs("div", {
                                            className: "flex items-center space-x-2",
                                            children: [e.jsx(S, {
                                                className: "h-5 w-5 text-muted-foreground"
                                            }), e.jsx(ae, {
                                                className: "text-sm",
                                                children: C.name
                                            })]
                                        }), e.jsx(ge, {
                                            variant: m[C.provider] ? "default" : "secondary",
                                            children: m[C.provider] ? "Activo" : "Inactivo"
                                        })]
                                    })
                                }), e.jsx(U, {
                                    className: "pt-0",
                                    children: e.jsxs("div", {
                                        className: "flex items-center space-x-2",
                                        children: [e.jsx(St, {
                                            checked: m[C.provider],
                                            onCheckedChange: E => j(C.provider, E),
                                            onClick: E => E.stopPropagation()
                                        }), e.jsx(q, {
                                            className: "text-xs text-muted-foreground",
                                            children: m[C.provider] ? "Habilitado" : "Deshabilitado"
                                        })]
                                    })
                                })]
                            }, C.provider)
                        }) : e.jsxs("div", {
                            className: "text-center py-8",
                            children: [e.jsx(ps, {
                                className: "mx-auto h-12 w-12 text-muted-foreground"
                            }), e.jsx("p", {
                                className: "text-sm text-muted-foreground mt-2",
                                children: "No hay módulos disponibles"
                            })]
                        })
                    })
                }), e.jsx("div", {
                    className: "lg:col-span-3",
                    children: i && e.jsxs(V, {
                        children: [e.jsx(ne, {
                            children: e.jsxs("div", {
                                className: "flex items-center space-x-2",
                                children: [e.jsx(Us, {
                                    className: "h-5 w-5"
                                }), e.jsxs(ae, {
                                    children: ["Configuración - ", (v = s.find(C => C.provider === i)) == null ? void 0 : v.name]
                                })]
                            })
                        }), e.jsx(U, {
                            className: "space-y-6",
                            children: ((N = s.find(C => C.provider === i)) == null ? void 0 : N.configFields.length) === 0 ? e.jsxs("div", {
                                className: "text-center py-8",
                                children: [e.jsx(Fr, {
                                    className: "mx-auto h-12 w-12 text-muted-foreground mb-4"
                                }), e.jsx("p", {
                                    className: "text-muted-foreground",
                                    children: "Este módulo no requiere configuración adicional"
                                })]
                            }) : e.jsxs(e.Fragment, {
                                children: [e.jsx("div", {
                                    className: "grid grid-cols-1 md:grid-cols-2 gap-4",
                                    children: (w = s.find(C => C.provider === i)) == null ? void 0 : w.configFields.map(C => p(C))
                                }), e.jsx("div", {
                                    className: "flex justify-end",
                                    children: e.jsxs(A, {
                                        onClick: b,
                                        disabled: d,
                                        className: "flex items-center space-x-2",
                                        children: [e.jsx(Nn, {
                                            className: "h-4 w-4"
                                        }), e.jsx("span", {
                                            children: d ? "Guardando..." : "Guardar Configuración"
                                        })]
                                    })
                                })]
                            })
                        })]
                    })
                })]
            }), s.length === 0 && e.jsxs("div", {
                className: "text-center py-12",
                children: [e.jsx(ps, {
                    className: "mx-auto h-12 w-12 text-muted-foreground"
                }), e.jsx("h3", {
                    className: "mt-2 text-sm font-medium text-gray-900",
                    children: "No hay módulos de pago disponibles"
                }), e.jsx("p", {
                    className: "mt-1 text-sm text-muted-foreground",
                    children: "Los módulos de pago se cargan automáticamente del sistema."
                })]
            })]
        })]
    }))
}
function zW() {
    const {toast: t} = tt(),
        [s, r] = h.useState([]),
        [n, a] = h.useState(!0),
        [i, o] = h.useState(""),
        [l, c] = h.useState({}),
        [d, u] = h.useState(!1);
    h.useEffect(() => {
        m()
    }, []);
    const m = async () => {
            try {
                const v = await Ie("GET", "/api/admin/payment-modules");
                r(v),
                v.length > 0 && (o(v[0].provider), c(v[0].config || {}))
            } catch {
                t({
                    title: "Error",
                    description: "No se pudieron cargar los módulos de pago",
                    variant: "destructive"
                })
            } finally {
                a(!1)
            }
        },
        f = v => {
            o(v);
            const N = s.find(w => w.provider === v);
            c((N == null ? void 0 : N.config) || {})
        },
        y = (v, N) => {
            c(w => ({
                ...w,
                [v]: N
            }))
        },
        g = async () => {
            u(!0);
            try {
                const v = s.find(N => N.provider === i);
                if (!v)
                    return;
                await Ie("PUT", `/api/admin/payment-modules/${i}`, {
                    config: l,
                    isActive: v.isActive
                }),
                t({
                    title: "Configuración guardada",
                    description: "Los cambios se han guardado correctamente"
                }),
                await m()
            } catch {
                t({
                    title: "Error",
                    description: "No se pudo guardar la configuración",
                    variant: "destructive"
                })
            } finally {
                u(!1)
            }
        },
        x = async (v, N) => {
            try {
                const w = s.find(C => C.provider === v);
                if (!w)
                    return;
                await Ie("PUT", `/api/admin/payment-modules/${v}`, {
                    config: w.config,
                    isActive: N
                }),
                t({
                    title: N ? "Módulo activado" : "Módulo desactivado",
                    description: `El módulo ${w.name} ha sido ${N ? "activado" : "desactivado"}`
                }),
                await m()
            } catch {
                t({
                    title: "Error",
                    description: "No se pudo cambiar el estado del módulo",
                    variant: "destructive"
                })
            }
        },
        b = v => {
            switch (v) {
            case "stripe":
                return e.jsx(ps, {
                    className: "w-5 h-5 text-blue-600"
                });
            case "paypal":
                return e.jsx(L5, {
                    className: "w-5 h-5 text-yellow-600"
                });
            case "redsys":
                return e.jsx(ps, {
                    className: "w-5 h-5 text-red-600"
                });
            case "bank_transfer":
                return e.jsx(ff, {
                    className: "w-5 h-5 text-green-600"
                });
            default:
                return e.jsx(Us, {
                    className: "w-5 h-5"
                })
            }
        },
        j = v => {
            var w;
            const N = l[v.name] || "";
            switch (v.type) {
            case "select":
                return e.jsxs("div", {
                    className: "space-y-2",
                    children: [e.jsxs(q, {
                        htmlFor: v.name,
                        children: [v.label, v.required && e.jsx("span", {
                            className: "text-red-500 ml-1",
                            children: "*"
                        })]
                    }), e.jsxs(He, {
                        value: N,
                        onValueChange: C => y(v.name, C),
                        children: [e.jsx(Ue, {
                            children: e.jsx(We, {
                                placeholder: `Seleccionar ${v.label}`
                            })
                        }), e.jsx(qe, {
                            children: (w = v.options) == null ? void 0 : w.map(C => e.jsx(Q, {
                                value: C.value,
                                children: C.label
                            }, C.value))
                        })]
                    }), v.description && e.jsx("p", {
                        className: "text-sm text-gray-500",
                        children: v.description
                    })]
                }, v.name);
            case "checkbox":
                return e.jsxs("div", {
                    className: "space-y-2",
                    children: [e.jsxs("div", {
                        className: "flex items-center space-x-2",
                        children: [e.jsx(St, {
                            id: v.name,
                            checked: N,
                            onCheckedChange: C => y(v.name, C)
                        }), e.jsx(q, {
                            htmlFor: v.name,
                            children: v.label
                        })]
                    }), v.description && e.jsx("p", {
                        className: "text-sm text-gray-500",
                        children: v.description
                    })]
                }, v.name);
            case "password":
                return e.jsxs("div", {
                    className: "space-y-2",
                    children: [e.jsxs(q, {
                        htmlFor: v.name,
                        children: [v.label, v.required && e.jsx("span", {
                            className: "text-red-500 ml-1",
                            children: "*"
                        })]
                    }), e.jsx(te, {
                        id: v.name,
                        type: "password",
                        value: N,
                        onChange: C => y(v.name, C.target.value),
                        placeholder: `Ingresa ${v.label}`
                    }), v.description && e.jsx("p", {
                        className: "text-sm text-gray-500",
                        children: v.description
                    })]
                }, v.name);
            default:
                return e.jsxs("div", {
                    className: "space-y-2",
                    children: [e.jsxs(q, {
                        htmlFor: v.name,
                        children: [v.label, v.required && e.jsx("span", {
                            className: "text-red-500 ml-1",
                            children: "*"
                        })]
                    }), e.jsx(te, {
                        id: v.name,
                        type: "text",
                        value: N,
                        onChange: C => y(v.name, C.target.value),
                        placeholder: `Ingresa ${v.label}`
                    }), v.description && e.jsx("p", {
                        className: "text-sm text-gray-500",
                        children: v.description
                    })]
                }, v.name)
            }
        };
    if (n)
        return e.jsx("div", {
            className: "flex items-center justify-center h-64",
            children: e.jsx("div", {
                className: "animate-spin w-8 h-8 border-4 border-primary border-t-transparent rounded-full"
            })
        });
    const p = s.find(v => v.provider === i);
    return e.jsxs("div", {
        className: "container mx-auto p-6 space-y-6",
        children: [e.jsxs("div", {
            className: "flex items-center justify-between",
            children: [e.jsx("h1", {
                className: "text-3xl font-bold",
                children: "Módulos de Pago"
            }), e.jsxs(ge, {
                variant: "outline",
                className: "flex items-center gap-2",
                children: [e.jsx(Us, {
                    className: "w-4 h-4"
                }), "Configuración de Pagos"]
            })]
        }), e.jsxs("div", {
            className: "grid grid-cols-1 md:grid-cols-4 gap-6",
            children: [e.jsxs(V, {
                className: "md:col-span-1",
                children: [e.jsx(ne, {
                    children: e.jsx(ae, {
                        children: "Módulos Disponibles"
                    })
                }), e.jsx(U, {
                    className: "space-y-4",
                    children: s.map(v => e.jsxs("div", {
                        className: `p-3 rounded-lg border cursor-pointer transition-colors ${i === v.provider ? "border-primary bg-primary/10" : "border-gray-200 hover:border-gray-300"}`,
                        onClick: () => f(v.provider),
                        children: [e.jsxs("div", {
                            className: "flex items-center justify-between mb-2",
                            children: [e.jsxs("div", {
                                className: "flex items-center gap-2",
                                children: [b(v.provider), e.jsx("span", {
                                    className: "font-medium",
                                    children: v.name
                                })]
                            }), e.jsxs("div", {
                                className: "flex items-center gap-2",
                                children: [e.jsx(St, {
                                    checked: v.isActive,
                                    onCheckedChange: N => x(v.provider, N),
                                    onClick: N => N.stopPropagation()
                                }), v.isActive ? e.jsx(yp, {
                                    className: "w-4 h-4 text-green-600"
                                }) : e.jsx(Xs, {
                                    className: "w-4 h-4 text-gray-400"
                                })]
                            })]
                        }), e.jsx(ge, {
                            variant: v.isActive ? "default" : "secondary",
                            className: "text-xs",
                            children: v.isActive ? "Activo" : "Inactivo"
                        })]
                    }, v.provider))
                })]
            }), e.jsxs(V, {
                className: "md:col-span-3",
                children: [e.jsx(ne, {
                    children: e.jsxs(ae, {
                        className: "flex items-center gap-2",
                        children: [p && b(p.provider), "Configuración de ", p == null ? void 0 : p.name]
                    })
                }), e.jsx(U, {
                    children: p ? e.jsxs("div", {
                        className: "space-y-6",
                        children: [e.jsxs("div", {
                            className: "flex items-center gap-2 p-4 bg-blue-50 rounded-lg",
                            children: [e.jsx(Fr, {
                                className: "w-5 h-5 text-blue-600"
                            }), e.jsx("p", {
                                className: "text-sm text-blue-800",
                                children: "Configura los parámetros del módulo de pago. Los campos marcados con * son obligatorios."
                            })]
                        }), e.jsx("div", {
                            className: "grid grid-cols-1 md:grid-cols-2 gap-4",
                            children: p.configFields.map(v => j(v))
                        }), e.jsxs("div", {
                            className: "flex justify-end gap-2",
                            children: [e.jsx(A, {
                                variant: "outline",
                                onClick: () => f(i),
                                disabled: d,
                                children: "Descartar Cambios"
                            }), e.jsx(A, {
                                onClick: g,
                                disabled: d,
                                children: d ? "Guardando..." : "Guardar Configuración"
                            })]
                        })]
                    }) : e.jsx("p", {
                        className: "text-center text-gray-500",
                        children: "Selecciona un módulo para configurar"
                    })
                })]
            })]
        }), e.jsxs(V, {
            children: [e.jsx(ne, {
                children: e.jsx(ae, {
                    children: "Información Importante"
                })
            }), e.jsx(U, {
                className: "space-y-4",
                children: e.jsxs("div", {
                    className: "grid grid-cols-1 md:grid-cols-2 gap-4",
                    children: [e.jsxs("div", {
                        className: "space-y-2",
                        children: [e.jsx("h4", {
                            className: "font-semibold",
                            children: "Redsys"
                        }), e.jsx("p", {
                            className: "text-sm text-gray-600",
                            children: "Sistema de pago español para tarjetas de crédito y débito. Requiere código de comercio y clave secreta."
                        })]
                    }), e.jsxs("div", {
                        className: "space-y-2",
                        children: [e.jsx("h4", {
                            className: "font-semibold",
                            children: "PayPal"
                        }), e.jsx("p", {
                            className: "text-sm text-gray-600",
                            children: "Sistema de pago internacional. Requiere Client ID y Client Secret desde el panel de PayPal."
                        })]
                    }), e.jsxs("div", {
                        className: "space-y-2",
                        children: [e.jsx("h4", {
                            className: "font-semibold",
                            children: "Stripe"
                        }), e.jsx("p", {
                            className: "text-sm text-gray-600",
                            children: "Procesador de pagos con tarjeta. Requiere claves públicas y privadas de Stripe."
                        })]
                    }), e.jsxs("div", {
                        className: "space-y-2",
                        children: [e.jsx("h4", {
                            className: "font-semibold",
                            children: "Transferencia Bancaria"
                        }), e.jsx("p", {
                            className: "text-sm text-gray-600",
                            children: "Pago offline. Los clientes reciben instrucciones para realizar transferencia manual."
                        })]
                    })]
                })
            })]
        })]
    })
}
const $W = Ae.object({
        name: Ae.string().min(1, "El nombre es requerido"),
        description: Ae.string().optional(),
        base_price: Ae.coerce.number().min(0, "El precio base debe ser mayor o igual a 0"),
        is_active: Ae.boolean().default(!0),
        free_shipping_threshold: Ae.coerce.number().min(0).optional(),
        weight_based_pricing: Ae.boolean().default(!0),
        price_per_kg: Ae.coerce.number().min(0).optional(),
        max_weight: Ae.coerce.number().min(0).optional(),
        estimated_days: Ae.coerce.number().min(1).optional(),
        instructions: Ae.string().optional()
    }),
    VW = Ae.object({
        shipping_config_id: Ae.number(),
        min_weight: Ae.coerce.number().min(0, "El peso mínimo debe ser mayor o igual a 0"),
        max_weight: Ae.coerce.number().optional(),
        price: Ae.coerce.number().min(0, "El precio debe ser mayor o igual a 0")
    }),
    UW = Ae.object({
        name: Ae.string().min(1, "El nombre es requerido"),
        description: Ae.string().optional(),
        sort_order: Ae.coerce.number().min(0, "El orden debe ser mayor o igual a 0"),
        is_active: Ae.boolean().default(!0)
    });
Ae.object({
    shipping_config_id: Ae.number(),
    shipping_zone_id: Ae.number(),
    min_weight: Ae.coerce.number().min(0, "El peso mínimo debe ser mayor o igual a 0"),
    max_weight: Ae.coerce.number().optional(),
    price: Ae.coerce.number().min(0, "El precio debe ser mayor o igual a 0")
});
function qW() {
    const {toast: t} = tt(),
        s = hr(),
        {logout: r} = Ps(),
        [, n] = dt(),
        [a, i] = h.useState(null),
        [o, l] = h.useState(!1);
    h.useState(!1),
    h.useState(null),
    h.useState(null);
    const [c, d] = h.useState(null),
        [u, m] = h.useState(!1),
        [f, y] = h.useState(null),
        [g, x] = h.useState(null),
        [b, j] = h.useState(!1),
        {data: p=[], isLoading: v} = _e({
            queryKey: ["/api/admin/shipping/methods"]
        }),
        {data: N=[], isLoading: w} = _e({
            queryKey: ["/api/admin/shipping/zones"]
        }),
        {data: C=[], isLoading: S} = _e({
            queryKey: ["/api/admin/provinces"]
        }),
        {data: E=[], isLoading: O} = _e({
            queryKey: f ? ["/api/admin/shipping/zone-rates", f.id] : ["/api/admin/shipping/zone-rates"],
            enabled: !!f
        }),
        G = un({
            resolver: Cn($W),
            defaultValues: {
                name: "",
                description: "",
                base_price: 0,
                is_active: !0,
                free_shipping_threshold: 0,
                weight_based_pricing: !0,
                price_per_kg: 0,
                max_weight: 0,
                estimated_days: 3,
                instructions: ""
            }
        });
    un({
        resolver: Cn(VW),
        defaultValues: {
            shipping_config_id: 0,
            min_weight: 0,
            max_weight: 0,
            price: 0
        }
    });
    const L = un({
            resolver: Cn(UW),
            defaultValues: {
                name: "",
                description: "",
                sort_order: 0,
                is_active: !0
            }
        }),
        I = rt({
            mutationFn: _ => Ie("POST", "/api/admin/shipping/methods", _),
            onSuccess: () => {
                s.invalidateQueries({
                    queryKey: ["/api/admin/shipping/methods"]
                }),
                t({
                    title: "Método de envío creado exitosamente"
                }),
                l(!1),
                i(null),
                G.reset()
            },
            onError: _ => {
                t({
                    title: "Error al crear método",
                    description: _.message,
                    variant: "destructive"
                })
            }
        }),
        z = rt({
            mutationFn: ({id: _, data: ee}) => Ie("PUT", `/api/admin/shipping/methods/${_}`, ee),
            onSuccess: () => {
                s.invalidateQueries({
                    queryKey: ["/api/admin/shipping/methods"]
                }),
                t({
                    title: "Método de envío actualizado exitosamente"
                }),
                l(!1),
                i(null),
                G.reset()
            },
            onError: _ => {
                t({
                    title: "Error al actualizar método",
                    description: _.message,
                    variant: "destructive"
                })
            }
        }),
        B = rt({
            mutationFn: _ => Ie("DELETE", `/api/admin/shipping/methods/${_}`),
            onSuccess: () => {
                s.invalidateQueries({
                    queryKey: ["/api/admin/shipping/methods"]
                }),
                t({
                    title: "Método de envío eliminado exitosamente"
                })
            },
            onError: _ => {
                t({
                    title: "Error al eliminar método",
                    description: _.message,
                    variant: "destructive"
                })
            }
        }),
        F = rt({
            mutationFn: _ => Ie("POST", "/api/admin/shipping/zones", _),
            onSuccess: () => {
                s.invalidateQueries({
                    queryKey: ["/api/admin/shipping/zones"]
                }),
                t({
                    title: "Zona de envío creada exitosamente"
                }),
                m(!1),
                d(null),
                L.reset()
            },
            onError: _ => {
                t({
                    title: "Error al crear zona",
                    description: _.message,
                    variant: "destructive"
                })
            }
        }),
        T = rt({
            mutationFn: ({id: _, data: ee}) => Ie("PUT", `/api/admin/shipping/zones/${_}`, ee),
            onSuccess: () => {
                s.invalidateQueries({
                    queryKey: ["/api/admin/shipping/zones"]
                }),
                t({
                    title: "Zona de envío actualizada exitosamente"
                }),
                m(!1),
                d(null),
                L.reset()
            },

                t({
                    title: "Error al actualizar zona",
                    description: _.message,
                    variant: "destructive"
                })
            }
        }),
        k = rt({
            mutationFn: _ => Ie("DELETE", `/api/admin/shipping/zones/${_}`),
            onSuccess: () => {
                s.invalidateQueries({
                    queryKey: ["/api/admin/shipping/zones"]
                }),
                s.invalidateQueries({
                    queryKey: ["/api/admin/provinces"]
                }),
                t({
                    title: "Zona de envío eliminada exitosamente"
                })
            },

                t({
                    title: "Error al eliminar zona",
                    description: _.message,
                    variant: "destructive"
                })
            }
        }),
        D = rt({
            mutationFn: ({provinceId: _, zoneId: ee}) => Ie("PUT", `/api/admin/provinces/${_}/zone`, {
                shipping_zone_id: ee
            }),

                    queryKey: ["/api/admin/provinces"]
                }),

                })
            },

                    description: _.message,

                })
            }
        }),
        $ = _ => {
            i(_),
            G.reset({
                name: _.name,
                description: _.description || "",
                base_price: parseFloat(_.base_price),
                is_active: _.is_active,
                free_shipping_threshold: _.free_shipping_threshold ? parseFloat(_.free_shipping_threshold) : 0,

                estimated_days: _.estimated_days || 3,
                instructions: _.instructions || ""
            }),
            l(!0)
        },
        re = _ => {
            confirm("¿Estás seguro de que quieres eliminar este método de envío y todas sus tarifas?") && B.mutate(_)
        },
        R = _ => {
            d(_),
            L.reset({
                name: _.name,
                description: _.description || "",
                sort_order: _.sort_order,
                is_active: _.is_active
            }),
            m(!0)
        },
        M = _ => {
            confirm("¿Estás seguro de que quieres eliminar esta zona de envío? Se desasignarán todas las provincias.") && k.mutate(_)
        },
        K = _ => {
            a ? z.mutate({
                id: a.id,
                data: _
            }) : I.mutate(_)
        },
        oe = _ => {
            c ? T.mutate({
                id: c.id,
                data: _
            }) : F.mutate(_)
        },
        be = (_, ee) => {
            const H = ee === "" ? null : parseInt(ee);
            D.mutate({
                provinceId: _,
                zoneId: H
            })
        },
        Se = async () => {
            await r(),
            n("/login")
        };

                        })
                    })]

                    value: "zone-rates",

                                    children: e.jsx(U, {

                        })]

                                }), e.jsxs(A, {

                                    },

                                })]

                                className: "text-center py-8",

                                }), e.jsx("p", {

                                    children: "Cargando tarifas..."
                                })]
                            }) : e.jsxs(Bs, {

                                        }), e.jsx(pe, {

                                        })]

                                        })
                                    })]
                                })]
                            })
                        })]
                    })]
                })]
            })]
        })]
    })
}
const BW = () => {
        const {toast: t} = tt(),
            s = hr(),
            [r, n] = h.useState(!1),
            [a, i] = h.useState("config"),
            {data: o, isLoading: l} = _e({
                queryKey: ["/api/admin/email-config"],
                queryFn: async () => {
                    const C = await fetch("/api/admin/email-config");
                    if (!C.ok)
                        throw new Error("Error al cargar configuración de correos");
                    return C.json()
                }
            }),
            {data: c, isLoading: d, refetch: u} = _e({
                queryKey: ["/api/admin/email-logs"],
                queryFn: async () => {
                    const C = await fetch("/api/admin/email-logs?limit=50");
                    if (!C.ok)
                        throw new Error("Error al cargar logs de correos");
                    return C.json()
                },
                enabled: a === "history"
            }),
            m = rt({
                mutationFn: async C => {
                    const S = await fetch("/api/admin/email-config", {
                        method: "POST",
                        headers: {
                            "Content-Type": "application/json"
                        },
                        body: JSON.stringify(C)
                    });
                    if (!S.ok)
                        throw new Error("Error al guardar configuración");
                    return S.json()
                },
                onSuccess: () => {
                    t({
                        title: "Configuración guardada",
                        description: "La configuración de correos se ha guardado correctamente"
                    }),
                    s.invalidateQueries({
                        queryKey: ["/api/admin/email-config"]
                    })
                },
                onError: C => {
                    t({
                        title: "Error",
                        description: "Error al guardar la configuración",
                        variant: "destructive"
                    })
                }
            }),
            f = rt({
                mutationFn: async () => {
                    const C = await fetch("/api/admin/email-config/test", {
                        method: "POST"
                    });
                    if (!C.ok)
                        throw new Error("Error al probar configuración");
                    return C.json()
                },
                onSuccess: () => {
                    t({
                        title: "Prueba exitosa",
                        description: "El correo de prueba se ha enviado correctamente"
                    }),
                    a === "history" && u()
                },
                onError: C => {
                    t({
                        title: "Error en la prueba",
                        description: "Error al enviar el correo de prueba",
                        variant: "destructive"
                    })
                }
            }),
            y = rt({
                mutationFn: async C => {
                    const S = await fetch(`/api/admin/email-logs/${C}`, {
                        method: "DELETE"
                    });
                    if (!S.ok)
                        throw new Error("Error al eliminar log");
                    return S.json()
                },
                onSuccess: () => {
                    t({
                        title: "Log eliminado",
                        description: "El log se ha eliminado correctamente"
                    }),
                    u()
                },
                onError: C => {
                    t({
                        title: "Error",
                        description: "Error al eliminar el log",
                        variant: "destructive"
                    })
                }
            }),
            g = rt({
                mutationFn: async () => {
                    const C = await fetch("/api/admin/email-logs", {
                        method: "DELETE"
                    });
                    if (!C.ok)
                        throw new Error("Error al limpiar historial");
                    return C.json()
                },
                onSuccess: () => {
                    t({
                        title: "Historial limpiado",
                        description: "Todo el historial de correos se ha eliminado"
                    }),
                    u()
                },
                onError: C => {
                    t({
                        title: "Error",
                        description: "Error al limpiar el historial",
                        variant: "destructive"
                    })
                }
            }),
            x = (C, S) => {
                m.mutate({
                    key: C,
                    value: S
                })
            },
            b = async () => {
                n(!0);
                try {
                    await f.mutateAsync()
                } finally {
                    n(!1)
                }
            },
            j = C => {
                const S = o == null ? void 0 : o.find(E => E.key === C);
                return (S == null ? void 0 : S.value) || ""
            },
            p = C => {
                const S = o == null ? void 0 : o.find(E => E.key === C);
                return (S == null ? void 0 : S.isActive) || !1
            },
            v = C => new Date(C).toLocaleString("es-ES", {
                year: "numeric",
                month: "short",
                day: "numeric",
                hour: "2-digit",
                minute: "2-digit"
            }),
            N = C => {
                switch (C) {
                case "sent":
                    return e.jsx(ge, {
                        variant: "default",
                        className: "bg-green-100 text-green-800",
                        children: "Enviado"
                    });
                case "failed":
                    return e.jsx(ge, {
                        variant: "destructive",
                        children: "Error"
                    });
                case "pending":
                    return e.jsx(ge, {
                        variant: "secondary",
                        children: "Pendiente"
                    });
                default:
                    return e.jsx(ge, {
                        variant: "outline",
                        children: C
                    })
                }
            },
            w = C => {
                switch (C) {
                case "contact_form":
                    return "Formulario de contacto";
                case "order_confirmation":
                    return "Confirmación de pedido";
                case "order_notification":
                    return "Notificación de pedido";
                case "test":
                    return "Prueba";
                default:
                    return C
                }
            };
        return l ? e.jsxs("div", {
            className: "flex min-h-screen bg-gray-100",
            children: [e.jsx(Fs, {}), e.jsx("div", {
                className: "flex-1 p-8",
                children: e.jsx("div", {
                    className: "flex items-center justify-center h-64",
                    children: e.jsx("div", {
                        className: "animate-spin h-12 w-12 border-4 border-primary border-t-transparent rounded-full"
                    })
                })
            })]
        }) : e.jsxs("div", {
            className: "flex min-h-screen bg-gray-100",
            children: [e.jsx(Fs, {}), e.jsxs("div", {
                className: "flex-1 p-8",
                children: [e.jsxs("div", {
                    className: "flex justify-between items-center mb-8",
                    children: [e.jsxs("div", {
                        children: [e.jsx("h1", {
                            className: "text-3xl font-montserrat font-bold",
                            children: "Configuración de Correos"
                        }), e.jsx("p", {
                            className: "text-muted-foreground",
                            children: "Configura las direcciones de correo para notificaciones y formularios"
                        })]
                    }), e.jsxs("div", {
                        className: "flex items-center gap-2",
                        children: [a === "history" && e.jsxs(A, {
                            onClick: () => u(),
                            variant: "outline",
                            size: "sm",
                            className: "flex items-center gap-2",
                            children: [e.jsx(gt, {
                                className: "h-4 w-4"
                            }), "Actualizar"]
                        }), a === "messages" && e.jsxs(A, {
                            onClick: () => refetchMessages(),
                            variant: "outline",
                            size: "sm",
                            className: "flex items-center gap-2",
                            children: [e.jsx(gt, {
                                className: "h-4 w-4"
                            }), "Actualizar"]
                        }), e.jsxs(A, {
                            onClick: b,
                            disabled: r,
                            variant: "outline",
                            className: "flex items-center gap-2",
                            children: [e.jsx(Ph, {
                                className: "h-4 w-4"
                            }), r ? "Probando..." : "Probar configuración"]
                        })]
                    })]
                }), e.jsxs(ls, {
                    value: a,
                    onValueChange: i,
                    className: "w-full",
                    children: [e.jsxs(es, {
                        className: "grid w-full grid-cols-2",
                        children: [e.jsxs(Ve, {
                            value: "config",
                            className: "flex items-center gap-2",
                            children: [e.jsx(Os, {
                                className: "h-4 w-4"
                            }), "Configuración"]
                        }), e.jsxs(Ve, {
                            value: "history",
