    },
    HW = () => {
        const {toast: t} = tt(),
            [s, r] = h.useState(!1),
            [n, a] = h.useState(!1),
            [i, o] = h.useState({
                id: "1",
                bannerEnabled: !0,
                bannerMessage: "Utilizamos cookies para mejorar tu experiencia en nuestro sitio web. Al continuar navegando, aceptas nuestro uso de cookies.",
                bannerPosition: "bottom",
                bannerStyle: "detailed",
                privacyPolicyUrl: "/politica-privacidad",
                cookiePolicyUrl: "/politica-cookies",
                consentDuration: 365,
                necessaryCookies: {
                    enabled: !0,
                    description: "Cookies esenciales para el funcionamiento básico del sitio web",
                    cookies: ["session", "csrf_token", "cart_data"]
                },
                analyticsCookies: {
                    enabled: !1,
                    description: "Cookies para análisis y métricas del sitio web",
                    cookies: ["_ga", "_gid", "_gat"],
                    googleAnalyticsId: ""
                },
                marketingCookies: {
                    enabled: !1,
                    description: "Cookies para publicidad y marketing dirigido",
                    cookies: ["_fb", "_twitter", "advertising_id"]
                },
                preferencesCookies: {
                    enabled: !1,
                    description: "Cookies para recordar preferencias del usuario",
                    cookies: ["theme", "language", "layout_preferences"]
                }
            }),
            l = async () => {
                a(!0);
                try {
                    await new Promise(m => setTimeout(m, 1e3)),
                    localStorage.setItem("adminCookieConfig", JSON.stringify(i)),
                    t({
                        title: "Configuración guardada",
                        description: "La configuración de cookies se ha guardado correctamente."
                    })
                } catch {
                    t({
                        title: "Error al guardar",
                        description: "No se pudo guardar la configuración de cookies.",
                        variant: "destructive"
                    })
                } finally {
                    a(!1)
                }
            },
            c = async () => {
                r(!0);
                try {
                    await new Promise(f => setTimeout(f, 500));
                    const m = localStorage.getItem("adminCookieConfig");
                    m && o(JSON.parse(m))
                } catch {
                    t({
                        title: "Error al cargar",
                        description: "No se pudo cargar la configuración de cookies.",
                        variant: "destructive"
                    })
                } finally {
                    r(!1)
                }
            },
            d = () => {
                localStorage.removeItem("cookieConsent"),
                localStorage.removeItem("cookiePreferences"),
                t({
                    title: "Consentimiento restablecido",
                    description: "Se ha eliminado el consentimiento de cookies. Recarga la página para ver el banner nuevamente."
                })
            },
            u = (m, f) => {
                o(y => {
                    const g = {
                            ...y
                        },
                        x = m.split(".");
                    let b = g;
                    for (let j = 0; j < x.length - 1; j++)
                        b = b[x[j]];
                    return b[x[x.length - 1]] = f, g
                })
            };
        return h.useEffect(() => {
            c()
        }, []), e.jsxs("div", {
            className: "flex min-h-screen bg-gray-50",
            children: [e.jsx(Fs, {
                activeTab: "admin_cookie_settings"
            }), e.jsxs("div", {
                className: "flex-1 p-8 space-y-6",
                children: [e.jsxs("div", {
                    className: "flex items-center justify-between",
                    children: [e.jsxs("div", {
                        children: [e.jsx("h1", {
                            className: "text-3xl font-bold",
                            children: "Configuración de Cookies"
                        }), e.jsx("p", {
                            className: "text-muted-foreground",
                            children: "Gestiona el consentimiento de cookies y las políticas de privacidad"
                        })]
                    }), e.jsxs("div", {
                        className: "flex gap-2",
                        children: [e.jsxs(A, {
                            variant: "outline",
                            onClick: c,
                            disabled: s,
                            children: [e.jsx(gt, {
                                className: `h-4 w-4 mr-2 ${s ? "animate-spin" : ""}`
                            }), "Recargar"]
                        }), e.jsxs(A, {
                            onClick: l,
                            disabled: n,
                            children: [e.jsx(Nn, {
                                className: `h-4 w-4 mr-2 ${n ? "animate-spin" : ""}`
                            }), n ? "Guardando..." : "Guardar configuración"]
                        })]
                    })]
                }), e.jsxs(ls, {
                    defaultValue: "general",
                    className: "w-full",
                    children: [e.jsxs(es, {
                        className: "grid w-full grid-cols-4",
                        children: [e.jsx(Ve, {
                            value: "general",
                            children: "General"
                        }), e.jsx(Ve, {
                            value: "categories",
                            children: "Categorías"
                        }), e.jsx(Ve, {
                            value: "appearance",
                            children: "Apariencia"
                        }), e.jsx(Ve, {
                            value: "tools",
                            children: "Herramientas"
                        })]
                    }), e.jsx(ze, {
                        value: "general",
                        className: "space-y-6",
                        children: e.jsxs(V, {
                            children: [e.jsx(ne, {
                                children: e.jsxs(ae, {
                                    className: "flex items-center gap-2",
                                    children: [e.jsx(Us, {
                                        className: "h-5 w-5"
                                    }), "Configuración General"]
                                })
                            }), e.jsxs(U, {
                                className: "space-y-4",
                                children: [e.jsxs("div", {

                                            children: "Habilitar banner de cookies"
                                        }), e.jsx("p", {
                                            className: "text-sm text-muted-foreground",
                                            children: "Mostrar el banner de consentimiento de cookies"
                                        })]
                                    }), e.jsx(St, {
                                        checked: i.bannerEnabled,
                                        onCheckedChange: m => u("bannerEnabled", m)
                                    })]
                                }), e.jsxs("div", {
                                    className: "space-y-2",
                                    children: [e.jsx(q, {
                                        children: "Mensaje del banner"

                                        onChange: m => u("bannerMessage", m.target.value),

                                }), e.jsxs("div", {

                                        })]

                                        })]

                                        children: "Duración del consentimiento (días)"
                                    }), e.jsx(te, {
                                        type: "number",
                                        value: i.consentDuration,
                                        onChange: m => u("consentDuration", parseInt(m.target.value)),
                                        placeholder: "365",
                                        min: "1",
                                        max: "1095"
                                    }), e.jsx("p", {
                                        className: "text-sm text-muted-foreground",
                                        children: "Tiempo antes de que se vuelva a solicitar el consentimiento"
                                    })]

                    }), e.jsx(ze, {
                        value: "categories",

                        children: e.jsxs("div", {
                            className: "grid gap-6",

                    })]
                })]
            })]
        })
    };
function WW() {
    const [, t] = dt(),
        {user: s, logout: r} = Ps(),
        n = (s == null ? void 0 : s.isAdmin) || !1,
        a = s !== null,
        {toast: i} = tt(),
        o = async () => {
            try {
                await r(),
                t("/admin")
            } catch (z) {
                console.error("Error during logout:", z)
            }
        },
        [l, c] = h.useState("0"),
        [d, u] = h.useState("1000"),
        [m, f] = h.useState(new Date(2e3, 0, 1)),
        [y, g] = h.useState("recovery"),
        [x, b] = h.useState(null),
        [j, p] = h.useState(!0),
        v = async () => {
            try {
                p(!0);
                const z = await Dc.getConfig();
                b(z),
                console.log("Configuración de API cargada:", z),
                i({
                    title: "Configuración cargada",
                    description: `API Key: ${z.apiKey.substring(0, 8)}... | ID Empresa: ${z.companyId}`,
                    variant: "default"
                })
            } catch (z) {
                console.error("Error al cargar la configuración de la API:", z),
                i({
                    title: "Error",
                    description: "No se pudo cargar la configuración de la API",
                    variant: "destructive"
                })
            } finally {
                p(!1)
            }
        };
    h.useEffect(() => {
        a && n && v()
    }, [a, n]),
    h.useEffect(() => {
        if (x) {
            const z = JSON.parse(JSON.stringify(E));
            z.forEach(B => {
                B.tests.forEach(F => {
                    "apikey" in F.headers && (F.headers.apikey = x.apiKey),
                    "idempresa" in F.headers && (F.headers.idempresa = x.companyId)
                })
            }),
            O(z)
        }
    }, [x]);
    const N = z => {
            try {
                const B = JSON.stringify(z.response, null, 2),
                    F = new Blob([B], {
                        type: "application/json"
                    }),
                    T = URL.createObjectURL(F),
                    k = document.createElement("a");
                k.href = T,
                k.download = `${z.name}_${new Date().toISOString().slice(0, 16).replace(/:/g, "-")}.json`,
                document.body.appendChild(k),
                k.click(),
                document.body.removeChild(k),
                i({
                    title: "Archivo JSON exportado",
                    description: "El archivo se ha descargado correctamente",
                    variant: "default"
                })
            } catch (B) {
                console.error("Error al exportar JSON:", B),
                i({
                    title: "Error al exportar",
                    description: "No se pudo generar el archivo JSON",
                    variant: "destructive"
                })
            }
        },
        w = z => {
            if (!z || z.length === 0)
                return "";
            const B = z.filter(D => D && typeof D == "object");
            if (B.length === 0)
                return "";
            const F = new Set;
            for (const D of B)
                if (D && typeof D == "object")
                    for (const $ of Object.keys(D))
                        F.add($);
            const T = Array.from(F),
                k = [T.join(",")];
            for (const D of B) {
                const $ = [];
                for (const re of T) {
                    let R = "";
                    if (D.hasOwnProperty(re)) {
                        const M = D[re];
                        M == null ? R = "" : typeof M == "object" ? R = `"${JSON.stringify(M).replace(/"/g, '""')}"` : R = `"${String(M).replace(/"/g, '""')}"`
                    }
                    $.push(R)
                }
                k.push($.join(","))
            }
            return k.join(`
`
            )
        },
        C = z => {
            var B,
                F,
                T,
                k,
                D,
                $;
            try {
                let re = "",
                    R = `${z.name}_${new Date().toISOString().slice(0, 16).replace(/:/g, "-")}.csv`;
                (F = (B = z.response) == null ? void 0 : B.data) != null && F.piezas && z.response.data.piezas.length > 0 ? (re = w(z.response.data.piezas), R = `piezas_${R}`) : (k = (T = z.response) == null ? void 0 : T.data) != null && k.vehiculos && z.response.data.vehiculos.length > 0 ? (re = w(z.response.data.vehiculos), R = `vehiculos_${R}`) : Array.isArray((D = z.response) == null ? void 0 : D.data) ? re = w(z.response.data) : re = w([(($ = z.response) == null ? void 0 : $.data) || {}]);
                const M = new Blob([re], {
                        type: "text/csv;charset=utf-8;"
                    }),
                    K = URL.createObjectURL(M),
                    oe = document.createElement("a");
                oe.href = K,
                oe.download = R,
                document.body.appendChild(oe),
                oe.click(),
                document.body.removeChild(oe),
                i({
                    title: "Archivo CSV exportado",
                    description: "El archivo se ha descargado correctamente",
                    variant: "default"
                })
            } catch (re) {

                i({
                    title: "Error al exportar",
                    description: "No se pudo generar el archivo CSV",
                    variant: "destructive"
                })
            }

            try {
                const z = await fetch("/api/config");
                if (!z.ok)
                    throw new Error("Error al obtener la configuración de API");
                const B = await z.json();
                O(F => F.map(T => ({
                    ...T,
                    tests: T.tests.map(k => ({
                        ...k,
                        headers: {
                            ...k.headers,
                            apikey: B.apiKey
                        }
                    }))
                })))
            } catch (z) {

                i({

        },
        L = (z, B, F) => {
            O(T => {
                const k = T.findIndex(re => re.id === z);
                if (k === -1)
                    return T;
                const D = T[k].tests.findIndex(re => re.id === B);
                if (D === -1)
                    return T;
                const $ = [...T];
                return $[k].tests[D].body = F, $
            })
        },
        I = async (z, B) => {
            const F = E.findIndex(k => k.id === z);
            if (F === -1)
                return;
            const T = E[F].tests.findIndex(k => k.id === B);
            if (T !== -1) {
                O(k => {
                    const D = [...k];
                    return D[F].tests[T].loading = !0, D[F].tests[T].error = void 0, D[F].tests[T].success = void 0, D
                });
                try {
                    const {headers: k, body: D, requiresBody: $} = E[F].tests[T];
                    let re = {};
                    if ($ && D)
                        try {
                            re = {
                                ...k,
                                body: JSON.parse(D)
                            }
                        } catch {
                            i({
                                title: "Error en el formato del body",
                                description: "El formato JSON del body no es válido",
                                variant: "destructive"
                            }),
                            O(oe => {
                                const be = [...oe];
                                return be[F].tests[T].loading = !1, be[F].tests[T].error = "Error en el formato JSON del body", be
                            });
                            return
                        }
                    else
                        re = k;
                    const R = await fetch(E[F].tests[T].endpoint, {
                            method: "POST",
                            headers: {
                                "Content-Type": "application/json"
                            },
                            body: JSON.stringify(re)
                        }),
                        M = await R.json();
                    O(K => {
                        const oe = [...K];
                        return oe[F].tests[T].loading = !1, oe[F].tests[T].response = M, oe[F].tests[T].success = R.ok, R.ok || (oe[F].tests[T].error = M.error || "Error desconocido"), oe
                    }),
                    R.ok ? i({
                        title: "Test ejecutado correctamente",
                        description: `${E[F].tests[T].name} completado con éxito.`
                    }) : i({
                        title: "Error al ejecutar test",
                        description: M.error || "Error desconocido",
                        variant: "destructive"
                    })
                } catch (k) {
                    console.error("Error running test:", k),
                    O(D => {
                        const $ = [...D];
                        return $[F].tests[T].loading = !1, $[F].tests[T].error = k instanceof Error ? k.message : "Error desconocido", $[F].tests[T].success = !1, $
                    }),
                    i({
                        title: "Error al ejecutar test",
                        description: k instanceof Error ? k.message : "Error desconocido",
                        variant: "destructive"
                    })
                }
            }
        };
    return ke.useEffect(() => {
        a && n && G()
    }, [a, n]), ke.useEffect(() => {
        O(z => z.map(B => ({
            ...B,
            tests: B.tests.map(F => ({
                ...F,
                headers: {
                    ...F.headers,
                    fecha: S
                }
            }))
        })))
    }, [S]), ke.useEffect(() => {
        O(z => z.map(B => ({
            ...B,
            tests: B.tests.map(F => "lastid" in F.headers && "offset" in F.headers ? {
                ...F,
                headers: {
                    ...F.headers,
                    lastid: l,
                    offset: d
                }
            } : F)
        })))
    }, [l, d]), !a || !n ? e.jsx("div", {
        className: "flex min-h-screen flex-col",
        children: e.jsxs("div", {
            className: "container flex flex-col items-center justify-center flex-1 px-4 py-16",
            children: [e.jsx("h1", {
                className: "text-2xl font-bold mb-4",
                children: "Acceso denegado"
            }), e.jsx("p", {

            })]
        })
    }) : e.jsxs("div", {
        className: "flex min-h-screen bg-gray-100",
        children: [e.jsx(Fs, {}), e.jsxs("div", {
            className: "flex-1 p-8",
            children: [e.jsxs("div", {
                className: "flex justify-between items-center mb-8",
                children: [e.jsxs("div", {
                    children: [e.jsx("h1", {
                        className: "text-3xl font-montserrat font-bold",
                        children: "Tester de API Metasync"
                    }), e.jsx("p", {
                        className: "text-muted-foreground",
                        children: "Prueba todos los endpoints de la API Metasync y visualiza los resultados"
                    }), e.jsxs("div", {
                        className: "mt-2 text-sm p-2 rounded border border-amber-200 bg-amber-50 text-amber-700",
                        children: [e.jsx("strong", {
                            children: "Nota:"
                        }), " Para recuperar vehículos, usar RecuperarCambiosCanalEmpresa, ya que también contiene datos de vehículos y el endpoint RecuperarCambiosVehiculosCanalEmpresa puede no responder correctamente."]
                    })]
                }), e.jsxs(A, {
                    variant: "outline",
                    onClick: o,
                    children: [e.jsx(Ea, {
                        className: "mr-2 h-4 w-4"
                    }), "Cerrar sesión"]
                })]
            }), e.jsxs(V, {
                className: "mb-6",
                children: [e.jsxs(ne, {
                    children: [e.jsx(ae, {
                        children: "Parámetros globales"
                    }), e.jsx(qt, {
                        children: "Estos parámetros se aplican a todos los tests según corresponda"
                    }), e.jsxs("div", {
                        className: "flex items-center justify-end mt-2",
                        children: [e.jsxs(A, {
                            variant: "outline",
                            size: "sm",
                            onClick: v,
                            disabled: j,
                            className: "flex items-center gap-1",
                            children: [j ? e.jsx(Xt, {
                                className: "h-4 w-4 animate-spin"
                            }) : e.jsx(gt, {
                                className: "h-4 w-4"
                            }), "Actualizar Configuración"]
                        }), x && e.jsxs("div", {

                        })]
                    })]

                            }), e.jsx(ib, {

                                                    className: "mr-2 h-4 w-4 animate-spin"
                                                }), "Ejecutar"]
                                            })
                                        })]

                                        className: "mb-4",
                                        children: [e.jsx("h4", {
                                            className: "text-sm font-medium mb-2",
                                            children: "Headers"
                                        }), e.jsx("div", {
                                            className: "bg-muted p-3 rounded-md overflow-x-auto",
                                            children: e.jsx("pre", {
                                                className: "text-xs",
                                                children: JSON.stringify(B.headers, null, 2)
                                            })
                                        })]
                                    }), B.requiresBody && e.jsxs("div", {
                                        className: "mb-4 border-t pt-4",
                                        children: [e.jsx("div", {
                                            className: "flex justify-between items-center mb-2",
                                            children: e.jsx("h4", {
                                                className: "text-sm font-medium",
                                                children: "Body (JSON)"
                                            })
                                        }), e.jsx("div", {
                                            className: "border border-input rounded-md",
                                            children: e.jsx("textarea", {
                                                className: "w-full p-3 font-mono text-xs bg-background resize-y min-h-[200px]",
                                                value: B.body || "",
                                                onChange: F => L(z.id, B.id, F.target.value),
                                                placeholder: "Escribe el body en formato JSON"
                                            })
                                        }), e.jsx("p", {
                                            className: "text-xs text-muted-foreground mt-1",
                                            children: "El body debe estar en formato JSON válido"
                                        })]
                                    }), B.response && e.jsxs("div", {
                                        className: "border-t pt-4 mt-4",
                                        children: [e.jsxs("div", {
                                            className: "flex justify-between items-center mb-2",
                                            children: [e.jsxs("h4", {
                                                className: "text-sm font-medium flex items-center",
                                                children: ["Resultado", B.success ? e.jsx(zt, {
                                                    className: "ml-2 h-4 w-4 text-green-500"
                                                }) : e.jsx(Sa, {
                                                    className: "ml-2 h-4 w-4 text-red-500"
                                                })]
                                            }), e.jsxs("div", {
                                                className: "flex gap-2",
                                                children: [e.jsx(A, {
                                                    variant: "outline",
                                                    size: "sm",
                                                    onClick: () => N(B),
                                                    children: "Exportar JSON"
                                                }), e.jsx(A, {
                                                    variant: "outline",
                                                    size: "sm",
                                                    onClick: () => C(B),
                                                    children: "Exportar CSV"
                                                })]
                                            })]
                                        }), B.error ? e.jsx("div", {
                                            className: "bg-red-50 text-red-500 p-3 rounded-md overflow-x-auto",
                                            children: e.jsx("pre", {
                                                className: "text-xs",
                                                children: B.error
                                            })
                                        }) : e.jsx("div", {
                                            className: "bg-muted p-3 rounded-md overflow-x-auto max-h-96",
                                            children: e.jsx("pre", {
                                                className: "text-xs",
                                                children: JSON.stringify(B.response, null, 2)
                                            })
                                        })]
                                    })]
                                }, B.id))
                            })
                        })]
                    })
                }, z.id))]
            })]
        })]
    })
}
var ub = "Radio",

    [KW, YW] = GW(ub),
    sM = h.forwardRef((t, s) => {
        const {__scopeRadio: r, name: n, checked: a=!1, required: i, disabled: o, value: l="on", onCheck: c, form: d, ...u} = t,
            [m, f] = h.useState(null),
            y = ot(s, b => f(b)),
            g = h.useRef(!1),
            x = m ? d || !!m.closest("form") : !0;
        return e.jsxs(KW, {
            scope: r,
            checked: a,
            disabled: o,
            children: [e.jsx(De.button, {
                type: "button",
                role: "radio",

                disabled: o,

                ...u,
                ref: y,

                    a || c == null || c(),
                    x && (g.current = b.isPropagationStopped(), g.current || b.stopPropagation())
                })
            }), x && e.jsx(QW, {

var rM = "RadioIndicator",

            i = YW(rM, r);

var QW = t => {
    const {control: s, checked: r, bubbles: n=!0, ...a} = t,
        i = h.useRef(null),
        o = Ip(r),
        l = Sp(s);
    return h.useEffect(() => {
        const c = i.current,
            d = window.HTMLInputElement.prototype,
            m = Object.getOwnPropertyDescriptor(d, "checked").set;
        if (o !== r && m) {
            const f = new Event("click", {
                bubbles: n
            });
            m.call(c, r),
            c.dispatchEvent(f)
        }
    }, [o, r, n]), e.jsx("input", {
        type: "radio",
        "aria-hidden": !0,
        defaultChecked: r,
        ...a,
        tabIndex: -1,
        ref: i,
        style: {
            ...t.style,
            ...l,
            position: "absolute",
            pointerEvents: "none",
            opacity: 0,
            margin: 0
        }
    })
};
function aM(t) {
    return t ? "checked" : "unchecked"
}

const $1 = "guestSessionId";
function rG() {
    const t = Date.now().toString(36),
        s = Math.random().toString(36).substring(2, 15);
    return `guest_${t}_${s}`
}
function vy() {
    let t = localStorage.getItem($1);
    return t || (t = rG(), localStorage.setItem($1, t)), t
}
function nG() {
    const {toast: t} = tt(),
        {items: s, clearCart: r, setItems: n} = yl(),
        [, a] = dt(),
        [i, o] = h.useState([]),
        [l, c] = h.useState([]),
        [d, u] = h.useState([]),
        [m, f] = h.useState(!0),
        [y, g] = h.useState(!1),
        [x, b] = h.useState(0),
        [j, p] = h.useState(!1),
        [v, N] = h.useState("guest"),
        [w, C] = h.useState(""),
        [S, E] = h.useState(""),
        [O, G] = h.useState(!1),
        [L, I] = h.useState(null),
        [z, B] = h.useState(null),
        [F, T] = h.useState(!1),
        [k, D] = h.useState({
            customerName: "",
            customerLastName: "",
            customerEmail: "",
            customerPhone: "",
            shippingAddress: "",
            shippingCity: "",
            shippingProvince: "",
            shippingPostalCode: "",
            billingAddress: "",
            billingCity: "",
            billingProvince: "",
            billingPostalCode: "",
            useSameAddress: !0,
            paymentMethodId: "",
            shippingMethodId: "",
            notes: "",
            createAccount: !1,
            password: ""
        });
    h.useEffect(() => {
        if (re(), $(), s.length === 0) {
            const _ = sessionStorage.getItem("backup_cart_data");
            if (_)
                try {
                    const ee = JSON.parse(_);
                    Array.isArray(ee) && ee.length > 0 && (console.log("🔄 Restaurando carrito desde backup en checkout:", ee.length, "items"), n(ee), sessionStorage.removeItem("backup_cart_data"))
                } catch (ee) {
                    console.error("Error restaurando carrito en checkout:", ee)
                }
        }
    }, []),
    h.useEffect(() => {
        k.shippingProvince && s.length > 0 && R()
    }, [k.shippingProvince, s]);
    const $ = async () => {
            try {
                const _ = await fetch("/api/auth/me", {
                    credentials: "include"
                });
                if (_.ok) {
                    const ee = await _.json();
                    I(ee);
                    const H = await fetch("/api/user/permissions", {
                        credentials: "include"
                    });
                    if (H.ok) {
                        const se = await H.json();
                        B(se)
                    }
                    ee && (D(se => ({
                        ...se,
                        customerName: ee.firstName || "",
                        customerLastName: ee.lastName || "",
                        customerEmail: ee.email || "",
                        customerPhone: ee.phone || "",
                        shippingAddress: ee.address || "",
                        shippingCity: ee.city || "",
                        shippingProvince: ee.province || "",
                        shippingPostalCode: ee.postalCode || "",
                        billingAddress: ee.billingAddress || ee.address || "",
                        billingCity: ee.billingCity || ee.city || "",
                        billingProvince: ee.billingProvince || ee.province || "",
                        billingPostalCode: ee.billingPostalCode || ee.postalCode || "",
                        useSameAddress: !ee.billingAddress
                    })), N("authenticated"))
                }
            } catch (_) {
                console.error("Error checking user auth:", _)
            }
        },
        re = async () => {
            try {
                const [_, ee] = await Promise.all([Ie("GET", "/api/payment-modules/demo"), Ie("GET", "/api/provinces")]),
                    H = await _.json(),
                    se = await ee.json();
                o(H),
                u(se),
                H.length > 0 && D(de => ({
                    ...de,
                    paymentMethodId: H[0].provider
                }))
            } catch (_) {
                console.error("Error loading methods:", _),
                t({
                    title: "Error",
                    description: "No se pudieron cargar los métodos de pago y provincias",
                    variant: "destructive"
                })
            } finally {
                f(!1)
            }
        },
        R = async () => {
            if (!(!k.shippingProvince || s.length === 0)) {
                p(!0),
                console.log(`🚚 Calculando envío para ${s.length} items distintos:`),
                s.forEach(_ => {
                    console.log(`  - ID: ${_.partId}, Código: ${_.partCode}, Cantidad: ${_.quantity}, Peso almacenado: ${_.partWeight}g`)
                });
                try {
                    const _ = await Promise.all(s.map(async se => {
                        let de = se.partWeight;
                        if (console.log(`Pieza ${se.partId} (${se.partCode}) - peso almacenado: ${de}g`), !de || de === 500)
                            try {
                                let he = await fetch(`/api/parts/${se.partId}`),
                                    ve = null;
                                if (he.ok)
                                    ve = await he.json();
                                else if (se.partCode && (console.log(`Buscando pieza por código: ${se.partCode}`), he = await fetch(`/api/search-parts?search=${encodeURIComponent(se.partCode)}&limit=1`), he.ok)) {
                                    const lt = await he.json();
                                    lt.data && lt.data.length > 0 && (ve = lt.data[0], console.log(`Encontrada pieza por código ${se.partCode}: ID ${ve.id}, peso ${ve.peso}g`))
                                }
                                if (ve) {
                                    const lt = ve.peso ? parseInt(ve.peso.toString()) : null;
                                    console.log(`Pieza ${se.partId} - peso de API: ${lt}g`),
                                    de = lt || 500
                                } else
                                    console.log(`Pieza ${se.partId} - no encontrada, usando 500g por defecto`),
                                    de = 500
                            } catch (he) {
                                console.error("Error fetching part weight:", he),
                                de = 500
                            }
                        const le = de * se.quantity;
                        return console.log(`Pieza ${se.partId} - peso final: ${de}g × ${se.quantity} = ${le}g`), {
                            partId: se.partId,
                            quantity: se.quantity,
                            price: se.price,
                            peso: de
                        }
                    }));
                    console.log("📤 Enviando datos al servidor para cálculo de envío:"),
                    console.log("  - Provincia:", k.shippingProvince),
                    console.log("  - Items del carrito:", _),
                    console.log("  - Total items:", _.length),
                    _.forEach((se, de) => {
                        console.log(`    [${de}] ID: ${se.partId}, Cantidad: ${se.quantity}, Peso unitario: ${se.peso}g, Peso total: ${se.peso * se.quantity}g`)
                    });
                    const H = await (await Ie("POST", "/api/shipping/calculate", {
                        province: k.shippingProvince,
                        cartItems: _,
                        postalCode: k.shippingPostalCode
                    })).json();
                    if (H.shippingOptions && (c(H.shippingOptions), H.shippingOptions.length > 0)) {
                        const se = H.shippingOptions[0];
                        D(de => ({
                            ...de,
                            shippingMethodId: se.id.toString()
                        })),
                        b(se.cost)
                    }
                } catch (_) {
                    console.error("Error calculating shipping options:", _),
                    t({
                        title: "Error",
                        description: "No se pudieron calcular las opciones de envío",
                        variant: "destructive"
                    }),
                    c([])
                } finally {
                    p(!1)
                }
            }
        },
        M = async _ => {
            if (_.preventDefault(), T(!0), g(!0), !be()) {
                g(!1),
                t({
                    title: "Error en el formulario",
                    description: "Por favor, completa todos los campos obligatorios antes de continuar.",
                    variant: "destructive"
                });
                return
            }
            try {
                const ee = s.reduce((le, he) => le + he.price * he.quantity, 0),
                    H = i.find(le => le.provider === k.paymentMethodId);

                    throw new Error("Método de pago no seleccionado");

                    de = {
                        customerName: k.customerName,
                        customerLastName: k.customerLastName,
                        customerEmail: k.customerEmail,
                        customerPhone: k.customerPhone,

                        shippingCity: k.shippingCity,

                            partId: le.partId,
                            quantity: le.quantity,
                            price: le.price,
                            partName: le.partName
                        })),

                        shippingCost: x.toString(),
                        total: (ee + x).toString(),

                        password: k.password,

                    };
                if (H.provider === "stripe") {

                            amount: parseFloat(de.total),
                            currency: "EUR",
                            description: "Pedido - Desguace Murcia",

                            customerName: `${de.customerName} ${de.customerLastName}`,

                                sessionId: se
                            }
                        },

                    if (he.ok) {
                        const ve = await he.json();
                        if (ve.success) {
                            sessionStorage.setItem("pending_order_data", JSON.stringify(de)),
                            window.location.href = `${ve.data.redirectUrl}&session_id=${se}`;
                            return
                        }
                    }
                } else if (H.provider === "paypal") {
                    const le = {
                            amount: parseFloat(de.total),
                            currency: "EUR",
                            description: "Pedido - Desguace Murcia",
                            customerEmail: de.customerEmail,
                            customerName: `${de.customerName} ${de.customerLastName}`,

                                sessionId: se
                            }
                        },

                    if (he.ok) {
                        const ve = await he.json();
                        if (ve.success) {
                            sessionStorage.setItem("pending_order_data", JSON.stringify(de)),
                            window.location.href = `${ve.data.redirectUrl}&session_id=${se}`;
                            return
                        }
                    }
                } else if (H.provider === "redsys") {
                    sessionStorage.setItem("backup_cart_data", JSON.stringify(s));
                    const le = await Ie("POST", "/api/orders/local", de);
                    if (le.ok) {
                        const he = await le.json(),
                            ve = {
                                id: he.id,
                                orderNumber: he.orderNumber,
                                amount: parseFloat(de.total),
                                currency: "EUR",
                                description: `Pedido #${he.orderNumber} - Desguace Murcia`,

                                cancelUrl: `${window.location.origin}/checkout?error=payment_cancelled`,
                                metadata: {
                                    orderId: he.id
                                }
                            },
                            lt = await Ie("POST", "/api/payment/redsys/process", ve);
                        if (lt.ok) {
                            const ut = await lt.json();
                            if (ut.success && ut.data.formHtml) {
                                console.log("🚨 CHECKOUT DEBUG - Enviando directamente a Redsys:", {
                                    success: ut.success,
                                    hasFormHtml: !!ut.data.formHtml,
                                    actionUrl: ut.data.actionUrl,

                                    redsysOrderNumber: ut.data.redsysOrderNumber,
                                    amount: ut.data.amount
                                });
                                const bt = document.createElement("div"),
                                    W = di.sanitize(ut.data.formHtml);
                                bt.innerHTML = W,
                                bt.style.display = "none",
                                document.body.appendChild(bt);
                                const Me = bt.querySelector("form");
                                if (Me)
                                    console.log("🚨 FORM FOUND - Submitting directly to Redsys"),
                                    document.body.appendChild(Me),
                                    Me.submit();
                                else
                                    throw console.error("❌ No se encontró el formulario en el HTML generado"), new Error("Error en la configuración del pago");
                                return
                            } else
                                throw new Error("Error al procesar el pago con Redsys")
                        } else
                            throw new Error("Error al procesar el pago con Redsys")
                    } else {
                        const he = await le.json();
                        if (le.status === 400 && he.error) {
                            let ve = "Por favor, completa todos los campos obligatorios";
                            throw he.error.includes("customerPhone") ? ve = "El teléfono es obligatorio y debe tener un formato válido" : he.error.includes("customerName") ? ve = "El nombre es obligatorio" : he.error.includes("customerLastName") ? ve = "Los apellidos son obligatorios" : he.error.includes("customerEmail") ? ve = "El email es obligatorio y debe tener un formato válido" : he.error.includes("shippingAddress") ? ve = "La dirección de envío es obligatoria" : he.error.includes("shippingCity") ? ve = "La ciudad es obligatoria" : he.error.includes("shippingProvince") ? ve = "La provincia es obligatoria" : he.error.includes("shippingPostalCode") ? ve = "El código postal es obligatorio" : he.error.includes("paymentMethodId") ? ve = "Debe seleccionar un método de pago" : he.error.includes("shippingMethodId") && (ve = "Debe seleccionar un método de envío"), new Error(ve)
                        }
                        throw new Error(he.error || "Error al crear el pedido")
                    }
                } else {
                    const le = await Ie("POST", "/api/orders/local", de);
                    if (le.ok) {
                        const he = await le.json(),
                            ve = vy();

                            title: "¡Pedido creado!",
                            description: `Tu pedido #${he.orderNumber} ha sido creado. Consulta los datos de transferencia en la página de confirmación.`
                        }), r(), a(`/order-confirmation/${he.id}?payment=bank_transfer&sessionId=${ve}`)) : H.provider === "stripe" ? (t({
                            title: "¡Pedido creado!",
                            description: `Tu pedido #${he.orderNumber} ha sido creado. Serás redirigido al pago.`
                        }), r(), a(`/order-confirmation/${he.id}?payment=stripe&sessionId=${ve}`)) : H.provider === "paypal" ? (t({

                        }), r(), a(`/order-confirmation/${he.id}?sessionId=${ve}`))

                        const he = await le.json();
                        if (le.status === 400 && he.error) {
                            let ve = "Por favor, completa todos los campos obligatorios";
                            throw he.error.includes("customerPhone") ? ve = "El teléfono es obligatorio y debe tener un formato válido" : he.error.includes("customerName") ? ve = "El nombre es obligatorio" : he.error.includes("customerLastName") ? ve = "Los apellidos son obligatorios" : he.error.includes("customerEmail") ? ve = "El email es obligatorio y debe tener un formato válido" : he.error.includes("shippingAddress") ? ve = "La dirección de envío es obligatoria" : he.error.includes("shippingCity") ? ve = "La ciudad es obligatoria" : he.error.includes("shippingProvince") ? ve = "La provincia es obligatoria" : he.error.includes("shippingPostalCode") ? ve = "El código postal es obligatorio" : he.error.includes("paymentMethodId") ? ve = "Debe seleccionar un método de pago" : he.error.includes("shippingMethodId") && (ve = "Debe seleccionar un método de envío"), new Error(ve)

            } catch (ee) {
                console.error("Error submitting order:", ee),
                t({
                    title: "Error",
                    description: ee instanceof Error ? ee.message : "No se pudo procesar el pedido. Inténtalo de nuevo.",
                    variant: "destructive"
                })
            } finally {
                g(!1)
            }
        },
        K = (_, ee) => {
            D(H => ({
                ...H,
                [_]: ee
            }))
        },
        oe = (_, ee) => {
            if (!F && (!ee || ee.trim().length === 0))
                return null;
            switch (_) {
            case "customerName":
                return !ee || ee.trim().length === 0 ? "El nombre es obligatorio" : ee.trim().length < 2 ? "El nombre debe tener al menos 2 caracteres" : null;
            case "customerLastName":
                return !ee || ee.trim().length === 0 ? "Los apellidos son obligatorios" : ee.trim().length < 2 ? "Los apellidos deben tener al menos 2 caracteres" : null;
            case "customerEmail":
                return !ee || ee.trim().length === 0 ? "El email es obligatorio" : /^[^\s@]+@[^\s@]+\.[^\s@]+$/.test(ee) ? null : "El email debe tener un formato válido";
            case "customerPhone":
                return !ee || ee.trim().length === 0 ? "El teléfono es obligatorio" : ee.trim().length < 9 ? "El teléfono debe tener al menos 9 dígitos" : null;
            case "shippingAddress":
                return !ee || ee.trim().length === 0 ? "La dirección es obligatoria" : ee.trim().length < 5 ? "La dirección debe tener al menos 5 caracteres" : null;
            case "shippingCity":
                return !ee || ee.trim().length === 0 ? "La ciudad es obligatoria" : ee.trim().length < 2 ? "La ciudad debe tener al menos 2 caracteres" : null;
            case "shippingPostalCode":
                return !ee || ee.trim().length === 0 ? "El código postal es obligatorio" : ee.trim().length < 5 ? "El código postal debe tener al menos 5 caracteres" : null;
            case "billingAddress":
                return !ee || ee.trim().length === 0 ? "La dirección de facturación es obligatoria" : ee.trim().length < 5 ? "La dirección debe tener al menos 5 caracteres" : null;
            case "billingCity":
                return !ee || ee.trim().length === 0 ? "La ciudad de facturación es obligatoria" : ee.trim().length < 2 ? "La ciudad debe tener al menos 2 caracteres" : null;
            case "billingPostalCode":
                return !ee || ee.trim().length === 0 ? "El código postal de facturación es obligatorio" : ee.trim().length < 5 ? "El código postal debe tener al menos 5 caracteres" : null;
            default:
                return null
            }
        },
        be = () => {
            const _ = ["customerName", "customerLastName", "customerEmail", "customerPhone", "shippingAddress", "shippingCity", "shippingProvince", "shippingPostalCode"];
            return k.useSameAddress || _.push("billingAddress", "billingCity", "billingProvince", "billingPostalCode"), _.every(ee => {
                const H = k[ee];
                return H && typeof H == "string" && H.trim().length > 0 && !oe(ee, H)
            }) && k.paymentMethodId && k.shippingMethodId
        },

            _.preventDefault(),
            G(!0);

                G(!1)

    }) : s.length === 0 ? e.jsx("div", {

                                                htmlFor: "customerName",
                                                children: "Nombre *"
                                            }), e.jsx(te, {
                                                id: "customerName",
                                                value: k.customerName,
                                                onChange: _ => K("customerName", _.target.value),
                                                required: !0,
                                                placeholder: "Tu nombre",
                                                className: oe("customerName", k.customerName) ? "border-red-500" : ""
                                            }), oe("customerName", k.customerName) && e.jsx("p", {
                                                className: "text-sm text-red-600 mt-1",
                                                children: oe("customerName", k.customerName)
                                            })]
                                        }), e.jsxs("div", {
                                            children: [e.jsx(q, {
                                                htmlFor: "customerLastName",
                                                children: "Apellidos *"
                                            }), e.jsx(te, {
                                                id: "customerLastName",
                                                value: k.customerLastName,
                                                onChange: _ => K("customerLastName", _.target.value),
                                                required: !0,
                                                placeholder: "Tus apellidos",
                                                className: oe("customerLastName", k.customerLastName) ? "border-red-500" : ""
                                            }), oe("customerLastName", k.customerLastName) && e.jsx("p", {
                                                className: "text-sm text-red-600 mt-1",
                                                children: oe("customerLastName", k.customerLastName)
                                            })]
                                        })]
                                    }), e.jsxs("div", {
                                        className: "grid grid-cols-1 md:grid-cols-2 gap-4",
                                        children: [e.jsxs("div", {
                                            children: [e.jsx(q, {
                                                htmlFor: "customerEmail",
                                                children: "Email *"
                                            }), e.jsx(te, {
                                                id: "customerEmail",
                                                type: "email",

                                                onChange: _ => K("customerEmail", _.target.value),
                                                required: !0,

                                            }), oe("customerEmail", k.customerEmail) && e.jsx("p", {

                                })]
                            }), e.jsxs(V, {
                                children: [e.jsx(ne, {
                                    children: e.jsxs(ae, {
                                        className: "flex items-center gap-2",

                                            className: "w-5 h-5"
                                        }), "Opciones de cuenta"]
                                    })
                                }), e.jsxs(U, {
                                    className: "space-y-4",
                                    children: [e.jsxs("div", {

                                        children: [e.jsx("input", {
                                            type: "checkbox",
                                            id: "createAccount",
                                            checked: k.createAccount,
                                            onChange: _ => D(ee => ({
                                                ...ee,
                                                createAccount: _.target.checked
                                            })),
                                            className: "rounded border-gray-300"
                                        }), e.jsx(q, {

                                                }), " Guarda tu información para futuras compras"]
                                            })]
                                        })]
                                    })]
                                })]
                            }), e.jsxs(V, {
                                children: [e.jsx(ne, {
                                    children: e.jsxs(ae, {

                                        children: [e.jsx(co, {

                                        }), "Dirección de envío"]
                                    })
                                }), e.jsxs(U, {
                                    className: "space-y-4",

                                            htmlFor: "shippingAddress",
                                            children: "Dirección *"
                                        }), e.jsx(te, {

                                            value: k.shippingAddress,
                                            onChange: _ => K("shippingAddress", _.target.value),

                                            className: oe("shippingAddress", k.shippingAddress) ? "border-red-500" : ""
                                        }), oe("shippingAddress", k.shippingAddress) && e.jsx("p", {

                                            children: oe("shippingAddress", k.shippingAddress)
                                        })]
                                    }), e.jsxs("div", {
                                        className: "grid grid-cols-1 md:grid-cols-3 gap-4",

                                                htmlFor: "shippingCity",
                                                children: "Ciudad *"
                                            }), e.jsx(te, {
                                                id: "shippingCity",

                                                onChange: _ => K("shippingCity", _.target.value),
                                                required: !0,

                                                className: oe("shippingCity", k.shippingCity) ? "border-red-500" : ""
                                            }), oe("shippingCity", k.shippingCity) && e.jsx("p", {

                                            })]
                                        }), e.jsxs("div", {

                                                htmlFor: "shippingProvince",
                                                children: "Provincia *"
                                            }), e.jsxs(He, {
                                                value: k.shippingProvince,
                                                onValueChange: _ => K("shippingProvince", _),
                                                children: [e.jsx(Ue, {
                                                    className: !k.shippingProvince && F ? "border-red-500" : "",
                                                    children: e.jsx(We, {
                                                        placeholder: "Selecciona provincia"
                                                    })
                                                }), e.jsx(qe, {
                                                    children: d.map(_ => e.jsx(Q, {
                                                        value: _.name,
                                                        children: _.name
                                                    }, _.id))
                                                })]
                                            }), !k.shippingProvince && F && e.jsx("p", {
                                                className: "text-sm text-red-600 mt-1",
                                                children: "La provincia es obligatoria"
                                            })]
                                        }), e.jsxs("div", {
                                            children: [e.jsx(q, {
                                                htmlFor: "shippingPostalCode",
                                                children: "Código postal *"
                                            }), e.jsx(te, {
                                                id: "shippingPostalCode",
                                                value: k.shippingPostalCode,
                                                onChange: _ => K("shippingPostalCode", _.target.value),
                                                required: !0,
                                                placeholder: "12345",
                                                className: oe("shippingPostalCode", k.shippingPostalCode) ? "border-red-500" : ""
                                            }), oe("shippingPostalCode", k.shippingPostalCode) && e.jsx("p", {
                                                className: "text-sm text-red-600 mt-1",
                                                children: oe("shippingPostalCode", k.shippingPostalCode)
                                            })]
                                        })]
                                    })]
                                })]
                            }), e.jsxs(V, {
                                children: [e.jsx(ne, {
                                    children: e.jsxs(ae, {
                                        className: "flex items-center gap-2",
                                        children: [e.jsx(ff, {
                                            className: "w-5 h-5"
                                        }), "Dirección de facturación"]
                                    })
                                }), e.jsxs(U, {
                                    className: "space-y-4",
                                    children: [e.jsxs("div", {
                                        className: "flex items-center space-x-2",
