                                            type: "checkbox",
                                            id: "useSameAddress",
                                            checked: k.useSameAddress,
                                            onChange: _ => {
                                                const ee = _.target.checked;
                                                D(H => ({
                                                    ...H,
                                                    useSameAddress: ee,
                                                    billingAddress: ee ? H.shippingAddress : "",
                                                    billingCity: ee ? H.shippingCity : "",
                                                    billingProvince: ee ? H.shippingProvince : "",
                                                    billingPostalCode: ee ? H.shippingPostalCode : ""
                                                }))
                                            },
                                            className: "rounded border-gray-300"
                                        }), e.jsx(q, {
                                            htmlFor: "useSameAddress",
                                            className: "text-sm font-medium",
                                            children: "Usar misma dirección que la de envío"
                                        })]
                                    }), !k.useSameAddress && e.jsxs(e.Fragment, {
                                        children: [e.jsxs("div", {
                                            children: [e.jsx(q, {
                                                htmlFor: "billingAddress",
                                                children: "Dirección de facturación *"
                                            }), e.jsx(te, {
                                                id: "billingAddress",
                                                value: k.billingAddress,
                                                onChange: _ => K("billingAddress", _.target.value),
                                                required: !k.useSameAddress,
                                                placeholder: "Calle, número, piso, puerta",
                                                className: oe("billingAddress", k.billingAddress) && !k.useSameAddress ? "border-red-500" : ""
                                            }), oe("billingAddress", k.billingAddress) && !k.useSameAddress && e.jsx("p", {
                                                className: "text-sm text-red-600 mt-1",
                                                children: oe("billingAddress", k.billingAddress)
                                            })]
                                        }), e.jsxs("div", {
                                            className: "grid grid-cols-1 md:grid-cols-3 gap-4",
                                            children: [e.jsxs("div", {
                                                children: [e.jsx(q, {
                                                    htmlFor: "billingCity",
                                                    children: "Ciudad *"
                                                }), e.jsx(te, {
                                                    id: "billingCity",
                                                    value: k.billingCity,
                                                    onChange: _ => K("billingCity", _.target.value),
                                                    required: !k.useSameAddress,
                                                    placeholder: "Tu ciudad",
                                                    className: oe("billingCity", k.billingCity) && !k.useSameAddress ? "border-red-500" : ""
                                                }), oe("billingCity", k.billingCity) && !k.useSameAddress && e.jsx("p", {
                                                    className: "text-sm text-red-600 mt-1",
                                                    children: oe("billingCity", k.billingCity)
                                                })]
                                            }), e.jsxs("div", {
                                                children: [e.jsx(q, {
                                                    htmlFor: "billingProvince",
                                                    children: "Provincia *"
                                                }), e.jsxs(He, {
                                                    value: k.billingProvince,
                                                    onValueChange: _ => K("billingProvince", _),
                                                    children: [e.jsx(Ue, {
                                                        className: !k.billingProvince && F && !k.useSameAddress ? "border-red-500" : "",
                                                        children: e.jsx(We, {
                                                            placeholder: "Selecciona provincia"
                                                        })
                                                    }), e.jsx(qe, {
                                                        children: d.map(_ => e.jsx(Q, {
                                                            value: _.name,
                                                            children: _.name
                                                        }, _.id))
                                                    })]
                                                }), !k.billingProvince && F && !k.useSameAddress && e.jsx("p", {
                                                    className: "text-sm text-red-600 mt-1",
                                                    children: "La provincia es obligatoria"
                                                })]
                                            }), e.jsxs("div", {
                                                children: [e.jsx(q, {
                                                    htmlFor: "billingPostalCode",
                                                    children: "Código postal *"
                                                }), e.jsx(te, {
                                                    id: "billingPostalCode",
                                                    value: k.billingPostalCode,
                                                    onChange: _ => K("billingPostalCode", _.target.value),
                                                    required: !k.useSameAddress,
                                                    placeholder: "12345",
                                                    className: oe("billingPostalCode", k.billingPostalCode) && !k.useSameAddress ? "border-red-500" : ""
                                                }), oe("billingPostalCode", k.billingPostalCode) && !k.useSameAddress && e.jsx("p", {
                                                    className: "text-sm text-red-600 mt-1",
                                                    children: oe("billingPostalCode", k.billingPostalCode)
                                                })]
                                            })]
                                        })]
                                    }), k.useSameAddress && e.jsx("div", {
                                        className: "bg-green-50 p-3 rounded-lg",
                                        children: e.jsxs("p", {
                                            className: "text-sm text-green-800",
                                            children: [e.jsx("strong", {
                                                children: "Dirección de facturación:"
                                            }), " Se utilizará la misma dirección de envío para la facturación."]
                                        })
                                    })]
                                })]
                            }), e.jsxs(V, {
                                children: [e.jsx(ne, {
                                    children: e.jsxs(ae, {
                                        className: "flex items-center gap-2",
                                        children: [e.jsx(ur, {
                                            className: "w-5 h-5"
                                        }), "Método de envío *"]
                                    })
                                }), e.jsx(U, {
                                    children: j ? e.jsx("div", {
                                        className: "text-center py-4",
                                        children: e.jsx("p", {
                                            className: "text-sm text-gray-600",
                                            children: "Calculando opciones de envío..."
                                        })
                                    }) : k.shippingProvince === "" ? e.jsx("div", {
                                        className: "text-center py-4",
                                        children: e.jsx("p", {
                                            className: "text-sm text-gray-600",
                                            children: "Selecciona una provincia para ver las opciones de envío"
                                        })
                                    }) : e.jsxs("div", {
                                        children: [e.jsx(xy, {
                                            value: k.shippingMethodId,
                                            onValueChange: _ => {
                                                K("shippingMethodId", _);
                                                const ee = l.find(H => H.id.toString() === _);
                                                ee && b(ee.cost)
                                            },
                                            children: l.map(_ => e.jsxs("div", {
                                                className: "flex items-center space-x-2 p-3 border rounded-lg",
                                                children: [e.jsx(gy, {
                                                    value: _.id.toString(),
                                                    id: `shipping-${_.id}`
                                                }), e.jsx(q, {
                                                    htmlFor: `shipping-${_.id}`,
                                                    className: "flex-1",
                                                    children: e.jsxs("div", {
                                                        className: "flex justify-between items-center",
                                                        children: [e.jsxs("div", {
                                                            children: [e.jsx("p", {
                                                                className: "font-medium",
                                                                children: _.name
                                                            }), e.jsx("p", {
                                                                className: "text-sm text-gray-600",
                                                                children: _.description
                                                            }), e.jsxs("p", {
                                                                className: "text-xs text-gray-500",
                                                                children: [_.estimatedDays, " días estimados"]
                                                            }), e.jsxs("p", {
                                                                className: "text-xs text-gray-500",
                                                                children: ["Zona: ", _.zoneName]
                                                            })]
                                                        }), e.jsx("div", {
                                                            className: "text-right",
                                                            children: _.isFreeShipping ? e.jsxs("div", {
                                                                children: [e.jsx("p", {
                                                                    className: "text-sm font-medium text-green-600",
                                                                    children: "GRATIS"
                                                                }), e.jsxs("p", {
                                                                    className: "text-xs text-gray-500",
                                                                    children: ["Precio normal: €", _.originalCost.toFixed(2)]
                                                                })]
                                                            }) : e.jsxs("p", {
                                                                className: "text-sm font-medium",
                                                                children: ["€", _.cost.toFixed(2)]
                                                            })
                                                        })]
                                                    })
                                                })]
                                            }, _.id))
                                        }), !k.shippingMethodId && F && e.jsx("p", {
                                            className: "text-sm text-red-600 mt-2",
                                            children: "Debe seleccionar un método de envío"
                                        })]
                                    })
                                })]
                            }), e.jsxs(V, {
                                children: [e.jsx(ne, {
                                    children: e.jsxs(ae, {
                                        className: "flex items-center gap-2",
                                        children: [e.jsx(ps, {
                                            className: "w-5 h-5"
                                        }), "Método de pago *"]
                                    })
                                }), e.jsx(U, {
                                    children: e.jsxs("div", {
                                        children: [e.jsx(xy, {
                                            value: k.paymentMethodId,
                                            onValueChange: _ => K("paymentMethodId", _),
                                            children: i.map(_ => e.jsxs("div", {
                                                className: `flex items-center space-x-2 p-3 border rounded-lg ${_.needsConfiguration ? "border-orange-200 bg-orange-50" : ""}`,
                                                children: [e.jsx(gy, {
                                                    value: _.provider,
                                                    id: `payment-${_.provider}`,
                                                    disabled: _.needsConfiguration
                                                }), e.jsxs(q, {
                                                    htmlFor: `payment-${_.provider}`,
                                                    className: "flex items-center gap-3",
                                                    children: [_.provider === "stripe" && e.jsx(ps, {
                                                        className: "w-5 h-5 text-blue-600"
                                                    }), _.provider === "bank_transfer" && e.jsx(ff, {
                                                        className: "w-5 h-5 text-green-600"
                                                    }), _.provider === "paypal" && e.jsx(ps, {
                                                        className: "w-5 h-5 text-yellow-600"
                                                    }), _.provider === "redsys" && e.jsx(ps, {
                                                        className: "w-5 h-5 text-red-600"
                                                    }), _.provider === "cash" && e.jsx(r5, {
                                                        className: "w-5 h-5 text-orange-600"
                                                    }), e.jsxs("div", {
                                                        className: "flex-1",
                                                        children: [e.jsx("p", {
                                                            className: "font-medium",
                                                            children: _.name
                                                        }), _.provider === "bank_transfer" && !_.needsConfiguration && e.jsx("p", {
                                                            className: "text-sm text-gray-600",
                                                            children: "Los datos bancarios se mostrarán después de confirmar el pedido"
                                                        }), _.needsConfiguration && e.jsx("p", {
                                                            className: "text-sm text-orange-600",
                                                            children: "Necesita configuración en el panel de administración"
                                                        })]
                                                    })]
                                                })]
                                            }, _.provider))
                                        }), !k.paymentMethodId && F && e.jsx("p", {
                                            className: "text-sm text-red-600 mt-2",
                                            children: "Debe seleccionar un método de pago"
                                        })]
                                    })
                                })]
                            }), e.jsxs(V, {
                                children: [e.jsx(ne, {
                                    children: e.jsx(ae, {
                                        children: "Notas adicionales"
                                    })
                                }), e.jsx(U, {
                                    children: e.jsx("textarea", {
                                        className: "w-full p-3 border rounded-md",
                                        rows: 3,
                                        placeholder: "Instrucciones especiales para la entrega...",
                                        value: k.notes,
                                        onChange: _ => K("notes", _.target.value)
                                    })
                                })]
                            })]
                        })
                    })]
                })
            }), e.jsx("div", {
                children: e.jsxs(V, {
                    className: "sticky top-4",
                    children: [e.jsx(ne, {
                        children: e.jsx(ae, {
                            children: "Resumen del pedido"
                        })
                    }), e.jsxs(U, {
                        className: "space-y-4",
                        children: [s.map(_ => e.jsxs("div", {
                            className: "flex justify-between items-start",
                            children: [e.jsxs("div", {
                                className: "flex-1",
                                children: [e.jsx("p", {
                                    className: "font-medium text-sm",
                                    children: _.partName
                                }), e.jsx("p", {
                                    className: "text-xs text-gray-600",
                                    children: _.partFamily
                                }), (_.partReference || _.partCode) && e.jsxs("div", {
                                    className: "flex gap-1 mt-1",
                                    children: [_.partReference && e.jsxs("span", {
                                        className: "bg-blue-100 text-blue-800 px-2 py-0.5 rounded text-xs",
                                        children: ["Ref: ", _.partReference]
                                    }), _.partCode && e.jsxs("span", {
                                        className: "bg-green-100 text-green-800 px-2 py-0.5 rounded text-xs",
                                        children: ["Cód: ", _.partCode]
                                    })]
                                }), e.jsxs("p", {
                                    className: "text-xs mt-1",
                                    children: ["Cantidad: ", _.quantity]
                                })]
                            }), e.jsxs("p", {
                                className: "font-medium",
                                children: ["€", (_.price * _.quantity).toFixed(2)]
                            })]
                        }, _.id)), e.jsx(wa, {}), e.jsxs("div", {
                            className: "space-y-2",
                            children: [e.jsxs("div", {
                                className: "flex justify-between",
                                children: [e.jsx("span", {
                                    children: "Subtotal:"
                                }), e.jsxs("span", {
                                    children: [s.reduce((_, ee) => _ + ee.price * ee.quantity, 0).toFixed(2), " €"]
                                })]
                            }), e.jsxs("div", {
                                className: "flex justify-between",
                                children: [e.jsx("span", {
                                    children: "Envío:"
                                }), e.jsxs("span", {
                                    children: [x.toFixed(2), " €"]
                                })]
                            }), e.jsx(wa, {}), e.jsxs("div", {
                                className: "flex justify-between font-bold text-lg",
                                children: [e.jsx("span", {
                                    children: "Total:"
                                }), e.jsxs("span", {
                                    children: [(s.reduce((_, ee) => _ + ee.price * ee.quantity, 0) + x).toFixed(2), " €"]
                                })]
                            })]
                        }), e.jsx(A, {
                            type: "submit",
                            className: "w-full",
                            size: "lg",
                            disabled: y || !be(),
                            onClick: M,
                            children: y ? "Procesando..." : "Finalizar pedido"
                        }), !be() && !y && F && e.jsx("p", {
                            className: "text-xs text-red-600 text-center mt-2",
                            children: "Por favor, completa todos los campos obligatorios y corrige los errores antes de continuar"
                        }), e.jsx("p", {
                            className: "text-xs text-gray-600 text-center",
                            children: "Al finalizar el pedido aceptas nuestros términos y condiciones"
                        })]
                    })]
                })
            })]
        })
    })
}
const aG = () => {
        const {items: t, totalItems: s, totalPrice: r, updateQuantity: n, removeItem: a, clearCart: i} = yl(),
            [, o] = dt();
        return e.jsxs("div", {
            className: "max-w-[1400px] mx-auto px-6 py-8",
            children: [e.jsxs("div", {
                className: "flex items-center gap-4 mb-8",
                children: [e.jsxs(A, {
                    variant: "ghost",
                    size: "sm",
                    onClick: () => o("/"),
                    className: "flex items-center gap-2",
                    children: [e.jsx(br, {
                        className: "h-4 w-4"
                    }), "Volver a la tienda"]
                }), e.jsxs("div", {
                    children: [e.jsx("h1", {
                        className: "text-3xl font-bold",
                        children: "Tu Carrito"
                    }), e.jsx("p", {
                        className: "text-gray-600",

                        })
                    }), e.jsxs(U, {
                        children: [e.jsx("p", {
                            children: i.shippingAddress
                        }), e.jsxs("p", {
                            children: [i.shippingCity, ", ", i.shippingPostalCode]
                        }), e.jsx("p", {
                            children: i.shippingCountry
                        })]
                    })]
                })]
            }), (i.transportAgency || i.expeditionNumber || i.adminObservations) && e.jsxs(V, {
                className: "mb-6",
                children: [e.jsx(ne, {
                    children: e.jsxs(ae, {
                        className: "flex items-center gap-2",
                        children: [e.jsx(ur, {
                            className: "h-5 w-5"
                        }), "Información de Transporte"]
                    })
                }), e.jsxs(U, {
                    className: "space-y-3",
                    children: [i.transportAgency && e.jsxs("div", {
                        children: [e.jsx("span", {
                            className: "font-medium text-gray-700",
                            children: "Agencia de transporte:"
                        }), e.jsx("p", {
                            className: "text-gray-900",
                            children: i.transportAgency
                        })]
                    }), i.expeditionNumber && e.jsxs("div", {
                        children: [e.jsx("span", {
                            className: "font-medium text-gray-700",
                            children: "Número de expedición:"
                        }), e.jsx("p", {
                            className: "text-gray-900 font-mono",
                            children: i.expeditionNumber
                        })]
                    }), i.adminObservations && e.jsxs("div", {
                        children: [e.jsx("span", {
                            className: "font-medium text-gray-700",
                            children: "Observaciones:"
                        }), e.jsx("p", {
                            className: "text-gray-900",
                            children: i.adminObservations
                        })]
                    }), i.shippingCost && e.jsxs("div", {
                        children: [e.jsx("span", {
                            className: "font-medium text-gray-700",
                            children: "Costo de envío:"
                        }), e.jsx("p", {
                            className: "text-gray-900",
                            children: ft(i.shippingCost, !1)
                        })]
                    })]
                })]
            }), e.jsxs(V, {
                className: "mb-6",
                children: [e.jsx(ne, {
                    children: e.jsx(ae, {
                        children: "Artículos del Pedido"
                    })
                }), e.jsx(U, {
                    children: i.items && i.items.length > 0 ? e.jsxs("div", {
                        className: "space-y-4",
                        children: [i.items.map((d, u) => e.jsxs("div", {
                            className: "flex items-start justify-between p-4 border rounded-lg",
                            children: [e.jsxs("div", {
                                className: "flex-1",
                                children: [e.jsxs("div", {
                                    className: "flex items-center gap-2 mb-2",
                                    children: [e.jsx(Lt, {
                                        className: "h-4 w-4 text-gray-500"
                                    }), e.jsx("h4", {
                                        className: "font-semibold",
                                        children: d.partName
                                    })]
                                }), e.jsxs("div", {
                                    className: "space-y-1 text-sm text-gray-600",
                                    children: [d.partFamily && e.jsxs("p", {
                                        children: [e.jsx("span", {
                                            className: "font-medium",
                                            children: "Familia:"
                                        }), " ", d.partFamily]
                                    }), d.partReference && e.jsxs("p", {
                                        children: [e.jsx("span", {
                                            className: "font-medium",
                                            children: "Referencia:"
                                        }), " ", d.partReference]
                                    }), (d.vehicleBrand || d.vehicleModel) && e.jsxs("p", {
                                        children: [e.jsx("span", {
                                            className: "font-medium",
                                            children: "Vehículo:"
                                        }), d.vehicleBrand && ` ${d.vehicleBrand}`, d.vehicleModel && ` ${d.vehicleModel}`, d.vehicleYear && ` (${d.vehicleYear})`]
                                    }), d.vehicleVersion && e.jsxs("p", {
                                        children: [e.jsx("span", {
                                            className: "font-medium",
                                            children: "Versión:"
                                        }), " ", d.vehicleVersion]
                                    })]
                                })]
                            }), e.jsxs("div", {
                                className: "text-right",
                                children: [e.jsxs("p", {
                                    className: "font-semibold",
                                    children: [ft(d.price, !1), " × ", d.quantity]
                                }), e.jsxs("p", {
                                    className: "text-sm text-gray-500",
                                    children: ["Total: ", ft((parseFloat(d.price) || 0) * d.quantity, !1)]
                                })]
                            })]
                        }, u)), e.jsx(wa, {
                            className: "my-4"
                        }), e.jsxs("div", {
                            className: "flex justify-between items-center",
                            children: [e.jsx("span", {
                                className: "text-lg font-semibold",
                                children: "Total del Pedido:"
                            }), e.jsx("span", {
                                className: "text-lg font-bold",
                                children: ft(i.total, !1)
                            })]
                        })]
                    }) : e.jsxs("div", {
                        className: "text-center py-8 text-gray-500",
                        children: [e.jsx(Lt, {
                            className: "h-12 w-12 mx-auto mb-4 opacity-50"
                        }), e.jsx("p", {
                            children: "No se encontraron artículos en este pedido."
                        })]
                    })
                })]
            }), i.notes && e.jsxs(V, {
                children: [e.jsx(ne, {
                    children: e.jsx(ae, {
                        children: "Notas"
                    })
                }), e.jsx(U, {
                    children: e.jsx("p", {
                        className: "text-gray-600",
                        children: i.notes
                    })
                })]
            })]
        })
    };
function mG({params: t}) {
    const {toast: s} = tt(),
        [, r] = dt(),
        [n, a] = h.useState(null),
        [i, o] = h.useState(!0),
        [l, c] = h.useState("");
    h.useEffect(() => {
        d();
        const y = new URLSearchParams(window.location.search);
        c(y.get("payment") || "")
    }, [t.orderId]);
    const d = async () => {
        try {
            const g = new URLSearchParams(window.location.search).get("sessionId"),
                x = vy(),
                b = g || x;
            let j = `/api/orders/${t.orderId}`;
            b && (j += `?sessionId=${b}`);
            const p = await Ie("GET", j);
            if (p.ok) {
                const v = await p.json();
                a(v)
            } else
                s({
                    title: "Error",
                    description: "No se pudo cargar la información del pedido",
                    variant: "destructive"
                })
        } catch (y) {
            console.error("Error loading order:", y),
            s({
                title: "Error",
                description: "No se pudo cargar la información del pedido",
                variant: "destructive"
            })
        } finally {
            o(!1)
        }
    };
    if (i)
        return e.jsx("div", {
            className: "container mx-auto px-4 py-8",
            children: e.jsx("div", {
                className: "text-center",
                children: "Cargando información del pedido..."
            })
        });
    if (!n)
        return e.jsx("div", {
            className: "container mx-auto px-4 py-8",
            children: e.jsx(V, {
                children: e.jsxs(U, {
                    className: "p-8 text-center",
                    children: [e.jsx("h2", {
                        className: "text-2xl font-bold mb-4",
                        children: "Pedido no encontrado"
                    }), e.jsx("p", {
                        className: "text-gray-600 mb-6",
                        children: "No se pudo encontrar el pedido solicitado"
                    }), e.jsx(A, {
                        onClick: () => r("/"),
                        children: "Volver al inicio"
                    })]
                })
            })
        });
    const u = y => new Date(y).toLocaleDateString("es-ES", {
            year: "numeric",
            month: "long",
            day: "numeric",
            hour: "2-digit",
            minute: "2-digit"
        }),
        m = () => {
            var y;
            if ((y = n.shippingMethod) != null && y.estimatedDays) {
                const g = new Date;
                return g.setDate(g.getDate() + n.shippingMethod.estimatedDays), g.toLocaleDateString("es-ES", {
                    year: "numeric",
                    month: "long",
                    day: "numeric"
                })
            }
            return "Por determinar"
        },
        f = y => ({
            stripe: "Tarjeta de Crédito/Débito",
            paypal: "PayPal",
            bank_transfer: "Transferencia Bancaria",
            redsys: "Tarjeta (Redsys)",
            cash: "Pago en Efectivo",
            cash_on_delivery: "Pago contra reembolso"
        })[y] || y;
    return e.jsx("div", {
        className: "container mx-auto px-4 py-8",
        children: e.jsxs("div", {
            className: "max-w-4xl mx-auto",
            children: [e.jsxs("div", {
                className: "text-center mb-8",
                children: [e.jsx(zt, {
                    className: "w-16 h-16 text-green-600 mx-auto mb-4"
                }), e.jsx("h1", {
                    className: "text-3xl font-bold text-green-600 mb-2",
                    children: "¡Pedido confirmado!"
                }), e.jsxs("p", {
                    className: "text-gray-600",
                    children: ["Tu pedido #", n.orderNumber, " ha sido procesado correctamente"]
                }), e.jsxs("p", {
                    className: "text-sm text-gray-500 mt-2",
                    children: ["Realizado el ", u(n.createdAt)]
                })]
            }), e.jsxs("div", {
                className: "grid grid-cols-1 lg:grid-cols-3 gap-8",
                children: [e.jsxs("div", {
                    className: "lg:col-span-2 space-y-6",
                    children: [e.jsxs(V, {
                        children: [e.jsx(ne, {
                            children: e.jsx(ae, {
                                children: "Productos del pedido"
                            })
                        }), e.jsx(U, {
                            children: n.items && n.items.length > 0 ? e.jsx("div", {
                                className: "space-y-4",
                                children: n.items.map(y => e.jsx("div", {
                                    className: "border-b pb-4",
                                    children: e.jsxs("div", {
                                        className: "flex justify-between items-start",
                                        children: [e.jsxs("div", {
                                            className: "flex-1",
                                            children: [e.jsx("p", {
                                                className: "font-medium",
                                                children: y.partName
                                            }), e.jsxs("div", {
                                                className: "text-sm text-gray-600 space-y-1 mt-2",
                                                children: [y.partFamily && e.jsxs("p", {
                                                    children: ["Familia: ", y.partFamily]
                                                }), y.partReference && e.jsxs("p", {
                                                    children: ["Referencia: ", y.partReference]
                                                }), (y.vehicleBrand || y.vehicleModel) && e.jsxs("p", {
                                                    children: ["Vehículo:", y.vehicleBrand && ` ${y.vehicleBrand}`, y.vehicleModel && ` ${y.vehicleModel}`, y.vehicleYear && ` (${y.vehicleYear})`]
                                                }), y.vehicleVersion && e.jsxs("p", {
                                                    children: ["Versión: ", y.vehicleVersion]
                                                }), e.jsxs("p", {
                                                    children: ["Cantidad: ", y.quantity]
                                                })]
                                            })]
                                        }), e.jsxs("div", {
                                            className: "text-right",
                                            children: [e.jsxs("p", {
                                                className: "font-medium",
                                                children: [parseFloat(y.price).toFixed(2), " € × ", y.quantity]
                                            }), e.jsxs("p", {
                                                className: "text-sm text-gray-600",
                                                children: ["Total: ", (parseFloat(y.price) * y.quantity).toFixed(2), " €"]
                                            })]
                                        })]
                                    })
                                }, y.id))
                            }) : e.jsx("p", {
                                className: "text-gray-600",
                                children: "No se encontraron productos en este pedido"
                            })
                        })]
                    }), e.jsxs(V, {
                        children: [e.jsx(ne, {
                            children: e.jsxs(ae, {
                                className: "flex items-center gap-2",
                                children: [e.jsx(Or, {
                                    className: "w-5 h-5"
                                }), "Información del cliente"]
                            })
                        }), e.jsx(U, {
                            className: "space-y-3",
                            children: e.jsxs("div", {
                                children: [e.jsx("p", {
                                    className: "font-medium",
                                    children: n.customerName
                                }), e.jsx("p", {
                                    className: "text-sm text-gray-600",
                                    children: n.customerEmail
                                }), e.jsx("p", {
                                    className: "text-sm text-gray-600",
                                    children: n.customerPhone
                                })]
                            })
                        })]
                    }), e.jsxs(V, {
                        children: [e.jsx(ne, {
                            children: e.jsxs(ae, {
                                className: "flex items-center gap-2",
                                children: [e.jsx(co, {
                                    className: "w-5 h-5"
                                }), "Dirección de envío"]
                            })
                        }), e.jsxs(U, {
                            className: "space-y-3",
                            children: [e.jsxs("div", {
                                children: [e.jsx("p", {
                                    className: "font-medium",
                                    children: n.shippingAddress
                                }), e.jsxs("p", {
                                    className: "text-sm text-gray-600",
                                    children: [n.shippingCity, ", ", n.shippingPostalCode]
                                })]
                            }), n.shippingMethod && e.jsxs("div", {
                                className: "mt-4 p-3 bg-blue-50 rounded-lg",
                                children: [e.jsxs("div", {
                                    className: "flex items-center gap-2 mb-2",
                                    children: [e.jsx(ur, {
                                        className: "w-4 h-4 text-blue-600"
                                    }), e.jsx("span", {
                                        className: "font-medium text-blue-600",
                                        children: n.shippingMethod.name
                                    })]
                                }), e.jsx("p", {
                                    className: "text-sm text-gray-600",
                                    children: n.shippingMethod.description
                                }), e.jsxs("p", {
                                    className: "text-sm text-blue-600 font-medium",
                                    children: ["Entrega estimada: ", m()]
                                })]
                            })]
                        })]
                    }), e.jsxs(V, {
                        children: [e.jsx(ne, {
                            children: e.jsxs(ae, {
                                className: "flex items-center gap-2",
                                children: [e.jsx(ps, {
                                    className: "w-5 h-5"
                                }), "Información de pago"]
                            })
                        }), e.jsx(U, {
                            className: "space-y-3",
                            children: n.paymentMethod && e.jsxs("div", {
                                className: "space-y-4",
                                children: [e.jsxs("div", {
                                    className: "flex items-center gap-3",
                                    children: [n.paymentMethod.provider === "bank_transfer" && e.jsx(ff, {
                                        className: "w-5 h-5 text-green-600"
                                    }), n.paymentMethod.provider === "stripe" && e.jsx(ps, {
                                        className: "w-5 h-5 text-blue-600"
                                    }), n.paymentMethod.provider === "paypal" && e.jsx(ps, {
                                        className: "w-5 h-5 text-yellow-600"
                                    }), e.jsxs("div", {
                                        children: [e.jsx("p", {
                                            className: "font-medium",
                                            children: f(n.paymentMethod.provider)
                                        }), e.jsx(ge, {
                                            variant: "outline",
                                            className: "text-xs mt-1",
                                            children: n.paymentStatus === "pending" ? "Pendiente" : n.paymentStatus === "paid" ? "Pagado" : n.paymentStatus === "failed" ? "Fallido" : "Pendiente"
                                        })]
                                    })]
                                }), n.paymentMethod.provider === "bank_transfer" && e.jsxs("div", {
                                    className: "bg-blue-50 p-4 rounded-lg border border-blue-200",
                                    children: [e.jsx("h4", {
                                        className: "font-semibold text-blue-800 mb-3",
                                        children: "Datos para transferencia bancaria"
                                    }), e.jsxs("div", {
                                        className: "space-y-2 text-sm",
                                        children: [e.jsxs("div", {
                                            children: [e.jsx("span", {
                                                className: "font-medium",
                                                children: "Banco:"
                                            }), " ", n.paymentMethod.config.bank_name]
                                        }), e.jsxs("div", {
                                            children: [e.jsx("span", {
                                                className: "font-medium",
                                                children: "Número de cuenta:"
                                            }), " ", n.paymentMethod.config.account_number]
                                        }), e.jsxs("div", {
                                            children: [e.jsx("span", {
                                                className: "font-medium",
                                                children: "Concepto:"
                                            }), " Pedido #", n.orderNumber]
                                        }), e.jsxs("div", {
                                            children: [e.jsx("span", {
                                                className: "font-medium",
                                                children: "Importe:"
                                            }), " ", parseFloat(n.total).toFixed(2), " €"]
                                        })]
                                    }), e.jsx("div", {
                                        className: "mt-3 p-3 bg-blue-100 rounded border border-blue-300",
                                        children: e.jsxs("p", {
                                            className: "text-sm text-blue-700",
                                            children: [e.jsx("strong", {
                                                children: "Importante:"
                                            }), " Una vez realizada la transferencia, tu pedido será procesado. Guarda el justificante de la transferencia como comprobante."]
                                        })
                                    })]
                                }), n.paymentMethod.provider === "stripe" && e.jsxs("div", {
                                    className: "bg-green-50 p-4 rounded-lg border border-green-200",
                                    children: [e.jsx("h4", {
                                        className: "font-semibold text-green-800 mb-3",
                                        children: "Pago con tarjeta"
                                    }), e.jsxs("div", {
                                        className: "space-y-2 text-sm",
                                        children: [e.jsx("p", {
                                            className: "text-green-700",
                                            children: "Tu pedido ha sido creado correctamente. El pago se procesará de forma segura."
                                        }), e.jsx("div", {
                                            className: "mt-3 p-3 bg-green-100 rounded border border-green-300",
                                            children: e.jsxs("p", {
                                                className: "text-sm text-green-700",
                                                children: [e.jsx("strong", {
                                                    children: "Nota:"
                                                }), " Recibirás un email de confirmación una vez procesado el pago."]
                                            })
                                        })]
                                    })]
                                }), n.paymentMethod.provider === "paypal" && e.jsxs("div", {
                                    className: "bg-yellow-50 p-4 rounded-lg border border-yellow-200",
                                    children: [e.jsx("h4", {
                                        className: "font-semibold text-yellow-800 mb-3",
                                        children: "Pago con PayPal"
                                    }), e.jsxs("div", {
                                        className: "space-y-2 text-sm",
                                        children: [e.jsx("p", {
                                            className: "text-yellow-700",
                                            children: "Tu pedido ha sido creado correctamente. El pago se procesará a través de PayPal."
                                        }), e.jsx("div", {
                                            className: "mt-3 p-3 bg-yellow-100 rounded border border-yellow-300",
                                            children: e.jsxs("p", {
                                                className: "text-sm text-yellow-700",
                                                children: [e.jsx("strong", {
                                                    children: "Nota:"
                                                }), " Recibirás un email de confirmación una vez procesado el pago."]
                                            })
                                        })]
                                    })]
                                })]
                            })
                        })]
                    }), n.notes && e.jsxs(V, {
                        children: [e.jsx(ne, {
                            children: e.jsx(ae, {
                                children: "Notas del pedido"
                            })
                        }), e.jsx(U, {
                            children: e.jsx("p", {
                                className: "text-gray-700 whitespace-pre-wrap",
                                children: n.notes
                            })
                        })]
                    })]
                }), e.jsxs("div", {
                    className: "space-y-6",
                    children: [e.jsxs(V, {
                        children: [e.jsx(ne, {
                            children: e.jsx(ae, {
                                children: "Resumen del pedido"
                            })
                        }), e.jsxs(U, {
                            className: "space-y-4",
                            children: [e.jsxs("div", {
                                className: "flex justify-between",
                                children: [e.jsx("span", {
                                    children: "Subtotal"
                                }), e.jsxs("span", {
                                    children: [parseFloat(n.subtotal).toFixed(2), " €"]
                                })]
                            }), e.jsxs("div", {
                                className: "flex justify-between",
                                children: [e.jsx("span", {
                                    children: "Envío"
                                }), e.jsxs("span", {
                                    children: [parseFloat(n.shippingCost).toFixed(2), " €"]
                                })]
                            }), e.jsx(wa, {}), e.jsxs("div", {
                                className: "flex justify-between font-semibold text-lg",
                                children: [e.jsx("span", {
                                    children: "Total"
                                }), e.jsxs("span", {
                                    children: [parseFloat(n.total).toFixed(2), " €"]
                                })]
                            })]
                        })]
                    }), e.jsxs(V, {
                        children: [e.jsx(ne, {
                            children: e.jsx(ae, {
                                children: "Estado del pedido"
                            })
                        }), e.jsxs(U, {
                            className: "space-y-3",
                            children: [e.jsxs("div", {
                                className: "flex items-center gap-2",
                                children: [e.jsx("div", {
                                    className: "w-2 h-2 bg-green-500 rounded-full"
                                }), e.jsx("span", {
                                    className: "text-sm",
                                    children: "Pedido confirmado"
                                })]
                            }), e.jsxs("div", {
                                className: "flex items-center gap-2",
                                children: [e.jsx("div", {
                                    className: "w-2 h-2 bg-yellow-500 rounded-full"
                                }), e.jsx("span", {
                                    className: "text-sm",
                                    children: "En proceso"
                                })]
                            }), e.jsxs("div", {
                                className: "flex items-center gap-2",
                                children: [e.jsx("div", {
                                    className: "w-2 h-2 bg-gray-300 rounded-full"
                                }), e.jsx("span", {
                                    className: "text-sm text-gray-500",
                                    children: "Enviado"
                                })]
                            }), e.jsxs("div", {
                                className: "flex items-center gap-2",
                                children: [e.jsx("div", {
                                    className: "w-2 h-2 bg-gray-300 rounded-full"
                                }), e.jsx("span", {
                                    className: "text-sm text-gray-500",
                                    children: "Entregado"
                                })]
                            })]
                        })]
                    }), e.jsxs("div", {
                        className: "space-y-3",
                        children: [e.jsxs(A, {
                            onClick: () => r("/"),
                            variant: "outline",
                            className: "w-full",
                            children: [e.jsx(br, {
                                className: "w-4 h-4 mr-2"
                            }), "Volver al catálogo"]
                        }), e.jsx(A, {
                            onClick: () => window.print(),
                            variant: "outline",
                            className: "w-full",
                            children: "Imprimir pedido"
                        })]
                    })]
                })]
            })]
        })
    })
}
const hG = Ae.object({
        identifier: Ae.string().min(3, "Ingresa un email o nombre de usuario válido"),
        password: Ae.string().min(6, "La contraseña debe tener al menos 6 caracteres")
    }),
    fG = () => {
        const {login: t, isLoading: s} = Ps(),
            [, r] = dt(),
            n = un({
                resolver: Cn(hG),
                defaultValues: {
                    identifier: "",
                    password: ""
                }
            }),
            a = async i => {
                try {
                    if (!i.identifier || !i.password) {
                        n.setError("identifier", {
                            message: "Usuario y contraseña son requeridos"
                        }),
                        n.setError("password", {
                            message: "Usuario y contraseña son requeridos"
                        });
                        return
                    }
                    const o = await t(i.identifier, i.password);
                    o.success ? o.shouldRedirect ? (console.log("🔄 Redirigiendo admin a dashboard via SPA..."), r("/admin/dashboard")) : r("/") : (n.setError("identifier", {
                        message: o.message || "Usuario o contraseña incorrectos"
                    }), n.setError("password", {
                        message: o.message || "Usuario o contraseña incorrectos"
                    }))
                } catch (o) {
                    console.error("Error en el formulario de login:", o),
                    n.setError("identifier", {
                        message: "Error de conexión. Intente nuevamente."
                    }),
                    n.setError("password", {

function fM(t, s) {
    return function() {
        return t.apply(s, arguments)
    }
}

function Tm(t, s, {allOwnKeys: r=!1}={}) {
    if (t === null || typeof t > "u")
        return;
    let n,
        a;
    if (typeof t != "object" && (t = [t]), rd(t))
        for (n = 0, a = t.length; n < a; n++)
            s.call(null, t[n], n, t);
    else {
        const i = r ? Object.getOwnPropertyNames(t) : Object.keys(t),
            o = i.length;
        let l;
        for (n = 0; n < o; n++)
            l = i[n],
            s.call(null, t[l], l, t)
    }
}
function vM(t, s) {
    s = s.toLowerCase();
    const r = Object.keys(t);
    let n = r.length,
        a;
    for (; n-- > 0;)
        if (a = r[n], s === a.toLowerCase())
            return a;
    return null
}
const Oo = typeof globalThis < "u" ? globalThis : typeof self < "u" ? self : typeof window < "u" ? window : global,
    yM = t => !Gu(t) && t !== Oo;
function yy() {
    const {caseless: t} = yM(this) && this || {},
        s = {},
        r = (n, a) => {
            const i = t && vM(s, a) || a;
            Lh(s[i]) && Lh(n) ? s[i] = yy(s[i], n) : Lh(n) ? s[i] = yy({}, n) : rd(n) ? s[i] = n.slice() : s[i] = n
        };
    for (let n = 0, a = arguments.length; n < a; n++)
        arguments[n] && Tm(arguments[n], r);
    return s
}
const zG = (t, s, r, {allOwnKeys: n}={}) => (Tm(s, (a, i) => {

    }, {

function B1(t) {

class Gr {
    constructor(s)
    {
        s && this.set(s)
    }
    set(s, r, n)
    {
        const a = this;
        function i(l, c, d) {
            const u = Cd(c);
            if (!u)
                throw new Error("header name must be a non-empty string");
            const m = ce.findKey(a, u);
            (!m || a[m] === void 0 || d === !0 || d === void 0 && a[m] !== !1) && (a[m || c] = Fh(l))
        }
        const o = (l, c) => ce.forEach(l, (d, u) => i(d, u, c));
        if (ce.isPlainObject(s) || s instanceof this.constructor)
            o(s, r);
        else if (ce.isString(s) && (s = s.trim()) && !EK(s))
            o(CK(s), r);
        else if (ce.isObject(s) && ce.isIterable(s)) {
            let l = {},
                c,
                d;
            for (const u of s) {
                if (!ce.isArray(u))
                    throw TypeError("Object iterator must return a key-value pair");
                l[d = u[0]] = (c = l[d]) ? ce.isArray(c) ? [...c, u[1]] : [c, u[1]] : u[1]
            }
            o(l, r)
        } else
            s != null && i(r, s, n);
        return this
    }
    get(s, r)
    {
        if (s = Cd(s), s) {
            const n = ce.findKey(this, s);
            if (n) {
                const a = this[n];
                if (!r)
                    return a;
                if (r === !0)
                    return SK(a);
                if (ce.isFunction(r))
                    return r.call(this, a, n);
                if (ce.isRegExp(r))
                    return r.exec(a);
                throw new TypeError("parser must be boolean|regexp|function")
            }
        }
    }
    has(s, r)
    {
        if (s = Cd(s), s) {
            const n = ce.findKey(this, s);
            return !!(n && this[n] !== void 0 && (!r || bg(this, this[n], n, r)))
        }
        return !1
    }
    delete(s, r)
    {
        const n = this;
        let a = !1;

const e2 = {};
cx.transitional = function(s, r, n) {
    function a(i, o) {
        return "[Axios v" + OM + "] Transitional option '" + i + "'" + o + (n ? ". " + n : "")
    }
    return (i, o, l) => {
        if (s === !1)
            throw new ht(a(o, " has been removed" + (r ? " in " + r : "")), ht.ERR_DEPRECATED);
        return r && !e2[o] && (e2[o] = !0, console.warn(a(o, " has been deprecated since v" + r + " and will be removed in the near future"))), s ? s(i, o, l) : !0
    }
};
cx.spelling = function(s) {
    return (r, n) => (console.warn(`${n} is likely a misspelling of ${s}`), !0)
};
function KK(t, s, r) {
    if (typeof t != "object")
        throw new ht("options must be an object", ht.ERR_BAD_OPTION_VALUE);
    const n = Object.keys(t);
    let a = n.length;
    for (; a-- > 0;) {
        const i = n[a],
            o = s[i];
        if (o) {
            const l = t[i],
                c = l === void 0 || o(l, i, t);
            if (c !== !0)
                throw new ht("option " + i + " must be " + c, ht.ERR_BAD_OPTION_VALUE);
            continue
        }
        if (r !== !0)
            throw new ht("Unknown option " + i, ht.ERR_BAD_OPTION)
    }
}
const zh = {
        assertOptions: KK,
        validators: cx
    },
    ia = zh.validators;
class Yo {
    constructor(s)
    {
        this.defaults = s || {},
        this.interceptors = {
            request: new H1,
            response: new H1
        }
    }
    async request(s, r)
    {
        try {
            return await this._request(s, r)
        } catch (n) {
            if (n instanceof Error) {
                let a = {};
                Error.captureStackTrace ? Error.captureStackTrace(a) : a = new Error;
                const i = a.stack ? a.stack.replace(/^.+\n/, "") : "";
                try {
                    n.stack ? i && !String(n.stack).endsWith(i.replace(/^.+\n.+\n/, "")) && (n.stack += `
`
                    + i) : n.stack = i
                } catch {}
            }
            throw n
        }
    }
    _request(s, r)
    {
        typeof s == "string" ? (r = r || {}, r.url = s) : r = s || {},
        r = fl(this.defaults, r);
        const {transitional: n, paramsSerializer: a, headers: i} = r;
        n !== void 0 && zh.assertOptions(n, {
            silentJSONParsing: ia.transitional(ia.boolean),
            forcedJSONParsing: ia.transitional(ia.boolean),
            clarifyTimeoutError: ia.transitional(ia.boolean)
        }, !1),
        a != null && (ce.isFunction(a) ? r.paramsSerializer = {
            serialize: a
        } : zh.assertOptions(a, {
            encode: ia.function,
            serialize: ia.function
        }, !0)),
        r.allowAbsoluteUrls !== void 0 || (this.defaults.allowAbsoluteUrls !== void 0 ? r.allowAbsoluteUrls = this.defaults.allowAbsoluteUrls : r.allowAbsoluteUrls = !0),
        zh.assertOptions(r, {
            baseUrl: ia.spelling("baseURL"),
            withXsrfToken: ia.spelling("withXSRFToken")
        }, !0),
        r.method = (r.method || this.defaults.method || "get").toLowerCase();
        let o = i && ce.merge(i.common, i[r.method]);
        i && ce.forEach(["delete", "get", "head", "post", "put", "patch", "common"], g => {
            delete i[g]
        }),
        r.headers = Gr.concat(o, i);
        const l = [];
        let c = !0;
        this.interceptors.request.forEach(function(x) {
            typeof x.runWhen == "function" && x.runWhen(r) === !1 || (c = c && x.synchronous, l.unshift(x.fulfilled, x.rejected))
        });
        const d = [];
        this.interceptors.response.forEach(function(x) {
            d.push(x.fulfilled, x.rejected)
        });
        let u,
            m = 0,
            f;
        if (!c) {
            const g = [J1.bind(this), void 0];
            for (g.unshift.apply(g, l), g.push.apply(g, d), f = g.length, u = Promise.resolve(r); m < f;)
                u = u.then(g[m++], g[m++]);
            return u
        }
        f = l.length;
        let y = r;
        for (m = 0; m < f;) {
            const g = l[m++],
                x = l[m++];
            try {
                y = g(y)
            } catch (b) {
                x.call(this, b);
                break
            }
        }
        try {
            u = J1.call(this, y)
        } catch (g) {
            return Promise.reject(g)
        }
        for (m = 0, f = d.length; m < f;)
            u = u.then(d[m++], d[m++]);
        return u
    }
    getUri(s)
    {
        s = fl(this.defaults, s);
        const r = AM(s.baseURL, s.url, s.allowAbsoluteUrls);
        return EM(r, s.params, s.paramsSerializer)
    }
}
ce.forEach(["delete", "get", "head", "options"], function(s) {
    Yo.prototype[s] = function(r, n) {
        return this.request(fl(n || {}, {
            method: s,
            url: r,
            data: (n || {}).data
        }))
    }
});
ce.forEach(["post", "put", "patch"], function(s) {
    function r(n) {
        return function(i, o, l) {
            return this.request(fl(l || {}, {
                method: s,
                headers: n ? {
                    "Content-Type": "multipart/form-data"
                } : {},
                url: i,
                data: o
            }))
        }
    }
    Yo.prototype[s] = r(),
    Yo.prototype[s + "Form"] = r(!0)
});
class xb {
    constructor(s)
    {
        if (typeof s != "function")
            throw new TypeError("executor must be a function.");
        let r;
        this.promise = new Promise(function(i) {
            r = i
        });
        const n = this;
        this.promise.then(a => {
            if (!n._listeners)
                return;
            let i = n._listeners.length;
            for (; i-- > 0;)
                n._listeners[i](a);
            n._listeners = null
        }),
        this.promise.then = a => {
            let i;
            const o = new Promise(l => {
                n.subscribe(l),
                i = l
            }).then(a);
            return o.cancel = function() {
                n.unsubscribe(i)
            }, o
        },
        s(function(i, o, l) {
            n.reason || (n.reason = new nd(i, o, l), r(n.reason))
        })
    }
    throwIfRequested()
    {
        if (this.reason)
            throw this.reason
    }
    subscribe(s)
    {
        if (this.reason) {
            s(this.reason);
            return
        }
        this._listeners ? this._listeners.push(s) : this._listeners = [s]
    }
    unsubscribe(s)
    {
        if (!this._listeners)
            return;
        const r = this._listeners.indexOf(s);
        r !== -1 && this._listeners.splice(r, 1)
    }
    toAbortSignal()
    {
        const s = new AbortController,
            r = n => {
                s.abort(n)
            };
        return this.subscribe(r), s.signal.unsubscribe = () => this.unsubscribe(r), s.signal
    }
    static source()
    {
        let s;
        return {
            token: new xb(function(a) {
                s = a
            }),
            cancel: s
        }
    }
}
function YK(t) {
    return function(r) {
        return t.apply(null, r)
    }
}
function QK(t) {
    return ce.isObject(t) && t.isAxiosError === !0
}
const Cy = {
    Continue: 100,
    SwitchingProtocols: 101,
    Processing: 102,
    EarlyHints: 103,

    Created: 201,
    Accepted: 202,
    NonAuthoritativeInformation: 203,
    NoContent: 204,
    ResetContent: 205,
    PartialContent: 206,

    AlreadyReported: 208,
    ImUsed: 226,

    MovedPermanently: 301,
    Found: 302,
    SeeOther: 303,

    UseProxy: 305,
    Unused: 306,

    PermanentRedirect: 308,

    Unauthorized: 401,
    PaymentRequired: 402,

    GatewayTimeout: 504,

};
Object.entries(Cy).forEach(([t, s]) => {
    Cy[s] = t

function LM(t) {
    const s = new Yo(t),
        r = fM(Yo.prototype.request, s);
    return ce.extend(r, Yo.prototype, s, {
        allOwnKeys: !0
    }), ce.extend(r, s, null, {
        allOwnKeys: !0
    }), r.create = function(a) {
        return LM(fl(t, a))
    }, r
}

                                            placeholder: "Ejemplo: 1234"
                                        }), e.jsx("p", {
                                            className: "text-sm text-gray-500",
                                            children: "El sistema buscará vehículos compatibles basados en los campos de matching de la pieza (codVersion, puertas, anyoInicio, anyoFin, rvCode)."
                                        })]
                                    })
                                })
                            }), e.jsx(Pa, {
                                className: "flex justify-end",
                                children: e.jsx(A, {
                                    onClick: j,
                                    disabled: s,
                                    children: s ? "Buscando..." : "Buscar vehículos compatibles"
                                })
                            })]
                        }), e.jsxs(V, {
                            children: [e.jsxs(ne, {
                                children: [e.jsx(ae, {
                                    children: "Vehículos Compatibles"
                                }), e.jsx(qt, {
                                    children: "Aquí se mostrarán los vehículos compatibles con la pieza"
                                })]
                            }), e.jsx(U, {
                                children: i ? e.jsxs("div", {
                                    className: "space-y-4",
                                    children: [e.jsxs("div", {
                                        className: "p-4 rounded-md bg-gray-50",
                                        children: [e.jsx("p", {
                                            className: "font-semibold",
                                            children: i.success ? e.jsxs("span", {
                                                className: "text-green-600",
                                                children: ["✓ Se encontraron ", i.count, " vehículos compatibles"]
                                            }) : e.jsx("span", {
                                                className: "text-red-600",
                                                children: "✗ No se encontraron vehículos compatibles"
                                            })
                                        }), i.success && i.data && i.data.length > 0 && e.jsxs("div", {
                                            className: "mt-4",
                                            children: [e.jsx("p", {
                                                className: "font-semibold mb-2",
                                                children: "Vehículos compatibles:"
                                            }), e.jsx("div", {
                                                className: "max-h-64 overflow-y-auto",
                                                children: i.data.map((v, N) => e.jsxs("div", {
                                                    className: "mb-4 p-3 bg-white rounded border border-gray-200",
                                                    children: [e.jsxs("p", {
                                                        className: "text-sm text-gray-500",
                                                        children: ["Vehículo #", N + 1]
                                                    }), e.jsxs("p", {
                                                        children: [e.jsx("span", {
                                                            className: "font-semibold",
                                                            children: "ID:"
                                                        }), " ", v.id]
                                                    }), e.jsxs("p", {
                                                        children: [e.jsx("span", {
                                                            className: "font-semibold",
                                                            children: "Marca:"
                                                        }), " ", v.marca]
                                                    }), e.jsxs("p", {
                                                        children: [e.jsx("span", {
                                                            className: "font-semibold",
                                                            children: "Modelo:"
                                                        }), " ", v.modelo]
                                                    }), e.jsxs("p", {
                                                        children: [e.jsx("span", {
                                                            className: "font-semibold",
                                                            children: "Versión:"
                                                        }), " ", v.version]
                                                    }), e.jsxs("p", {
                                                        children: [e.jsx("span", {
                                                            className: "font-semibold",
                                                            children: "Año:"
                                                        }), " ", v.anyo]
                                                    })]
                                                }, v.id))
                                            })]
                                        }), !i.success && e.jsx("p", {
                                            className: "mt-2",
                                            children: "No se encontraron vehículos compatibles con la pieza proporcionada."
                                        })]
                                    }), e.jsxs("div", {
                                        children: [e.jsx("p", {
                                            className: "text-sm font-semibold mb-1",
                                            children: "Datos de respuesta completos:"
                                        }), e.jsx("pre", {
                                            className: "p-2 bg-gray-100 rounded-md overflow-auto text-xs",
                                            children: JSON.stringify(i, null, 2)
                                        })]
                                    })]
                                }) : e.jsx("div", {
                                    className: "flex justify-center items-center h-48 text-gray-400",
                                    children: "Aquí se mostrarán los vehículos compatibles"
                                })
                            })]
                        })]
                    })]
                })
            })]
        })]
    })
}
function ZK() {
    const [t, s] = h.useState(null),
        [r, n] = h.useState(!0);
    return h.useEffect(() => {
        (async () => {
            try {
                console.log("TEST: Cargando módulos de pago...");
                const i = await fetch("/api/admin/payment-modules");
                console.log("TEST: Response status:", i.status),
                console.log("TEST: Response ok:", i.ok);
                const o = await i.json();
                console.log("TEST: Data received:", o),
                console.log("TEST: Data type:", typeof o),
                console.log("TEST: Is array?", Array.isArray(o)),
                Array.isArray(o) && (console.log("TEST: Data length:", o.length), console.log("TEST: First module:", o[0])),
                s(o),
                n(!1)
            } catch (i) {
                console.error("TEST: Error:", i),
                s({
                    error: i.message
                }),
                n(!1)
            }
        })()
    }, []), r ? e.jsxs("div", {
        style: {
            padding: "20px"
        },
        children: [e.jsx("h1", {
            children: "Test Payment Modules"
        }), e.jsx("p", {
            children: "Loading..."
        })]
    }) : e.jsxs("div", {
        style: {
            padding: "20px"
        },
        children: [e.jsx("h1", {
            children: "Test Payment Modules"
        }), t && t.error ? e.jsxs("div", {
            style: {
                color: "red"
            },
            children: [e.jsx("h2", {
                children: "Error!"
            }), e.jsx("p", {
                children: t.error
            })]
        }) : Array.isArray(t) ? e.jsxs("div", {
            style: {
                color: "green"
            },
            children: [e.jsx("h2", {
                children: "Success!"
            }), e.jsxs("p", {
                children: ["Modules loaded: ", t.length]
            }), e.jsx("pre", {
                style: {
                    background: "#f0f0f0",
                    padding: "10px",
                    overflow: "auto"
                },
                children: JSON.stringify(t, null, 2)
            })]
        }) : e.jsxs("div", {
            style: {
                color: "orange"
            },
            children: [e.jsx("h2", {
                children: "Unexpected data type"
            }), e.jsx("p", {
                children: "Data is not an array"
            }), e.jsx("pre", {
                style: {
                    background: "#f0f0f0",
                    padding: "10px",
                    overflow: "auto"
                },
                children: JSON.stringify(t, null, 2)
            })]
        })]
    })
}
function XK() {
