                        className: "h-8 w-8 text-red-500"
                    }), e.jsx("h1", {
                        className: "text-2xl font-bold text-gray-900",
                        children: "404 Page Not Found"
                    })]
                }), e.jsx("p", {
                    className: "mt-4 text-sm text-gray-600",
                    children: "Did you forget to add the page to the router?"
                })]
            })
        })
    })
}
function _t({path: t, component: s}) {
    const {user: r, isLoading: n} = Ps();
    return n ? e.jsx(Nt, {
        path: t,
        children: () => e.jsx("div", {
            className: "flex items-center justify-center min-h-screen",
            children: e.jsx(Xt, {
                className: "h-8 w-8 animate-spin text-border"
            })
        })
    }) : r ? e.jsx(Nt, {
        path: t,
        component: s
    }) : e.jsx(Nt, {
        path: t,
        children: () => e.jsx(KS, {
            to: "/login"
        })
    })
}
const JK = () => {
        const {toast: t} = tt(),
            [s, r] = h.useState(!1),
            [n, a] = h.useState(!1),
            {data: i, isLoading: o, refetch: l} = _e({
                queryKey: ["/api/google-merchant/stats"],
                queryFn: () => fetch("/api/google-merchant/stats").then(y => y.json())
            }),
            c = async () => {
                try {
                    r(!0),
                    t({
                        title: "Generando feed",
                        description: "Creando archivo XML para Google Merchant Center..."
                    });
                    const y = await fetch("/api/google-merchant/feed.xml");
                    if (!y.ok)
                        throw new Error("Error al generar el feed");
                    const g = await y.blob(),
                        x = window.URL.createObjectURL(g),
                        b = document.createElement("a");
                    b.href = x,
                    b.download = `google-merchant-feed-${new Date().toISOString().split("T")[0]}.xml`,
                    document.body.appendChild(b),
                    b.click(),
                    document.body.removeChild(b),
                    window.URL.revokeObjectURL(x),
                    t({
                        title: "Feed descargado",
                        description: "El archivo XML se ha descargado correctamente"
                    })
                } catch (y) {
                    console.error("Error al descargar feed:", y),
                    t({
                        title: "Error",
                        description: "No se pudo descargar el feed XML",
                        variant: "destructive"
                    })
                } finally {
                    r(!1)
                }
            },
            d = async () => {
                try {
                    const y = await fetch("/api/google-merchant/preview");
                    if (!y.ok)
                        throw new Error("Error al generar vista previa");
                    const g = await y.text(),
                        x = window.open();
                    x && (x.document.write(`
          <html>
            <head>
              <title>Vista previa - Google Merchant Feed</title>
              <style>
                body { font-family: monospace; padding: 20px; }
                pre { white-space: pre-wrap; background: #f5f5f5; padding: 15px; border-radius: 5px; }
              </style>
            </head>
            <body>
              <h2>Vista previa del Feed XML (primeros 10 productos)</h2>
              <pre>${









                    g.replace(/</g, "&lt;").replace(/>/g, "&gt;")}</pre>
            </body>
          </html>
        `


                    ), x.document.close())
                } catch (y) {
                    console.error("Error al mostrar vista previa:", y),
                    t({
                        title: "Error",
                        description: "No se pudo mostrar la vista previa",
                        variant: "destructive"
                    })
                }
            },
            u = () => {
                const y = `${window.location.origin}/api/google-merchant/feed.xml`;
                navigator.clipboard.writeText(y),
                a(!0),
                t({
                    title: "URL copiada",
                    description: "La URL del feed se ha copiado al portapapeles"
                }),
                setTimeout(() => a(!1), 2e3)
            },
            m = `${window.location.origin}/api/google-merchant/feed.xml`,
            f = i == null ? void 0 : i.data;
        return e.jsx("div", {
            className: "min-h-screen bg-gray-50",

                            })
                        }), e.jsxs(U, {
                            className: "space-y-4",
                            children: [e.jsxs("div", {
                                className: "space-y-3",
                                children: [e.jsxs("div", {

                                    })]
                                }), e.jsxs("div", {
                                    className: "flex justify-between items-center p-3 bg-gray-50 rounded-lg",
                                    children: [e.jsx("span", {
                                        className: "font-medium",
                                        children: "Productos con imágenes:"
                                    }), e.jsxs(ge, {
                                        variant: f.partsWithImages / f.totalParts > .7 ? "default" : "destructive",
                                        children: [Math.round(f.partsWithImages / f.totalParts * 100), "%"]
                                    })]
                                })]
                            }), (f.partsWithPrice / f.totalParts < .8 || f.partsWithImages / f.totalParts < .7) && e.jsxs("div", {
                                className: "flex items-start gap-2 p-3 bg-yellow-50 rounded-lg",
                                children: [e.jsx(Fr, {
                                    className: "h-5 w-5 text-yellow-600 mt-0.5"
                                }), e.jsxs("div", {
                                    className: "text-sm text-yellow-800",
                                    children: [e.jsx("strong", {
                                        children: "Recomendación:"
                                    }), " Para mejorar la calidad del feed, asegúrate de que todas las piezas tengan precios válidos e imágenes. Esto aumentará la visibilidad en Google Shopping."]
                                })]
                            })]
                        })]
                    })]
                })]
            })
        })
    },
    eY = ({importHistory: t, onControlImport: s, onDeleteAllHistory: r}) => {
        const n = c => {
                switch (c) {
                case "completed":
                    return e.jsx(zt, {
                        className: "h-4 w-4 text-green-500"
                    });
                case "failed":
                    return e.jsx(Sa, {
                        className: "h-4 w-4 text-red-500"
                    });
                case "in_progress":
                case "processing":
                case "running":
                    return e.jsx(gt, {
                        className: "h-4 w-4 text-blue-500 animate-spin"
                    });
                case "paused":
                    return e.jsx(Cv, {
                        className: "h-4 w-4 text-yellow-500"
                    });
                default:
                    return e.jsx(qs, {
                        className: "h-4 w-4 text-gray-500"
                    })
                }
            },
            a = c => {
                const d = {
                    completed: "default",
                    failed: "destructive",
                    in_progress: "secondary",
                    processing: "secondary",
                    running: "secondary",
                    paused: "outline"
                };
                return e.jsxs(ge, {
                    variant: d[c] || "outline",
                    className: "flex items-center gap-1",
                    children: [n(c), c]
                })
            },
            i = c => {
                switch (c) {
                case "vehicles":
                    return "Vehículos";
                case "parts":
                    return "Piezas";
                case "all":
                    return "Todo";
                default:
                    return c
                }
            },
            o = t.filter(c => c.status === "in_progress" || c.status === "processing" || c.status === "running"),
            l = t.filter(c => c.status === "completed" || c.status === "failed" || c.status === "paused");
        return e.jsxs("div", {
            className: "space-y-6",
            children: [o.length > 0 && e.jsxs(V, {
                children: [e.jsx(ne, {
                    children: e.jsxs(ae, {
                        className: "flex items-center gap-2",
                        children: [e.jsx(gt, {
                            className: "h-5 w-5 animate-spin"
                        }), "Importaciones en Curso (", o.length, ")"]
                    })
                }), e.jsx(U, {
                    className: "space-y-4",
                    children: o.map(c => e.jsxs("div", {
                        className: "p-4 border rounded-lg space-y-3",
                        children: [e.jsxs("div", {
                            className: "flex justify-between items-start",
                            children: [e.jsxs("div", {
                                className: "space-y-1",
                                children: [e.jsxs("div", {
                                    className: "flex items-center gap-2",
                                    children: [e.jsxs("h4", {
                                        className: "font-medium",
                                        children: [i(c.type), " - ", c.isFullImport ? "Completa" : "Incremental"]
                                    }), a(c.status)]
                                }), e.jsxs("p", {
                                    className: "text-sm text-muted-foreground",
                                    children: ["Iniciada: ", Bt(new Date(c.startTime), "dd/MM/yyyy HH:mm", {
                                        locale: Ss
                                    })]
                                }), c.processingItem && e.jsx("p", {
                                    className: "text-sm text-blue-600",
                                    children: c.processingItem
                                })]
                            }), e.jsxs("div", {
                                className: "flex gap-1",
                                children: [e.jsx(A, {
                                    size: "sm",
                                    variant: "outline",
                                    onClick: () => s(c.id, "pause"),
                                    children: e.jsx(Cv, {
                                        className: "h-3 w-3"
                                    })
                                }), e.jsx(A, {
                                    size: "sm",
                                    variant: "destructive",
                                    onClick: () => s(c.id, "cancel"),
                                    children: e.jsx(P5, {
                                        className: "h-3 w-3"
                                    })
                                })]
                            })]
                        }), c.progress !== void 0 && e.jsxs("div", {
                            className: "space-y-2",
                            children: [e.jsxs("div", {
                                className: "flex justify-between text-sm",
                                children: [e.jsx("span", {
                                    children: "Progreso"
                                }), e.jsxs("span", {
                                    children: [Math.round(c.progress), "%"]
                                })]
                            }), e.jsx(Bf, {
                                value: c.progress,
                                className: "h-2"
                            })]
                        }), c.processedItems !== void 0 && c.totalItems !== void 0 && e.jsxs("div", {
                            className: "grid grid-cols-3 gap-4 text-sm",
                            children: [e.jsxs("div", {
                                children: [e.jsx("span", {
                                    className: "text-muted-foreground",
                                    children: "Procesados:"
                                }), e.jsxs("p", {
                                    className: "font-medium",
                                    children: [c.processedItems, "/", c.totalItems]
                                })]
                            }), e.jsxs("div", {
                                children: [e.jsx("span", {
                                    className: "text-muted-foreground",
                                    children: "Nuevos:"
                                }), e.jsx("p", {
                                    className: "font-medium text-green-600",
                                    children: c.newItems || 0
                                })]
                            }), e.jsxs("div", {
                                children: [e.jsx("span", {
                                    className: "text-muted-foreground",
                                    children: "Actualizados:"
                                }), e.jsx("p", {
                                    className: "font-medium text-blue-600",
                                    children: c.updatedItems || 0
                                })]
                            })]
                        })]
                    }, c.id))
                })]
            }), e.jsxs(V, {
                children: [e.jsx(ne, {
                    children: e.jsxs("div", {
                        className: "flex justify-between items-center",
                        children: [e.jsx(ae, {
                            children: "Historial de Importaciones"
                        }), r && l.length > 0 && e.jsxs(A, {
                            size: "sm",
                            variant: "destructive",
                            onClick: r,
                            children: [e.jsx(Jt, {
                                className: "h-3 w-3 mr-1"
                            }), "Eliminar Todo"]
                        })]
                    })
                }), e.jsx(U, {
                    className: "space-y-4",
                    children: l.length === 0 ? e.jsx("p", {
                        className: "text-muted-foreground text-center py-4",
                        children: "No hay importaciones completadas"
                    }) : l.map(c => e.jsx("div", {
                        className: "p-4 border rounded-lg",
                        children: e.jsxs("div", {
                            className: "flex justify-between items-start",
                            children: [e.jsxs("div", {
                                className: "space-y-1",
                                children: [e.jsxs("div", {
                                    className: "flex items-center gap-2",
                                    children: [e.jsxs("h4", {
                                        className: "font-medium",
                                        children: [i(c.type), " - ", c.isFullImport ? "Completa" : "Incremental"]
                                    }), a(c.status)]
                                }), e.jsxs("p", {
                                    className: "text-sm text-muted-foreground",
                                    children: [Bt(new Date(c.startTime), "dd/MM/yyyy HH:mm", {
                                        locale: Ss
                                    }), c.endTime && e.jsxs(e.Fragment, {
                                        children: [" - ", Bt(new Date(c.endTime), "HH:mm", {
                                            locale: Ss
                                        })]
                                    })]
                                }), (c.newItems !== void 0 || c.updatedItems !== void 0) && e.jsxs("div", {
                                    className: "flex gap-4 text-sm",
                                    children: [c.newItems !== void 0 && e.jsxs("span", {
                                        className: "text-green-600",
                                        children: ["+", c.newItems, " nuevos"]
                                    }), c.updatedItems !== void 0 && e.jsxs("span", {
                                        className: "text-blue-600",
                                        children: ["~", c.updatedItems, " actualizados"]
                                    })]
                                }), c.errors && c.errors.length > 0 && e.jsxs("div", {
                                    className: "text-sm text-red-600",
                                    children: [c.errors.length, " error(es)"]
                                })]
                            }), e.jsxs("div", {
                                className: "flex gap-1",
                                children: [c.status === "paused" && e.jsx(A, {
                                    size: "sm",
                                    variant: "outline",
                                    onClick: () => s(c.id, "resume"),
                                    children: e.jsx(S5, {
                                        className: "h-3 w-3"
                                    })
                                }), e.jsx(A, {
                                    size: "sm",
                                    variant: "ghost",
                                    onClick: () => {
                                        console.log("Intentando eliminar importación:", c.id, c),
                                        c.id ? s(c.id, "delete") : console.error("ID de importación no encontrado:", c)
                                    },
                                    className: "text-red-600 hover:text-red-700",
                                    children: e.jsx(Jt, {
                                        className: "h-3 w-3"
                                    })
                                })]
                            })]
                        })
                    }, c.id))
                })]
            })]
        })
    },
    tY = () => {
        const [, t] = dt(),
            {toast: s} = tt(),
            {user: r, logout: n} = Ps(),
            [a, i] = h.useState({
                vehiclesIncremental: !1,
                vehiclesComplete: !1,
                partsIncremental: !1,
                partsComplete: !1,
                allComplete: !1,
                allIncremental: !1,
                updateCounters: !1
            }),
            [o, l] = h.useState([]),
            [c, d] = h.useState({
                type: "vehicles",
                frequency: "12h",
                active: !0,
                isFullImport: !1,
                days: ["monday", "tuesday", "wednesday", "thursday", "friday"]
            }),
            [u, m] = h.useState(null),
            [f, y] = h.useState({
                fromDate: void 0,
                fullImport: !1,
                batchSize: 1e3,
                autoRecovery: !0
            }),
            [g, x] = h.useState([]),
            [b, j] = h.useState(!0),
            [p, v] = h.useState(!0),
            [N, w] = h.useState("import");
        h.useState(!1),
        h.useState(null);
        const {data: C, isLoading: S, refetch: E} = _e({
                queryKey: ["/api/import/history"],
                queryFn: () => ss.getHistory(20),
                refetchInterval: p ? 5e3 : !1
            }),
            {data: O, isLoading: G, refetch: L} = _e({
                queryKey: ["/api/import/schedule"],
                queryFn: () => ss.getSchedules(),
                refetchInterval: p ? 1e4 : !1
            }),
            {data: I, refetch: z, error: B} = _e({
                queryKey: ["/api/import/stats"],
                queryFn: () => ss.getImportStats(),
                refetchInterval: p ? 3e4 : !1,
                retry: 3,
                retryDelay: H => Math.min(1e3 * 2 ** H, 3e4)
            });
        h.useEffect(() => {
            O && l(O)
        }, [O]),
        h.useEffect(() => {
            if (!C)
                return;
            const H = C.some(se => se.status === "in_progress" || se.status === "processing");
            j(H),
            x(C.filter(se => se.status === "in_progress" || se.status === "processing"))
        }, [C]);
        const F = async () => {
                try {
                    await n(),
                    t("/admin")
                } catch (H) {
                    console.error("Error al cerrar sesión:", H),
                    s({
                        title: "Error",
                        description: "No se pudo cerrar la sesión",
                        variant: "destructive"
                    })
                }
            },
            T = async (H, se=!1) => {
                try {
                    const de = k(H, se);
                    i(ve => ({
                        ...ve,
                        [de]: !0
                    }));
                    const le = {
                        fromDate: !se && f.fromDate ? Bt(f.fromDate, "yyyy-MM-dd") : void 0,
                        fullImport: se,
                        batchSize: f.batchSize,
                        autoRecovery: f.autoRecovery
                    };
                    await ss.startOptimizedImport(H, le),
                    s({
                        title: "Importación iniciada",
                        description: `La importación ${se ? "completa" : "incremental"} de ${H === "vehicles" ? "vehículos" : H === "parts" ? "piezas" : "vehículos y piezas"} ha comenzado`
                    }),
                    w("monitor"),
                    E(),
                    z()
                } catch (de) {
                    console.error("Error al iniciar importación:", de),
                    s({
                        title: "Error",
                        description: "No se pudo iniciar la importación",
                        variant: "destructive"
                    })
                } finally {
                    setTimeout(() => {
                        const de = k(H, se);
                        i(le => ({
                            ...le,
                            [de]: !1
                        }))
                    }, 2e3)
                }
            },
            k = (H, se) => H === "vehicles" ? se ? "vehiclesComplete" : "vehiclesIncremental" : H === "parts" ? se ? "partsComplete" : "partsIncremental" : se ? "allComplete" : "allIncremental",
            D = async () => {
                try {
                    i(de => ({
                        ...de,
                        updateCounters: !0
                    }));
                    const H = await fetch("/api/import/update-vehicle-counters", {
                        method: "POST",
                        headers: {
                            "Content-Type": "application/json"
                        },
                        credentials: "include"
                    });
                    if (!H.ok)
                        throw new Error("Error al actualizar contadores");
                    const se = await H.json();
                    s({
                        title: "Contadores actualizados",
                        description: "Los contadores de piezas en vehículos se han actualizado correctamente"
                    }),
                    z(),
                    E()
                } catch (H) {
                    console.error("Error al actualizar contadores:", H),
                    s({
                        title: "Error",
                        description: "No se pudieron actualizar los contadores de piezas",
                        variant: "destructive"
                    })
                } finally {
                    i(H => ({
                        ...H,
                        updateCounters: !1
                    }))
                }
            },
            $ = async () => {
                try {
                    await ss.createSchedule(c);
                    const H = c.isFullImport ? "completa" : "incremental";
                    s({
                        title: "Programación creada",
                        description: `Importación ${H} de ${c.type} programada cada ${c.frequency}`
                    }),
                    L(),
                    d({
                        type: "vehicles",
                        frequency: "12h",
                        active: !0,
                        isFullImport: !1,
                        days: ["monday", "tuesday", "wednesday", "thursday", "friday"]
                    })
                } catch (H) {
                    console.error("Error al programar importación:", H),
                    s({
                        title: "Error",
                        description: "No se pudo programar la importación",
                        variant: "destructive"
                    })
                }
            },
            re = async (H, se) => {
                try {
                    await ss.updateScheduleConfig(H, se),
                    s({
                        title: "Programación actualizada",
                        description: "La programación ha sido actualizada correctamente"
                    }),
                    L(),
                    m(null)
                } catch (de) {
                    console.error("Error al actualizar programación:", de),
                    s({
                        title: "Error",
                        description: "No se pudo actualizar la programación",
                        variant: "destructive"
                    })
                }
            },
            R = H => {
                m(H)
            },
            M = () => {
                m(null)
            },
            K = async (H, se) => {
                try {
                    if (console.log(`Ejecutando acción ${se} para importación ID: ${H}`), se === "pause")
                        await ss.pauseImportOperation(H);
                    else if (se === "resume")
                        await ss.resumeImportOperation(H);
                    else if (se === "cancel")
                        await ss.cancelImportOperation(H);
                    else if (se === "delete") {
                        const le = await ss.deleteImportFromHistory(H);
                        console.log("Resultado de eliminación:", le)
                    }
                    const de = {
                        pause: "pausada",
                        resume: "reanudada",
                        cancel: "cancelada",
                        delete: "eliminada"
                    }[se];
                    s({
                        title: "Importación " + de,
                        description: `La importación ha sido ${de} correctamente`
                    }),
                    E()
                } catch (de) {
                    console.error(`Error al ${se} importación:`, de),
                    console.error("Error details:", de),
                    s({
                        title: "Error",
                        description: de instanceof Error ? de.message : `No se pudo ${se} la importación`,
                        variant: "destructive"
                    })
                }
            },
            oe = async () => {
                try {
                    await ss.deleteAllImportHistory(),
                    s({
                        title: "Historial eliminado",
                        description: "Todo el historial de importaciones ha sido eliminado correctamente"
                    }),
                    E(),
                    z()
                } catch (H) {
                    console.error("Error al eliminar historial:", H),
                    s({
                        title: "Error",
                        description: "No se pudo eliminar el historial de importaciones",
                        variant: "destructive"
                    })
                }
            },
            be = async () => {
                try {
                    await ss.clearImportStatistics(),
                    s({
                        title: "Estadísticas limpiadas",
                        description: "Las estadísticas de importación han sido reiniciadas"
                    }),
                    z()
                } catch (H) {
                    console.error("Error al limpiar estadísticas:", H),
                    s({
                        title: "Error",
                        description: "No se pudieron limpiar las estadísticas",
                        variant: "destructive"
                    })
                }
            },
            Se = async (H, se) => {
                try {
                    await ss.updateScheduleConfig(H, {
                        active: se
                    }),
                    s({
                        title: se ? "Programación activada" : "Programación desactivada",
                        description: `La programación ha sido ${se ? "activada" : "desactivada"}`
                    }),
                    L()
                } catch (de) {
                    console.error("Error al actualizar programación:", de),
                    s({
                        title: "Error",
                        description: "No se pudo actualizar la programación",
                        variant: "destructive"
                    })
                }
            },
            _ = async H => {
                try {
                    await ss.deleteSchedule(H),
                    L(),
                    s({
                        title: "Programación eliminada",
                        description: "La programación ha sido eliminada correctamente"
                    })
                } catch (se) {
                    console.error("Error al eliminar programación:", se),
                    s({
                        title: "Error",
                        description: "No se pudo eliminar la programación",
                        variant: "destructive"
                    })
                }
            },
            ee = H => {
                switch (H) {
                case "completed":
                    return e.jsx(zt, {
                        className: "h-4 w-4 text-green-500"
                    });
                case "failed":
                    return e.jsx(Sa, {
                        className: "h-4 w-4 text-red-500"
                    });
                case "in_progress":
                    return e.jsx(gt, {
                        className: "h-4 w-4 text-blue-500 animate-spin"
                    });
                case "paused":
                    return e.jsx(Cv, {
                        className: "h-4 w-4 text-yellow-500"
                    });
                default:
                    return e.jsx(qs, {
                        className: "h-4 w-4 text-gray-500"
                    })
                }
            };
        return G ? e.jsx("div", {
            className: "flex items-center justify-center min-h-screen",
            children: e.jsx("div", {
                className: "animate-spin h-12 w-12 border-4 border-primary border-t-transparent rounded-full"
            })
        }) : e.jsxs("div", {
            className: "flex min-h-screen bg-gray-100",
            children: [e.jsx(Fs, {}), e.jsxs("div", {
                className: "flex-1 p-8",
                children: [e.jsxs("div", {
                    className: "flex justify-between items-center mb-8",
                    children: [e.jsxs("div", {
                        children: [e.jsx("h1", {
                            className: "text-3xl font-montserrat font-bold",
                            children: "Importación Optimizada"
                        }), e.jsxs("p", {
                            className: "text-muted-foreground",
                            children: ["Sistema avanzado de importación y sincronización de datos", p && e.jsxs("span", {
                                className: "ml-2 inline-flex items-center text-green-600 font-medium",
                                children: [e.jsx(gt, {
                                    className: "h-3 w-3 mr-1 animate-spin"
                                }), "Actualización automática activa"]
                            })]
                        })]
                    }), e.jsxs(A, {
                        variant: "outline",
                        onClick: F,
                        children: [e.jsx(Ea, {
                            className: "mr-2 h-4 w-4"
                        }), "Cerrar sesión"]
                    })]
                }), g.length > 0 && e.jsxs(ir, {
                    className: "mb-6 border-blue-200 bg-blue-50",
                    children: [e.jsx(gt, {
                        className: "h-4 w-4 animate-spin"
                    }), e.jsxs(or, {
                        children: ["Hay ", g.length, " importación(es) en curso.", p ? " La página se actualiza automáticamente cada 5 segundos." : " Active la actualización automática en Configuración para monitoreo en tiempo real."]
                    })]
                }), e.jsxs(ls, {
                    value: N,
                    onValueChange: w,
                    className: "space-y-6",
                    children: [e.jsxs(es, {
                        className: "grid w-full grid-cols-4",
                        children: [e.jsx(Ve, {
                            value: "import",
                            children: "Importación"
                        }), e.jsx(Ve, {

                        }), e.jsx(Ve, {
                            value: "config",

                        })]
                    }), e.jsxs(ze, {
                        value: "import",

                            className: "grid grid-cols-1 md:grid-cols-2 gap-6 mb-6",

                                    }), "Configuración de Importación"]
                                })
                            }), e.jsxs(U, {

                                        }), e.jsx(ib, {

                                            onChange: H => y(se => ({
                                                ...se,

                                            }))

                                        }), e.jsxs(He, {

                                            })),

                                                })]

                                        onCheckedChange: H => y(se => ({
                                            ...se,
                                            fullImport: H
                                        }))

                                            ...se,
                                            autoRecovery: H
                                        }))
                                    }), e.jsx(q, {
                                        htmlFor: "autoRecovery",
                                        children: "Recuperación automática de errores"
                                    })]
                                })]
                            })]
                        }), e.jsxs("div", {
                            className: "grid grid-cols-1 md:grid-cols-3 gap-6",

                                children: [e.jsx(ne, {
                                    children: e.jsxs(ae, {
                                        className: "flex items-center gap-2",
                                        children: [e.jsx(li, {
                                            className: "h-5 w-5"
                                        }), "Vehículos"]
                                    })
                                }), e.jsxs(U, {
                                    className: "space-y-4",
                                    children: [e.jsxs("div", {
                                        className: "space-y-2",
                                        children: [e.jsxs(A, {
                                            onClick: () => T("vehicles", !1),
                                            disabled: a.vehiclesIncremental || a.vehiclesComplete,
                                            className: "w-full",
                                            children: [a.vehiclesIncremental ? e.jsx(gt, {
                                                className: "mr-2 h-4 w-4 animate-spin"
                                            }) : e.jsx(ma, {
                                                className: "mr-2 h-4 w-4"
                                            }), "Importación Incremental"]
                                        }), e.jsxs(A, {
                                            onClick: () => T("vehicles", !0),
                                            disabled: a.vehiclesIncremental || a.vehiclesComplete,
                                            variant: "outline",
                                            className: "w-full",
                                            children: [a.vehiclesComplete ? e.jsx(gt, {
                                                className: "mr-2 h-4 w-4 animate-spin"
                                            }) : e.jsx(ma, {
                                                className: "mr-2 h-4 w-4"
                                            }), "Importación Completa"]
                                        })]
