                                    children: e.jsxs("div", {
                                        className: "flex justify-between items-center",
                                        children: [e.jsx(ae, {
                                            children: "Estadísticas Generales"
                                        }), e.jsxs(A, {
                                            size: "sm",
                                            variant: "outline",
                                            onClick: be,
                                            className: "text-orange-600 hover:text-orange-700",
                                            children: [e.jsx(Jt, {
                                                className: "h-3 w-3 mr-1"
                                            }), "Limpiar Estadísticas"]
                                        })]
                                    })
                                }), e.jsx(U, {
                                    children: I && e.jsxs("div", {
                                        className: "space-y-4",
                                        children: [e.jsxs("div", {
                                            className: "grid grid-cols-2 gap-4",
                                            children: [e.jsxs("div", {
                                                className: "text-center",
                                                children: [e.jsx("p", {
                                                    className: "text-2xl font-bold",
                                                    children: I.totalImports || 0
                                                }), e.jsx("p", {
                                                    className: "text-sm text-muted-foreground",
                                                    children: "Importaciones totales"
                                                })]
                                            }), e.jsxs("div", {
                                                className: "text-center",
                                                children: [e.jsxs("p", {
                                                    className: "text-2xl font-bold",
                                                    children: [I.successRate || 0, "%"]
                                                }), e.jsx("p", {
                                                    className: "text-sm text-muted-foreground",
                                                    children: "Tasa de éxito"
                                                })]
                                            })]
                                        }), e.jsx(wa, {}), e.jsxs("div", {
                                            className: "space-y-2",
                                            children: [e.jsxs("p", {
                                                className: "text-sm",
                                                children: [e.jsx("span", {
                                                    className: "font-medium",
                                                    children: "Última importación:"
                                                }), " ", I.lastImport ? new Date(I.lastImport).toLocaleString() : "Nunca"]
                                            }), e.jsxs("p", {
                                                className: "text-sm",
                                                children: [e.jsx("span", {
                                                    className: "font-medium",
                                                    children: "Próxima programada:"
                                                }), " ", I.nextScheduled ? new Date(I.nextScheduled).toLocaleString() : "No programada"]
                                            })]
                                        })]
                                    })
                                })]
                            })]
                        })
                    })]
                })]
            })]
        })
    };
function FM({content: t, onChange: s, placeholder: r, className: n}) {
    const a = h.useRef(null),
        [i, o] = h.useState(!1),
        [l, c] = h.useState(t);
    h.useEffect(() => {
        if (c(t), a.current && a.current.innerHTML !== t) {
            const p = di.sanitize(t, {
                ALLOWED_TAGS: ["p", "br", "strong", "em", "u", "h1", "h2", "h3", "h4", "h5", "h6", "ul", "ol", "li", "a", "img", "div"],
                ALLOWED_ATTR: ["href", "target", "rel", "src", "alt", "style", "class"],
                ALLOWED_URI_REGEXP: /^(?:(?:(?:f|ht)tps?|mailto|tel|callto|cid|xmpp|data):|[^a-z]|[a-z+.\-]+(?:[^a-z+.\-:]|$))/i
            });
            a.current.innerHTML = p
        }
    }, [t]);
    const d = () => {
            if (a.current) {
                const p = a.current.innerHTML;
                c(p),
                s(p)
            }
        },
        u = p => {
            if (c(p), s(p), a.current) {
                const v = di.sanitize(p, {
                    ALLOWED_TAGS: ["p", "br", "strong", "em", "u", "h1", "h2", "h3", "h4", "h5", "h6", "ul", "ol", "li", "a", "img", "div"],
                    ALLOWED_ATTR: ["href", "target", "rel", "src", "alt", "style", "class"],
                    ALLOWED_URI_REGEXP: /^(?:(?:(?:f|ht)tps?|mailto|tel|callto|cid|xmpp|data):|[^a-z]|[a-z+.\-]+(?:[^a-z+.\-:]|$))/i
                });
                a.current.innerHTML = v
            }
        },
        m = (p, v) => {
            var N;
            try {
                document.queryCommandSupported && document.queryCommandSupported(p) ? document.execCommand(p, !1, v) : f(p, v)
            } catch (w) {
                console.warn("Error executing command:", p, w),
                f(p, v)
            }
            (N = a.current) == null || N.focus(),
            d()
        },
        f = (p, v) => {
            if (!a.current)
                return;
            const N = window.getSelection();
            if (!N || N.rangeCount === 0)
                return;
            const w = N.getRangeAt(0);
            switch (p) {
            case "bold":
                y("strong");
                break;
            case "italic":
                y("em");
                break;
            case "underline":
                y("u");
                break;
            case "createLink":
                if (v) {
                    const C = document.createElement("a");
                    C.href = v,
                    C.target = "_blank",
                    C.rel = "noopener noreferrer";
                    try {
                        w.surroundContents(C)
                    } catch {
                        w.deleteContents(),
                        w.insertNode(C)
                    }
                }
                break;
            case "insertImage":
                if (v) {
                    const C = document.createElement("img");
                    C.src = v,
                    C.style.maxWidth = "100%",
                    C.style.height = "auto",
                    w.insertNode(C)
                }
                break;
            case "insertUnorderedList":
                g("ul");
                break;
            default:
                if (p.startsWith("justify")) {
                    const C = p.replace("justify", "").toLowerCase(),
                        S = document.createElement("div");
                    S.style.textAlign = C === "left" ? "left" : C === "center" ? "center" : "right";
                    try {
                        w.surroundContents(S)
                    } catch {
                        w.deleteContents(),
                        w.insertNode(S)
                    }
                }
                break
            }
        },
        y = p => {
            const v = window.getSelection();
            if (!v || v.rangeCount === 0)
                return;
            const N = v.getRangeAt(0),
                w = N.toString();
            if (w) {
                const C = document.createElement(p);
                C.textContent = w,
                N.deleteContents(),
                N.insertNode(C)
            }
        },
        g = p => {
            const v = window.getSelection();
            if (!v || v.rangeCount === 0)
                return;
            const N = v.getRangeAt(0),
                w = N.toString();
            if (w) {
                const C = document.createElement(p),
                    S = document.createElement("li");
                S.textContent = w,
                C.appendChild(S),
                N.deleteContents(),
                N.insertNode(C)
            }
        },
        x = () => {
            const p = prompt("Ingrese la URL:");
            p && m("createLink", p)
        },
        b = () => {
            const p = prompt("Ingrese la URL de la imagen:");
            p && m("insertImage", p)
        },
        j = [{
            icon: n5,
            command: "bold",
            title: "Negrita"
        }, {
            icon: j5,
            command: "italic",
            title: "Cursiva"
        }, {
            icon: I5,
            command: "underline",
            title: "Subrayado"
        }, {
            icon: e5,
            command: "justifyLeft",
            title: "Alinear izquierda"
        }, {
            icon: JO,
            command: "justifyCenter",
            title: "Centrar"
        }, {
            icon: t5,
            command: "justifyRight",
            title: "Alinear derecha"
        }, {
            icon: jp,
            command: "insertUnorderedList",
            title: "Lista"
        }];
    return e.jsx("div", {
        className: ue("border rounded-lg overflow-hidden", n),
        children: e.jsxs(ls, {
            defaultValue: "visual",
            className: "w-full",
            children: [e.jsxs(es, {
                className: "grid w-full grid-cols-2",
                children: [e.jsx(Ve, {
                    value: "visual",
                    children: "Editor Visual"
                }), e.jsx(Ve, {
                    value: "html",
                    children: "Código HTML"
                })]
            }), e.jsxs(ze, {
                value: "visual",
                className: "m-0",
                children: [e.jsxs("div", {
                    className: "border-b bg-gray-50 p-2 flex flex-wrap gap-1",
                    children: [j.map(p => e.jsx(A, {
                        variant: "ghost",
                        size: "sm",
                        className: "h-8 w-8 p-0",
                        onClick: () => m(p.command),
                        title: p.title,
                        type: "button",
                        children: e.jsx(p.icon, {
                            className: "h-4 w-4"
                        })
                    }, p.command)), e.jsx("div", {
                        className: "w-px h-6 bg-gray-300 mx-1"
                    }), e.jsx(A, {
                        variant: "ghost",
                        size: "sm",
                        className: "h-8 w-8 p-0",
                        onClick: x,
                        title: "Insertar enlace",
                        type: "button",
                        children: e.jsx(N5, {
                            className: "h-4 w-4"
                        })
                    }), e.jsx(A, {
                        variant: "ghost",
                        size: "sm",
                        className: "h-8 w-8 p-0",
                        onClick: b,
                        title: "Insertar imagen",
                        type: "button",
                        children: e.jsx(Vs, {
                            className: "h-4 w-4"
                        })
                    }), e.jsx("div", {
                        className: "w-px h-6 bg-gray-300 mx-1"
                    }), e.jsxs("select", {
                        onChange: p => m("formatBlock", p.target.value),
                        className: "h-8 px-2 text-sm border rounded",
                        defaultValue: "",
                        children: [e.jsx("option", {
                            value: "",
                            children: "Formato"
                        }), e.jsx("option", {
                            value: "h1",
                            children: "Título 1"
                        }), e.jsx("option", {
                            value: "h2",
                            children: "Título 2"
                        }), e.jsx("option", {
                            value: "h3",
                            children: "Título 3"
                        }), e.jsx("option", {
                            value: "p",
                            children: "Párrafo"
                        })]
                    })]
                }), e.jsxs("div", {
                    className: "relative",
                    children: [e.jsx("div", {
                        ref: a,
                        contentEditable: !0,
                        onInput: d,
                        onFocus: () => o(!0),
                        onBlur: () => o(!1),
                        className: ue("min-h-[300px] p-4 outline-none prose prose-sm max-w-none", "focus:ring-2 focus:ring-blue-500 focus:ring-inset", !t && !i && "text-gray-400"),
                        style: {
                            whiteSpace: "pre-wrap",
                            wordWrap: "break-word"
                        },
                        suppressContentEditableWarning: !0
                    }), !t && !i && e.jsx("div", {
                        className: "absolute top-4 left-4 text-gray-400 pointer-events-none",
                        children: r || "Escriba el contenido aquí..."
                    })]
                })]
            }), e.jsx(ze, {
                value: "html",
                className: "m-0",
                children: e.jsx(Ut, {
                    value: l,
                    onChange: p => u(p.target.value),
                    placeholder: "Ingrese el código HTML aquí...",
                    className: "min-h-[400px] font-mono text-sm border-0 rounded-none resize-none"
                })
            })]
        })
    })
}
function sY() {
    const [t, s] = h.useState("pages"),
        [r, n] = h.useState(null),
        [a, i] = h.useState(null),
        [o, l] = h.useState({}),
        [c, d] = h.useState({}),
        [u, m] = h.useState(!1),
        [f, y] = h.useState(!1),
        {toast: g} = tt(),
        x = hr(),
        {data: b, isLoading: j} = _e({
            queryKey: ["/api/admin/cms/pages"],
            queryFn: async () => {
                const I = await fetch("/api/admin/cms/pages", {
                    credentials: "include"
                });
                if (!I.ok)
                    throw new Error("Error al cargar páginas");
                return I.json()
            }
        }),
        {data: p, isLoading: v} = _e({
            queryKey: ["/api/admin/cms/footer-blocks"],
            queryFn: async () => {
                const I = await fetch("/api/admin/cms/footer-blocks", {
                    credentials: "include"
                });
                if (!I.ok)
                    throw new Error("Error al cargar bloques");
                return I.json()
            }
        }),
        {data: N, isLoading: w, error: C} = _e({
            queryKey: ["/api/cms/site-settings"],
            queryFn: async () => {
                const I = await fetch("/api/cms/site-settings", {
                    credentials: "include"
                });
                if (!I.ok)
                    throw new Error("Error al cargar configuraciones");
                return I.json()
            }
        }),
        S = async () => {
            try {
                const I = r ? "PUT" : "POST",
                    z = r ? `/api/admin/cms/pages/${r.id}` : "/api/admin/cms/pages";
                if (!(await fetch(z, {
                    method: I,
                    headers: {
                        "Content-Type": "application/json"
                    },
                    credentials: "include",
                    body: JSON.stringify(o)
                })).ok)
                    throw new Error("Error al guardar página");
                x.invalidateQueries({
                    queryKey: ["/api/admin/cms/pages"]
                }),
                n(null),
                l({}),
                m(!1),
                g({
                    title: r ? "Página actualizada exitosamente" : "Página creada exitosamente"
                })
            } catch {
                g({
                    title: "Error al guardar página",
                    variant: "destructive"
                })
            }
        },
        E = async I => {
            try {
                if (!(await fetch(`/api/admin/cms/pages/${I}`, {
                    method: "DELETE",
                    credentials: "include"
                })).ok)
                    throw new Error("Error al eliminar página");
                x.invalidateQueries({
                    queryKey: ["/api/admin/cms/pages"]
                }),
                g({
                    title: "Página eliminada exitosamente"
                })
            } catch {
                g({
                    title: "Error al eliminar página",
                    variant: "destructive"
                })
            }
        },
        O = async () => {
            try {
                const I = a ? "PUT" : "POST",
                    z = a ? `/api/admin/cms/footer-blocks/${a.id}` : "/api/admin/cms/footer-blocks";
                if (!(await fetch(z, {
                    method: I,
                    headers: {
                        "Content-Type": "application/json"
                    },
                    credentials: "include",
                    body: JSON.stringify(c)
                })).ok)
                    throw new Error("Error al guardar bloque");
                x.invalidateQueries({
                    queryKey: ["/api/admin/cms/footer-blocks"]
                }),
                i(null),
                d({}),
                y(!1),
                g({
                    title: a ? "Bloque actualizado exitosamente" : "Bloque creado exitosamente"
                })
            } catch {
                g({
                    title: "Error al guardar bloque",
                    variant: "destructive"
                })
            }
        },
        G = async I => {
            try {
                if (!(await fetch(`/api/admin/cms/footer-blocks/${I}`, {
                    method: "DELETE",
                    credentials: "include"
                })).ok)
                    throw new Error("Error al eliminar bloque");
                x.invalidateQueries({
                    queryKey: ["/api/admin/cms/footer-blocks"]
                }),
                g({
                    title: "Bloque eliminado exitosamente"
                })
            } catch {
                g({
                    title: "Error al eliminar bloque",
                    variant: "destructive"
                })
            }
        },
        L = async (I, z) => {
            try {
                if (!(await fetch(`/api/cms/site-settings/${I}`, {
                    method: "PUT",
                    headers: {
                        "Content-Type": "application/json"
                    },
                    credentials: "include",
                    body: JSON.stringify({
                        value: z
                    })
                })).ok)
                    throw new Error("Error al actualizar configuración");
                x.invalidateQueries({
                    queryKey: ["/api/cms/site-settings"]
                }),
                g({
                    title: "Configuración actualizada exitosamente"
                })
            } catch {
                g({
                    title: "Error al actualizar configuración",
                    variant: "destructive"
                })
            }
        };
    return e.jsxs("div", {
        className: "flex min-h-screen bg-background",
        children: [e.jsx(Fs, {
            activeTab: "admin_cms"
        }), e.jsxs("div", {
            className: "flex-1 p-6",
            children: [e.jsx("h1", {
                className: "text-3xl font-bold mb-8",
                children: "Sistema de Gestión de Contenido"
            }), e.jsxs("div", {
                className: "flex space-x-2 mb-6 border-b pb-4",
                children: [e.jsx(A, {
                    variant: t === "pages" ? "default" : "outline",
                    onClick: () => s("pages"),
                    children: "Páginas"
                }), e.jsx(A, {
                    variant: t === "footer" ? "default" : "outline",
                    onClick: () => s("footer"),
                    children: "Footer"
                }), e.jsx(A, {
                    variant: t === "settings" ? "default" : "outline",
                    onClick: () => s("settings"),
                    children: "Configuraciones"
                })]
            }), t === "pages" && e.jsxs("div", {
                className: "space-y-6",
                children: [e.jsxs("div", {
                    className: "flex justify-between items-center",
                    children: [e.jsx("h2", {
                        className: "text-2xl font-semibold",
                        children: "Gestión de Páginas"
                    }), e.jsxs(A, {
                        onClick: () => {
                            m(!0),
                            l({
                                title: "",
                                slug: "",
                                content: "",
                                metaDescription: "",
                                isPublished: !0,
                                isEditable: !0,
                                pageType: "static"
                            })
                        },
                        children: [e.jsx(an, {
                            className: "w-4 h-4 mr-2"
                        }), "Nueva Página"]
                    })]
                }), e.jsxs("div", {
                    className: "grid grid-cols-1 lg:grid-cols-2 gap-6",
                    children: [e.jsxs(V, {
                        children: [e.jsx(ne, {
                            children: e.jsx(ae, {
                                children: "Páginas Existentes"
                            })
                        }), e.jsx(U, {
                            className: "space-y-4",
                            children: j ? e.jsx("div", {
                                children: "Cargando páginas..."
                            }) : b == null ? void 0 : b.map(I => e.jsxs("div", {
                                className: "flex items-center justify-between p-4 border rounded-lg",
                                children: [e.jsxs("div", {
                                    className: "space-y-1",
                                    children: [e.jsx("h3", {
                                        className: "font-medium",
                                        children: I.title
                                    }), e.jsxs("p", {
                                        className: "text-sm text-muted-foreground",
                                        children: ["/", I.slug]
                                    }), e.jsxs("div", {
                                        className: "flex gap-2",
                                        children: [e.jsx(ge, {
                                            variant: I.isPublished ? "default" : "secondary",
                                            children: I.isPublished ? "Publicada" : "Borrador"
                                        }), e.jsx(ge, {
                                            variant: "outline",
                                            children: I.pageType
                                        })]
                                    })]
                                }), e.jsxs("div", {
                                    className: "flex gap-2",
                                    children: [e.jsx(A, {
                                        size: "sm",
                                        variant: "outline",
                                        onClick: () => {
                                            n(I),
                                            l(I),
                                            m(!1)
                                        },
                                        children: e.jsx(qr, {
                                            className: "w-4 h-4"
                                        })
                                    }), I.isEditable && e.jsx(A, {
                                        size: "sm",
                                        variant: "destructive",
                                        onClick: () => E(I.id),
                                        children: e.jsx(Jt, {
                                            className: "w-4 h-4"
                                        })
                                    })]
                                })]
                            }, I.id))
                        })]
                    }), (r || u) && e.jsxs(V, {
                        children: [e.jsx(ne, {
                            children: e.jsx(ae, {
                                children: u ? "Nueva Página" : `Editando: ${r == null ? void 0 : r.title}`
                            })
                        }), e.jsxs(U, {
                            className: "space-y-4",
                            children: [e.jsxs("div", {
                                className: "space-y-2",
                                children: [e.jsx(q, {
                                    htmlFor: "title",
                                    children: "Título"
                                }), e.jsx(te, {
                                    id: "title",
                                    value: o.title || "",
                                    onChange: I => l({
                                        ...o,
                                        title: I.target.value
                                    }),
                                    placeholder: "Título de la página"
                                })]
                            }), e.jsxs("div", {
                                className: "space-y-2",
                                children: [e.jsx(q, {
                                    htmlFor: "slug",
                                    children: "Slug (URL)"
                                }), e.jsx(te, {
                                    id: "slug",
                                    value: o.slug || "",
                                    onChange: I => l({
                                        ...o,
                                        slug: I.target.value
                                    }),
                                    placeholder: "url-de-la-pagina"
                                })]
                            }), e.jsxs("div", {
                                className: "space-y-2",
                                children: [e.jsx(q, {
                                    htmlFor: "content",
                                    children: "Contenido"
                                }), e.jsx(FM, {
                                    content: o.content || "",
                                    onChange: I => l({
                                        ...o,
                                        content: I
                                    }),
                                    placeholder: "Escriba el contenido de la página aquí...",
                                    className: "min-h-[400px]"
                                })]
                            }), e.jsxs("div", {
                                className: "flex items-center space-x-2",
                                children: [e.jsx(St, {
                                    id: "isPublished",
                                    checked: o.isPublished || !1,
                                    onCheckedChange: I => l({
                                        ...o,
                                        isPublished: I
                                    })
                                }), e.jsx(q, {
                                    htmlFor: "isPublished",
                                    children: "Página publicada"
                                })]
                            }), e.jsxs("div", {
                                className: "flex gap-2",
                                children: [e.jsxs(A, {
                                    onClick: S,
                                    children: [e.jsx(Nn, {
                                        className: "w-4 h-4 mr-2"
                                    }), "Guardar"]
                                }), e.jsxs(A, {
                                    variant: "outline",
                                    onClick: () => {
                                        n(null),
                                        l({}),
                                        m(!1)
                                    },
                                    children: [e.jsx(Xs, {
                                        className: "w-4 h-4 mr-2"
                                    }), "Cancelar"]
                                })]
                            })]
                        })]
                    })]
                })]
            }), t === "footer" && e.jsxs("div", {
                className: "space-y-6",
                children: [e.jsxs("div", {
                    className: "flex justify-between items-center",
                    children: [e.jsx("h2", {
                        className: "text-2xl font-semibold",
                        children: "Gestión del Footer"
                    }), e.jsxs(A, {
                        onClick: () => {
                            y(!0),
                            d({
                                title: "",
                                content: "",
                                blockType: "text",
                                sortOrder: 0,
                                isActive: !0
                            })
                        },
                        children: [e.jsx(an, {
                            className: "w-4 h-4 mr-2"
                        }), "Nuevo Bloque"]
                    })]
                }), e.jsxs("div", {
                    className: "grid grid-cols-1 lg:grid-cols-2 gap-6",
                    children: [e.jsxs(V, {
                        children: [e.jsx(ne, {
                            children: e.jsx(ae, {
                                children: "Bloques del Footer"
                            })
                        }), e.jsx(U, {
                            className: "space-y-4",
                            children: v ? e.jsx("div", {
                                children: "Cargando bloques..."
                            }) : p == null ? void 0 : p.map(I => e.jsxs("div", {
                                className: "flex items-center justify-between p-4 border rounded-lg",
                                children: [e.jsxs("div", {
                                    className: "space-y-1",
                                    children: [e.jsx("h3", {
                                        className: "font-medium",
                                        children: I.title
                                    }), e.jsx("p", {
                                        className: "text-sm text-muted-foreground line-clamp-2",
                                        children: I.content
                                    }), e.jsx(ge, {
                                        variant: I.isActive ? "default" : "secondary",
                                        children: I.isActive ? "Activo" : "Inactivo"
                                    })]
                                }), e.jsxs("div", {
                                    className: "flex gap-2",
                                    children: [e.jsx(A, {
                                        size: "sm",
                                        variant: "outline",
                                        onClick: () => {
                                            i(I),
                                            d(I),
                                            y(!1)
                                        },
                                        children: e.jsx(qr, {
                                            className: "w-4 h-4"
                                        })
                                    }), e.jsx(A, {
                                        size: "sm",
                                        variant: "destructive",
                                        onClick: () => G(I.id),
                                        children: e.jsx(Jt, {
                                            className: "w-4 h-4"
                                        })
                                    })]
                                })]
                            }, I.id))
                        })]
                    }), (a || f) && e.jsxs(V, {
                        children: [e.jsx(ne, {
                            children: e.jsx(ae, {
                                children: f ? "Nuevo Bloque" : `Editando: ${a == null ? void 0 : a.title}`
                            })
                        }), e.jsxs(U, {
                            className: "space-y-4",
                            children: [e.jsxs("div", {
                                className: "space-y-2",
                                children: [e.jsx(q, {
                                    htmlFor: "block-title",
                                    children: "Título"
                                }), e.jsx(te, {
                                    id: "block-title",
                                    value: c.title || "",
                                    onChange: I => d({
                                        ...c,
                                        title: I.target.value
                                    }),
                                    placeholder: "Título del bloque"
                                })]
                            }), e.jsxs("div", {
                                className: "space-y-2",
                                children: [e.jsx(q, {
                                    htmlFor: "block-content",
                                    children: "Contenido"
                                }), e.jsx(Ut, {
                                    id: "block-content",
                                    value: c.content || "",
                                    onChange: I => d({
                                        ...c,
                                        content: I.target.value
                                    }),
                                    placeholder: "Contenido del bloque",
                                    rows: 6
                                })]
                            }), e.jsxs("div", {
                                className: "flex gap-2",
                                children: [e.jsxs(A, {
                                    onClick: O,
                                    children: [e.jsx(Nn, {
                                        className: "w-4 h-4 mr-2"
                                    }), "Guardar"]
                                }), e.jsxs(A, {
                                    variant: "outline",
                                    onClick: () => {
                                        i(null),
                                        d({}),
                                        y(!1)
                                    },
                                    children: [e.jsx(Xs, {
                                        className: "w-4 h-4 mr-2"
                                    }), "Cancelar"]
                                })]
                            })]
                        })]
                    })]
                })]
            }), t === "settings" && e.jsxs("div", {
                className: "space-y-6",
                children: [e.jsx("h2", {
                    className: "text-2xl font-semibold",
                    children: "Configuraciones del Sitio"
                }), e.jsxs("div", {
                    className: "grid grid-cols-1 lg:grid-cols-2 gap-6",
                    children: [e.jsxs(V, {
                        children: [e.jsx(ne, {
                            children: e.jsxs(ae, {
                                className: "flex items-center gap-2",
                                children: [e.jsx(Us, {
                                    className: "w-5 h-5"
                                }), "Configuración del Header"]
                            })
                        }), e.jsx(U, {
                            className: "space-y-4",
                            children: w ? e.jsx("div", {
                                children: "Cargando configuraciones..."
                            }) : N == null ? void 0 : N.filter(I => I.category === "header").map(I => e.jsxs("div", {
                                className: "space-y-2",
                                children: [e.jsxs("div", {
                                    className: "flex items-center justify-between",
                                    children: [e.jsx("div", {
                                        children: e.jsx(q, {
                                            htmlFor: I.key,
                                            children: I.description || I.key
                                        })
                                    }), e.jsx(ge, {
                                        variant: "outline",
                                        children: "header"
                                    })]
                                }), I.type === "boolean" ? e.jsxs("div", {
                                    className: "flex items-center space-x-2",
                                    children: [e.jsx(St, {
                                        id: I.key,
                                        defaultChecked: I.value === "true",
                                        onCheckedChange: z => {
                                            L(I.key, z.toString())
                                        }
                                    }), e.jsx(q, {
                                        htmlFor: I.key,
                                        children: I.value === "true" ? "Activado" : "Desactivado"
                                    })]
                                }) : e.jsx(te, {
                                    id: I.key,
                                    defaultValue: I.value,
                                    onBlur: z => {
                                        z.target.value !== I.value && L(I.key, z.target.value)
                                    },
                                    className: "bg-gray-50"
                                })]
                            }, I.id))
                        })]
                    }), e.jsxs(V, {
                        children: [e.jsx(ne, {
                            children: e.jsxs(ae, {
                                className: "flex items-center gap-2",
                                children: [e.jsx(Aj, {
                                    className: "w-5 h-5"
                                }), "Configuración General"]
                            })
                        }), e.jsx(U, {
                            className: "space-y-4",
                            children: w ? e.jsx("div", {
                                children: "Cargando configuraciones..."
                            }) : N == null ? void 0 : N.filter(I => I.category === "general").map(I => e.jsxs("div", {
                                className: "space-y-2",
                                children: [e.jsxs("div", {
                                    className: "flex items-center justify-between",
                                    children: [e.jsx("div", {
                                        children: e.jsx(q, {
                                            htmlFor: I.key,
                                            children: I.description || I.key
                                        })
                                    }), e.jsx(ge, {
                                        variant: "outline",
                                        children: "general"
                                    })]
                                }), I.type === "json" ? e.jsx(Ut, {
                                    id: I.key,
                                    defaultValue: I.value,
                                    onBlur: z => {
                                        z.target.value !== I.value && L(I.key, z.target.value)
                                    },
                                    rows: 4,
                                    className: "bg-gray-50 font-mono text-sm"
                                }) : e.jsx(te, {
                                    id: I.key,
                                    defaultValue: I.value,
                                    onBlur: z => {
                                        z.target.value !== I.value && L(I.key, z.target.value)
                                    },
                                    className: "bg-gray-50"
                                })]
                            }, I.id))
                        })]
                    }), e.jsxs(V, {
                        children: [e.jsx(ne, {
                            children: e.jsxs(ae, {
                                className: "flex items-center gap-2",
                                children: [e.jsx(Qn, {
                                    className: "w-5 h-5"
                                }), "Información de Contacto"]
                            })
                        }), e.jsx(U, {
                            className: "space-y-4",
                            children: N == null ? void 0 : N.filter(I => I.category === "contact").map(I => e.jsxs("div", {
                                className: "space-y-2",
                                children: [e.jsxs("div", {
                                    className: "flex items-center justify-between",
                                    children: [e.jsx("div", {
                                        children: e.jsx(q, {
                                            htmlFor: I.key,
                                            children: I.description || I.key
                                        })
                                    }), e.jsx(ge, {
                                        variant: "outline",
                                        children: "contacto"
                                    })]
                                }), e.jsx(te, {
                                    id: I.key,
                                    type: I.type === "email" ? "email" : "text",
                                    defaultValue: I.value,
                                    onBlur: z => {
                                        z.target.value !== I.value && L(I.key, z.target.value)
                                    },
                                    className: "bg-gray-50"
                                })]
                            }, I.id))
                        })]
                    }), e.jsxs(V, {
                        children: [e.jsx(ne, {
                            children: e.jsxs(ae, {
                                className: "flex items-center gap-2",
                                children: [e.jsx(ME, {
                                    className: "w-5 h-5"
                                }), "Configuración del Footer"]
                            })
                        }), e.jsx(U, {
                            className: "space-y-4",
                            children: N == null ? void 0 : N.filter(I => I.category === "footer").map(I => e.jsxs("div", {
                                className: "space-y-2",
                                children: [e.jsxs("div", {
                                    className: "flex items-center justify-between",

                                        children: e.jsx(q, {
                                            htmlFor: I.key,
                                            children: I.description || I.key
                                        })
                                    }), e.jsx(ge, {
                                        variant: "outline",
                                        children: "footer"
                                    })]

                                    },

                                        z.target.value !== I.value && L(I.key, z.target.value)
                                    },
                                    className: "bg-gray-50"
                                })]
                            }, I.id))
                        })]
                    })]
                }), e.jsxs(V, {
                    children: [e.jsx(ne, {
                        children: e.jsxs(ae, {
                            className: "flex items-center gap-2",
                            children: [e.jsx(Os, {
                                className: "w-5 h-5"
                            }), "Configuración de Formularios"]
                        })
                    }), e.jsx(U, {
                        children: e.jsx("div", {
                            className: "grid grid-cols-1 md:grid-cols-2 gap-4",
                            children: N == null ? void 0 : N.filter(I => I.category === "forms").map(I => e.jsxs("div", {
                                className: "space-y-2",
                                children: [e.jsxs("div", {
                                    className: "flex items-center justify-between",
                                    children: [e.jsx("div", {
                                        children: e.jsx(q, {
                                            htmlFor: I.key,
                                            children: I.description || I.key
                                        })
                                    }), e.jsx(ge, {
                                        variant: "outline",
                                        children: "formularios"
                                    })]
                                }), e.jsx(te, {
                                    id: I.key,
                                    type: "email",
                                    defaultValue: I.value,
                                    onBlur: z => {
                                        z.target.value !== I.value && L(I.key, z.target.value)
                                    },
                                    className: "bg-gray-50"
                                })]
                            }, I.id))
                        })
                    })]
                })]
            })]
        })]
    })
}
function rY() {
    const [, t] = dt(),
        [s, r] = h.useState(null),
        [n, a] = h.useState(""),
        [i, o] = h.useState(!1),
        l = () => {
            var f;
            if (!s)
                return;
            if (o(!0), console.log("🚨 PÁGINA INTERMEDIA - Enviando datos a Redsys"), console.log("🚨 DATOS COMPLETOS:", {
                actionUrl: s.actionUrl,
                merchantParameters: s.merchantParameters,
                signature: s.signature,
                hasFormHtml: !!s.formHtml,
                orderNumber: s.orderNumber,
                amount: s.amount
            }), s.formHtml) {
                console.log("🚨 USANDO FORMULARIO HTML DEL BACKEND");
                const y = document.createElement("div"),
                    b = new DOMParser().parseFromString(s.formHtml, "text/html").querySelector("form");
                b && y.appendChild(b.cloneNode(!0));
                const j = y.querySelector("form");
                if (j) {
                    j.style.display = "none",
                    document.body.appendChild(j),
                    console.log("🚨 FORMULARIO DEL BACKEND AÑADIDO AL DOM"),
                    console.log("- Action:", j.action),
                    console.log("- Method:", j.method),
                    console.log("- Fields count:", j.children.length);
                    const p = j.querySelector('input[name="Ds_SignatureVersion"]'),
                        v = j.querySelector('input[name="Ds_MerchantParameters"]'),
                        N = j.querySelector('input[name="Ds_Signature"]');
                    console.log("🚨 VERIFICANDO CAMPOS:"),
                    console.log("- Ds_SignatureVersion:", p == null ? void 0 : p.value),
                    console.log("- Ds_MerchantParameters length:", (f = v == null ? void 0 : v.value) == null ? void 0 : f.length),
                    console.log("- Ds_Signature:", N == null ? void 0 : N.value),
                    console.log("🚨 ENVIANDO FORMULARIO DEL BACKEND A REDSYS..."),
                    j.submit(),
                    sessionStorage.removeItem("redsysPaymentData");
                    return
                }
            }
            console.log("🚨 FALLBACK: Creando formulario manualmente");
            const c = document.createElement("form");
            c.method = "POST",
            c.action = s.actionUrl,
            c.acceptCharset = "UTF-8",
            c.enctype = "application/x-www-form-urlencoded",
            c.style.display = "none";
            const d = document.createElement("input");
            d.type = "hidden",
            d.name = "Ds_SignatureVersion",
            d.value = "HMAC_SHA256_V1",
            c.appendChild(d);
            const u = document.createElement("input");
            u.type = "hidden",
            u.name = "Ds_MerchantParameters",
            u.value = s.merchantParameters,
            c.appendChild(u);
            const m = document.createElement("input");
            m.type = "hidden",
            m.name = "Ds_Signature",
            m.value = s.signature,
            c.appendChild(m),
            document.body.appendChild(c),
            console.log("🚨 FORMULARIO MANUAL CREADO - Verificando campos:"),
            console.log("- Action:", c.action),
            console.log("- Method:", c.method),
            console.log("- Fields count:", c.children.length),
            console.log("- Ds_SignatureVersion:", d.value),
            console.log("- Ds_MerchantParameters length:", u.value.length),
            console.log("- Ds_Signature:", m.value),
            console.log("🚨 ENVIANDO FORMULARIO MANUAL A REDSYS..."),
            c.submit(),
            sessionStorage.removeItem("redsysPaymentData")
        };
    return h.useEffect(() => {
        var d,
            u;
        const c = sessionStorage.getItem("redsysPaymentData");
        if (!c) {
            a("No se encontraron datos de pago. Redirigiendo al checkout..."),
            setTimeout(() => t("/checkout"), 3e3);
            return
        }
        try {
            const m = JSON.parse(c);
            r(m),
            console.log("🚨 PÁGINA INTERMEDIA - Datos recibidos:", {
                hasFormHtml: !!m.formHtml,
                formHtmlLength: (d = m.formHtml) == null ? void 0 : d.length,
                actionUrl: m.actionUrl,
                merchantParameters: ((u = m.merchantParameters) == null ? void 0 : u.substring(0, 50)) + "...",
                signature: m.signature,
                orderNumber: m.orderNumber,
                amount: m.amount
            }),
            console.log("🚨 INICIANDO ENVÍO AUTOMÁTICO A REDSYS"),
            setTimeout(() => {
                l()
            }, 1500)
        } catch (m) {
            a("Error al procesar los datos de pago"),
            console.error("Error parsing Redsys data:", m)
        }
    }, [t]), n ? e.jsx("div", {
        className: "min-h-screen flex items-center justify-center bg-gray-50",
        children: e.jsx("div", {
            className: "max-w-md w-full bg-white rounded-lg shadow-md p-6",
            children: e.jsxs("div", {
                className: "text-center",
                children: [e.jsx("div", {
                    className: "w-12 h-12 mx-auto mb-4 bg-red-100 rounded-full flex items-center justify-center",
                    children: e.jsx("svg", {
                        className: "w-6 h-6 text-red-600",
                        fill: "none",
                        stroke: "currentColor",
                        viewBox: "0 0 24 24",
                        children: e.jsx("path", {
                            strokeLinecap: "round",
                            strokeLinejoin: "round",
                            strokeWidth: 2,
                            d: "M12 9v2m0 4h.01m-6.938 4h13.856c1.54 0 2.502-1.667 1.732-2.5L13.732 4c-.77-.833-1.964-.833-2.732 0L3.082 16.5c-.77.833.192 2.5 1.732 2.5z"
                        })
                    })
                }), e.jsx("h2", {
                    className: "text-xl font-semibold text-gray-900 mb-2",
                    children: "Error en el proceso de pago"
                }), e.jsx("p", {
                    className: "text-gray-600 mb-4",
                    children: n
                }), e.jsx("button", {
                    onClick: () => t("/checkout"),
                    className: "w-full bg-blue-600 text-white py-2 px-4 rounded-lg hover:bg-blue-700 transition-colors",
                    children: "Volver al checkout"
                })]
            })
        })
    }) : s ? e.jsx("div", {
        className: "min-h-screen flex items-center justify-center bg-gray-50",
        children: e.jsx("div", {
            className: "max-w-md w-full bg-white rounded-lg shadow-md p-6",
            children: e.jsxs("div", {
                className: "text-center",
                children: [e.jsx("div", {
                    className: "w-12 h-12 mx-auto mb-4 bg-blue-100 rounded-full flex items-center justify-center",
                    children: e.jsx("svg", {
                        className: "w-6 h-6 text-blue-600",
                        fill: "none",
                        stroke: "currentColor",
                        viewBox: "0 0 24 24",
                        children: e.jsx("path", {
                            strokeLinecap: "round",
                            strokeLinejoin: "round",
                            strokeWidth: 2,
                            d: "M12 15v2m-6 4h12a2 2 0 002-2v-6a2 2 0 00-2-2H6a2 2 0 00-2 2v6a2 2 0 002 2zm10-10V7a4 4 0 00-8 0v4h8z"
                        })
                    })
                }), e.jsx("h2", {
                    className: "text-xl font-semibold text-gray-900 mb-2",
                    children: "Redirigiendo al pago seguro"
                }), e.jsx("p", {
                    className: "text-gray-600 mb-4",
                    children: "Estás siendo redirigido a la pasarela de pago segura de Redsys para completar tu compra."
                }), e.jsx("div", {
                    className: "bg-gray-50 rounded-lg p-4 mb-6",
                    children: e.jsxs("div", {
                        className: "text-sm text-gray-600 mb-2",
                        children: [e.jsxs("div", {
                            className: "flex justify-between",
                            children: [e.jsx("span", {
                                children: "Pedido:"
                            }), e.jsx("span", {
                                className: "font-medium",
                                children: s.reference || s.orderNumber || "N/A"
                            })]
                        }), e.jsxs("div", {
                            className: "flex justify-between",
                            children: [e.jsx("span", {
                                children: "Importe:"
                            }), e.jsxs("span", {
                                className: "font-medium",
                                children: [s.totalAmount ? s.totalAmount.toFixed(2) : s.amount ? (s.amount / 100).toFixed(2) : "0.00", "€"]
                            })]
                        })]
                    })
                }), i ? e.jsx("div", {
                    className: "w-full bg-green-600 text-white py-3 px-4 rounded-lg font-medium",
                    children: e.jsxs("div", {
                        className: "flex items-center justify-center",
                        children: [e.jsx("div", {
                            className: "animate-spin rounded-full h-4 w-4 border-b-2 border-white mr-2"
                        }), "Redirigiendo a Redsys..."]
                    })
                }) : e.jsx("button", {
                    onClick: l,
                    className: "w-full bg-red-600 text-white py-3 px-4 rounded-lg hover:bg-red-700 transition-colors font-medium",
                    children: "Continuar con el pago en Redsys"
                }), e.jsx("p", {
                    className: "text-xs text-gray-500 mt-4",
                    children: "Si no eres redirigido automáticamente, haz clic en el botón de arriba."
                })]
            })
        })
    }) : e.jsx("div", {
        className: "min-h-screen flex items-center justify-center bg-gray-50",
        children: e.jsxs("div", {
            className: "text-center",
            children: [e.jsx("div", {
                className: "animate-spin rounded-full h-12 w-12 border-b-2 border-blue-600 mx-auto mb-4"
            }), e.jsx("p", {
                className: "text-gray-600",
                children: "Preparando el pago..."
            })]
        })
    })
}
function nY() {
    const [t, s] = h.useState("pages"),
        [r, n] = h.useState(null),
        [a, i] = h.useState(null),
        [o, l] = h.useState({}),
        [c, d] = h.useState({}),
        [u, m] = h.useState(!1),
        [f, y] = h.useState(!1),
        [g, x] = h.useState({}),
        [b, j] = h.useState({}),
        {toast: p} = tt(),
        v = hr(),
        {data: N, isLoading: w} = _e({
            queryKey: ["/api/admin/cms/pages"],
            queryFn: async () => {
                const T = await fetch("/api/admin/cms/pages", {
                    credentials: "include"
                });
                if (!T.ok)
                    throw new Error("Error al cargar páginas");
                return T.json()
            }
        }),
        {data: C, isLoading: S} = _e({
            queryKey: ["/api/admin/cms/footer-blocks"],
            queryFn: async () => {
                const T = await fetch("/api/admin/cms/footer-blocks", {
                    credentials: "include"
                });
                if (!T.ok)
                    throw new Error("Error al cargar bloques");
                return T.json()
            }
        }),
        {data: E, isLoading: O} = _e({
            queryKey: ["/api/cms/site-settings"],
            queryFn: async () => {
                const T = await fetch("/api/cms/site-settings", {
                    credentials: "include"
                });
                if (!T.ok)
                    throw new Error("Error al cargar configuraciones");
                return T.json()
            }
        }),
        G = async (T, k) => {
            x(D => ({
                ...D,
                [T]: !0
            }));
            try {
                if (!(await fetch(`/api/cms/site-settings/${T}`, {
                    method: "PUT",
                    headers: {
                        "Content-Type": "application/json"
                    },
                    credentials: "include",
                    body: JSON.stringify({
                        value: k
                    })
                })).ok)
                    throw new Error("Error al actualizar configuración");
                v.invalidateQueries({
                    queryKey: ["/api/cms/site-settings"]
                }),
                j($ => {
                    const re = {
                        ...$
                    };
                    return delete re[T], re
                }),
                p({
                    title: "Configuración guardada",
                    description: "Los cambios se han guardado correctamente"
                })
            } catch {
                p({
                    title: "Error al guardar",
                    description: "No se pudo guardar la configuración",
                    variant: "destructive"
                })
            } finally {
                x(D => ({
                    ...D,
                    [T]: !1
                }))
            }
        },
        L = (T, k) => {
            j(D => ({
                ...D,
                [T]: k
            }))
        },
        I = async () => {
            x(T => ({
                ...T,
                page: !0
            }));
            try {
                const T = r ? "PUT" : "POST",
                    k = r ? `/api/admin/cms/pages/${r.id}` : "/api/admin/cms/pages";
                if (!(await fetch(k, {
                    method: T,
                    headers: {
                        "Content-Type": "application/json"
                    },
                    credentials: "include",
                    body: JSON.stringify(o)
                })).ok)
                    throw new Error("Error al guardar página");
                v.invalidateQueries({
                    queryKey: ["/api/admin/cms/pages"]
                }),
                n(null),
                l({}),
                m(!1),
                p({
                    title: r ? "Página actualizada" : "Página creada"
                })
            } catch {
                p({
                    title: "Error al guardar página",
                    variant: "destructive"
                })
            } finally {
                x(T => ({
                    ...T,
                    page: !1
                }))
            }
        },
        z = async () => {
            x(T => ({
                ...T,
                block: !0
            }));
            try {
                const T = a ? "PUT" : "POST",
                    k = a ? `/api/admin/cms/footer-blocks/${a.id}` : "/api/admin/cms/footer-blocks";
                if (!(await fetch(k, {
                    method: T,
                    headers: {
                        "Content-Type": "application/json"
                    },
                    credentials: "include",
                    body: JSON.stringify(c)
                })).ok)
                    throw new Error("Error al guardar bloque");
                v.invalidateQueries({
                    queryKey: ["/api/admin/cms/footer-blocks"]
                }),
                i(null),
                d({}),
                y(!1),
                p({
                    title: a ? "Bloque actualizado" : "Bloque creado"
                })
            } catch {
                p({
                    title: "Error al guardar bloque",
                    variant: "destructive"
                })
            } finally {
                x(T => ({
                    ...T,
                    block: !1
                }))
            }
        },
        B = async T => {
            try {
                if (!(await fetch(`/api/admin/cms/footer-blocks/${T}`, {
                    method: "DELETE",
                    credentials: "include"
                })).ok)
                    throw new Error("Error al eliminar bloque");
                v.invalidateQueries({
                    queryKey: ["/api/admin/cms/footer-blocks"]
                }),
                p({
                    title: "Bloque eliminado"
                })
            } catch {
                p({
                    title: "Error al eliminar bloque",
                    variant: "destructive"
                })
            }
        },
        F = T => {
            var re;
            const k = b[T.key] !== void 0,
                D = k ? b[T.key] : T.value,
                $ = g[T.key];
            return e.jsxs("div", {
                className: "space-y-3 p-4 border rounded-lg bg-gray-50",
                children: [e.jsxs("div", {
                    className: "flex items-center justify-between",
                    children: [e.jsxs("div", {
                        className: "flex-1",
                        children: [e.jsx(q, {
                            htmlFor: T.key,
                            className: "text-sm font-medium",
                            children: T.description || T.key
                        }), e.jsxs("div", {
                            className: "flex items-center gap-2 mt-1",
                            children: [e.jsx(ge, {
                                variant: "outline",
                                className: "text-xs",
                                children: T.category
                            }), e.jsx(ge, {
                                variant: "outline",
                                className: "text-xs",
                                children: T.type
                            })]
                        })]
                    }), k && e.jsx(A, {
                        size: "sm",
                        onClick: () => G(T.key, D),
                        disabled: $,
                        className: "ml-2",
                        children: $ ? e.jsx("div", {
                            className: "w-4 h-4 border-2 border-white border-t-transparent rounded-full animate-spin"
                        }) : e.jsx(Nn, {
                            className: "w-4 h-4"
                        })
                    })]
                }), T.type === "boolean" ? e.jsxs("div", {
                    className: "flex items-center space-x-2",
                    children: [e.jsx(St, {
                        id: T.key,
                        checked: D === "true",
                        onCheckedChange: R => {
                            L(T.key, R.toString())
                        },
                        disabled: $
                    }), e.jsx(q, {
                        htmlFor: T.key,
                        className: "text-sm",
                        children: D === "true" ? "Activado" : "Desactivado"
                    })]
                }) : T.type === "json" ? e.jsx(Ut, {
                    id: T.key,
                    value: D,
                    onChange: R => L(T.key, R.target.value),
                    disabled: $,
                    rows: 4,
                    className: "font-mono text-sm",
                    placeholder: "Formato JSON válido"
                }) : T.type === "email" ? e.jsx(te, {
                    id: T.key,
                    type: "email",
                    value: D,
                    onChange: R => L(T.key, R.target.value),
                    disabled: $,
                    placeholder: "correo@ejemplo.com"
                }) : e.jsx(te, {
                    id: T.key,
                    value: D,
                    onChange: R => L(T.key, R.target.value),
                    disabled: $,
                    placeholder: `Ingrese ${((re = T.description) == null ? void 0 : re.toLowerCase()) || T.key}`
                })]
            }, T.id)
        };
    return e.jsxs("div", {
        className: "flex min-h-screen bg-background",
        children: [e.jsx(Fs, {
            activeTab: "admin_cms"
        }), e.jsxs("div", {
            className: "flex-1 p-6",
            children: [e.jsxs("div", {
                className: "mb-8",
                children: [e.jsx("h1", {
                    className: "text-3xl font-bold mb-2",
                    children: "Sistema de Gestión de Contenido"
                }), e.jsx("p", {
                    className: "text-muted-foreground",
                    children: "Gestiona páginas, bloques del footer y configuraciones del sitio web"
                })]
            }), e.jsxs(ls, {
                value: t,
                onValueChange: s,
                className: "w-full",
                children: [e.jsxs(es, {
                    className: "grid w-full grid-cols-4",
                    children: [e.jsxs(Ve, {
                        value: "pages",
                        className: "flex items-center gap-2",
                        children: [e.jsx(vu, {
                            className: "w-4 h-4"
                        }), "Páginas"]
                    }), e.jsxs(Ve, {
                        value: "header",
                        className: "flex items-center gap-2",
                        children: [e.jsx(dr, {
                            className: "w-4 h-4"
                        }), "Header"]
                    }), e.jsxs(Ve, {
                        value: "footer",
                        className: "flex items-center gap-2",
                        children: [e.jsx(ME, {
                            className: "w-4 h-4"
                        }), "Footer"]
                    }), e.jsxs(Ve, {
                        value: "settings",
                        className: "flex items-center gap-2",
                        children: [e.jsx(Us, {
                            className: "w-4 h-4"
                        }), "Configuraciones"]
                    })]
                }), e.jsxs(ze, {
                    value: "pages",
                    className: "space-y-6",
                    children: [e.jsxs("div", {
                        className: "flex justify-between items-center",
                        children: [e.jsx("h2", {
                            className: "text-2xl font-semibold",
                            children: "Gestión de Páginas"
                        }), e.jsxs(A, {
                            onClick: () => {
                                m(!0),
                                l({

                                    isEditable: !0,

                                })
                            },

                        })]
                    }), e.jsxs("div", {

                                            },

                            })]

                                        className: "w-5 h-5"
                                    }), "Contacto del Header"]
                                })
                            }), e.jsx(U, {
                                className: "space-y-4",
                                children: E == null ? void 0 : E.filter(T => T.category === "header" && !T.key.includes("hours")).map(F)
                            })]
                        })]
                    })]
                }), e.jsxs(ze, {
                    value: "settings",
                    className: "space-y-6",
                    children: [e.jsxs("div", {
                        className: "mb-6",

                        }), e.jsx("p", {

                        })]
                    }), O ? e.jsx("div", {

                        })
                    }) : e.jsxs("div", {
                        className: "grid grid-cols-1 lg:grid-cols-2 gap-6",

                                    }), "Configuración General"]
                                })
                            }), e.jsx(U, {
                                className: "space-y-4",
                                children: E == null ? void 0 : E.filter(T => T.category === "general").map(F)
                            })]
                        }), e.jsxs(V, {
                            children: [e.jsx(ne, {
                                children: e.jsxs(ae, {
                                    className: "flex items-center gap-2",
                                    children: [e.jsx(Qn, {
                                        className: "w-5 h-5"
                                    }), "Información de Contacto"]
                                })
                            }), e.jsx(U, {
                                className: "space-y-4",
                                children: E == null ? void 0 : E.filter(T => T.category === "contact").map(F)
                            })]
                        })]
                    }), (E == null ? void 0 : E.filter(T => T.category === "forms").length) > 0 && e.jsxs(V, {
                        children: [e.jsx(ne, {
                            children: e.jsxs(ae, {
                                className: "flex items-center gap-2",
                                children: [e.jsx(Os, {
                                    className: "w-5 h-5"
                                }), "Configuración de Formularios"]
                            })
                        }), e.jsx(U, {
                            children: e.jsx("div", {
                                className: "grid grid-cols-1 md:grid-cols-2 gap-4",
                                children: E == null ? void 0 : E.filter(T => T.category === "forms").map(F)
                            })
                        })]
                    })]
                })]
            })]
        })]
    })
}
function aY() {
    return e.jsxs("div", {
        className: "container mx-auto py-8",
        children: [e.jsx("h1", {
            className: "text-3xl font-bold mb-8",
            children: "Test de 5 Tabs"
        }), e.jsxs(ls, {
            defaultValue: "tab1",
            className: "space-y-6 mb-12",
            children: [e.jsxs(es, {
                className: "grid w-full grid-cols-5",
                children: [e.jsx(Ve, {
                    value: "tab1",
                    children: "Tab 1"
                }), e.jsx(Ve, {
                    value: "tab2",
                    children: "Tab 2"
                }), e.jsx(Ve, {
                    value: "tab3",
                    children: "Tab 3"

                    className: "bg-green-200 text-green-800 font-bold",

                }), e.jsx(Ve, {
                    value: "tab5",
                    children: "Tab 5"
                })]
            }), e.jsx(ze, {
                value: "tab1",
                children: e.jsxs(V, {
                    children: [e.jsx(ne, {
                        children: e.jsx(ae, {
                            children: "Tab 1 Content"
                        })
                    }), e.jsx(U, {
                        children: e.jsx("p", {
                            children: "Contenido del tab 1"
                        })
                    })]
                })
            }), e.jsx(ze, {
                value: "tab2",
                children: e.jsxs(V, {
                    children: [e.jsx(ne, {
                        children: e.jsx(ae, {
                            children: "Tab 2 Content"
                        })
                    }), e.jsx(U, {
                        children: e.jsx("p", {
                            children: "Contenido del tab 2"
                        })
                    })]
                })
            }), e.jsx(ze, {
